boing.world.text:
This is not an open-invite server.

You must already know someone on this instance, or have been to the event, or be from the fabled old place.

You must tell us who you already know to register, and we will actually check. So it might take a day or two, unless you are at the event.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No harassment, or incitement, or spam.
Just generally be chill, you know. This is a place for making friends and joking about not for making enemies and having arguments.

If you want Free Speech run your own server. This is /community moderated/ speech.

We will kick you off if you are too embarrassing, but also block other servers to defend you from anyone harassing you.
Do not copy any content from this server to any server or system owned or operated by Facebook, Meta, Instagram, Threads or any associated enterprise.

boldcity.social.text: Be respectful and courteous to all users.

Hate speech, discrimination, harassment, bullying and abusive/threating behavior will not be tolerated, specifically that which is directed at any race, color, religion, sex (including sexual orientation or gender identity), nationality, age, or disability.

Do not post illegal content or content that promotes illegal activities. This includes but is not limited to piracy, hacking, and drug use. It is your responsibility to ensure that the content you post is legal.

Posting or sending spam is not permitted. This includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services and utilizing direct message and tagging to send spam.
Respect the privacy of other users. Do not post personal information about others without their consent.

Use content warnings when appropriate. This includes sensitive content and topics such as violence, graphic content, and NSFW material. Accounts that are dedicated to posting sensitive content are not permitted. Repeat violations of this rule will result in suspension.

Accounts that impersonate a person, brand, or entity are not permitted, unless they clearly indicate in their bio AND account display name that the account is unofficial and/or parody. Accounts that cause confusion from other users may be disabled at the discretion of the admins.

Brand and entity accounts are permitted but are required to follow all rules. As it can be challenging to confirm the legitimacy of brand and entity accounts, it is suggested that you contact the admins prior to creating such accounts.
Do not create multiple accounts for the purposes of ban or suspension evasion. Please tag bot or alt accounts with your primary account.

Violation of the rules (or any action that is determined by the moderation team to be not permitted) will result in suspension or ban, potentially without notice or warning. You may appeal a moderator action but decisions by admins are final.
Please see the About page for a more detailed list of policies, rules, and information about this instance.

boles.xyz.text: Be positive. Be Kind. Be helpful. Answer questions. Provide Answers.
No Crypto or NFT links. Moderate your self-promotion. The Mastodon community is not a marketplace.
No hate speech. No cruelty. No Trolls.

boitam.eu.text:
Pour maintenir une instance tolérante, cette instance est intolérante à l'intolérance.

https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradoxe_de_la_tol%C3%A9rance
De ce fait, les idées racistes, xénophobes, islamophobes & antisémites, confusionistes & rouge-brunes, homophobes & transphobes ne sont pas les bienvenues.
Les discussions doivent se faire dans le respect de tous et toutes.
Le spam n'est pas bienvenu non plus.
Les photos de vélos doivent être prises côté transmission.
Cette instance se donne le droit de ne pas fédérer avec des serveurs qui hébergent des comptes qui ne respectent pas les quatre premières règles.
Cette instance ne fédérera pas avec des serveurs tenus par des entités qui ont été accusées par l’ONU d’avoir aidé un génocide.

bolha.one.hint: Não crie brigas entre usuários desta ou de outras instâncias. Evite escalar os ânimos das interações para mantê-las dentro da civilidade. Evite comportamentos vistos em outras redes, como trollagem, xingamentos, acusações levianas, ameaças, provocações e afins.

Não faça publicações racistas, machistas, sexistas, homofóbicas, transfóbicas, capacitistas, xenofóbicas, gordofóbicas, misóginas, entre outros tipos de preconceito. Também não erre propositalmente o gênero das pessoas nem mencione o nome que não é mais usado por elas (deadnaming).

É proibida a promoção de ideologias de extrema-direita, como o nazismo e fascismo. Também não incite nem defenda atos ou ideologias violentas. Apologia a toda e qualquer forma de opressão, exploração e humilhação entre seres humanos também está proibido.
Não espalhe notícias e informações sabidamente falsas, com divulgação deliberadamente feita para enganar, como, por exemplo, as que mentem sobre vacinas.

Não são permitidos conteúdos CSAM, ou seja, que contenham material com abuso sexual de crianças. O mesmo vale para CG-CSAM, ou seja, imagens geradas por computador ou outras mídias fictícias sexualizadas, incluindo lolicon e shotacon.

Não pratique assédio, avanços ou comportamentos indesejados. Respeite os limites dos demais usuários. Não participe de assédios em grupo (dogpilling), perseguição (stalking), ou vazamento de informações pessoais (doxxing) e afins.
Comportamentos considerados spam, como a prática de compartilhar links não solicitados mencionando terceiros, assim como mensagens enviadas com curtos intervalos entre elas são proibidos.
É proibido se passar por terceiros, sejam estes pessoas, empresas, marcas ou organizações. Não utilize imagens e informações de outras pessoas para se passar por elas ou criar uma identidade anônima.
Não faça promoção de anúncios pagos nem promoção excessiva de sua/uma empresa ou marca.

Não compartilhe conteúdos com violência explícita ou excessiva, sangue, cadáveres, feridas abertas, crueldade ou maus-tratos contra animais, com intenção de chocar. Em caso de notícias de portais, use o aviso de conteúdo (CW) ou marque como sensível.

bologna.one.text: No allo Spam, al Flooding e ai Bot
No al proselitismo e all'intolleranza religiosa
No a comportamenti molesti e tossici, dogpiling o doxxing.
No al razzismo, sessismo, misoginia, omofobia, bifobia, lesbofobia, transfobia, afobia
No alla diffusione intenzionale di notizie false, fuorvianti o manipolate e alla condivisione di informazioni con intenti antiscientifici.

bols.games.text: Do not share, trade, link to, or distribute in any manner here, any copyright material, without the express written consent of the owner.
Spam is not tolerated on BoLS.
No Prohibited Content: It is prohibited to link to pornography or content that can damage computers or data such as viruses or malware.

Do not use racist slurs, prejudiced comments, profanity, derogatory statements, or hate speech. Evading the moderation filters by using punctuation marks or purposefully misspelling words is considered an offense.

Do not initiate arguments of a personal nature. Be courteous to other users, even if you disagree with someone or believe that they are ill-informed. Refrain from flaming posts or comments. You may argue and debate, but do not make any attacks of a personal nature (including grammar trolling).

bongo.social.text: Respect the laws of Tanzania and adhere to guidelines regarding hate speech, defamation, and any other local regulations.

Engaging in threatening, abusive, intolerant, or illegal behavior is strictly prohibited and may result in moderation or further actions. We maintain a zero-tolerance policy towards racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
Please use the Content Warning flag for NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content, and mark NSFW media as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored closely. Spam accounts (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts, or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Harassment or bullying of other users will not be tolerated.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Spamming or engaging in any form of malicious activity is strictly prohibited.
Maintain civil and respectful discussions. Refrain from using derogatory language or participating in personal attacks.
Respect the privacy of others and avoid sharing personal information without their explicit consent.
When posting potentially sensitive or triggering content, use appropriate tags and content warnings.
If you observe a violation of these rules, promptly report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you must be at least 18 years old.
By following these guidelines, we aim to create a welcoming and respectful environment for all members of our community at Bongo Social.

bonga.nu.text:
Dit is mijn persoonlijke server, dus dit zijn regels voor mezelf. 

Voornaamste regel: Wees geen lul.

bolha.us.text: Don't disrepect other people ( Não desrespeite outros usuários )
Don't break the laws ( Não quebre as leis canadenses ou brasileiras )
No facism ( É proibido a apologia ao facismo )

No sexism and misogyny ( Não toleramos sexismo ou misoginia )
No violence or hate speech ( É proibida a apologia a violência e discurso de ódio )
No LGTBQIA+ Disrespect, this is a safe place for everyone.
No Neurodivergent (ADHD, Autism, etc.) Disrespect, this is a safe place for everyone.
No SPAM or Flood (não faça ou spam ou flood na timeline)
No explicit sexual content without warning, use the tag #NSFW always ( É proibido o conteúdo sexual explícito sem avisos )
No nudes that are not of your body, with warnings and tag #NSFW, always ( Sós poste nudes seus, use avisos )
If the content is not safe for work, always use sensitive for images, warning, and the tag #NSFW
Don't share protected material, especially software, music, books, photos and videos ( Não compartilhe material protegido, se o fizer vamos denunciar ).

Follow our Rules and Conduct Code to be part of our collective or be suspended. ( Você precisa seguir nossas regras e código de conduta para ser parte de nosso coletivo, do contrário sua conta será suspensa )
No porn (É proibida a pornografia).

bonn.social.text: Fühl Dich wie zu Hause in Bonn. Benimm Dich so, als könnten wir uns morgen wieder persönlich auf der Straße begegnen.
Als Nutzer*in von Bonn.social bist Du für Deine eigenen Inhalte verantwortlich.
Missbrauch kannst Du mit den Reporting-Tools oder unter email@bonn.digital melden.
Wir entwickeln die Regeln für diese Instanz so weiter, dass sich hier jeder wohlfühlen kann.

bookish.community.text: This is a server for official accounts of independent publishers and bookshops based in the UK.
Accounts on this server are on an invitation-only basis and invitations are given at the discretion of the administrator.
Hate speech will not be tolerated. This includes racism, homophobia, transphobia, misogyny and other forms of abuse.
Any explicit or NSFW content posted must use a content warning.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom.
No harmful misinformation or harrassment of others.

We expect accounts on this server to be friendly and respectful. If any accounts are found by the administrator not to be upholding these rules, they will be given the opportunity to move to another server.

bookstodon.es.text: No SPAM: Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no está permitido en la línea de tiempo pública el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por él.
Parodia: No se permite suplantar a otras personas, figuras públicas u organizaciones, excepto si está marcado claramente como parodia.

No odio/violencia: Se bloqueará toda cuenta o dominio que comparta enlaces o material multimedia violento o que promueva la violencia. Los administradores informarán a las autoridades en caso de que se encuentren indicios de actividad delictiva.

No violencia: Se bloqueará toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud. Como por ejemplo, y sin limitar, el consumo/distribución de drogas, los trastornos alimentarios, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopatía y la apología de conductas perjudiciales para la salud.

Desnudez: Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez está permitido siempre que se catalogue como material sensible e incluya advertencia o CW sobre el contenido, usando las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity y cumpla con todas las otras reglas (ilegal, pornografía)

Pornografía: Este nodo es un nodo libre de pornografía. No se permite distribuir enlaces, texto o material multimedia donde aparezca actividad sexual o fluidos corporales. No está permitido hacerlo ni catalogándolo como material sensible o añadiendo #NSFW.
Medicamentos: Se prohíbe la prescripción, recomendación o aconsejar el uso de cualquier tipo de medicamento, requiera o no receta médica, ya sea en público o en privado.

Drogas: Se podrá mostrar, en un contexto de moderación, material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco, siempre dentro del marco legal y con las advertencias que la ley prevé sobre su uso . Se prohíben los enlaces para comprar, vender o promocionar alcohol o tabaco.

Bebidas energéticas: Queda expresamente prohibida la difusión o la promoción de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual sobre las llamadas ‘bebidas energéticas’ con alto contenido con cafeína u otros tipos de estimulantes cuando se trate de marketing dirigido a menores.

Contenido ilegal: Queda totalmente prohibido, en público o en privado, compartir contenido donde haya, se intuya o se sugiera actividad sexual o desnudez de personas menores de edad. Cualquier infracción de este tipo será reportada a las autoridades.
Contenido ilegal: Prohibido el contenido ilegal según las leyes españolas y de la Unión Europea.

Discriminación: Esta instancia no acepta ningún tipo de comportamiento que atente contra la dignidad de las personas, por su raza, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal o riesgo de exclusión social.

Discriminación: Se considerará que atenta contra la dignidad de las personas cualquier indicio de racismo, machismo, capacitismo, LGTBIQ+ fobia, xenofobia, supremacismo blanco o falta de respeto a las creencias o experiencias ajenas.
Desinformación: No está permitido hablar seriamente de Criptomonedas, Trading y otras movidas de Cryptobros y de como hacer rica a la gente en poco tiempo.

Desinformación: Tampoco está permitido promocionar o distribuir contenidos sobre productos basados en esquemas Ponzi, economía piramidal, juegos de azar, juegos de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados o no regulados.

Acoso: Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantación de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Acoso: Se interpretará la insistencia de dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a un usuario que no lo ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto físico supone el cierre inmediato de la cuenta.

Respeto: Se debe respetar la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de otros. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos siempre que respeten y no hieran a otros. Ten presente que otros pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminología diferente a la tuya.
Bots: Los bots necesitan estar marcados como 'bots' en  las preferencias del perfil y los Toots automáticos tienen que ser unlisted. Aquellas cuentas que hacen mirroring de Twitter serán suspendidas.

Bots: Los administradores se reservan el derecho de suspender cualquier cuenta manejada por un bot, si su funcionamiento es prejudicial para la instancia, por ejemplo, aunque no limitándose a: envío masivo de toots, uso excesivo de almacenamiento....

Los administradores se reservan el derecho de cerrar o limitar una cuenta si consideran que ha incumplido alguna norma. Estos tendrán la decisión final sobre si la cuenta ha incumplido las normas. Se aplicarán las normas vigentes independientemente del momento de los incumplimientos.

bookstodon.thestorygraph.com.text: No discrimination. Our community promotes a safe and healthy environment for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.
Do not share explicit materials (videos, pictures, articles, etc.) or discuss sexual acts, excessive violence, or gore.
Be kind and respectful. Treat others as you would like to be treated
No doxxing. Please do not share another person’s information or sensitive materials without their consent.
No trolling. Trolling is someone who intentionally instigates conflict, hostility, or arguments online. Don’t be a troll.
No spamming. Please do not repeatedly post the same message or spam others (i.e. tagging someone repeatedly).
Do not post or engage in any illegal behavior.
No spoilers. If you want to discuss anything of that sort, please use the spoiler (Content Warning) tag.

bookwor.ms.text: Behave according to the laws of Japan. 日本の法に従ってください。

bookstodon.com.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

Automated posting activity must have approval from admin. Accounts registered for the purpose of posting spam such as SEO backlinks or marketing material will be removed by moderators. Book related activity does not apply.
Posts with an affiliate link must have #ad
Posts that are bot generated cannot dominate the timeline.
Posts that are bot generated will be silenced to one post a day.  We prefer human interaction with the posts.

boop.network.text: Don't be an dick, and don't post illegal content. Those concepts guide most other rules and moderation.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, antisemitism, ableism, or other hateful conduct. Please, also report it when you see it.

Content Warnings & Sensitive Media labels are required for images of nudity, bloodshed, or extreme harm. CWs, Alt Text, and PascalCase hashtags are encouraged for improving everyone's experiences, especially disabled users. However, policing posts or bullying people into using them is unacceptable.

No corporate advertising, spam, or accounts. No crypto advertising, spam, or accounts. No "AI" advertising, spam, or accounts. However, self-promotion of art, livestreams, personal storefronts, etc. is welcomed and encouraged.

Automated and Bot accounts must be labeled as such. If the account will be regularly posting more than 3 times a day, posts should be set as Unlisted by default to prevent clogging up the Local timeline.

borahae.love.text: NO illegal content based on EU or US law. We will report any illegal activity involving minors to the NCMEC and/or CEPOL, and everything else to authorities. Just don't do it!
NO sexually explicit or violent media. We can't control the fediverse, but there is no need for anything like that here.

NO posting of private, or should be private, information. Bans will be swift if posting information that could potentially be harmful. For example, leaking flight, hotel, or non-public whereabouts of anybody.
NO hate speech allowed, keep it civil
NO impersonating others, including using the same "bird site" handle as someone active in the BTS community. If you find your handle is taken, please send an email to admin@borahae.love

botsin.space.text: No uncurated news bots posting. If you want to see statuses from a newspaper or something like that, check out https://feedsin.space to setup an RSS->fediverse account.

No bots that use ChatGPT, OpenAI or the other big GPT systems. If you're running your own LLM, that's ok. If you think you have a special use case to use a GPT system, feel free to ask if you can make a bot here, but chances are the answer will be no.

brands.town.text: The only people allowed on this instance are corporations. Brands Town is specifically dedicated to brand promotion on Mastodon.

Upon registration, Brands must be original properties, not impersonations. Detected impersonations will be immediately rejected, we will also immediately delete impersonations upon request from corporations or legal counsel.

Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Les propos homophobes, transphobes, racistes et tous les autres propos à caractère haineux sont interdits et leurs auteur·es feront l'objet d'une suspension.
Utilisez les content warnings et les descriptions d'image. Un modérateur peut être amené à vous demander d'éditer votre post pour rajouter de telles informations si nécessaire.
En règle générale, soyez bienveillant·e et abstenez-vous de tout jugement ou commentaire négatif et intrusif.

bullcity.space.text: No sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions.
No gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions.
Racism, antisemitism, and any form of harassment and discrimination on the basis of culture/background will not be tolerated.
Misogyny, transphobia, homophobia and any form of harassment and discrimination based on a person's sex, gender identity or sexual orientation will not be tolerated.
Ableism and any form of harassment and discrimination on the basis of physical/mental disabilities will not be tolerated.

Alt-right, Nazi, and other far-right content is prohibited. Promotion of disinformation, "alternative facts," conspiracy theories, or content aimed at the destruction of democracy and civil discourse is prohibited.
Illegal content of any sort is prohibited.

bunni.social.text: You must know Joan (server owner) to request to join or be introduced from another member. Fill out reason for joining as how you know her; if it’s through other social media please mention it and your user name.
No homophobia, transphobia, racism, etc. Pronouns and identities should be respected.
No harassment or doxxing of others including non users of site.
NSFW content is allowed as long as it is your art or you own it and all parties involved consent to to posting. Use the proper content warnings for it.
Illegal and problematic content is not allowed, this server is based in the USA as such follows USA laws.
Loli or sexual content with characters of questionable age, as well as 'ageing up' characters from fandoms that are minors in order to depict them in sexual situations, is expressly prohibited.

bumscode.com.text: No things that are illegal in Germany, for example nazi-symbols and slogans

burma.social.text: Our platform is free from censorship and we do not engage in advertising or promotion. Our aim is to provide a free and open environment.

Prohibitions:
Illegal content
Intentionally harmful or harassing content
Hate speech and discrimination
Excessive self-promotion
Spam

Emphasis:
Creating a welcoming and inclusive environment

burnout.cafe.text: No pornography; no erotic content or communication; no content or communication that can be qualified as essentially sexually oriented or intentionally appealing to prurient interest; no sexualization of children or minors in any form.
No "gore"; no posting content or links to content that could reasonably be qualified as particularly emotionally shocking, disgusting or repulsive.
No content or links showing cruelty to animals or humans, with the intent of entertaining, shocking or disgusting.
No content or links showing sadism, masochism or other forms of violence, with the intent of entertaining, shocking or disgusting.
No hateful, harmful, threatening or aggressive content or communication with the intent of shocking, disgusting or intimidating.
No harassment; no "trolling"; no bullying.
No content or communication that could be qualified as defamation, slander or libel.
No racism; no promotion of bigotry, eugenics or racial/ethnic segregation; no promotion of racial, religious or ethnic intolerance.
No homophobic, biphobic, transphobic or sexist communication or content.
No ableism; no disparagement of the physical appearance, abilities, intelligence or other attributes of another person or population.
No use of language that could be considered to be offensive to people of a particular ethnicity, religion, gender, sexuality or other population.
No ad hominem attacks; no insults or derogatory attacks against a person because of their race, creed, color, beliefs, sexual orientation, gender identification or other motivations.
No revelation of private personal information or content about other persons (no "doxing").
No revelation of confidential or protected information of companies or other organizations that is not already in the public domain and considered to be public knowledge.
No activity, communication or content designed to harvest personal information for illicit purposes (no "phishing").
No "grooming" behavior; no "stalking" behavior.

No gambling; no betting; no wagering; no promotion of gambling or gambling sites; no rooms, groups or communications about games or activities involving or giving rise to gambling or monetary payments in any form or for whatever service or commodity.

No communication about or conducting of any kind of investment, loan or bartering schemes or business dealings; no conducting of any commercial business without prior explicit permission from the site administrator.

No commercial advertising; no "infomercials"; no "commercials"; no "spam" or advertising links; no promotion of commercial businesses without prior explicit written consent from the site administrator.
No preying or profiteering or exploitative behavior, particularly against anyone that could be construed as vulnerable, disadvantaged, susceptible or impressionable.
No using any service accessed on or via this site for cultivation of a relationship or communication for any illegal or harmful purpose.

No proselytizing; no content or communication pressurizing people to join a particular religion, cult or political organization; no content or communication encouraging or requesting monetary donations or other contributions to a religious, social or political organization, cult or movement.
No promotion of political violence or terrorism.
No promotion of dangerous, excessive and/or illegal use of alcohol or drugs.
No promotion of self-harm or suicide; no content that encourages, causes or perpetuates a psychological or emotional state of mind that could give rise to self-harm or suicide.

No activity intended to disrupt or exploit the operation of any service on this site or on other sites; no "cracking"; no participation in DDOS attacks, cross-site scripting attacks or other forms of illicit exploit against this site, or via this site and against any other site or service.

No copyright or intellectual property infringements; no re-posting of content of another person, website or organization, from which they derive revenue or for which they legitimately claim publishing exclusivity, without explicit written consent from the rights holder.

No disinformation or misinformation; no publication of content or communication considered to be social or political disinformation or misinformation, according to the judgment of the site administrator; no publication or recommendation of hyperlinks or other access to such content or media.
No registration of accounts for persons under the age of 16.

Não é permitido racismo, lgtbfobia, machismo, misoginia ou discriminação contra minorias.
Não é permitido divulgar teorias da conspiração tais como negação da pandemia, crise climática ou semelhantes.
Defendemos uma internet livre e acessível, porém links contendo pirataria são de responsabilidade de quem postou.
Proibido conteúdo +18 sem uso de CW (Content Warning - Aviso de conteúdo)
Não serão permitidos membros com menos de 18 anos.
É incentivado o uso de CW/Aviso de conteúdo quando descrever experiências negativas com discriminação (racismo, capacitismo, misoginia, entre outros)

Não é permitido spam, anúncios pagos ou com quaisquer fins lucrativos.

É permitido divulgar o próprio trabalho, porém não é permitido ter um perfil que só faça marketing.
Não roube conteúdo e respeite as vontades des artistas. Dê crédito quando respostar e não reposte sem permissão expressa.
Não é permitido doxxing (divulgação de informações pessoais sem consentimento da pessoa)

Não é recomendado o uso de posts privados com informações sensíveis.

Nós moderadores não temos interesse algum nas mensagens privadas dos cidadãos da cidade em chamas. Porém é importante ressaltar que por motivos técnicos os moderadores têm acesso a todos os posts, pois não são criptografados.
Contas inativas por mais de seis meses estão sujeitas a serem removidas da plataforma. Enviaremos um aviso alguns dias antes, dando a possibilidade que a pessoa possa manter a conta.

byteheaven.net.text:
No racim, sexim, transphobia, or other celebration of prejudice.
It's OK and even normal to have prejudices, but act like a douche and you're out.

No Nazi or fascist stuff.
Oppressive authoritarian government is bad.

Porn. Consensual, legal, non-stolen erotica is OK behind a NSFW or similar tag. No gore. This isn't a porn server, but we're not going to go handing out bans because picture contained a nipple or something kinky turns up in "Federated." Because of this, grown-ups only on this server pls.
No paedo shit. Note that this completely covered under "no unethical or illegal" etc etc but repeated here because zero tolerance.
If you can't make your point with logic, step off. Sure, we all rant sometimes, but shouting at someone is almost never the answer.

Behave ethically. If this doesn't appeal to you, you don't belong here.

Scams and harassment, for example, are unethical. Most of the other rules are just examples of this one, expanded as individual rules so that simpleminded fediblock users from other sites won't block us out of hand.
Don't do illegal stuff, even if your cause is righteous. This makes the moderators and other users accessories unless/until they rat you out. It is impolite to incriminate your friends.

c.im.text: Respect the laws of the Netherlands and the Isle of Man, including those related to hate speech and defamation.

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Do not harass or bully other users.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Do not spam or engage in any form of malicious activity.
Keep discussions civil and respectful, and refrain from using derogatory language or engaging in personal attacks.
Do not reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Use appropriate tags and content warnings when posting potentially sensitive or triggering content.
If you see a violation of these rules, report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you are at least 18 years old.

Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).

c18.masto.host.text: Racism, antisemitism, sexism, casteism, homophobia, transphobia, and harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Hostile and spam instances will be blocked.

Please feel free to mute (you don't see them) or block (they don't see you either) freely. If a hostile or spam user/instance appears, please submit a report to your admin. Report harassment immediately.
Fill out your profile when you join. When you follow someone, they should be able to see something about you.
Use the CW button broadly for shocking, potentially annoying, or repetitive content. Include a caption for all images. (Please do not ask others to CW experiences of discrimination.)
Don't post lists of users that they have not opted into, or repost content you see here on other sites. Avoid using asterisks or euphemisms, which get around people's blocked and muted terms.

In order to join this server, you should provide a brief explanation of why you are joining this particular server, not just why you are leaving another social media site. Why is c18.masto.host right for you?

cackl.io.text: Love everyone. Hate speech, derogatory language, and slurs of any kind will not be tolerated. This includes racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, and any other forms of discrimination.

Use the Content Warning feature to mark any posts or comments that contain adult or potentially inappropriate content. This includes, but is not limited to sexual content, violence, and disturbing or triggering material.

Respect the safety and well-being of others and refrain from advocating for or promoting violence or harm towards individuals or groups. Such as, but not limited to, threats of physical harm, encouragement of self-harm or harm to others, and calls to engage in illegal activities.
Respect the privacy and safety of all members of this community: do not share the personal information of others. Examples of, but not limited to: names, addresses, and phone numbers.

Do not attempt to circumvent any bans or other disciplinary actions that have been imposed on you. This includes, but is not limited to, creating new accounts, using proxies or VPNs, or attempting to access the community through other means.

All bots mark their content as unlisted and ignore content that contains the #nobot tag. This allows members of the community to distinguish between human-generated content and content that has been created by bots, and will help to ensure that all members have equal access to the conversation.

Clearly disclose any content that is intended to generate revenue by using the #ad tag in your post. This will allow other members of the community to distinguish between content that is purely informational or educational and content that has a financial motive.

catcatnya.com.hint:
This applies especially for discrimination towards marginalized folks and groups. This includes, but is not limited to:

Racism, xenomisia, homomisia, transmisia, and other queermisia, gatekeeping the "queer" status, classism/casteism, ableism, anti-semitism, islamomisia.

Note that preferring a marginalized group over a less- or non-marginalized group is explicitly done to counteract discrimination, and, as such, is not discrimination on its own.

catcatnya.com.text: If it's illegal in Austria, don't post it.
catcatnya.com.hint: We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow applicable laws. We will not follow any other (therefore non-applicable) laws, however, as we aren't legally required to do so.

This includes, among the obvious ones, certain popular meme formats, such as the Wojak (including its related NPC meme) and Pepe the Frog.

This point will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis, but at the very least, we will attempt to educate in case of unintentional usage.

Fund raisers, mutual aid, artists doing commissions, or individuals advertising their services are fine. That's because they aren't soulless businesses and corporations. Those we will suspend (remote ones too).
This includes obvious topics such as gore, sexual content, assault, mental health issues, but also less obvious ones like food, selfies, media with eye contact to the viewer, "AI", etc.

Posting media without media descriptions, also known as alt text, is strongly discouraged. If you're unable to think of alt text for an image, please ask a third party (or us, via DMs!) to help you with alt text.

Constantly ignoring the need for alt text counts towards the discrimination rule.

catcatnya.com.text: No doxxing or leaking DMs for petty reasons.
catcatnya.com.hint: Sharing private information for no good reason (for petty reasons or over non-severe wrongdoings) is forbidden. This includes doing that outside of our instance, as this type of behaviour is great at disrupting safe spaces.

catcatnya.com.text: "AI" text and media must be marked as such.
catcatnya.com.hint:
We don't particularly like "AI", but banning it entirely is impossible.

Therefore, it must be labelled. Any post with LLM-output text (such as by "GPT" models) or Diffusion-output imagery (such as by "Stable Diffusion" models) not under a CW will face at least deletion. Repeat offenses will have their authors face suspension.

ceilidh.online.text:
Do not engage in hate speech of any kind
Any post that contains hateful language meant to demean or harm another user or group of people will not be tolerated and your account and IP will be banned for doing so.  We are not a government so don't even try to claim First Amendment rights.

Use CW at your discretion to help protect the community at large
It is expected that you can self-edit and place sensitive posts behind a CW. Warnings will be given for non-compliance and further action will be taken if the issue persists.

Please report issues to the Admins and Moderators and let us take care of them
Please do not act as an admin or moderator if you are not.  Instead, report adverse activity so the team can handle it properly as well as make reports to other admins.

Violence against any member of this or other instances will result in your account being banned
If this is not clear enough for you then maybe this isn't the instance for you.  Violent and threatening speach will not be tolerated against anyone on the Fediverse and will result in an immediate ban.

Talk, Share, Intermingle, and Have Fun!
This server is meant to be a place where we can have all sorts of discussions and share our moments.  Please keep that in mind when you post.

Please submit missing language translations to mods and admins
This system is translation-enabled using libretranslate.  If you are unable to translate a post please share that post with a mod or admin so we can add the language pack to the system.

We Are a Safe Place for the LGBTQIA+ Community
You are safe here.  The admin and mod team are hand-picked to be sensitive to our community and we will do everything we can to make sure you will be comfortable here.  Anyone that is not part of the LGBTQIA+ community or an ally need not apply.

No Discrimination Allowed, EVER!
We welcome all races, ethnicities, genders, etc. as long as you follow the rules.  We are stronger through diversity and through diversity we understand our selves better.

This Instance Honors Reports from Fediblock
Instances reported to the Fediblock hashtag are reviewed throughout the day and added to our filters to help ensure the content here is not pluted by hatred and bigotry.

New Account Requests Must Have a Meaningful Reason
When requesting a new account you must include a meaningful reason for joining this server.  Requests that only have a word or two in the reason, or the reason does not make sense will be rejected.

chitter.xyz.text: This is a safe and welcoming community. Abusive or antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated.
In particular, no hate speech or bigotry, including dogwhistles (implicit but deliberate discrimination through coded language).
No posting others' personal information or private exchanges without permission.
Do not continue to engage a person, or incite others to do so, after they have requested otherwise.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, Germany, or France. This includes "grey area" content such as sexualized, artistic depictions of minors.
Sexual or sexually suggestive content must be tagged as such, with a clear content warning. Avatars and profile banners must be clean.

Same goes for artistic depictions of graphic violence or gore. Real pictures and recordings of gore and violence are generally not acceptable, you better have a really good reason. Shock value is not a good reason.
Bots are OK as long as they don't post to the public TL more than twice a day and don't interact with folks out of the blue. That means no followbots.
When in doubt about something you'd like to post, ask a mod. When in doubt about something you saw posted, report liberally.
We may take administrative action for reasons not listed here.

ciberlandia.pt.text: Lê os nossos Termos de Serviço (ciberlandia.pt/terms), que contêm mais pormenores e motivações por trás destes princípios, e cuja aceitação está implícita ao criares uma conta.
Não são tolerados comentários discriminatórios, comunicação condescendente, degradante ou de outra forma intimidatória, mesmo que em forma de piada ou ironia.
O mesmo para discursos de ódio, incluindo mas não só supremacia branca e nazismo.

Somos mais a favor de falar para e com pessoas do que sobre pessoas e grupos. Subtoots, generalizações antagónicas e incendiárias, tiradas polémicas ou edgy à custa de outrem são para ser levadas para o Twitter (ou outro sítio longe daqui).

Não existe margem para assédio, stalking ou divulgação de dados pessoais de outros (doxing). Pressionar irrazoavelmente durante uma discussão em escalada ou enviar repetidamente mensagens privadas são também formas de assédio.
Não aceitamos publicações cruzadas do Twitter para aqui, mas não temos nenhum problema com o contrário.
Publicidade em massa não é permitida. Por outro lado, incentivamos a partilha de projetos, eventos e sítios onde os teus seguidores possam apoiar o teu trabalho (como o Patreon).
Bots experimentais e criativos são bem-vindos, desde que se portem bem: devem indicar que são bots no perfil e fazer apenas toots não listados.
Este não é um serviço, mas sim uma partilha. O seu usufruto deve ser visto como um privilégio, e não um direito.

Se tiveres problema com algum utilizador (local ou não) a violar as nossas regras, contacta os administradores e moderadores do serviço. Não hesites em entrar em contacto e nunca presumas que estás a causar incómodo – pelo contrário!

circumstances.run.text: We're all free speech absolutists here, and by that we mean there are things in your free speech that we absolutely won't allow. Specifically —
No bigotry allowed. Discriminatory language, racism, misogyny, ableism, homophobia and transphobia are right out.
No fascism. No nazism. No genocide denial. No genocide apology. Simple as.
That being said, we're quite reasonable —
We encourage you to be kind to your fellow sentients, use content notes liberally (at your discretion), listen first, act second and do your best.
Your well-being is important. Filter, mute and block when needed. Report infractions when possible, but don't make it your duty.

Addendum: we're following Mona Eltahawy's Civility Principle here and therefore do not enforce purity of language. Readers disgusted by the word “fuck” can fuck right off, in the most kind meaning of the phrase.

You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people.

You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so. This includes wishing or hoping that someone experiences physical harm.

You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.
You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as home phone number and address) without their express authorisation and permission.

clj.social.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as is any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the clj.social community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” on clj.social.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on clj.social, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@clj.social.

climatejustice.global.text: Before signing up please read the full set of principles, rules and guidelines at https://climatejustice.global/about
We stand for climate justice, which includes justice for all marginalized people as well as other living beings and we stand against discrimination and exploitation.
We consider ourselves on the left side of the political spectrum and stand up against right wing ideologies.
We believe the Fediverse should be a place for respectful discourse and we stand against harassment, trolling and spam.
We stand up for peace and against violence, oppression and authoritarianism.
We stand behind the science and against fake-news & propaganda.
Also, we stick to Austrian and EU law and we don't post pornography.

Principles, rules and guidelines may change at any time and sanctions may be applied according to rules that have not been written yet at that time, but of course never without justification. Appeal is always possible.

climatescienc.es.text:
Nothing discriminatory 	

Instances by the Fediverse Foundation are expressly inclusive and open to everyone.

Therefore, any form of discrimination is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to: ableism, antisemitism, homomisia, islamomisia, classism, racism, sexism, transmisia, etc.
Nothing illegal 	Do not post anything illegal (Austrian law / EU law).

Nothing harassing 	

No spam, trolling, bullying, or similar annoyances.

No calls for hate or violence.

No pornography.

Nothing (intentionally) fake 	

No fake news, misinformation, science denial

No spreading rumors or propaganda

Nothing automated 	

No bots, no crossposting (e.g. mirroring of Twitter posts etc.) without context or other interaction.

clq.im.text: This is a single-user instance consisting of only me (clq). Anything I post or boost will conform to the rules below, though this does not mean that I'd expect the same from anyone I follow.
Explicit posts, if any, will be extremely rare, but anything explicit will be marked as sensitive and/or have a CW

Politics or news/topics that can be triggering or distressing will be behind a CW. I'm happy to be called out on anything that may be seen as political that I've not defined as such, or anything else that could be triggering.

No hate-speech, including but not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia. For the avoidance of doubt, this includes any misgendering, and questioning the validity of or joking about trans/gender issues.

In general, I'll try to be decent. In this corner of the internet I respect people's right to feel comfortable with what they read over my right to say/post it. Any input, or feedback on whether I've breached the definition of "decent" will be appreciated, and received and considered respectfully.

- Keine Gewalt, keine Propaganda, keine Ideologien 
- Keine sexuellen Inhalte

Lern-Kultur auf Colearn.social:  Wir leben Werte wie Offenheit, Vielfalt, Vertrauen, Partizipation, Augenhöhe, Kooperation, Autonomie, Experimentierfreude und Gemeinschaft. Fehler werden als Lernchance betrachtet.

Diskussion - aber keine Werbung für gewerbliche Leistungen oder Produkte!
Colearn.social dient dem Austausch unter Learning Experten: Zum von- und miteinander Lernen. Gewerbliche Werbung stört die Diskussion.

collapsible.systems.text: Racism, fascism, gender discrimination: You will not engage in or promote any form of fascism, racism or gender discrimination, and will be proactive in reporting it if encountered.
Harrassment: you will not engage in harassment in any form, and will be proactive in reporting it if witnessing it or subject to it.
Conspiracy Theories: You will not engage in the development nor circulation of conspiracy theories.
Weapons: You will refrain from posts pertaining to guns, explosives and the use of weapons for self-defense.
Child protection: You will not post child pornography nor any identifying images of children, including your own.
Content Warnings: You will place content warnings on any material that you understand may be disturbing for our membership.
Image captions: You will add captions to images for those with vision challenges.

Pseudoscience: You will to the best of your ability ensure research and designs shared are peer reviewed and/or meet a scientific consensus, and will not advocate nor propagate pseudo-scientific works and theses.
Tardigrada: You must post at least one image, poem or fact about tardigrades.

collar.place.text: All NSFW and questionable content must be marked with a CW or spoiler
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and any other kind of discrimination
Do your best at keeping a factual discussion, instead of switching to insults, even if you are in anger
Don't abuse computing power and storage, specifically with automated mass relaying from non-ActivityPub communities

colloquy.social.text:
This server supports constructive speech: speech which informs, persuades, enlightens, or entertains.

Unconstructive speech is unwelcome and includes, inter alia:
- Narcissism
- Manichaeism
- Solipcism
- Evidence denialism
- Scapegoating
- Othering
- Agenda hiding
- Brigading
- Mobbing

colonels.world.text: Don't be a bellend. Bellends get kicked.

colter.social.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau « sensible/sensitive ». Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·trices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.

Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes, l'apologie du terrorisme, des crimes contre l'humanité et l'incitation à la haine raciale (article 6 de la loi pour la confiance dans l'économie numérique, no 2004-575 du 21 juin 2004).
Sont interdites les avances ou propositions à caractère sexuel non-sollicitées.
Est interdite toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper. Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

com.thephysics.xyz.text: No hate speech or otherwise offensive content will be posted from thephysics.xyz.
Opinions are my own and do not reflect the opinions of my employer.

coma.social.text: Don't be an asshole. We are entitled to have our opinions, but conversations are more valuable for everyone if we are curious, not lecturing. Think about your motivation on why to enter a discussion, and keep it friendly.
Freedom is equal for all, or just a privilege. coma.social is not the place for racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia or other discriminating and violent ideologies.
Even as Shakespeare wrote "The first thing we do, let's kill all the lawyers", we have to follow some rules, also and maybe especially on the Internet. Do not post content that is illegal in Germany.

"Don't confuse me with facts, I've got an opinion"? We are not Truth Social. Refrain from posting intentionally false or misleading information here. An evidence based approach leads to more fruitful conversations we all can learn from.
Take care for each other. Use content warnings if you have the feeling something you post might be difficult for others to digest. Do no harm, and don't be evil.

Not safe for work? Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting, and as with content warnings, also other topics might apply. Rely on you own judgement and give it a thought.

comfy.blue.text:
Understand the ethos and goals of Comfy.Blue (found at http://comfy.blue/about)
This instance is meant to be mental health positive instance. Please use content warnings when appropriate (particularly for politics/news topics).
Use a secure, unique password and 2 factor authentication.

NSFW media is allowed, as long as it has appropriate content warnings and follows our NSFW policy from our about page. (No depictions of minors, Lalafels or any being that cannot give consent. Content must be legal in France, The EU and the United Kingdom.)

comics.town.text: Comics Town is a place where anyone interested in making comics can come to share their work, connect with other creators, and learn.  To grow a safe, inclusive community, the following rules are in place:
Harassment, hate speech, dog-piling, doxxing, and similar behaviors are not welcome.
Comics Town is a welcoming environment for LGBTQIA+ , PoC and Indigenous creators.  Moderation decisions will be made with this as a priority.
Explicit content should use the Content Warning feature.
Promotional posts are allowed, but should be in healthy balance with interaction with the community.
Non-comics content is allowed, but please keep fandom discourse to a respectful dull roar.

No AI Generated Content:
AI-derived work will be deleted and repeat offenders will lose their Comics Town accounts.

commfurnity.com.text: No minors. No exceptions. You must be over 18 to join.
The admin is a furry. If you don't like that, go somewhere else.
NSFW is fine, but must be tagged appropriately, behind Mastodon's Content Warning feature and marked sensitive.
If you're sharing any kind of artwork, credit the author (unless you're the author, duh).
No underage content. Do not post kids on the internet!
If unsure, ask. We will update the rules, if necessary.

commune.anarchist.gay.text: lewd stuff should be CW'd (at least one admin is a minor lol)

compostintraining.club.text: No: racism, sexism, ableism, sanism, homo- trans- or aphobia, religious bigotry, fascists, rape apology, reactionaries, Trump supporters, slurs. No exceptions.
No spam or excessive advertising. Absolutely NO corporate advertising.

compound.social.text: Invite only, for family and friends.
Keep it family friendly. Use content warnings for anything that might be for limited audiences (politics, spicy food, she wants her rocks)
Don't do anything to get us defederated!

computerclub.social.text: Mastodon-server voor Vrienden van Computer Club (https://vrienden.computerclub.online).

comunidad.blasterradio.net.text: Se permiten publicaciones de otras radios, siempre y cuando no lancen indirectas u ofensas entre las cuentas.
Queda terminantemente prohibido el spam en todas sus formas, derivados y cualquier otra índole. Se considerará spam al intervalo de envío de publicaciones de 5 minutos o menos, según el caso.
Se permite hablar de religión, solo si no se lanzan insultos a otras creencias. Respetamos las creencias religiosas de cada usuario, así que en ese sentido sé recíproco.
Se prohíbe terminantemente la piratería, ya sea informática, o de cualquier tipo.
Prohibida totalmente la pornografía en la instancia sea de cualquier tipo. Recuerda que pueden haber menores de edad.
Insultos de cualquier índole a otro usuario o cualquier instancia están terminantemente prohibido.
Las únicas cuentas botx permitidas, son las cuentas radiales, así que úsalas con medida, si eres dueño o dueña de una cuenta radial alojada en la instancia.
no se permiten las fake news en la instancia. Verifica antes de publicar la nota.
No se permite el clasismo, racismo, o cualquier tipo de discriminación a ninguna preferencia sexual, color de piel, creencia religiosa, o ideología política.

computermuseum.social.text: Be professional and polite. All accounts on this server are public computer museums who have the same idea as you have, therefor respect each other in their choices.

comunidad.nvda.es.text: Se debe marcar el contenido de carácter sexual o violento como contenido sensible al publicarlo.
Se prohíbe la discriminación por razones de género, política, religión, raza, discapacidad o lugar de procedencia, entre otras.
No se permiten discursos de odio, incitaciones a la violencia o promoción de ideologías violentas.
Se prohíbe el acoso hacia otros usuarios.

El contenido considerado ilegal o protegido por derechos de autor en España y la UE puede compartirse, siempre que se haga en privado a uno o varios usuarios. Se suspenderán las cuentas que compartan este contenido utilizando un nivel de privacidad menos restrictivo.
Se prohíbe compartir información intencionadamente falsa, imprecisa o engañosa.

Se permite la publicidad a los seguidores de una cuenta, pero no públicamente a nivel de instancia o federación. Se prohíbe terminantemente hacer spam y mencionar a varios usuarios con fines publicitarios.

Además de estas normas específicas, esta instancia se rige según el Código de conducta del ciudadano y el colaborador elaborado por NV Access y, donde se apliquen, las normas de nuestra lista de correo.

connectop.us.text: This group will not tolerate racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, Nazis, or hate speech which will be determined at the sole discretion of the moderators
If you are experiencing hate speech or harassment, please report it to the moderators
Consent matters - use content warnings (CW) often and always where required (see details in the about)
NSFW content is allowed behind CW banners
No posting or sharing another user's personal information
No excessive posting of advertisements or requesting for cash (see details in the about)

connectified.com.text: Black, Trans, Queer, whatever. Your life matters.
We don't have to agree with each other, but we do have to be respectful.
Be willing to apologize when you eff up.
Use content warnings on political posts.
Use content warnings on potentially disturbing and/or "adult" things.

contenttechtodon.org.text: Talk about content technology or something related
A lot of us work for vendors. Don't over-promote. There's a vague line you shouldn't cross.

continuousdelivery.social.text: Be kind. Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks.

Be respectful. Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.
Be lawful. Do not post illegal content or content that links to an illegal source.
Be honest. Do not post spam, false or misleading informations.
Be careful. Do not post sexually explicit content, violent media, inflammatory or controversial content without a Content Warning.

conversafiada.net.text: NAZIFASCISMO - É crime e é proibido aqui.

TROLLAGEM: comportamentos típicos de outras redes não serão permitidos nessa instância. Quem incorrer em xingamentos a pessoas, acusações levianas e provocações desnecessárias será banido/a da instância.
PORNOGRAFIA INFANTIL - ou qualquer conteúdo que fetichista crianças são obviamente proibidos.

DISCURSO DE ÓDIO - Aqui é proibido qualquer discurso de ódio ou seus derivados: machismo, misoginia, racismo, xenofobia, transfobia, homofobia, apologia a toda e qualquer forma de opressão, exploração e humilhação entre seres humanos. Apologia a governos autoritários, nacionalismo extremista.
NOTÍCIAS MENTIROSAS/MANIPULAÇÃO - se for intencional, banimento imediato. Se for sem dolo, congelamento da conta por alguns dias. Com banimento se o comportamento continuar.
AMEAÇAS - toda publicação de ameaça é causa de banimento.

ATITUDES INVASIVAS - Estão sujeitos à punição, que vai depender do nível de violência: comentários e/ou perguntas invasivas (ex. pedir a localização de alguém), assédio (continuar uma conversa que alguém não quer mais que continue).
ASSÉDIO SEXUAL - banimento imediato. Outros comportamentos nocivos como piadas ou comentários sexuais receberão punições que podem variar dependendo da gravidade.
REPRESENTAÇÃO FALSA: contas criadas em nome de marcas ou celebridades devem ser sinalizadas como paródia.
FLODDAR TL LOCAL OU GLOBAL - com conversas infinitas é um comportamento desencorajado. A continuidade pode levar à suspensão.

CONTEÚDO VIOLENTO /CHOCANTE - sempre com CW e, caso tenha imagens, com aviso de imagem sensível. Dependendo do conteúdo, se não for uma denúncia válida e NECESSÁRIA - pode causar o banimento da conta.
SPOILER SEM CW - Também nunca. Qualquer spoiler precisa de aviso de conteúdo.
SPAM - nunca. Independente do conteúdo, spam é caso de banimento.

coolmathgam.es.text: No nazism, holocaust denial, and other topics banned in Germany.
No fascism, sexism, transphobic, TERFism, racism, and being any other things related to those topics.
Avoid shitposting to the ninth degree.
Don't post NSFW content (an admin legally cannot moderate it).
Any other problematic behaviour that is subject to the opinions of the admins.

convo.casa.text: No content illegal in EU or South Africa.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.

cornerbooth.chat.text: Act in good faith & with respect. Don’t engage in hateful, bigoted, or otherwise cruel behavior. Don’t be a nuisance, be a good neighbor.
If somebody isn’t following the rules, report them so a moderator can take care of it.

cornputer.org.text: No homophobia, transphobia, or xenophobia allowed.

coplus.social.text: Please don't insult anyone in your comments.
Be respectful. Don't make fun of others and don't be condescending.
Don't discriminate against anyone. Racist, sexist, transphobic, misogynistic, homophobic, antisemitic and any other kind of hate-speech is forbidden on our instance!
No excessive advertising. No spamming or aggressive promotion. If you want to promote something do it responsibly with supporting facts and never only links.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention.
Bots must be marked as Bot in their profile.
No NFT content. None at all.
No illegal content. No false or misleading information. No posting of malicious links.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No anonymous emails. Accounts with anonymous or temporary emails will be deleted.

corneill.es.text: Pas de propos oppressif : raciste, sexiste, LGBTIphobe, validiste, antisémite, etc.
Pas de choses illégales. Ça vaut aussi pour les lois qu'on n'aime pas de ouf genre le copyright, etc., parce que pas envie d'aller en taule.
Pas de harcèlement, prise à partie, menaces, etc. Ici on est gentil·le·s.
Pas de discussion avec les fafs.

corp.social.text: Only businesses and brands, no individual accounts.
Be professional. No NSFW content, no racism, sexism, homophobia or transpobia.
No languages but English in public feeds.
No advertisements in response to other people's posts unless they specifically asked for a product/service you are providing.
No excessive use of hashtags, keep them relevant.
Posts submitted through automation must be hand-written and original. No automated replies.
Be respectful of everyone on the network. We are not an advertising platform.
If you have a website, you must put a verified link on your profile.

cosmos.social.text: No abuse. No trolling. No spam.
Here we value kindness and consideration, creativity and intelligence, good humor and good will.
Keep it clean, have fun, and all will be well.

cosocial.ca.text: Do not post or share any content that is illegal in Canada
Do not harass, dogpile, or dox users on this server or other servers
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, casteism, fatphobia, or other forms of bigotry
NSFW content and depictions of violence must be behind a content warning.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
CoSocial.ca is a service for the members of the CoSocial Community Cooperative.
CoSocial is for people 18 and over.
Business accounts are allowed, but don't spam or engage in excessive commercial posting.
Read and follow the full Code of Conduct and Acceptable Use Policy section of our Terms of Service, available at https://cosocial.ca/terms#coc

costodon.social.text: 日本の法令と社会規範は守ってください。わいせつな内容の投稿を禁止します。成人向けの内容を投稿する場合は、CW・NSFWを使ってください。
誹謗中傷・脅迫・いやがらせなど、相手や第三者の心を傷つけることはしないでください。
ブロックやミュートも活用して、人との距離を適切にとってください。
宣伝・告知・募集は禁止しませんが、良識と節度をもって、テーマと関係ある内容を、適切な頻度で投稿してください。
COStodon.Socialは日本国外の法令や基準には準拠していません。日本国外からのCOStodon.Socialへのアクセスは、アクセス元の国・地域で違法となる場合もありますので、十分注意してください。
16歳未満の方は、COStodon.Socialにアカウントを登録しないでください（GDPR・COPPAの要件に拠ります）。
以上のいずれかに違反した場合はCOStodon.Socialのモデレーターによって警告・制限・アカウントの停止といった措置がなされることを、ご了承ください。

corteximplant.com.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

We do not tolerate spam, fraud, or theft in our community. This includes excessive cross-posts, links, and posts related to crypto/NFT projects and AI art (AI art can be posted under certain conditions: the post must be published as "unlisted," labeled as AI Art, and should not be profit-oriented).

⚠️ We kindly ask you to attentively read the information under "Registration" on our About Page in order to join our community. 

🔗 https://corteximplant.com/about

courbet.social.text: Be civil and kind to everyone you encounter here.
Always apply appropriate content warnings and sensitive markings to NSFW content.
Absolutely no images or descriptions of sexual situations of anyone under 18, in any circumstances.
Spam, bots, doxxing, harassment, and abuse are not being civil and kind, and you will almost certainly be kicked off the server for them.

courage.quest.text: Though shalt conduct thyself without bigotry. courage.quest does not allow bigotry in any form. This includes, but is not limited to, dishonorable treatment to anyone based on race, sex and gender identity, sexual orientation, religion. We uphold the paradox of intolerance as a guiding principle.

Thou shalt not make use of right wing dogwhistles. Examples include "deus vult," pepe, triple parentheses, yes chad, or wojack. Though we understand that making their memes look innocuous to spread via unwitting use is a reactionary stratagem, we treat them with the utmost scrutiny.

Feudalism was not honorable. Many reactionary knaves wish themselves to be part of an idealized historical western Europe. They believe the crusades were righteous and feudalism was an equitable way to structure a society. We will not tolerate those with such ideology in this knightly order.

Comport thyself with honor Do not harass or personally attack other knights nor users of the greater fediverse. Do not reveal the private personal details of other persons. Be truthful with thy words and actions. Do not start feuds or vendettas.

A knight is compassionate. Extend kindness to others. Uplift others who are having a difficult time with your words and deeds. Be patient if another comports themself poorly, unless they truly be a knave.

Be a bastion of courage.

If thou seest someone in need, aid them to the best of thy ability. If thou seest someone accosted by a knave, stand up in their defense.

Thou must be a knight.

We are a knightly order, not an instance for general use. Knights of multiple disciplines (for example, knights of wizardly persuasion) are of course welcome.

cosmedn.net.text: 日本国内の法律に違反する行為
公序良俗に反する行為
他者の著作物を無断転載
サーバへの極端な負荷

correctiv.social.text: Keine Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind.
Kein Rassismus, Sexismus, Homophobie oder Transphobie.
Wir dulden keine Verschwörungserzählungen oder andere reaktionäre Mythen, die das oben diskriminierendes Verhalten unterstützen oder dazu führen.
Sexuell eindeutige oder gewalttätige Medien müssen bei der Veröffentlichung als sensibel gekennzeichnet werden.

covelline.social.text: 日本の法律と社会規範に従った行動をお願いします
投稿する際には強い言葉遣いや人が傷つくような言葉を使わないでください

cozy.chat.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users

coywolf.social.text: Follow the Golden Rule: Treat others the way you want to be treated
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Europe, and the United States of America.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

cr8r.gg.text: Be Kind and Respectful. Don't be racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, fatphobic, etc.
cr8r.gg.hint: Any discriminatory, threatening or harassment behaviour or content promoting / advocating said behaviours will not be tolerated.
Don't do/discuss doing/link to anything illegal (as determined by UK & EU law).

cr8r.gg.text: Must consider others at all times.
cr8r.gg.hint:
Include relevant #HashTags to aid discoverability & filtering potential and add image descriptions (Alt-Text). 
Use of a Content Wrapper/Warning (CW) must be utilised for topics and/or images that may invoke a strong difference of opinion or could be distressing to some (for example: phobias), as well as lewd, suggestive or adult themed imagery or text.

cr8r.gg.text: Credit other artists/photographers/creators appropriately when posting their work whenever possible.
No unsolicited / spam posts permitted. This includes mass mentioning, timeline flooding, constant follow/boost requests, commercial/product advertising or promotional campaigns, etc.

No impersonation of an entity or another individual. 
Your identity must be your own, whether this is yourself or your online persona. Business/corporate, automated & bot accounts are not permitted to join unless for support purposes only and have explicit authorisation from ourselves.
Do not misuse the reporting, CW or any other systems of the fediverse as well as attempting to disrupt or spoil others' experiences.

crab.garden.text: Be kind: demonstrate empathy and kindness toward other people.
Be respectful: do not harass, doxx, or threaten others.
Be considerate: use content warnings for sensitive content.

craba.cab.text: Запрещена поддержка военного вторжения России в Украину
Запрещён трансфобный, расистский, мизогинный, гомофобный, эйблистский, ксенофобный дискурс и слюры
Просим отмечать чувствительный контент с помощью функции CW

craftodon.social.text:
No discrimination against marginalized groups, based on:
ethnicity, gender identity or expression, sexual identity or expression, physical characteristics or age, disability or illness, nationality, residency, citizen status, wealth or education, religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Estonia/Europe will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

English preferred. Minecraft is a global community and English is the language that enables the most members to communicate with one another. This also allows us to keep the instance safe and enjoyable.
The contents of this instance should remain primarily about Minecraft. This includes all Minecraft related games created by Mojang Studios.

crag.social.text: Remember the human — be kind and courteous to users on this instance and others, in order to foster a welcoming community for all.
Report offenders — use the report function if you feel a toot/post goes against the server rules. Don't report if a post is in bad taste or if you disagree, just mute or block them instead.
Allowed with content warning: Nudity, pornography, spoilers
Advertising exception: Recommendations and reviews welcome, please limit your own self-promotion to within tasteful limits (e.g. if your entire profile is adspam 🚫)

creativewriting.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No overly aggressive posting. This isn't twitter. Minimal shitposting

creators.social.text: Be a known and active creator
Compliance with German and European laws

creature.garden.text: Use content warnings on public and unlisted posts that aren't appropriate for a general audience (see examples at http://creature.garden/about).
"AI" generated content must be clearly marked per post.
Don't post shit that makes me have to make a rule about it.

creature.social.text: Be respectful and kind to others. No harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or bullying of any kind.
Do not post or share any illegal, harmful, or offensive content. This includes spam, malware, phishing, gore, violence, pornography, or NSFW content.
Use content warnings and appropriate privacy settings for sensitive or controversial topics. Respect the choices and preferences of other users.
Do not impersonate, stalk, or dox anyone. Do not share personal or confidential information without consent.
Follow the terms of service and guidelines of Mastodon and the server host. Do not abuse the server resources or cause any disruptions.
Report any violations or issues to the @stuffie@creature.social. They have the final say on enforcing the rules and resolving disputes.

crispsandwi.ch.text: Account email address MUST match email entered during checkout
No harassment, spamming, dogpiling, impersonation or doxxing of others
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia or other discrimination
Specifically, if you’re one of those weirdos obsessed with questioning the rights and existence of trans people, this is not the server for you
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting; content warnings should be used sensibly

無論性別丶性別認同和表達方式丶年齡丶性取向丶殘疾丶外表丶身材丶種族丶宗教 或技術如何選擇, 在這裏我們不容忍任何形式的網絡欺凌及言語攻擊。

任何色情相關的內容（包括: 語言、圖片、視頻、網址等）均不能上載到這裏。

Prohibit issuing all contents which violate Hong Kong laws. 
禁止發送違反香港法律的內容。

Don't toots political remarks and focus only for professional topics. 
本站不討論政治，重㸃討論專業的話題。

No Advertisement & Spam but professional product reviews are accepted and welcome. 
謝絕廣告推送, 但可接受及歡迎專業的產品評論。

All the above items are applicable to any discussion places and locations here (including TAGS, private messages, public discussion forums and other URL links). 
以上所有項目適用於在這里的任何討論場所及位置(包括 TAGS，私信，公開討論區 和其它連結)。

In order to avoid affecting the freedom of other users and normal enjoyment of this system, users who violate the above rules will be removed from our system (without warning). 
為了避免影響其他用戶的自由及正常享用本系統, 違反以上那些規則的用户 會從我們的系統中被移除 (無需警告)。

This is one non-profit project with no SLA guarantee but we shall try our best with FailOver Clustering System to stay system online 99.9%. 
這是一個沒有 SLA 保證的非盈利項目, 但我們將盡我們最大努力使用 故障轉移集群系統 來保持系統在線 99.9%。

We do not accept any donation now and we shall consider to use stripe to handle all donations from donors if needed in future. 
我們現在不接受任何捐款, 如果將來有需要才考慮使用 Stripe 來處理捐贈者的捐贈。
