cubhub.social.text: No minors. This is an adult instance and minors are not allowed. You must be 18+ to join and interact.

No harassment. Do not call out, demean, or harass a member of this or any community. To that end, if an issue arises with another Fediverse user, please contact the moderation staff directly or use the reporting feature.

Use content warnings (CW's) for your posts when appropriate. If discussing topics such as politics, current events, mental health, plot spoilers, extensive descriptions of sex/kink, or other subjects users may find objectionable or triggering, you must content warn it and tag it appropriately.

Use content warnings (CW's) for your sensitive media. Any media that features nudity/yiff/heavy kink/impact play & spanking/material with the intent to arouse, alcohol/drug use, violence/gore, or other objectionable/triggering content must be tagged with a content warning. Leaking/messy diapers must be CW'd.

Use content warnings (CWs) for all story posts. As CubHub has a 100k character limit, stories can be posted inline within posts. Please use content warnings for all story posts even if it's SFW. This is just so people can know what to expect from your story before reading!

No NSFW banners or avatars. Banners and avatars that display nudity, yiff, erections under clothing, or other sexual material, or themes users may find objectionable are not allowed. If you could have it on a badge or dress that way at a convention, it can be in your avatar/banner.
No cub/child porn. No porn depicting any underage character in a sexual situation or in the presence of one is allowed. Cub/child nudity with exposed genitalia is similarly not allowed.
No zoophilia. Do not post art depicting any animal in a sexual situation. Quadruped characters with full human mental faculties are fine.

No illegal content. Do not post copyrighted material without permission of the content owner, do not post threats of violence against an individual, and do not post any content that would be deemed illegal for our server to host within the jurisdiction of the United States.

Artwork posted must be yours or have consent from the original artist. If you post the artwork of another artist, you must have their consent for it to be posted and you must include credit to the artist who drew it. If using stickers, the credit can be included in the image description

No hate speech. Anything racist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-semitic, Islamaphobic, or other forms of hate speech or hate symbols will result in an immediate ban. This includes the promotion of Nazi, Confederate, Blue Lives Matter, or other hateful imagery.
No disinformation. Do not spread disinformation about elections, current events, COVID-19, 5G, vaccines, etc.

No spam. While advertising yourself is allowed, please do not repeatedly spam advertisements for your services or commissions. Crypto and NFT advertisements are entirely banned, do not post or boost them.
Bot and parody accounts must be labelled as such. Additionally, bot accounts that affect server performance will be immediately removed.

Cross-posting software is allowed as long as users still personally interact with the community. Any accounts found to simply be a mirror of a user's activity from elsewhere with no additional engagement will eventually be flagged. Please ensure your cross-posting software supports CWs.

Media that is entirely AI-generated must be CW'd, and all works featuring AI-generated content must include the tools used to generate it in the message body. This does not include works that use AI as reference material or AI editing tools such as Magic Eraser or Generative Fill.

cutie.city.text: No hate speech, discrimination, and/or bigotry. This includes racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, TERFery, SWERFery, xenophobia, and anything else along those lines.
Respect other people and their boundaries. No harassment, unwanted advances, sealioning, trolling, bullying, dogpiling, doxxing, outing, stalking, or anything else along those lines.
NSFW posts are allowed, but ONLY behind a content warning, and NSFW media must be marked as sensitive. Nonconsensual content and sexual depictions of minors are strictly forbidden.
No spamming, excessive/paid advertising, mass-marketing, or using irrelevant hashtags for visibility purposes. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged - but be yourself, not a "brand".
Don't share misleading information. This includes propaganda, conspiracy theories, promotion of cryptocurrency/NFTs, COVID denialism, deceitful impersonation, and anything else like that.
Don't incite violence, promote toxic ideologies, or link to any sources that do so. This includes religious fundamentalism, left-wing authoritarianism, and essentially anything right-wing.
Don't post any illegal content or otherwise break any applicable laws, including (but not limited to) U.S. copyright law. When in doubt, always ask for consent and/or provide attribution.
Do your part to keep Cutie City a friendly, accessible, and cozy space. Use CWs on posts that others may not want to see/read. Include alt text on images/videos. Be excellent to each other.

Please share and comment on things that have been edited or gone through peer review.
Please do not share anything that hasn't been verified, reviewed or edited somewhere else. This is not a place to break news.

cyber.ms.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

We do not tolerate spam, fraud, or theft in our community. This includes excessive cross-posts, links, and posts related to crypto/NFT projects and AI art (AI art can be posted under certain conditions: the post must be published as "unlisted," labeled as AI Art, and should not be profit-oriented).

⚠️ We kindly ask you to attentively read the information under "Registration" on our About Page in order to join our community. 

🔗 https://cyber.ms/about

This instance is under the jurisdiction of Western Australia. All posts on this instance must abide by the WA Laws and the Australian Laws

darkmoon.social.text:
Be Kind

No Spamming

darkfriend.social.text: You must be 13 years of age or older to hold an account on Darkfriend Social.
Show respect. Treat others with kindness, respect, dignity, and patience.
Do not harass others. Read the Code of Conduct for a description of what we consider to be harassment.
Do not post or boost NSFW content without Content Warnings / Sensitive Content setting.
Do not post or boost illegal material. This includes copyrighted materials which you are not licensed to share.
Do not post advertisements or promotions. Read the Code of Conduct for a description of what we consider to be advertisements.
Hide spoilers and leaks behind Content Warnings.

darktundra.xyz.text: Treat others respectfully: Refrain from any form of insult, bullying or discrimination, including but not limited to racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-Semitic and misogynistic remarks or actions toward others.
Use an appropriate tone: Use a respectful and friendly tone, even if you disagree with someone.
Respect the privacy of others: Do not share personal information without explicit permission and respect the privacy rights of others.
Compliance with applicable law: Do not post illegal content.
Avoid misinformation: Do not share false or misleading information.
No spam posts: Refrain from posting unsolicited advertisements or similar content that does not fit the community.

Mark sensitive content (CW): Please mark any content that may contain common triggers, is sexually explicit or violent as sensitive (CW) to ensure the safety of other members. Note: Accounts that exclusively post such content may be limited or banned.
You must be older than 16 years: According to European law, you must be at least 16 years old to use this instance.
All public posts from this instance are indexed by tootfinder.ch.

darmstadt.social.text: Achte auf einen respektvollen Umgang und faire Diskussionskultur.

Belästige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen(doxing) wird als Belästigung aufgefasst.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen (sog. Fake-News) und Verschwörungsmythen sind hier unerwünscht.
Rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache sind nicht geduldet.
Die Bewerbung von Menschenfeindlichen und Hasserfüllten Ideologien wird nicht geduldet.

Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen zuerst mit den Moderator*innen und gib ihnen eine Chance der Erläuterung. Kommunikation mit der Moderation ist direkte persönliche Kommunikation und erfolgt via Direktnachrichten, ein öffentliches Verbreiten dieser Moderations Kommunikation ist zu unterlassen.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam. Ein Toot mit nichts als einem Link wird als Spam ausgelegt, ebenso wie jedwede kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen bei sensitiven, kontroversen, oder vermutlich triggernden Themen.
Pornographische und stark sexualisierte Inhalte sind unerwünscht.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.

darticulate.com.text: This server is intended to be a place for Dartisans like  myself to chat together and explore the fediverse as seen from the Dart community, however a few ground rules have to apply to users, not that I'm expecting any users to break these but please see below.
No privacy violations against other people; doxing, revealing or sexual images of someone else, information about someone's health, or crimes done against them.
No xenophobia, hate speech or incitement to such things.
No incitements to break any of the server rules
No spread of violent images, sexual violence, torture, or forced actions.

darknight-coffee-cannabis.club.text: Respektvoller Umgang: Behandeln Sie alle Mitglieder der Mastodon-Community mit Respekt, unabhängig von ihren Meinungen, Herkunft, Geschlecht, Alter oder anderen persönlichen Merkmalen.
Keine Belästigung: Belästigung, Bedrohungen oder Mobbing jeglicher Art sind nicht gestattet. Vermeiden Sie absichtliche Provokationen und respektlose Kommunikation.
Keine Diskriminierung: Diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Äußerungen aufgrund von Rasse, Geschlecht, Religion, sexueller Orientierung oder anderen persönlichen Merkmalen sind streng verboten.

Keine NSFW-Inhalte ohne Kennzeichnung: Wenn Sie Inhalte für Erwachsene teilen möchten, kennzeichnen Sie diese bitte entsprechend mit einer "NSFW" (Not Safe For Work)-Markierung und halten Sie sich an die geltenden Gesetze und Vorschriften.
Keine Spam- oder Massennachrichten: Vermeiden Sie das Versenden von Spam-Nachrichten, massenhaften Werbeaktionen oder nicht angeforderten Informationen.

Achten Sie auf Urheberrecht und Privatsphäre: Respektieren Sie das Urheberrecht und die Privatsphäre anderer. Teilen Sie keine Inhalte, für die Sie keine Berechtigung haben, und veröffentlichen Sie keine persönlichen Informationen anderer ohne deren Zustimmung.
Keine illegalen Aktivitäten: Verwenden Sie Mastodon nicht für illegale Aktivitäten oder um gesetzeswidrige Inhalte zu teilen.
Fördern Sie konstruktive Diskussionen: Wenn Sie an Diskussionen teilnehmen, versuchen Sie, konstruktive Beiträge zu leisten und Meinungsverschiedenheiten auf respektvolle Weise zu lösen.
Befolgen Sie die Plattformregeln: Achten Sie darauf, dass Sie die spezifischen Regeln und Richtlinien Ihrer Mastodon-Instanz kennen und befolgen.
Melden Sie Verstöße: Wenn Sie auf Verstöße gegen diese Etikette stoßen, melden Sie diese bitte dem zuständigen Administrator oder Moderator, damit angemessene Maßnahmen ergriffen werden können.

Diese 10 Punkte bilden eine solide Grundlage für eine freundliche und respektvolle Mastodon-Community. Indem Sie diese Regeln befolgen und von anderen erwarten, dass sie dasselbe tun, können Sie dazu beitragen, eine angenehme und einladende Umgebung für alle Nutzer zu schaffen.

datak.duckdns.org.text: Questo è un server Mastodon "casalingo". Gira su un Thin Client Dell, RAM 4Gb, SSD da 64Gb.

Questo server è nato principalmente come server "personale" monoutente. Se qualcuno vuole iscriversi deve metterci la faccia e deve inviarmi un messaggio privato, altrimenti non se ne fa nulla. Le risorse del server sono molto limitate.
Chi entra qui deve innanzitutto lasciare fuori la maleducazione e gli estremismi di ogni genere. Rispetto le idee di tutti anche quando non le condivido, ma non tollero quando si esagera.
Qui non si fa politica. Il rispetto delle Istituzioni e dei loro rappresentanti, ad ogni livello, è un dovere civico oltre che di buona educazione.

datboi.network.text: No sexism, racism, or hate speech. Homophobia and transphobia are strictly forbidden.
Please use the content warning tag where appropriate.

Please use the report button whenever you feel it necessary. Reports will be reviewed, and content that breaks the rules will be removed at the discretion of moderators. Everyone should feel safe and comfortable being here.
Account access is not guaranteed. Signing up for an account on datboi.network requires that I personally know you in some capacity. Other applications will be rejected.

datavis.social.text: NO RACISM, SEXISM, HOMOPHOBIA, TRANSPHOBIA OR XENOPHOBIA.

Data Visualization Topics: datavis.social is a topical server focused particularly on Data Visualization and related topics. The central idea of the server is to gather a community around these shared interests.
LANGUAGE: English is the common language of the instance. Other languages are welcome, but please be kind and post English translations so that we can all read your posts.
INCLUSION: We want everyone to feel welcome, safe, and respected.  Please be welcoming and kind to everyone, especially when you have a difference of opinion. Then, be *extra* kind. :-)

HARASSMENT: If you experience or notice any harassment or other aggressive behaviors, report it—by clicking on the three dots next to the message or profile and selecting “Report @personname”) and help keeping this platform a safe space for everyone.
No NFTs: We know many people involved in computational art sell NFTs. However, on vis.social we’ve made the decision that we don’t want to be involved in NFTs. Please do NOT post them here.

No AI Images: Please do not use datavis.social to share images from text-to-image tools such as MidJourney or Stable Diffusion. We welcome critical discussion of these tools, particularly about the legal and ethical issues surrounding these tools and the implications for artists and society

Joining datavis.social: please tell us about your interest in this instance and it's topics. Tell us a little about you,  and your interests. Be sure to mention "Popcorn" in your application. Yes, it's a test to see if you've read the instance rules.

datflow.tech.text: Keine Lust auf diskriminierenden Mist! Hier zählt nur dein Menschsein. Aussehen, Herkunft, Glaube, Liebe, Identität, Beruf oder Socken sind egal. Hier wird Toleranz und Respekt gelebt.

Sensible Inhalte markieren!
Unbedingt Spinnentiere, NSFW, Gore, etc. pp. mit entsprechender Inhaltswarnung versehen.

dataplatform.social.text: Behave. While you're free to express your opinions, this freedom does not extend to being mean, disrespectful or derogatory to anyone. If you don't like someone, block them and move on with your life.
Everything is public. Don't post things you would be ashamed of if they became public - even in private messages.
No spam. You may promote material that you created yourself, within reason. Do not tag third parties. If you're unsure if your post or DM might be spammy, it probably is.
Only legal content. Everything must be legal under Swedish and EU law. In edge cases, or if you are unsure, don't click "Publish" in the first place.

No impersonation.

Unless *clearly* stated and clearly evident that you are running a parody/satire/comedy account, you may not assume the name of another individual or entity.
No disinformation. You must make a reasonable, good-faith effort to verify claims of a controversial nature.

datacorner.social.text: You work within Data Warehousing / Analytics / Business Intelligence areas.

datasci.social.text: Don't be a jerk. We expect to treat each other respectfully.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling, doxxing, or impersonation
No content that is considered illegal in Denmark or France
No intentional sharing of false or misleading information
Nothing NSFW (not safe for work), such as sexually explicit or violent media

SIGN-UP: This is not a generalist server and is destined for professionals in human-centric data science, broadly defined. Please register here only if that is the case. To get accepted for sign-up, specify your fit in the "Why do you want to join?" field.

dawdling.net.text: So far it's just me. If I allow others on the instance we'll add a standard list of rules.

dcerberus.com.text: No right-wing lunatics. Healthy political debate is fine, but this server is anti-fascist.
No anti-vaccine propaganda or fear mongering. The mods know people who have died from COVID-19.
Nothing illegal belongs here: no drug dealing, child pornography, death threats, or anything else that would be illegal in whatever country or jurisdiction you live in.
No hate speech here, period. Ever. It's 2022 and I can't believe I have to say that.

No minors. There are some jurisdictions where material posted by non-adults falls under some very strict legal constraints. I want no part of that, so if you are under 18 then sorry, please look for another server.

deacon.social.text: No sexually explicit, hateful, or illegal content is allowed
No intentional posting of misinformation or information that may lead to physical harm
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, or casteism
Disagreement is okay; personal attacks never are.

No spam. You can plug your latest project within reason, but if your account appears to only exist to solicit sales, especially if your product has nothing to do with the point of this server, we will delete your profile without warning.

dcae.fyi.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
No content that is illegal in the US, the UK, or the EU.

Only Daniel & Ammi
This server is for the exclusive use of Daniel Carter & Ammi Embry.

deadinsi.de.text: We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, discrimination against sex workers, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, transphobia and ableism.
Do not explicitly endorse systems of oppression as a remedy to the same. This especially applies to the myth of meritocracy.
Do not argue for the existence or relevance of reverse-racism or reverse-sexism. Racism and sexism are deep structural issues with culture and not the expression of single persons.

Make use of the Content Warning (CW) feature in Mastodon extensively. While this is a requirement for any adult/disturbing content, particularly involving discussion about prohibited content, we highly encourage using it as a general disclaimer regarding the content of your post.

When you're asked to disengage, do so. If you want to start an argument, it is better to ask if the person you're engaging would be interested in hearing your take first. We're trying to build a space where everyone feels comfortable being themselves, not a debate club.

dctr.uk.text: There must be no confidential information posted.

deadrobots.social.text: No illegal content or solicitation of illegal materials or services. This includes, but is not limited to; cracked software,
No pornography or sexually explicit material, both in imagery and descriptive text.
No scam or unethical services, suck as click / like buying, social marketing services.

No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate, hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence. This includes, no racism, no anti-trans, no ageism, no sexism. This is community and needs to be a safe place for all.
No account may impersonate anyone else. This includes a band that is not your own, musician, famous or not, or historical figure.

decentralis.social.text: No TERFs, SWERFs, Nazis, or "free speech absolutists"
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No harassing, dogpiling, or doxxing other users on this instance or the wider Fediverse
No posting or sharing illegal content (especially content illegal in the United States)
No creating bots without approval (cute, funny, or useful bots might be approved, just ask a moderator)
No posting or sharing content that will make us make a new rule (if your defense is "it doesn't break one of the rules", consider this rule)

Please report anything that violates any of the rules above. The moderators of this server take reports seriously and will work with members of this instance to ensure it is a friendly and welcoming space

deepwoodsocial.net.text: Be kind and respectful. No harassment, hate speech/symbols.

Example of breaking this rule: Debating about the age of consent.
A non-example: Posting about weed even if it is illegal some places.
Consider using content warnings for disturbing content and when venting. And hashtags, so people can add filters. Also hashtags are good for helping others find content they'd like to see

defcon.social.text: DEFCON.social is an inclusive instance and will moderate against bigotry, homophobia, supremacy, and edge-lord behavior
We don't condone harassment against any user, for any reason. Harassment can be generally or specifically targeted to make users feel uncomfortable, unwelcome, or afraid

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Anyone can report harassment. If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, you can report
Don't break laws here, ask others to break laws here, admit to breaking laws
Pornography, Nudity, Links to illegal content, spam and commercial advertising are forbidden. Promoting your own projects in moderation is OK
Be polite: Mark a CW for spoilers
No account impersonation. If you claim you are the BBC World News and you aren't, don't be surprised if your account is suspended. Identity is tricky enough as it is
Mark your account type as "Bot" if you act like a bot or are one. For example automated posting or re-posting of other accounts
You must be at least 13 years old to create an account (US COPA, CCPA, UK AADC, etc.)

devolver.social.text: Be excellent to each other! Be kind and respect others, regardless of who they are and whether their opinions differ from your own.
No NSFW or offensive content. This includes offensive/hateful or otherwise mature language, images, videos, etc. Keep it PG.
No spam. This includes excessive message/emoji posting, excessive reacting, symbol "art", hoisting, advertising and trolling.
Exercise common sense. Do not beg for free games, jobs, merch or anything else. Don't pester others, even in DMs. Don't try to bend/find loopholes in the rules.
This is not a customer service server. Users may help you out of the kindness of their heart if you have questions or are encountering issues, but it is not anybody's job.
Party on, and remember to seek alternatives to single-use plastics.

digisociety.social.text: Tue, was gut ist und vermeide, was schlecht ist.

Verletzender Sarkasmus oder Zynismus vergiftet das Gesprächsklima.

dingo.network.text: No discriminatory language, targeted slurs, harassment or bullying

disabled.social.text: I am at least 16 years of age or older on the date of registration for the disabled.social instance.
I agree to not discriminate or promote/advocate content that oppresses members of marginalized groups (see rules for examples of groups).
I agree to not threaten, stalk, or dox people.
I agree to not harass others using tactics such as brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
I agree to not engage in mobbing, name-calling, intentional misgendering, or deadnaming.
I agree to not promote/advocate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism, or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
I agree to not promote/advocate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
I agree to not promote/advocate unsubstantiated conspiracy theories related to anti-vaxx and COVID19.
I agree to alt text images, caption videos, and try my best to follow the best practices for screen readers.
I agree to not be spammy (e.g., spamming feeds with giveaways, crypto, etc.)
I agree to not post, promote, or advocate any content that is illegal in the United States.

I agree to not use disabled.social as a way to grow a commercial business, market products, or as a way to profit off of disabled people. EXCEPTION: Disabled people who sell products as part of mutual aid efforts and survival (e.g., Etsy shops, personal businesses, written works like books, etc.)
I agree to use content warnings where appropriate.
I agree to follow the remainder of the rules and adhere to the best practices outlined on the server about page.

dimension.host.text: 타인을 괴롭히거나 사칭할 목적으로 이용하지 마세요.
사회적 약자에 대한 혐오발언을 금지합니다. (장애, 인종, 성적 지향성, 성별 정체성, 나이 등)

전체 공개로 민감한 내용을 올릴 때는 CW기능을 사용해 주세요.
신체 노출도가 높거나 폭력적인 내용, 심한 욕설, 과하게 반짝이는 이미지, 최신 스포일러 등이 이에 해당합니다.

타인의 저작물을 올릴 경우 출처를 밝혀 주세요.
재업로드가 금지된 저작물을 가져오지 마세요.
타인의 저작물을 무단사용한 소스로 만들어진 Ai 결과물을 업로드하거나 프로필로 사용하지 마세요.
학대나 범죄를 유도·옹호하는 글, 자살 및 자해 조장, 그 외 대한민국 국법에 어긋나는 내용을 올리지 마세요.
bot으로 쓸 수 있는 전체 공개 글은 일일 3회 까지이며, 그 이상은 비표시 이하의 범위로 작성해 주세요.
다른 사용자에게 암묵적인 룰을 강요하지 마세요.
이상 규칙은 dimension.host 내부에 적용됩니다. dimension.host 의 관리자는 타 인스턴스의 사용자를 직접적으로 제재할 수 없으며, 대신 해당 사용자를 볼 수 없도록 침묵·차단하거나 문제되는 내용이 자주 올라오는 인스턴스를 침묵·차단할 수 있습니다.

dindon.one.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not post spam. A toot that is nothing other than a link constitutes spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine, however, to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on DinDon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@dindon.one.
Do not toot in languages other than English, Swedish, Russian (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

discordian.social.text: No Nazis or any hate speech related activity.

discuss.systems.text: Be welcoming. Be kind. Look out for each other.

No intimidation or harassment (online or in-person). Please read the Citizen Code of Conduct for how we interpret harassment.
No violence, threats of violence, or violent language.
Sustained disruption of online discussion is unacceptable.

The administrators reserve the right to remove users or defederate with instances.

diversity.kitchen.text: Protect marginalized groups. Hate speech and any form of oppression against anyone based on their social background, gender, religion, appearance, nationality, etc. has no place on this instance

Use CWs. When posting on the local timeline, provide content warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death, disease, politics, anything disturbing, posts conveying a negative atmosphere or posts mentioning discrimination, if you are not targeted. Consider using CWs beyond this rule.
Use image descriptions. When posting images, always post an image description.
No brands, no marketing, no data-miners, no bot accounts, no cross posters. The kitchen is a social space, not one for some agenda.

Put pronouns in your profile metadata. It does not matter if you think it is obvious. We all want to be 100% sure which pronouns to use. If you don't want anyone to use pronouns, put "no pronouns" or "use my name" instead.

doesstuff.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
doesstuff.social.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

doesstuff.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism
doesstuff.social.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

doesstuff.social.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
doesstuff.social.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

doesstuff.social.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
doesstuff.social.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

doesstuff.social.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
doesstuff.social.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

doesstuff.social.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and substantive use of generative AI must be disclosed
doesstuff.social.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

dogno.se.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or general bigotry.

Please try to resolve conflicts between folks using the tools Mastodon gives you, such as blocking/etc.
I will not intervene in petty interpersonal conflicts that do not otherwise violate the server rules.

Please, use common sense, and have an understanding of consent.
If someone has blocked you, do not continue to contact them!
Please mark 18+/NSFW content appropriately with the CW feature - i.e. click CW and write "18+" or "NSFW".
You are free to invite friends, but please make sure they are also decent people who are willing to follow server rules. Don't widely share invite links.

dogs.chat.text: Behave like a decent person. If you wouldn't say it to someone's face, don't say it here. If that requires further explanation, this server is not for you.
No illegal content, e.g., child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc.
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence, or calls for violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon-related content or similar conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No pornographic content of any kind.

No visual content depicting animal abuse. No content supporting, encouraging, promoting, or condoning animal abuse. All other posts related to the discussion of animal abuse (e.g., news stories, current events, historical references, etc.) require a Content Warning.

No spam. Owners of dog training businesses can promote their services directly (e.g., 'Buy This,' 'Buy Now,' etc.) with one daily post. Posts about free resources (e.g., podcasts, free videos, articles, etc.) without upsells are unrestricted.
No threats, bullying, or attacks on an individual or group.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else. This includes other people as well as other businesses.

dolphinhome.net.text: No Extremist Ideologies: Dolphin Home prohibits extremist views, including but not limited to white supremacy, religious fanaticism, and other intolerant or violent ideologies, to ensure a safe, inclusive community.

Respect and Courtesy Expected: Respect on Dolphin Home means polite interaction and empathy. Disrespect reports are evaluated for intent, impact, and pattern by moderators to maintain a harmonious community.

Mandatory Content Warnings (CWs): CWs are required for content not suitable for public spaces or considered offensive, grotesque, or upsetting. While not all personal triggers can be anticipated, general sensitivity is expected.

Restriction on Age Restricted Content: Users under legal age are prohibited from posting, responding to, or amplifying any age restricted content including but not limited to sexually explicit material, alcohol, tobacco, firearms, gambling.

Ban on Illegal Explicit Content: Any sexually explicit content, whether photographic, artistic, or written, considered illegal in general terms, is strictly prohibited on Dolphin Home, regardless of local legality.

Encouraged Use of Image Descriptions: We encourage, but don't require, image descriptions (alt text) to aid those who benefit from them, fostering an inclusive and accessible community for all members.
Privacy and Confidentiality: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent, including photos, contact details, or any other sensitive data.
Strict Ban on Parody Accounts: Impersonating brands or public figures through parody accounts is strictly forbidden on Dolphin Home. Violators will face immediate action.
Intellectual Property Rights: Respect copyright laws and intellectual property rights. Do not post content that you do not have the right to use or share.
Accurate Representation: Users should not intentionally misrepresent themselves or their affiliations. This includes creating fake profiles or spreading misinformation.

Appropriate Content: Content that is sexually explicit should only be posted as unlisted and with appropriate content warnings. Do not post if it does not contribute constructively to the community. Violent and graphic content is only acceptable for journalism in the course of reporting.
No Illegal Activities: Any content that promotes, suggests, or engages in illegal activities is strictly prohibited.

No Conspiracy Theories: Conspiracy theories and unfounded claims are prohibited. Users must provide credible facts and evidence when stating claims. Directing others to "do their own research" instead of providing substantiated information is not acceptable.
No Spam or Malicious Content: Users should not post spam, malicious links, or content that could harm others' devices or compromise their security.

Bullying and Harassment: Bullying, harassment, or any form of intimidation towards other users is strictly prohibited. This includes cyberbullying and any behavior intended to threaten, embarrass, or silence others.

Commissions Open Posts: Users offering commissions must include a link to their clear and comprehensive terms and conditions in their posts. This ensures transparency and mutual understanding in all commission-related transactions.
Legal Compliance for Raffles/Contests: Raffles, contests, and sweepstakes must comply with local laws. Users must post clear terms and rules, and understand legal differences between each activity.
Adherence to Laws: Users must comply with national, state (AZ, WA), and local laws relevant to Dolphin Home's server locations. This ensures a legal and safe community environment.
Moderation Decisions Are Final: For disputes or rule violations, the moderation team's decision is final. Please report any breaches to ensure Dolphin Home remains a safe, harmonious community.

Mutual Aid: We believe in helping those in need. However, we ask most posts should focus on community building and sharing. Aid requests are limited to once per week, cannot be pinned, and must include the #MutualAid tag. Please remain mindful of potential abuse and scams.

dragons.social.text: We believe freedom of speech is paramount, but like all freedoms, it comes with the requirement for its responsible and legal exercise. These rules set some "don't cross these" lines which should be considered by all posters as what we consider "responsible and legal exercise" on this service.

No harassment. This means going above and beyond to antagonize other users using things like circumventing blocks/mutes. Users are expected to unfollow/block/mute other users who post content they do not wish to see. Respect their decision and requests to stop targeting/mentioning them.

No brigading. Brigading is solicitation or inducement to harassment. Basically, getting your friends or followers to "jump on the bandwagon" to harass someone. Boycotting or expressing dissatisfaction with a corporate, political, or government entity may be exempt from this.
No breaking US law, or laws in your jurisdiction. We have to comply with all bona fide US law enforcement requests delivered via warrant or court order.

No impersonation. Parody is allowed, but parody accounts MUST be clearly identified. Attempting to impersonate another for financial/material gain, and soliciting such is considered fraud, and is illegal. Doing the same to defame, slander, or libel another can likewise be illegal.

No stealing other's names from other social media services, for the purposes of impersonation or squatting. Squatting is registering/reserving an account name which you have not used prior, but someone else has on another service. Common words or names may be considered exempt from this rule.

Don't spam (sending mass unsolicited commercial messages) via targeted posts or private messages. Advertising on your timeline to your followers is fine, and they can retoot it on their timeline, if they want. Social media isn't a replacement for email spam.

Do not "dox" people (post private personal info on public timelines without permission). Publishing already legitimately publicly-known info is a gray area; just because it may be published by a legitimate official source is not necessarily defensible. If people want to know, they can look it up.

Don't abuse or hack the service/servers. Participating in any kind of cracking or denial of service activities against the service, intentional or not, will be addressed immediately, potentially resulting in instant and irrevocable bans.

Posting adult/mature content. After-Dark/adult/XXX/erotic content is only permitted from accounts which are clearly marked as posting such content. Minors may not create, post, receive, follow, or interact with such content and accounts. Any such content cannot violate US law.

Respect copyrights. Avoid posting content that isn't yours, or that you don't have license to post. Copyright law still matters on social media, and reported violations will be taken seriously. Don't use other people's art for your avatars, backgrounds, or other decorations without their permission.

DMCA takedown notices are only for content you own or have license to. We strive to respond in a timely manner to all properly-submitted DMCA requests. Please send them to dmca@dragons.social for expedited processing. Do note that bona-fide "fair use" will be considered in our response.

Please respect the staff's time and try to take as little of it as possible in engaging us in administrative activities. Be direct and to the point in reports, and provide as much relevant info as possible. Be patient with us as we investigate and respond. We strive to work as quickly as we can.

The catch-all rule: don't be a jerk. If your goal in life is just to make people miserable, especially those of us tasked with managing communities like this, then we'll feel more than justified to send you on your way with our hind-pawprints in your posterior. We're all people too.

earpnation.social.text: No illegal content under US, French, or European law

Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the earpnation community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behavior; criticize ideas or behavior and never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on earpnation, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

ecologie.social.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, psychophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

edumasto.org.text: EduMasto is a Mastodon server whose primary purpose is to facilitate conversation about higher education issues, but conversations are not limited to that topic: feel free to share your thoughts on any topic of your choosing.

Because our goal is to promote civil and productive conversations among real people, only personal (i.e., no organizational or corporate) accounts for individuals (i.e., no anonymous accounts or bots) will be approved.

This server is intended as a platform for individuals professionally involved in higher ed policy. Please use “Why do you want to join?” to help us identify you. If using Gmail/etc., please include  your university/govt/work email in your response
This will be an inclusive online community: all higher education policy stakeholders, including colleagues in other countries, are welcome to join.

Please be mindful of the fact this is an experiment and we don't know how sustainable or successful it will be. If it works, you can enjoy a more civilized local timeline while retaining full access to the entire Mastodon network. If it doesn't, you can always move your account to another server.
PLEASE use your FULL NAME as the display name in your profile. We want people to get to know each other and odd handles and anonymity don't promote that.

efragz.net.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
efragz.net.hint:
This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. 

Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

efragz.net.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
efragz.net.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

efragz.net.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
efragz.net.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

efragz.net.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
efragz.net.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

efragz.net.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
efragz.net.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

eggplant.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in Germany or Ireland

No purely crossposting from other platforms. If you need to use a crossposter to aid with migrating fine, but if you don't engage with the fedi (follow people, reply, boost, like) while continuing to crosspost for extended periods, your account will be suspended

egirl.social.text: No Conspiracies (Antivaxx, Covid Denial, Flat Earth, Lemon Earth, etc.)
Self Promotion is allowed provided you are limiting yourself to once every 48 hours.
Cross Posting Boosts or Replies to Twitter without permission is prohibited.

ehr.scot.text: Sexually explicit content: We do not permit the posting of sexually explicit images or videos, nor do we permit links to such content unless it is incidental in nature or medical in character.

Private information: Do not share the private information of other people unless the subject consents, the information is freely available online and does not arise, nor is suspected to have arisen from phishing or hacking.

False information: Please not post information on this server which is false or misleading, or which is calculated to cause panic or alarm. This is especially important when it concerns armed conflict such as that in Ukraine, health and politics.

Video content: Space on mastodon servers come at a premium and we ask all members to avoid uploading videos directly to this server. Please upload your video to Youtube or a similar site and include the link within your toot instead.
Copyright: Please do not post any material to which you do not own the copyright or do not have  a license or permission to post.
Spam and advertising: We do not permit the posting of spam or advertisements on this server without our prior agreement.

Hate speech and discrimination: We won’t tolerate attacks, abuse or threats being made by members on the basis of their race, religion, disability, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, residency, asylum or refugee status or socioeconomic status.
Deadnaming and misgendering: A person’s pronouns are a fundamental part of that persons identity. With this in mind, we will not tolerate members misgendering or deadnaming others.

Sensitive media and content warnings: Please make liberal use of content warnings when you are posting on mastodon. This is extremely important when your toot discusses sensitive topics such as sexual violence, domestic violence, suicide etc.

No recreational shit-talking for no good reason.

See also: https://cohost.org/shel/post/29079-lashon-hara-direct

18 and older only please if you are found to be breaking this rule you will be removed

eimsbuettel.social.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Die Freiheit der einen hört dort auf, wo die Freiheit des anderen leidet: Eimsbuettel.social mag Meinung, aber weder Beleidigung noch Hassrede.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transfeindliche, ableistische, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen. Auch im Internet gelten Regeln und Gesetze.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Weil wir eine lokale Gemeinschaft aufbauen wollen, finden wir automatisierte Beiträge oder Accounts nicht so gut. Wenn sie eimsbuettel.social helfen, solltest Du sie kennzeichnen. Wir können automatisierte und Crossposter-Konten entfernen.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, ebensowenig die Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewaltverherrlichende oder gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

einbeck.social.text: Wir als Betreibende und Mitnutzer erwarten eine angenehme Atmosphäre und einen wertschätzenden Umgangston.
Wir als Betreibende und Mitnutzer dulden keine rassistischen, beleidigenden, sexistischen, homo- oder transphoben Beiträge.
Es gelten die gesetzlichen Bestimmungen. Beleidigungen jedweder Art können zur Anzeige gebracht und straftrechtlich verfolgt werden.

el5.net.text: 【用户交流】禁止发布对性取向、性癖、爱好、信仰、宗教、政治立场、民族、地域等的侮辱性言论
【用户交流】禁止对任何用户发送具有骚扰、猥亵、恐吓、威胁、诱骗、霸凌性质的内容、不受欢迎的性暗示内容，或其他令他人感到不安或不适、打扰他人正常生活的内容

【广告及推广】请不要推广虚假、诈骗、或违反本站服务条款的内容

【📌 规则明细 📌】使用本站前，请详细阅读[实例细则、服务承诺

【🔑 新用户注册需求🔑 】1、请使用中文告诉我们加入本实例的理由，请使用至少10个汉字描述理由。人工审核将尽量在一周内完成，如被批准，您会收到一封欢迎邮件。如没有按照上述要求填写，注册会被拒绝。
【🔑 新用户注册需求🔑 】2、同时请在通过审核后的📆两周内📆修改头像或者发送一条嘟文等相关的操作，未进行任何操作的账号将在下次清理僵尸账号时被冻结，请联系站长或管理员解冻。

eleph.social.text:
Nudity is allowed.

You are allowed to post nude images of yourself if you so choose. You must be 18+. You must mark nude images as sensitive. You must use a Content Warning (CW). This includes images of your bare chest regardless of gender. You may not post nude images of others.
When in doubt, use a Content Warning (CW). For example, toots about meat or including images of meat should be marked as sensitive and behind a CW.

eldritch.cafe.text: Hateful conduct: We do not permit any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the “debate” of theirs right to a safe existence.

Harassment: We do not permit harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling (“sealioning”), or boundary violations (for instance non-consensual flirting or unsolicited nudes). Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.

Safeguarding: We do not permit content that endangers others, such as others’ personal or identifiable information (“doxxing”) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.
Sexual Content: Sexual content, such as erotic nudity or pornography, may be shared behind a content warning. Sexual content may not be shared on public timelines.

CSAM/Abuse: Sexualised depictions of children, real (“child porn”, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (“lolicon”, “shotacon”), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, “revenge porn”), are not permitted and will be removed.
Misinformation: We do not permit the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating persons or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.

Spam: We do not permit spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion, crossposting on the public timelines. Bot accounts are not permitted unless administrators’ exceptional approval.
Illegal content: This instance is hosted in France and subject to French law. As such, any content illegal in France may be removed without prior warning.

Be nice: Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis. For the same reason, content warnings for common triggers are heavily encouraged, and may be required at the team’s discretion.

emacs.ch.text: Be friendly, be respectful, stay on-topic and avoid derailing discussions.
No condescending or derogatory language, especially regarding race, nationality, color, gender, sexual preference, age, religion or political affiliation.
Use the CW (Content Warning) flag whenever you post something that you wouldn't want your neighbor, boss, coworker, partner or children to see.
No porn, no child sexual exploitation material, not even disguised as anime. Exceptions: occasional soft nudity of yourself or your consenting partner behind a CW.
Bots allowed as long as posts are relevant to this instance (Emacs, Programming Languages etc.)
Properly tag the language of your posts, so other users can auto-translate the content.

If you post links to media (videos, images, audio), please provide a short description of what the content is about. This helps the users and the moderators to better assess the content. We reserve the right to mark links to media as "sensitive" that the moderators cannot qualify.
Comply with the law of your country.
No introduction required, no real names required, but please put a few words in your bio.

This server is intended for non-commercial purposes, with the exception of directly related commercial activities that contribute to the server's topic (i.e. services related to FOSS, hosting, Emacs, books). Prior approval from administrators is required for recurring use.

emeraldsocial.org.text: Don't post harmful content including but not limited to: racism (whether it's antiblackness, antisemitism, islamophobia, or some other form of racism), sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, enby erasure, fatphobia, casteism, pluralphobia, disinformation and copaganda
Posting images of people without their consent is not tolerated here. If your image was posted without your consent, please contact staff at emeraldsocial@riseup.net
Usage of captions and descriptive text when posting images is heavily encouraged for the benefit of those using screen readers
This instance is intended for those located in or having relation to Eugene-Springfield and the surrounding area.
Please use content warnings for NSFW, spoilers and potentially triggering content. If you're not sure, it's a safe bet to just add a content warning anyways.

embracing.space.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Won’t Be Tolerated. We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect Other Users. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is Important in all contexts. If you’re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.
Listen; Don’t Make Excuses. If you’re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.
No Pedophilia or Zoophilia. This includes "loli" and "feral", including artistic depictions.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.
Use the Report Feature. Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.
Any content that infringes on the rights of third parties or otherwise violates applicable law in United States of America or Federal Republic of Germany is strictly forbidden.

Rule 9 includes in particular, but is not limited to, pornographic or obscene material, extremist content or content that offends common decency, gambling, material that could seriously endanger the morals of children or young people.
Rule 9 includes in particular, but is not limited to, material that could violate the rights of third parties (copyrights, name rights, trademark rights and data protection rights).
Rule 9 also includes the publication of defamatory content, insults or disparagement of persons or groups of persons.

emsdetten.mastodon.info.text: Keine Belästigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen.
Rassismus, Sexismus oder Beschimpfungen haben hier nichts verloren.
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten haben hier auch nichts verloren.
Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus ist verboten.
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt und/oder Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sind nicht erlaubt.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden gelöscht.
Übermässige Werbung / Spam / Spamflut von wiederholenden Tröts sind nicht erwünscht.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Allgemeine Verstöße gegen geltendes Recht in Deutschland oder der EU.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Stummschaltung von einzelnen Beiträgen, Sperrung/oder Löschung des Accounts führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Accounts akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Löschung von einzelnen Beiträgen, oder der Stummschaltung/Löschung des gesamten Accounts führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Accounts akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

engasjert.mdg.no.text: Denne Mastodon serveren er for Miljøpartiet De Grønnes (MDG) nasjonalt tillitsvalgte og folkevalgte.
Når du ber om å få konto så må du fortelle hvilken rolle du har i partiet.
Brukernavn skal være fornavn_etternavn. Har du flere navn så tilpass slik du ønsker. Bruk "_" for å skille ord. For "æ" så bruker du "a", for "ø" så bruker du "o" og for "å" så bruker du "a".
Postinger på denne serveren skal ikke bryte MDGs etiske retningslinjer.
Husk at alle offentlige poster i praksis kan sees av hele verden.
Du kan miste tilgangen til denne serveren om du bryter MDGs etiske retningslinjer eller ikke lengre har den rollen som gjorde at du fikk konto.

enshittification.social.text: Promote mutual respect amidst disagreements. Avoid aggressive pressure or pinging unwilling participants. Zero tolerance for threats towards members or management. Severe consequences await, regardless of intent. Jokes/sarcasm allowed if clearly non-intimidating, moderated for judgment.

Zero tolerance for bigotry: no racism, sexism, homophobia, or any form of discrimination. Bigotry is indiscriminate hatred toward entire groups. Embrace diversity and respect individuals, irrespective of differences or opinions. Let's foster an inclusive environment.

Moderators decide based on logic and reason, while acknowledging their humanity. Discuss issues privately with moderators if you disagree. Avoid airing grievances publicly. Note that moderation actions are not public information.

Exercise common sense: think before you act or post. Offensive actions like animal cruelty or 9/11 jokes aren't explicitly mentioned in the rules but are still unacceptable. A warning means you crossed the line, even if it's not explicitly stated in the rules.
No creating impersonating alternate accounts of our staff. Also, no bringing alts to insult others (e.g., "CodixerIsDumb"). Respect the community by refraining from such behavior.

We oppose enshittification of other platforms, but strictly prohibit witch-hunting, harassment, or making staff's lives worse. Engaging in or planning such actions will result in removal from our server. Let's foster a positive community without resorting to harm.

epicure.social.text: Registrations are only accepted from those who demonstrate a serious interest in food and wine. Please make this clear in the "reason for joining" field, or we will reject your application. See our about page for more details.

Keep blatant political posts, memes, and promo to a minimum (or better yet, not at all. See full policy on our community rules page).
Use content warnings (CW: topic) generously. (Again, see our community rules page if you'd like more information about this.)
You may find support by visiting https://support.eponaauthorsolutions.com and checking out the tips, tricks, suggestions, and how-to articles in our support portal.

If you find value in the server, please support us on Patreon at https://patreon.com/eponaauthor or through Liberapay https://liberapay.com/EponaAuthor/donate . Even $1/month helps us maintain this server.

entrepreneurlibre.org.text: Cette communauté est un espace bienveillant et positif pour les actuels et futurs entrepreneurs (indépendants, chefs de TPE ou PME, auto- et micro-entrepreneurs) et leurs équipes !

Règle "Zéro emmerdeur". Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler, dénigrer, attaquer ou intimider d'autres personnes, ou divulguer leurs informations personnelles sans leur accord explicite. Insultes et grossièretés ne sont pas tolérées.

Abordez les autres membres de la communauté avec bienveillance et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.

Nous sommes plus stricts sur la modération que d'autres communautés. En particulier, le racialisme (promouvoir l'idée qu'il existe des races), le communautarisme, le prosélytisme religieux, la propagande politique, la désinformation, ne sont pas autorisés.

La publicité et la promotion d'offres commerciales (ventes de produits, services ou de MLM) est interdite.  Vous avez cependant le droit de parler de votre travail ou demander des avis et conseils pour améliorer par exemple votre site Web. (Profitez de l'entraide de la communauté !)
Les liens affiliés sont également interdits.

Seules les personnes physiques sont autorisées sur cette communauté. Les comptes purement publicitaires, notamment les comptes s'exprimant au nom d'une personne morale (société/association/institutions d'État) au lieu de ses gérants humains, seront rendus invisibles.
Pas de robots. Pas de "je reposte ici de façon automatique mes publications venant d'un autre réseau social".
Pas de crypto. Pas de MLM. Pas de Ponzi, d'offres d'investissement financier ou de prêts.

Les contenus suivants doivent être marqués avec le drapeau/avertissement de contenu sensible : nudité,  contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents (tous visuels ou messages qui ne sont pas convenables pour un affichage subit sur l'ordinateur de travail des autres membres).

Cette communauté est un refuge face à l'assaut anxiogène des médias. Par conséquent les contenus suivants doivent aussi être marqués avec le drapeau/avertissement de contenu sensible : affaires politiques, guerre, inflation, crise.

Cette communauté est un lieu positif d'entraide. Utilisez svp un drapeau/avertissement si vous postez commentaires ou réflexions négatifs sur vous-même (moments de blues, coups durs, etc.). Ça augmente vos chances de recevoir soutien ou conseil de ceux qui peuvent aider, sans s'imposer aux autres.

Dans la mesure du possible, même les mesures de modération drastiques (comme le bannissement) vous permettent quand même d'exporter vos données pour rejoindre un autre serveur Mastodon. Ceci ne s'appliquera pas si la cause du bannissement est le non-respect de la loi française ou européenne.
Pas de compte purement humoristique / satirique à moins que ce soit le coeur de votre métier.

Critiquer, diffamer, dénigrer d'autres personnes (comme c'est courant sur d'autres plateformes), par exemple en citant ou faisant une capture d'écran de leur message pour ajouter un commentaire narquois destiné à vos lecteurs, est interdit.

Note: nous utilisons le logiciel Mastodon, sur lequel il n'existe pas de fonctionnalité "langue de vipère" : si vous mentionnez un utilisateur (avec son "@"), même dans un message privé, cette personne peut toujours voir ce qui est dit à son sujet.

Sont interdits les propos, images ou publications racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes, l'incitation à la haine, à la violence ou à la discrimination. Les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris dessinés, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes/serveurs concernés bloqués.

Nous sommes connectés à la majorité du "Fediverse" (Mastodon, Peertube,  Pixelfed, etc.) mais nous réservons le droit de fermer la syndication (bloquer, ou rendre invisible) des serveurs qui ne respectent pas les valeurs et la charte de cette communauté.

Les "messages directs" sont soumis aux mêmes règles ci-dessus. Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées, les démarchages ou publicités non-sollicitées ainsi que le spam.

Les messages directs (sur la plateforme, ou par email) entre vous et d'autres membres, ou entre vous et les modérateurs, sont confidentiels. En aucun cas, ils ne peuvent être partagés publiquement sans l'accord des personnes concernées.

equel.social.text: We are a real-identity server. This is why our members authenticate with LinkedIn. If you prefer to remain anonymous, please consider joining another server.

Treat other members with respect, be polite and show empathy. 
Don’t overwhelm the discussion. 
Be mindful of spelling and formatting. 
Never write anything you wouldn't say aloud in real life.

Be open and seek to understand opinions that are different from yours.
Encourage each other's input and don't forget to validate other people's contributions.

Help make our community a safe space. 
Don't post or engage with NSFW content (including nudity). 
Don’t post or engage with the sole purpose of stirring controversy. 
Report any spammy behavior, such as unhelpful and unsolicited commercial outreach.

Don’t post or engage with incorrect or misleading content, including manipulated media.
Don’t post or engage with content that encourages or results in violence or physical harm, including health misinformation.

Illegal activities, hate speech, bullying, cancel mobs, harassment, sexual solicitation, threats, or discrimination (including racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia) will result in an immediate ban.

equestria.social.text: Illegal content under French and European law (Including off-site links) is not permitted. You are legally responsible for the content that you post.
Hate speech is not allowed. This includes racism, xenophobia, LGBTphobia, queerphobia, fatphobia, etc...
Be pony-like ! Don't harass others, and don't encourage it.
To keep the timeline easy-to-read, don't post spam messages or excessively shitpost.
User accounts may not be used solely for advertising. You can still register as a brony/furry convention or meet-up.
If you would like to create a bot account, please contact a moderator. Also, these accounts are not allowed to interact with users unless directly mentioned.
You may not use a disposable mail service to create an account.
Anything that depicts nudity, pornography, or anything not suitable for minors must use a content warning label. Sexual content depicting minors is forbidden.
Impersonation is prohibited. Parody accounts must state that they are.
If you post someone else's content (Such as fanart), please credit the original creator.
Inciting danger is prohibited. This applies (but not limited) to finance and health, for example. Cryptocurrencies are included in this ban.

Promoting organizations or ideologies that go against our rules is prohibited. For example, you can't promote a political party that incites hatred or harassment. In case it's not already clear: If you're far-right, you'll save time by registering elsewhere.
Multi-accounts are allowed as long as they are not used to circumvent a sanction or a user block. When creating a new account, please enter the name of your main account (to help moderation).

f.cz.text:
Citlivý obsah - všeobecný
Fotografie a média zobrazující mrtvé osoby či zvířata, utrpení lidí či zvířat, explicitní násilí na lidech či zvířatech nebo pornografický obsah musí být označené jako Citlivý obsah (CW).

Citlivý obsah - komerční. Komerční sdělení musí být označeno jako Citlivý obsah (CW), a to zejména pokud obsahuje erotický obsah. Označení erotiky nebo nahoty bez komerčního sdělení za citlivý obsah je pouze doporučené.

Netiquette. Je povinné dodržovat netiketu a zásady nekonfliktní mezilidské komunikace. Je zakázáno jiným uživatelům vyhrožovat, vydírat je, nebo je jiným způsobem obtěžovat; rovněž je zakázáno k těmto činům nabádat ostatní uživatele.

Zákaz hate speech a propagace totality. Je zakázáno kohokoli urážet na základě pohlaví, rasy, barvy pleti, jazyka, víry, náboženství či sexuální orientace. Je zakázána jakákoli podpora hnutí či politických stran směřujících k potlačení práv a svobod člověka.

Zakázaná témata: Je zakázáno schvalovat trestné činy nebo k nim ostatní uživatele nabádat. Je zakázána podpora a propagace terorismu. Je zakázáno popírat, zpochybňovat, schvalovat či ospravedlňovat holocaust, genocidy a válečné zločiny.
Přímé zasílání obsahu jiné osobě:  Bez předchozího výslovného souhlasu je zakázáno přímé zasílání  nevyžádaných komerčních nabídek či erotického nebo pornografického obsahu jiné osobě.

Citlivý obsah - dezinformace. Pokud si nejste zcela jisti, zda obsah, který šíříte, náhodou nemůže být označen jako dezinformace, označte ho raději předem jako citlivý obsah (CW). Jinak může být smazán.

f451.page.text: すべて世のありにくきこと、わが身とすみかとの、はかなくあだなるさまかくのごとし。いはむや所により、身のほどにしたがひて、心をなやますこと、あげてかぞふべからず。もしおのづから身かずならずして、權門のかたはらに居るものは深く悦ぶことあれども、大にたのしぶにあたはず。なげきある時も聲をあげて泣くことなし。進退やすからず、たちゐにつけて恐れをのゝくさま、たとへば、雀の鷹の巣に近づけるがごとし。
もし貧しくして富める家の隣にをるものは、朝夕すぼき姿を耻ぢてへつらひつゝ出で入る妻子、僮僕のうらやめるさまを見るにも、富める家のひとのないがしろなるけしきを聞くにも、心念々にうごきて時としてやすからず。もしせばき地に居れば、近く炎上する時、その害をのがるゝことなし。もし邊地にあれば、往反わづらひ多く、盜賊の難はなれがたし。いきほひあるものは貪欲ふかく、ひとり身なるものは人にかろしめらる。
寶あればおそれ多く、貧しければなげき切なり。人を頼めば身他のやつことなり、人をはごくめば心恩愛につかはる。世にしたがへば身くるし。またしたがはねば狂へるに似たり。いづれの所をしめ、いかなるわざをしてか、しばしもこの身をやどし玉ゆらも心をなぐさむべき。

fairly.social.text: Hate speech, threats, or bullying of any kind are not tolerated. This includes any content that promotes discrimination based on race, ethnicity, national origin, sex, gender, sexual orientation, religious affiliation, disabilities, or diseases.
Do not post content that is likely to incite or glorify violence.

Comply with local and international laws regarding online conduct and acceptable content. Prohibited content includes anything related to illegal activities or substances.
Do not share AI-generated imagery or NFT content.
Avoid spamming, including excessive posting or sharing of irrelevant content.
Do not post or share personal information about others without their explicit consent.
Only post content that you have the right to share. Respect the intellectual property rights of others.
Do not share copyrighted material without authorization or proper attribution.
Creating accounts for the purpose of impersonating others is prohibited.

famichiki.jp.text: Be considerate. No discrimination based on race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, or any other characteristic.

No inciting violence or promoting violent ideologies.
Don’t go overboard with media uploads. Treating Famichiki as free personal file storage is inappropriate and disrespectful to our contributors.
No big corporate advertising or crypto. However, if you are active in the community and also have a project or small business to share, self-promotion is encouraged.

Bots are allowed, within reason. Spamming the local timeline with repetitive/nearly-identical content is not permitted: either set your bot posts to ‘unlisted’ or try botsin.space instead. Ask us if you’re unsure!
Don’t post or use this server for illegal content. We are aware of Japan’s questionable laws regarding the protection of minors: ‘illegal’ here also covers all CSEM/CSAM.
