fairy.id.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media. !!!Zero tolerance for child pornography!!!

fairy.id.text: 没有种族主义、性别歧视、同性恋恐惧症、变性恐惧症、残疾歧视、仇外心理或种姓歧视。
fairy.id.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

fairy.id.text: 不得煽動暴力或宣揚暴力意識形態。
fairy.id.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

fairy.id.text: 不得骚扰、回避封禁、诽谤或攻击他人，禁止张贴他人的私人个人信息。
fairy.id.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

fairy.id.text: 切勿分享衆所周知的虛假和誤導性信息。
fairy.id.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

fairy.id.text: 引用 TA 人所創造的內容時必須註明來源，並且必須主動表明是否使用了人工智能。
fairy.id.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

fairy.id.text: 這裡不歡迎商業廣告、服務推廣和搜索引擎優化消息。
fairy.id.hint: No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.

fairy.id.text: 自由傳播，自由批評，自由信，自由不信。好好說話！
fairy.id.hint: Free to spread, free to criticize, free to believe or not to believe. Let's communicate with each other in a friendly manner!

fairmove.net.text: Auf unseren Plattformen ist kein Platz für Rassismus, Sexismus oder Aufrufen zu Gewalt, Verleugnung gut abgesicherter wissenschatlicher Erkenntnisse oder Heilsversprechen durch simplifizierte Lösungen.
Die Registrierung wird mit einem fairlogin Single-Sign-On Konto angeboten. Damit können auch weitere Open Source Anwendungen auf fairapps.net genutzt werden.

Dein fairlogin Benutzername wird dein Mastodon Account mit @fairmove.net . Wer sich bei fairlogin neu registriert, kann einen Benutzernamen festlegen.  Falls du ein fairlogin Konto  schon vor September 2023 angelegt hast, wird als dein Benutzername der vordere Teil deiner E-Mail Adresse verwendet.

Einen Server zu betreiben kostet Zeit und Geld. Wer diese Mastodon Instanz regelmässig nutzt darf gerne ein fairapps basic oder pro Paket auf https://shop.fairkom.net/ bestellen oder mal was spenden https://www.fairkom.eu/contribute
Wenn ein Beitrag gefällt, dann teilen (boosten) wir diesen. Dies macht ihn auch für Follower sichtbar. Der Stern sendet quasi nur einen Dank an den/die Autor:in.

fandomonium.space.text: Be respectful to each other. Everyone is entitled to their own opinions, but please remember that we are showing appreciation to fan works here. You don't have to be a fan of everyone, but you also don't have to spread negativity. Such behavior is uncalled for, and may result in a ban.

This server aims to be as inclusive as possible. Fandom has many aspects to it, some of which can be controversial. Just because you may not agree with it does not mean that it should be outright banned. Mastodon offers filters for removing unwanted content.

Use hashtags where appropriate. Hashtags will be required if the content falls into one of the following categories:  -- Graphic depictions of violence (#violence)  -- Rape/non-con (#non-con)  -- Underage (#underage)  -- Adult material (#nsfw)

Also, tag any ships with the primary tag used in the fandom (I.E. #inukag for Inuyasha/Kagome from Inuyasha content). This will better help the content reach the desired audience and keep it away from those who do not want to see it.

NSFW content is allowed. However, it MUST be tagged (#nsfw) and be given a content warning. If the content is a photo, video, or some other form of visual content, all characters MUST be of legal age (18 or older).
Be kind and supportive of artists. Try your best to get approval from the artist before sharing their work and at the very least link to where you originally found it.

famille.social.text: Server moderated with kindness, you are free to speach unless you broke the french law or your speach needs high moderation reviews.

No porn, some nudity accepted.
We don't want to spend time moderating porn so no is allowed.

fandom.ink.text: All users must be 18 or over.

All users must use tools provided by the platform (e.g. blocking, muting, reporting) to curate their own experience. Users must not expect other users to do this work for them (e.g. via "DNIs", etc.).
Behaviors considered illegal, harassing, inappropriate, derogatory or harmful to marginalized persons, or otherwise against the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct, are never tolerated.
Bots must be marked as such, and must not make posts to public timelines more frequently than once per hour.
Accounts auto-crossposted from Twitter or other services may be suspended or limited, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Adult and erotic content must only be posted in conformance to the "Adult and erotic content" section of the Code of Conduct.
Inactive accounts (i.e. those that have not been accessed for a period of six months or more) may be deleted, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.

Be courteous to others. Posting obvious flame-bait to public timelines (e.g. shipwars, nuclear-level takes on the discourse du jour, etc.) may result in content or your account being limited or removed, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Users caught encouraging or teaching others to circumvent instance rules, the code of conduct, or the terms of service will be penalized as if they themselves had performed the violation in question.
The reposting of unmodified content from the users of other platforms (e.g. cross-posted retweets, reposted art, etc.) is prohibited. Please link to the original content, instead!

fantasyhockey.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in Germany or France

fanfare.horse.text: 競馬に関するどんな話題でもご自由にどうぞ。

fandom.garden.text: Do not make hateful, discriminatory or bigoted statements, use abusive slurs or spread hate speech towards oppressed groups.
Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
Use content warnings, especially when talking about sensitive topics or if you are spoiling recent news in your fandom – see more information in the Recommendation section above.
You can post nudity, as long as it is protected by the adequate content warnings. Pornography is restricted to followers-only posts from 18+ accounts. Pedopornography is forbidden.
Do not publish private conversations without explicit consent of all parties involved, except to the moderation team if you need to report them.
Do not crosspost (from another social network) on the public timelines.
Avoid "reposting", which is actually stealing art. Boost the original toot or, if the art is not from Mastodon, credit and link to the artist, and ideally also ask for their permission.

Do not create any sort of corporate account for advertising purposes. Artists are of course allowed (and encouraged!) to promote their own shops and commissions. Websites or podcasts relating to fandoms are encouraged as well.
Use of bots on this instance is submitted to admin authorization, including follow bots.
Boosting is held to the same standards as direct posting; only boost toots that respect these rules.

fanscannabis.club.text:
No se permite :
Acoso, incitación o promoción del odio, terrorismo, conductas irrespetuosas, insultos u otras expresiones violentas, intolerancia hacia distintos colectivos o étnias y justificación o defensa de dichas conductas.Ejemplo ; (fascismo, nazismo, machismo, homofobia, transfobia...).

No se permite :
Usar bots de ingenieria social o programas automáticos sin objetivos legítimos así como el uso de marketing agresivo y/o fraudulento (también denominado spam), o intento de engaño cibernético (phising).

No se permite :
El contenido sexual o explícito en cualquier formato ni tampoco ningún tipo de pornografía infantil, o cualquier otro contenido considerado ilegal bajo la legislación Española.
No se permiten perfiles con contenido sobre culto o fanatismo religioso.

La difusión de noticias de dudosa procedencia, polémicas sin base y sin fundamentos constructivos, será solventada mediante la eliminación de dicho contenido, usando la objetividad o aceptada subjetividad de Administradores y Moderadores.
La dirección se reserva el derecho de modificar las normas si lo considera oportuno.

No se permite :
Promover el tráfico ,venta o trueque de estupefacientes en cualquier forma ,sea legal o no. Incluído el cannabis (maría ,hierba ,ganja, ...) con thc o cbd. Cualquier cosa que trate de identificarte como comprador o vendedor de cannabis será motivo de expulsión inmediata .

fckmsk.social.text: Be Respectful: Treat others with kindness and respect. Disagreements are fine, but personal attacks, hate speech, and discriminatory language will not be tolerated.

Stay on Topic: Keep discussions related to tech, science, friendship, future, climate, and future-oriented subjects. Off-topic posts may be removed (normally not, but it can, if it violences other rules).
No Spam or Self-Promotion: Avoid excessive self-promotion and refrain from spamming. If you want to share your work or content, make sure it's relevant to the community.
Mindful Content Warning Usage: When posting sensitive or potentially triggering content, use content warnings (CWs) appropriately to ensure everyone can enjoy the platform comfortably.

Encourage Open-Mindedness: Embrace diversity of thought. Be open to different perspectives and engage in constructive discussions. Remember, learning from one another is a key aspect of our community.
Privacy Matters: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent, and be mindful of the digital footprint you leave behind.

No Hate Speech or Harassment: Hate speech, harassment, and any form of bullying will not be tolerated. This includes, but is not limited to, attacks based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or disability.
Environmental Awareness: Recognize the importance of climate and sustainability. Discussions related to environmental issues should be approached with a positive and solution-oriented mindset.
Fact-Driven Discussions: Promote evidence-based discussions. When sharing information, cite sources where possible, and be willing to engage in discussions grounded in facts.
Community Building: Foster a sense of community and friendship. Reach out to others, share your knowledge, and participate in creating a positive and inclusive atmosphere.
Reporting and Moderation: If you come across content that violates these rules, report it to the moderators. Moderators will take appropriate action to ensure the community's well-being.

federate.blogpocket.com.text: Las publicaciones son moderadas. El Fediverso depende de instancias confiables, obedeciendo las jurisdicciones locales y prohibiendo el daño y el abuso.

En esta instancia se realiza una moderación activa contra cualquier comportamiento que atente contra las normas fundamentales de convivencia, especialmente aquellas relacionadas con el odio y la intolerancia.

federated.press.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States
No spam, including commercial advertising/promotion and SEO
By joining federated.press, you agree to adhere to our Code of Ethics

federate.social.text: Posts are moderated. Our federation depends on being a trustworthy instance, obeying local jurisdictions, and prohibiting harm and abuse.
Harmful and abusive speech and behaviors include the language and tactics of the white supremacy movement and its affiliations are strictly prohibited and enforced.

Accounts and servers will be permanently banned for engaging in Sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions, Gore and graphic violence, National Socialism, Nazism, Holocaust denial, Racism, Alt right, Gender-critical, Sex and gender discrimination, Transphobia, Misogyny
No crypto. Our federation depends on inhibiting the infiltration of capitalism into the processes of re-decentralizing the internet.

federatedfandom.net.text: Don't be a dick. If you are, mods reserve the right to talk to you, suspend you temporarily, or suspend you permanently, in that order.
Self-promotion is fine but you should be fannish or friends with folks on this server. Do not join to promote commercial content.

Sexual content depicting characters who are not sexually mature is banned. "Underage" is a fungible category, we know this, do not post any content that could be described as shota/lolicon/etc. Prior to performing any account limiting activities, mods will contact you to discuss.

If you don't like what you are seeing, block or mute, report if it violates the rules, move on. Do not harass users about ship preferences in any way. NOTE: discussion of racism, homophobia, etc in fandom does not constitute harassment.
This is a server for the girls & the gays & seeks to provide a trans-inclusive, anti-racist space. We are not a space for right-wing fans.
By joining this server you are asserting that you are legally an adult in your country of residence.

Please use your best judgement when posting NSFW or other sensitive content such as posts about political violence, screenshots of right-wingers, etc. NSFW images must be marked as sensitive and a CW should be used.

Username format: Usernames can be alphanumeric and have underscores but dashes and other special characters are not allowed. This is enforced at the Mastodon software level so it's not a "rule" but we want you to know before you try to sign up. Thanks!

federation.p1k3.com.text: This instance runs on masto.host, and is thus bound by masto.host's ToS, which bar instances dedicated to racism, Nazi shit, transphobia, misogyny, incitement to violence, and the rest of the usual litany of horrors.

fedi.awoo.pet.text: NSFW content must be put behind a content warning (CW)

fedi.at.text:
Nichts Diskriminierendes:

Jegliche Form von Diskriminierung ist verboten. Das inkludiert, ist aber nicht beschränkt auf: Ableismus, Antisemitismus, Homofeindlichkeit, Islamophobie, Klassismus, Rassismus, Sexismus, Transfeindlichkeit, etc.

Nichts Ungesetzliches:

Poste nichts ungesetzliches (österreichisches Recht / EU Recht).

Nichts Belästigendes:

Kein Spam, Trolling, Bullying, oder ähnliche Belästigungen.
Keine Aufrufe zu Hass oder Gewalt.
Keine Pornographie.

Nichts Automatisiertes:

Keine Bots, kein Crossposting (z.B. spiegeln von Twitter posts etc.)

Nichts (absichtlich) Fälschliches:

Keine Fake-news, Falschinformationen, Wissenschaftsleugnung.
Keine Verbreitung von Gerüchten oder Propaganda.

Hinweis für Unternehmenskonten:

Unternehmenskonten, unternehmensähnliche Konten und/oder Geschäftskonten, sind nur mit Einschränkungen erlaubt. Inoffizielle Unternehmenskonten werden gesperrt.

Bezüglich Unternehmenskonten wendet euch daher bitte vorab an: support@fediverse.foundation

English translation:

For our English speaking users we have prepared the the essential documents in our wiki. Please take a look here:
https://wiki.apps.fedi.at/books/fediverse-foundation-announcements

fedi.cr-net.be.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography is not permitted

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.

fedi.davewinter.social.text: No toxic and hateful speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on toxic and hateful speech. This includes attacks against anyone’s gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, age, disability, personal appearance, or socio-economic status.
No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading or violent ideologies. You may not make specific threats of violence or physical harm, death, or disease to an individual or group of people.

No harassment, dogpiling, or unwanted advances. You may not continue to engage with a user who has explicitly requested that you stop. This includes consistent baiting, bad-faith gaslighting, unwanted sexual advances, etc.
No doxxing of other users. Unauthorised requests for or distribution of any personal information or data is not allowed. Please treat personally identifying information with respect and privacy.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately. Posts and images with sexually explicit or violence must be flagged as sensitive and contain a content warning noting either ‘NSFW’ or ‘Violence’ when posting.
No spamming. Excessive posting, boosting, advertising, or mass-marketing posts will be actioned accordingly and based on intent.

fedi.lat.text: No se permite la pornografía infantil

fedi.lt.text: Website operators reserve the right to decide upon content moderation at own discretion.
Following comments and interactions will be removed without prior notice: hate speech, propaganda, conspiracy theories, fake news, disrespectful comments, illegal content.
This instance encourages content posted by human beings. Computer-generated or Artificial Intelligence (AI) augmented content must be explicitly tagged or is forbidden otherwise.
Advertising is not allowed unless explicitly marked with "ad" or "paidad" tags.
External links shared in post must contribute to discussion and it must be clear what reader is expected to find under linked resource.
Posts in English or Lithuanian only.

fedi.mvpgame.dev.text: Rule 0: Be Mads! :) Sure, I'm moderating myself, but I'm filling out these rules to outline the general standards I try to hold myself to. I'm actually cool with y'all reporting me to myself if I genuinely drop the ball and want me to reconsider something.
No discrimination and/or bigotry of any kind against any marginalized groups. Racism, xenophobia, queerphobia, sexism, and everything else of the sort is not permitted.
No posting or boosting NSFW content without a content warning. This includes stuff along the lines of nudity and gore.

Avoid "reply guy" type behavior. This is everything from being annoying about suggesting Linux when somebody's venting about Windows to trying to play devil's advocate in the comments on someone's story of experiencing discrimination.
Try to include accurate, useful alt text on posts with media. Perfection isn't really possible, but aim for being as consistent as possible.

Label sensitive topics with CWs as appropriate. Try to share links to posts with an added CW if it'd be appropriate to have one in the context. This is all in relation to stuff like political news, descriptions of hateful/discriminatory rhetoric, etc.

fedi.xamk.fi.text: Seksuaalinen tai väkivaltainen media on merkittävä arkaluontoiseksi postauksen yhteydessä.

fedi.yesmap.net.text: No accounts with mere focus on pictures or videos. This instance aims at promoting discussion and sharing science.
SFW only. No illegal material according to US law inc. hentai, porn, or cp, and links to any of that material.
This partially also applies to your global behaviour on the Fediverse via any yesmap.net account. Do not follow/share accounts with illegal or borderline content. You will be deactivated.

Don't write anything incriminating or potentially incriminating on this instance or elsewhere. For example, something about meeting minors, or trading images.

For a more in-depth list of rules, see NewgonWiki:

wiki.yesmap.net/wiki/Help:Joining_the_Yesmap_Fedi

fedi.yaf.ai.text: Don’t spread hate or negativity, especially based on people’s fundamental differences such as gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, age, ability, and social class.
Don’t harass, troll, seek to offend, shitpost, or otherwise bother anyone.
Don’t lie, and don’t spread others’ lies or misinformation.

fedihum.org.text: [EN] No racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia or transphobia. [DE] Kein Rassismus, Sexismus,  Frauenfeindlichkeit, Homophobie oder Transphobie.

[EN] No ableism, anti-semitism, religious-based hate, xenophobia, or casteism. [DE]  Keine Behindertenfeindlichkeit, Antisemitismus, religiös begründeter Hass, Fremdenfeindlichkeit oder Kastenfeindlichkeit.
[EN] No harassment, threatening, dogpiling, or doxxing of any kind. [DE]  Keine Belästigung, Bedrohung, Hetzjagd oder Doxxing jeglicher Art.
[EN] No pornographic material, sexually explicit or violent media. [DE] Kein pornografisches Material, eindeutig sexuelle oder gewalttätige Inhalte.

[EN] No intentionally false or misleading information and pseudoscience (this includes COVID-19 and vaccine misinformation). [DE] Keine absichtlich falschen oder irreführenden Informationen (dies schließt COVID-19 und Fehlinformationen über Impfungen ein).

[EN] No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others (e.g. falsely representing oneself as a member of a minority). [DE] Keine schwerwiegende Unehrlichkeit, die anderen schadet (z. B. falsche Darstellung als einer Minderheit angehörig).
[EN] No fraudulent impersonating other people. [DE] Kein betrügerischer Identitätsdiebstahl natürlicher Personen.
[EN] No spam, including multi-level-marketing. [DE] Kein Spam, einschließlich Multi-Level-Marketing.
[EN] No services offering academic ghostwriting or predatory conferences or journals. [DE] Keine akademischen Ghostwriter-Dienste oder sog. predatory Konferenzen oder Zeitschriften.

fediscience.org.text: When signing up, you need to verify you're a scientist! Please provide a link to your ORCID, Scholar, or academic webpage, showing your recent publications. (Junior) researchers without publications, please tell us why you want to join.
Discrimination in any form (including, but not limited to sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia...) is strictly prohibited on the platform.
Harassment, doxxing, or other abusive practices are not allowed.
Posting of content illegal in Germany or the EU is not allowed.
The intentional spreading of disinformation (“fake news”) is not allowed on the platform.
No sexually explicit or violent content allowed.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Promotion of pseudoscience is also not allowed.
Respect the Fediverse etiquette: use content warnings for sensible content and describe your uploaded images using alt text.
So that we can moderate the instance, content has to be in a language for which free machine translation (e.g. Deepl.com) is available.
Be kind to your peers! Treat others with empathy and respect.

fediverse.andy-bell.com.text: BE ME: This instance is only for my own use. Everyone else is welcome to see what I have to say and to follow me from their account on other instances though!

fediunam.site.text:
1. Sobre la identidad del usuario:
Para formar parte de Fediunam puedes usar datos reales como tu nombre y un apellido, pero no es estrictamente necesario.

2. Sobre los contenidos compartidos:
No se podrá compartir, guardar, enviar e intercambiar materiales u opiniones que sean ofensivos o agresivos contra los demás, dado que es una instancia académica es importante que en su mayoría sean materiales relacionados con el tema principal a discutir.

3. Sobre formar parte de la Comunidad. La comunidad es libre de registrarse e invitar a otros a unirse a Fediunam. Cada registro en Fediunam requiere una justificación para su incorporación, el cual es revisado por el administrador y aceptado.

4. Sobre los usos de la red social: Se enfatiza la discusión académica y de intercambio de información afines a la UNAM, México. No tendrá fines comerciales, ni tampoco se podrá hacer propaganda dentro de la red social sobre compras, ventas, ni se comercializará la identidad de los usuarios.
5. Sobre lo que no se puede hacer: No se permite ninguna conducta ni actividad no autorizada. Especial atención en acoso e intimidación,
Es importante señalar que las opiniones, manifestaciones y comentarios que realicen los participantes en esta red social son responsabilidad directa de los usuarios que las emiten.

7. Sobre la protección de datos:
La red social Fediunam garantiza que todos los datos personales compartidos por los usuarios serán considerados como prioritarios. Dichos datos serán resguardados cuidadosamente y no serán compartidos con terceros.

fedinerds.social.text: | Allgemeines |

Alle Verstöße oder Aufrufe zum Verstoß gegen deutsches Recht sind untersagt und werden geahndet. Zusätzlich gelten die Bestimmungen der jeweiligen europäischen Mitgliedsstaaten bzw. der Europäischen Union.
Jegliches Verhalten, dass darauf ausgelegt ist die Bereitstellung unserer Dienste in irgendeiner Form zu beeinträchtigen, ist verboten.
| Inhalte |

Inhalte mit rassistischen, illegalen, pornografischen oder gewaltverherrlichenden Inhalten sind strengstens untersagt. Unter diese Regel fallen auch Avatare und Verweise zu Internetseiten mit entsprechenden Inhalten.
Das massenweise Erstellen von Inhalten in einem kurzen Zeitraum ist untersagt.
Die Veröffentlichung von nicht öffentlichen Gesprächen (E-Mail, XMPP, Matrix etc.) ist nur dann erlaubt, wenn alle beteiligten Parteien ihre Erlaubnis dazu gegeben haben.
Beleidigungen und Belästigungen sind generell verboten. Darunter fallen auch jegliche Formen der Diffamierung, Hetze, übler Nachrede und dergleichen.
Not Safe for Work Inhalte, die potenziell nicht für alle Altersgruppen geeignet sind oder provokante Inhalte enthalten, sind entsprechend zu kennzeichnen.
| Benutzerkonten |
Jeder Nutzerin und jedem Nutzer steht maximal ein Konto zu. Mehrfachanmeldungen sind nur mit schriftlicher Zustimmung von uns gestattet.
Konten für kommerzielle Zwecke erfordern eine schriftliche Erlaubnis unsererseits.
Wir behalten uns vor, Konten, die über 365 Tage keine Anmeldeaktivität aufweisen zu löschen.

Wir behalten uns vor, der Nutzerin oder dem Nutzer die Lizenz zur Nutzung des Dienstes zeitweise oder dauerhaft, jederzeit und ohne Angaben von Gründen zu entziehen. Ausgenommen davon sind gesetzliche Verpflichtungen und Bestimmungen.
| Sonstige Regelungen |
Das Betreiben von Bots ist verboten. Alle  Bot Accounts benötigen die schriftliche Zustimmung von unserer Seite.
Fehler oder Sicherheitslücken die unsere Systeme betreffen sind uns unverzüglich zu melden. Ein bewusstes Ausnutzen ist untersagt.
| Sanktionen  |

Zuwiderhandlungen gegen diese Regeln werden in der Regel mit einer Verwarnung oder Sperre geahndet. Bei schweren Verstößen, oder Verdacht auf Mutwilligkeit beim Verstoß behalten wir uns die Sperrung aller Konten bis hin zu einem Hausverbot für alle Dienste vor.
Wir behalten uns vor diese Nutzungsbedingungen jederzeit zu ändern.

fediverse.au.text: This instance is for university (faculty, school, institute) and research home pages that don't yet have a home in .au
You must sign up with an .edu.au or equivalent email address. It can be a shared email address.
Assume that you are representing your institution and behave accordingly. If it wouldn't fly with your organisation's Code of Conduct, it doesn't fly here.

fediver.de.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension

fediverse.krohsnest.com.text: Please be respectful of others, no matter their age, race, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, background, nationality, or any thing else. Treat others as you would like to be treated.
No SPAM, pornography, NSFW, hate speech, or derogatory language is permitted.
No bots on fediverse.krohsnest.com. There is botsin.space as an instance that allows bots.
Mark media as sensitive when appropriate. If it would be censored on TV, it should be censored on here.
If you can go to prison for it, don't post it.
We read reports and will remove content that violates these rules.
If a user doesn't want to take a conversation further, be civil and respect that.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information. Verify your information is from a reliable source.
Expect anything you post on this server to be public, including direct messages, that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed.
No harassment or doxxing of other users.

Please use your account. Don't sign up and leave the poor thing quivering in the dark, hoping that you will use it to post something meaningful, inciteful, educational, funny, thoughtful, or prolific. If you don't log in after two months, you will receive a reminder to use your account.

fediverse.repc.co.text: Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour may lead to moderation and/or further measures.
We have a zero tolerance approach to discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.

We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant. A number of instance blocks are implemented to comply with the principles of the covenant and to prevent our users from being exposed to content that does not comply with our instance rules.
All public posts from this instance are indexed by tootfinder.ch.

fediverse.teomahk.de.text: Eine gute Netiquette zeichnet sich durch Respekt, Höflichkeit und Professionalität aus. Lies daher alle Informationen zum Thema und stelle erst dann Fragen. Respektiere die Meinungen anderer. Äußere konstruktive Kritik. Bedenke dabei, was und wie Du schreibst. Achte auf Grammatik und Zeichensetzung.

Respektiere die Privatsphäre anderer. Leite nicht einfach an Dich gesendete Informationen weiter, ohne vorher eine Erlaubnis vom ursprünglichen Absender eingeholt zu haben. Verzeihe kleine Fehler anderer und weise am besten mit einer privaten Nachricht darauf hin. Jeder war einmal ein Anfänger.
Das versenden von Spam über diese Instanz an andere Nutzer/-innen dieser Instanz oder anderen Instanzen ist nicht erlaubt.
Die mehrfache Einstellung eines Inhaltes an unterschiedlichen Orten dieser Instanz oder anderer Instanzen (sogenannte Crosspostings) ist nicht erlaubt.
Die Verwendung von gesetzlich durch Urheber- und Markenrecht geschützte Inhalte ohne rechtmäßige Berechtigung (z.B. Pressemitteilungen etc.) ist nicht erlaubt.

Das veröffentlichen von Inhalten, die unwahr sind (Fake News) oder deren Veröffentlichung nach geltendem Recht einen Straftatbestand oder eine Ordnungswidrigkeit erfüllen, ist nicht erlaubt. Hierzu zählen auch sogenannte Verschwörungstheorien.

Das veröffentlichen von Inhalten, die aggressive, beleidigende, rassistische oder diskriminierende Elemente gegenüber Einzelpersonen, Institutionen, Unternehmen oder öffentlich aktive Personengruppen aufweisen, ist nicht erlaubt.

Inhalte, welche die Ideologie des Rechtsextremismus unterstützen und fördern (wie z.B. Geschichtsrevisionismus, nationalsozialistische Symbole und Zeichen, Antisemitismus, Fremdenfeindlichkeit oder ähnliches) sind verboten.

Das veröffentlichen sexuell aufreizender oder pornographischer Darstellungen von Kindern und kinderpornographischer Literatur auf dieser Instanz ist verboten. Hierzu zählen auch Genre aus dem Bereich Manga und Anime wie z.B. Hentai, Lolicon, Shotacon und ähnliches.
Das veröffentlichen sonstiger pornographischer Elemente gegenüber anderen Nutzer/-innen und der Allgemeinheit ist nicht erlaubt.

fishsci.com.text: Please be kind and courteous. There’s no need to be mean or rude.

fluff.land.text: Be respectful to identity and situations. The following behaviors will not be allowed: transphobia/homophobia/sexism/racism/etc, using slurs, hate speech, invalidating or gatekeeping somebody's identity, posting memes that violate any of the above

Respect others' privacy. The following behaviors will not be allowed: sharing or saving personal information without permission, dead-naming an individual or demanding information about dead-names, suggesting doxing or posting information with the intent to dox
Use content warnings for any triggering or content sensitive information and do what you can to contain content that is sensitive to those threads.
NSFW content should be appropriately marked. This includes: text or images depicting sex or sexual acts, general nudity, drug discussion, sex work discussion
This instance is 18+ only, but please specify in your bio that you do not want minors to follow you if you are posting directly NSFW content

Be respectful of others’ triggers. Discussion of triggering content is not banned here, however please use liberal use of content warnings if you believe something might trigger others. When in doubt, use spoilers and content warnings.
Be considerate of others' sensory issues. If a GIF or emoji you're posting could reasonably have some kind of seizure warning, please specify in the content warning tags.

The rules above are not all encompassing. If the mod team agrees on a ban due to behaviour that is destructive or against the spirit of the rules- even if it doesn't directly break a rule, a ban will still occur.

No content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism.  No conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions is disallowed and will result in a permanent ban.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia, casteism, and/or violent nationalism or the advocacy of any of the above.
Bots must be approved by the administrators and are subject to all rules above.
Provably false content is subject to removal by the administrators.  Repeated posting of disinformation or intentional misinformation will result in a permanent ban.
In plain English: Be excellent to each other.  Don't be Nazis.  Respect boundaries.

forestodon.com.text: フォレストドンは身内向けサーバーなので管理人の知り合いでない一般ユーザーの新規登録は原則受け付けておりません。ご了承下さい。
当サーバーではローカルタイムライン（LTL）における会話の活性化を推奨してます。独り言投稿だけでなく、投稿ごとの公開範囲を上手く使い分け、適度に話題を振ったり乗っかったりしてみましょう。
投稿内容は基本的には法律と常識の範囲内で。抵触するかどうかは管理人の主観によりケースバイケースで判断します。ただ、他サーバーや他サービスを下げる発言だとか、愚痴やネガティブな発言はLTLありのサーバーにおいては周囲の空気にかかわるのでほどほどにお願いします（文脈と頻度の問題なので絶対にしてはいけないという訳ではありません）。
内輪サーバーと言えど普通に外から見られるので知られたらヤバい情報とかは書かないようにお願いします。マストドンはDM機能も甘いので個人情報等を伴うやり取りなどはメールや他サービスをご利用ください。
個人が運営しているため著作権および肖像権関連には厳しくしています。ゲームのスクリーンショットはメーカーの規約で認められている範囲のものに限定し、音楽関係も歌詞の転載は禁止です。動画はサーバーへの直接アップではなくYouTubeへ上げたもののリンクを貼るなどよろしくお願いします。
性的または刺激の強い話題および画像、創作物のネタバレに関する発言には必ずCW（Content Warning）を使ってワンクッション入れてください。また、ただ伏せるのではなく見出しの方に何を伏せているかの旨を明記してください。なお実写エロはCWの有無にかかわらず全面禁止です。

当サーバーはあくまで無償提供ですが、運営には有料のホスティングサービスを利用しておりますので長期的な継続実現のためFantiaにて任意の寄付ページを設けております（概要欄参照）。「いつも使ってるしちょっとくらい負担してあげようかな」というお気持ちが芽生えた時に100円ほど支援していただけると死ぬほど喜びます。なおこれらの支援に対する直接的な見返りは特になく、外部の方に対して登録可能になるといった便宜を図るなどということもありませんのでご了承ください。

fosstodon.org.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Fosstodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” on Fosstodon.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Fosstodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

forum.virctuary.com.text: No promotion of violence, death, or anything else that can cause physical or mental harm. (Taking a side in an existing violent dynamic such as a war, or encouraging self defense, is excluded from this rule.)
No advocating racial supremacy, or supporting a basket of positions broadly similar to those shared by Mussolini and Hitler, that are not also supported by many democracies.
ActivityPub means you do not have to be here to participate. If you're felt to be detrimental to the operation of our server, we may ask you to pick another server or create your own.

I do not want to have to judge whether characters in an image you've posted are inappropriate, or underage, etc. Do not put me in that position. Even if there's nothing wrong in my opinion with whatever you've drawn, copied, screenshotted, etc, I will ban you.

Transphobia and homophobia, not to mention sexism and racism, are explicitly banned. Remember the Fediverse is intended to be a welcoming space. Questioning vulnerable minorities identity or worth as human beings is shitty. Debating edge cases can be done elsewhere.
Use content warnings liberally, especially when covering topics involving real acts of violence and other harmful behavior.

fpl.social.text: Be kind and courteous. Treat others as you would like to be treated. Do not harass, abuse, insult, or discriminate against anyone based on their identity, background, or opinions. Do not post or share any content that is hateful, violent, illegal, or harmful to others.

Be respectful of privacy. Do not reveal or request any personal or sensitive information from others without their consent. Do not post or share any content that violates the privacy or security of others. Do not impersonate or misrepresent yourself or others.
Be responsible and accountable. Use content warnings and appropriate tags when posting or sharing any content that may be sensitive, graphic, or triggering to others.
Do not spam, flood, or disrupt the server or the network.
Do not post or share any content that infringes the intellectual property or rights of others.

franken.social.text: Was Du nicht willst, das man Dir tu’, das füg’ auch keinem andern zu.

Diese Instanz steht in Deutschland (genauer: in Franken; genauer: in Nämberch). Damit gilt deutsches Recht. Und, sofern Du außerhalb von Deutschland bist: deutsches Recht plus das Recht des Landes, in dem Du Dich befindest.
Diese Instanz ist für Personen, die 16 Jahre oder älter sind.
Wir diskutieren freundlich mit Benimm, Anstand und Respekt. Eine Prise Demut dazu hat noch nie geschadet.
Wer in Ruhe gelassen werden will, wird in Ruhe gelassen.
Bots sind nur nach ausdrücklicher Freigabe durch den Admin erlaubt.
Werbung machen wir wenn, dann mit Augenmaß und umsichtig. Was nach Spam riecht oder andere stört, lassen wir sein. Im Zweifel hilft eine Frage an den Admin, um die Sache vorher zu klären.
Was wir ins Netz stellen, sind unsere eigenen Inhalte (Texte, Bilder,…). Sachen von anderen könnte urheberrechtlich geschützt sein und wir lassen sie in Ruhe.

Nicht alles gehört in jedes Publikum. Wenn ein Beitrag zum Beispiel nicht für alle Altersgruppen geeignet ist (in diesem Internet lesen Kinder mit!) oder heikle Themen behandelt, dann platzieren wir eine Inhaltswarnung („Content Warning“) davor.

Verbreitung/Befürwortung von Verschwörungstheorien lehnen wir ab. Alle seriösen Wissenschaftler sind sich zum Klimawandel einig. Ebenso zu Covid-19 und Kriegsverbrechern. Was auch immer gerade los ist: Sie halten sich für schlauer als alle anderen? Dann lassen Sie sich gerne woanders nieder.

Die Instanz-Verwaltung spricht Deutsch und Englisch. Andere Sprachen können nicht oder nur schlecht bedient werden. Bei Beschwerden gegen Inhalte in anderen Sprachen sieht es eben schlecht aus für die Inhalte in anderen Sprachen, weil niemand da ist, der sinnvoll moderieren kann.
Wenn der Admin etwas entscheiden muss, dann hat der Admin recht. Hier gebe ich meinen Server, meine Zeit, meine Nerven. Nichts davon sollte überstrapaziert werden.
Kurzgesagt: stellen Sie sich vor, wir wären alle in Ihrem Wohnzimmer und benehmen uns so zu Ihnen, wie Sie sich hier zu uns verhalten. 😉

frankfurt.social.text: Dies is ein sicherer Raum. Belästige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen(doxing) wird als Belästigung aufgefasst.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam. Ein Toot mit nichts als einem Link wird als Spam ausgelegt, ebenso wie jedwede kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen.

freemasonry.social.text: This server is dedicated to Freemasonry. You do not have to be a Freemason to participate, but we do require all users to observe Masonic etiquette.

It is especially important to not post notices of meetings or other announcements where personal contact information of anyone - other than yourself - is displayed.
We do not allow spam. Any posts deemed by us at our absolute discretion to be spam will be deleted without notice and the account suspended without appeal.
The preferred language on this server is English. Please understand that any posts not in English may be deleted, especially if we think they look like spam.

freie-re.de.text: Diese Instanz ist ein privates Projekt, was in der Freizeit betrieben wird. Daher gibt es keine auch Garantien hinsichtlich der Verfügbarkeit.

freifunk.social.text: Achte auf einen respektvollen Umgang und faire Diskussionskultur.

Belästige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen(doxing) wird als Belästigung aufgefasst.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen (sog. Fake-News) und Verschwörungsmythen sind hier unerwünscht.
Rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache sind nicht geduldet.
Die Bewerbung von Menschenfeindlichen und Hasserfüllten Ideologien wird nicht geduldet.

Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen zuerst mit den Moderator*innen und gib ihnen eine Chance der Erläuterung. Kommunikation mit der Moderation ist direkte persönliche Kommunikation und erfolgt via Direktnachrichten, ein öffentliches Verbreiten dieser Moderations Kommunikation ist zu unterlassen.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam. Ein Toot mit nichts als einem Link wird als Spam ausgelegt, ebenso wie jedwede kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen bei sensitiven, kontroversen, oder vermutlich triggernden Themen.
Pornographische und stark sexualisierte Inhalte sind unerwünscht.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.

freiewaehler.social.text: Geht respektvoll miteinander um. Wir dulden keine Hetze oder beleidigende Inhalte.

Wir behalten uns vor nachweislich falsche Informationen, oder Inhalte, die gegen die vorangegangenen Regeln verstoßen, zu löschen.
Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Stummschaltung/Lösung des gesamten Accounts führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Accounts akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

freiburg.social.text: Keine rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache.

freie-radios.org.text: freie-radios.org ist die Mastodon-Instanz von und für Freie Radios, organisiert in ihren jeweiligen Verbänden: in der BRD der Bundesverband Freier Radios (BFR), in Österreich der Verband freier Radios (VFRÖ) sowie  in der Schweiz die Union nicht-kommerzorientierter Lokalradios (UNICOM).

Die in den jeweiligen Radios für die Austauschplattform freie-radios.net verantwortlichen Portier:e können auch hier einen Zugang erhalten, kurze Anfrage über die eingespielten Kanäle genügt. Die Toots sind dann Veröffentlichungen der Radios, vergleichbar den Beiträgen auf freie-radios.net.

Damit liegt die presserechtliche/juristische Verantwortlichkeit für die jeweiligen Toots bei den jeweiligen Radios bzw. ihren Portiere:s. Wenn ihr euer Konto erstmals hier verwendet, müsst ihr diesen Serverregeln ("AGBs") explizit zustimmen.
freie-radios.org ist auch gedacht zur Veröffentlichung der Podcasts der jeweiligen Radios hier im Fediverse. Das kann automatisiert geschehen, etwa mit dem Tool mastofeed.org.

Follow the Prime Directive:
Treat everyone with respect and dignity, exactly how you want to be treated.

Respect All Life Forms: 
No racial, sexual, gender-identity, or cultural discrimination.  No homophobia, transphobia, racial slurs or stereotypes, mis-gendering, dead-naming, etc.
Shields Up: If content is potentially offensive or triggering, NSFW, etc. Please label it with a CW to protect members of the community who may not wish to view it.

frikiverse.zone.text: No se permiten actitudes contra la dignidad de las personas, ya sea por su raza, origen, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal, riesgo de exclusión social o cualquier otro motivo. Tampoco la falta de respeto o el acoso a los miembros de esta o de cualquier otra comunidad.

El idioma por defecto de la instancia es el castellano, pero cualquier otro también es bienvenido. Los idiomas romances escritos son fácilmente inteligibles (con un poco de voluntad) y el inglés, nos guste o no, es idioma universal. Otros, como el euskera... bueno, para algo existen los traductores.

Se permite contenido ajeno a las temáticas de la instancia, pero se espera que una buena parte esté relacionado. Los temas potencialmente polémicos se deben conducir con educación y respeto, y etiquetar con un CW que permita identificar el contenido y un hashtag para poder filtrar.

No está permitido el contenido ilegal, la distribución de desinformación y el spam. Tampoco la publicidad, salvo recomendaciones puntuales o la promoción de productos propios (crowdfundings, nuevas publicaciones, artesanía, ilustraciones...), siempre que la cuenta no sea solo con este fin.

El contenido sexual explícito no es temática de la instancia. Seamos responsables en marcar imágenes o ilustraciones con CW y #NSFW (no es lo mismo una estatua que un fanart subido de tono). El contenido que muestre o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores está absolutamente prohibido.

Las decisiones sobre moderación, normas y funcionamiento de la instancia se tomarán de manera colectiva, mediante los procedimientos que se establezcan en cada momento, entre quienes estén colaborando en su mantenimiento.

Solo se bloquearán instancias si promueven la discriminación o el acoso, o en casos excepcionales (Meta, spam, contenido sexual de menores...). Se silenciarán si no hay moderación activa y se bloquearán las cuentas reportadas.

Para ayudar a la sostenibilidad de la instancia las cuentas inactivas podrán ser dadas de baja despues de avisar al propietario y las cachés de recursos gráficos se borrarán periódicamente. Las nuevas altas que no sigan a nadie ni publiquen contenido en siete días se consideran inactivas.
Solo se permiten cuentas bot si el perfil está claramente identificado y si se ha consultado previamente con los administradores de la instancia.

Las nuevas altas serán por solicitud de registro o por invitación. En las solicitudes se exige que el campo "motivación" tenga un contenido mínimamente razonado (más de 2 palabras). Para poder distinguir bots, por favor usad la palabra "friki" o el hashtag "#nosoyunbot".

fur.lgbt.text: All "not safe for work content"/"NSFW"/nudity/explicit content must use the term “NSFW” in the CW field and be hidden in public toots. Avoid setting your banner and icon to sexually explicit content since those cannot be CW'd.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #1 – No illegal content or conduct. Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Rule #2 – Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.
Rule #3 – Don’t stalk or harass other users. Respect other users of our service and other federated instances.

Rule #4 – Misinformation and deceptive content is prohibited. Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don’t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.
Rule #5 – Content warnings (CW) are required for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions.
Rule #5.2 – Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.
Rule #6 – Respect the service. Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome.
Rule #7 – Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.

Rule #8.1 – Account / post language identification. We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning).

Rule #8.2 – Misleading or deceptive impersonation. You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

Rule #8.3 – Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using “Unlisted”, “Followers only”, or “Mentioned people only”, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

Rule #8.4 – No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules.
Rule #8.5 – If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.
Rule #8.6 – All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).
The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko – Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

furpark.kr.text: 타인을 존중해주세요. 상대를 향한 인신공격이나 모욕 등을 위해 Content Warning을 이용하거나 태그, 미디어 업로드를 하지 말아주세요

furry.community.text: You are at least 16 years old.
Zero discrimination of any type: sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia, etc. No intentional misgender or deadnaming is allowed.
No sexual content involving minors or non-human animals is accepted, including artistic depictions.
Adult content is welcome but must be censored and properly announced with content warnings (CW).
Profile pictures, headers and usernames must stay SFW.
Financial help can be requested under a "mutual aid" content warning.
No promotion of AI/NFT art or crypto.
Sensitive content must be flagged under a descriptive content warning.
No corporate or bot accounts. Art accounts are welcome.

furry.energy.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Content warn (CW) anything you wouldn't see in general media and be kind with spoilers.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, spamming, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Only share content that is legal in the United Kingdom AND your own country of origin.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No ban evasion, NFT, AI Artwork, impersonation, hate or gore-centric accounts. Parody is ok if clearly labelled.
You must be 18+ to join this server. Read the House Rules & Extended Code of Conduct (https://furry.energy/about & https://furry.energy/privacypolicy)

furry.horse.text: 🔞 No members under the age of 18.
Personal accounts only, no businesses or organisations.  Exceptions for directly furry businesses/organisations, eg artists, fursuit makers, conventions.
No advertising, sponsored content, or spamming.  Exceptions for first-party directly furry advertising, e.g. art, but don't spam.
No raffles that require boosting/following to enter.

furry.pet.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive and have a short content warning when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Users registering on this instance must be at least 18 years old
You may not use an avatar if it has explicit content that would require a Content Warning
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.
Trying to be clever and skirting around the spirit of the rules will likely result in admin action

furs.town.text: by creating an account on this instance, you affirm that you are over 18 years old and/or legally adult.
please don't post or interact with—i.e., replying, boosting, or favoring—anything illegal in the laws of the United States; use your common sense.

we don't tolerate any content discriminating any individual on the grounds of—including, but not limited to—race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, caste, sexual orientation, sex, gender, gender identity, serious diseases or disability, or immigration status.

any content targeting any individual—whether they are on this instance or on other federated instances—with malicious intent is not allowed; this includes, but not limited to, harassment, gaslighting, spamming, or stalking. please be good to others.
adult (nsfw) content—excluding those listed under rule #6—is allowed, as long as it's masked under 'content warning' with a brief description; e.g., cw: blood.
absolutely forbidden: any content depicting or suggesting sexual exploitation of any MINOR, whether they be in-real-life human child or fictitious "cub."
always credit the rightful creator of the artwork, including a link to their profile is the best. or at least listing the creator name alone helps tremendously!

no impersonation of anyone, including one against any legal entities (a.k.a. businesses) unless you have a representing power of such entity. the only allowed exception shall be 'parody accounts' where the account is required to clearly specify in bio that the one is a parody account.

every single data created on and originating from Furstown belongs to respective local account who created that data, on furs.town. Furstown do NOT allow scraping data from us without consent, for any purpose; the only exception shall be federating for the intended purpose of 'socializing.'

furs.social.text: No harassment or discrimination. This includes hate speech, cyberbullying, or any other behavior that targets or discriminates against someone based on their race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, or any other personal characteristic.

Keep it legal. Do not post illegal or copyrighted material, or engage in any illegal activity on the platform.

(This server is managed in the United States and hosted in Japan)

AI art is not allowed on this instance. This includes any art or media created using artificial intelligence or machine learning algorithms. Posts containing AI art will be removed and may result in the user being banned from the instance.
No impersonation or deceptive behavior. Do not pretend to be someone else, or use the platform to mislead or deceive others.
Mark all NSFW content with a content warning.

futuregadgetlab.cc.text: - Boosting will be treated the same as posting that content. Only boost stuff that is not against the rules.
- When interacting with other instances, you must follow our rules as well as the other instances rules.
- We won't support hateful speech or harassment on this instance, therefore it is forbidden.
- We support freedom of expression for everybody. Don't be disrespectful, regardless of your political views. However, freedom of expression has limits.
- Discrimination is not allowed. It does not matter whether you discriminate a majority or a minority or a single person.
Don't upload anything illegal / you haven't got rights on it, if anything illegal came from here, contact a member of staff or use the report button.

- Before clicking the report button, keep in mind that we can't fully take action when it comes to posts from outside of the instance, however your report can be sent anonymously to the original instance.
You must not upload anything illegal or material that you don't have the licence/copyright for.
With illegal, we mean: Content that is against any laws of Germany or the European Union.
You must not upload any form of pornography.
Always credit the artists of the art you post.
Other NSFW (that is not pornographic) material must be posted hidden using the spoiler button.

fwoof.space.text: Be considerate. Respect others and their viewpoints.

Be lawful. No posts about anything that is illegal or would have the FBI knocking at our doors, etc.
Use content warnings. On posts with common trigger warnings, E.G. Sexual, potentially violent, etc, try to use content warnings. This is a pretty loose rule, just be mindful.

gachi.masto.host.text: Be Respectful: Treat everyone with dignity, regardless of background. We focus on actions, not generalizations.
Kindness Counts: Foster an inclusive environment through compassion and understanding, especially for marginalized voices.
Content Warnings (Optional, but Appreciated): Consider using CWs for sensitive topics (NSFW, violence, etc.) to empower user choice.
Harassment is Out: Doxxing, dogpiling, and any form of harassment are not welcome here.
Consent is Key: Sexually explicit content must involve consenting adults and be marked with CWs. Content promoting non-consent is forbidden.

gainer.cloud.text: Respect everyone: we actively moderate against racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia... Any kind of discrimination.
Any content that is illegal in UK, Ireland and EU is prohibited.
Do not gather information about our users by means of web scrapers or other software alike.
Dont Spam, occasional promotions are allowed but do not post constantly about them.
Adult content server: you are allowed to post sexually explicit content on here, as long as it will be accompanied by a content warning.
No minors are allowed on this server. Any participant is required to have a profile on grommr, chasabl, biggercity or another mastodon instance to be elligible to join.

galbo.io.text: Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on SBF all day long here tho.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.

galaxyrailway.link.text: 第1条 第1項 当サーバーは「ユーザー中心」のサーバーであり、鉄道テーマと自由テーマをメインに扱うサーバーです。自由を価値としています。

第1条 第2項 19禁のメッセージや政治的発言をしても構いません。私たちは特に制裁はしません。しかし、周りのフォロワーや他の利用者を考えて、CWを強制的に要求するわけではありませんが、ご利用されるユーザー様は自己判断でメッセージを投稿してください。（追加で、紛争などによる法的問題が発生した場合、私たちは司法機関に法的情報を提供することがあります。それ以外の責任はユーザー間の責任とし、私たちは責任を負いません。）

第2条 第1項 当サーバーのモデレーターの方々はヘルパーとして役割を果たします。とはいえ、絶対に大きな助けを求めるわけではありません。例えば、1. 絵文字を他の場所から持ってくることができます（著作権違反をせず、正しい著作物の使用を遵守しましょう。）2. 国家保安法違反や犯罪、児童ポルノ、テロ予告など、憲法および刑法を違反する投稿を報告します。そして、モデレーターの方々は自由に活動しますが、モデレーター間の風紀を乱す下品な行為をした場合、モデレーターの職位を解任されることがあります。
第2条 第2項 モデレーターはヘルパーとしての役割であり、自由な主権者である一般ユーザーとは異なり、ある程度の規則と規制が必要です。今から規則を説明します。1. 他のユーザー間の紛争を「モデレーターは」絶対に引き起こさないことを目指します。2. モデレーターは他の利用者を考えて、不道徳な罵倒や誹謗中傷をしないことを目指します。

第3条 第1項 連合宇宙リレーは複数のサーバーの多重クラスタです。インターネットエチケットマナーを守りましょう。
疑問がある場合は、@admin@galaxyrailway.link またはモデレーターにお問い合わせください！ ※銀河鉄道の規定は完璧ではありません。したがって、皆様の意見を受け入れて、規定が追加＆修正されることがありますが、無理な要求やサーバーの指向と異なる要求は拒否されます。

galaxy.quest.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.

No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.

gamedev.social.text: Do not share content that is intentionally false and/or defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, sexually oriented, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, or otherwise violate any law
Copyright material must be owned by you or GameDev.net/GameDev.social
Sexually explicit or violent content must be marked as sensitive

gamedev.berlin.text: Treat everyone with dignity and respect, regardless of their background, identity or circumstances. This is a positive and supportive place - Please interact in a way that reflects these values.
Mark NSFW content as sensitive and keep avatars and header images SFW.

Report any inappropriate behavior to the server administrator.
The administrator can and will remove user accounts if abuse or malicious behavior is seen.
The primary languages allowed on the server are German and English.

Only post content that is legal within the EU.

Distribution of copyrighted material is prohibited - no uploads, no links.
Do not spread false or misleading information intentionally.

Uphold quality. No Spamming of any kind .
No automated posts by bots, unless approved by the server admin.

*WHY?* Due to how Mastodon works under the hood, boosting (retweeting) posts from other servers will cause their media attachments to be cached on this server. Storage is limited.

gamedev.lgbt.text: Be friendly and respectful to all members - No personal attacks, antagonizing, or harassment of any kind.
This is a positive and supportive place - Please interact in a way that reflects these values.
General statement - Black lives matter, trans rights are human rights, and if either of these make you uncomfortable, this is not the community for you. Hopefully one day it will be.
You must be part of or directly adjacent to the games industry

gamelinks007.net.text:

あらかじめご了承ください。

現在、Creatodonの運営は個人で行っております。
そのため他のサーバーに比べて対応が遅くなることや漏れることがあり得ます。
そのことに了承できる方だけご利用ください。

また管理人も一個人としてCreatodonを利用しています。
そのため管理人と合わないと判断された場合はブロックやミュート、または別のサーバーを利用するなど自衛措置を取っていただければと思います。

gamemaking.social.text: There is no tolerance for harassment or discrimination of any kind, directly or indirectly. For example: racism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia and TERF shit, fascism, general channer garbage, and so on.

We're here to encourage and support each other, and hopefully make pals (and make videogames less bad)!
I will remove accounts that: Are inactive for a year, haven't posted anything within two months of their creation, or are just here for promotion (it probably won't help FYI).
You must use content warnings following the usual Mastodon etiquette; for example for politics, 'adult'/lewd content, eye contact, food, mental health … if in doubt ask first please!

gamepad.club.text: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other forms of discrimination are not acceptable on this server, and we have a zero-tolerance policy against it.
Nudity and pornographic content is not permitted, including fan art and video game content. Posts that include this content will be removed.
Repeated, targeted harassment against an individual or group is unacceptable behaviour, and may lead to a temporary or permanent suspension
Spam, advertising and bot accounts are not permitted and will be removed.
Content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, Germany, or the United States is strictly prohibited.

Include why you want to join in your application so that we can tell you're a human and approve you!

(Make sure to check your spam folder for any approval email)

gaminginthe.cloud.text: Posting content should generally not exceed a PG-13 threshold.  Please use NSFW for things you wouldn't want kids or your boss to see.  Do not block moderators to avoid being moderated.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm.
Agree to the Terms of Service and Code of Conduct.

Avoid boosting content from other servers that violates our rules, even if it doesn't violate the source server's rules. Reports for off-server content that violates our rules will result in those users being set to limited, and in extreme cases, defederation with that server.

gaydadon.jp.text: サービス利用に際しては日本国内法を遵守して下さい。
公的秩序に反したもの、犯罪や薬物、あまりにも社会ルールを逸脱したもの、等の発信は禁止とします。
特定の個人を攻撃するような発言、差別的な発言やヘイトは禁止します。

モザイク処理していない猥褻な画像や動画の投稿はおやめ下さい。画像や動画にモザイク処理をする場合は、運営アカウントの固定ページにあるサンプルと同程度以上の強度としてください。また処理は「モザイクは可」、「ぼかしは不可」とします。

gayfr.social.text: LIBERTÉ DU CORPS : nous accueillons les contenus (homo)sexuels de manière positive et bienveillante.
CONTENUS EXPLICITES : les contenus sexuellement explicites doivent être signalés comme tels et marqués comme sensibles ; ils ne doivent pas apparaître dans l’avatar ni la bannière de profil.
PAS DE DISCRIMINATION : les contenus racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes, xénophobes, discriminants et non respectueux sont proscrits.
CONTENU LÉGAL : les contenus illégaux en France (pédopornographiques, incitant à la haine ou à la violence, etc.) sont interdits.
CONSENSUEL : le partage de contenu impliquant une tierce personne sans son consentement et les contenus sexuels non consentis sont proscrits.
RESPECT DES AUTRES : les contenus violents, harcelants, intimidants, stigmatisants ou abusifs vis-à-vis d’un autre utilisateur sont proscrits.
PROPRIÉTÉ INTELLECTUELLE : les contenus violant la propriété intellectuelle ou les droits d’auteur sont interdits.
NON-COMMERCIAL : éviter la promotion commerciale intrusive et les sollicitations répétées.
PAS DE DÉSINFORMATION : le partage volontaire d’informations fausses avec l’intention de tromper (« infox » ou « fake news ») est interdit.
INTERDIT AUX MINEURS : vous devez être âgé d’au moins 18 ans pour consulter et utiliser ce serveur.
OUVERTURE : les hommes gay francophones sont le cœur de sa communauté, mais ce serveur est ouvert à tous ses amis et sympathisants.
PLAISIR ET BIENVEILLANCE : ce sont les valeurs cardinales de ce réseau social !

gaymer.social.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Won’t Be Tolerated. We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect Other Users. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is Important in all contexts. If you’re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.
Listen; Don’t Make Excuses. If you’re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.
No Pedophilia or Zoophilia. This includes artistic depictions of characters that cannot give consent.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.
Use the Report Feature. Our staff are here to listen and respond to reports.

gayweeb.vip.text:
NO NATIONALISM 
ABSOLUTELY NO FUCKING NATIONALISM ON THIS INSTANCE BE A NATIONALIST PIECE OF SHIT ON HERE AND I WILL HUNT YOU FOR SPORT
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, biphobia, classism, sexism, ableism, or any other systematic discrimination is allowed on GWV.
No hate speech, bullying, harassment, or dogpiling.
No spam - this includes shilling NFTs. Self-promotion is otherwise fine and encouraged.
No auto-posting bots from Twitter, RSS, etc. By joining this instance, you are entering a community and you are expected to interact authentically.

Please report any objectionable content - either in GWV or directed at a GWV member in bad faith - so that it can be responded to accordingly.
Many right-wing and far-right instances are universally blocked on GWV. Circumventing these blocks will result in removal from GWV.
Users from blocked instances may not transfer to GWV. Any requests to join will be rejected.
Users under the age of 18 will not be permitted to join GWV. Any requests to join will be rejected. Any user found to be under 18 will be banned immediately.
While GWV is primarily a Fediverse instance for gay men, we welcome people of all identities to join. All members are also expected to treat users in a welcoming and respectful manner.
Any additional rules can be added or amended at the discretion of the admin team.

geekodon.org.text: Be nice. Treat others how you would like to be treated yourself.

geekdom.social.text: Hate speech and acts of discrimination such as racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism will not be tolerated.
Do not intentionally share false or misleading information.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive with a content warning.
Do not share posts containing incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. Posts or replies designed to provoke a confrontation are not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots containing just links or an inordinate number of hashtags are considered spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

genealogie.social.text: Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transfeindliche, ableistische, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

genericsocialmediapage.com.text: Hateful conduct: We will not tolerate any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the “debate” of theirs right to a safe existence.

Harassment: We will not tolerate harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling (“sealioning”), or boundary violations (for instance non-consensual flirting or unsolicited nudes). Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.

Safeguarding: We will not tolerate action that endanger others, such as releasing others’ personal or identifiable information (“doxxing”) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.
Sexual Content: Sexual content, such as erotic nudity or pornography, may be shared in threads, but for the love of god put it behind a content warning.

CSAM/Abuse: Sexualised depictions of children, real (“child porn”, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (“lolicon”, “shotacon”), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, “revenge porn”), are not permitted and will be removed.
Misinformation: We will not tolerate the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating persons or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.

Spam: No you can't post your spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion. Relevant self promotion of your store, or services is okay.
Be nice: Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis.

geraffel.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
Be aware that misbehaviour on this instance may lead to removal from other Geraffel services including Bar and Threema Groups.

gervtuber.de.text: Bei der Verwendung dieses Servers achtest Du das geltende Recht und die Nutzungsbedingungen von Mastodon. Ein Verstoß gegen diese resultiert in einem Bann und ggf. Meldung an staatliche Behörden.
Respektiere andere Server-Mitglieder und deren Meinung. Respektiere auch deren persönliche Grenzen und überschreite diese nicht.
Diskriminierung, Intoleranz, Beleidigungen, Mobbing, etc. sind strengstens verboten.
Gewalt- und Terrorverherrlichende bzw. Extremistische Inhalte, sowie Relativierungen davon, sind verboten.
Die Privatsphäre der Mitmenschen ist zu respektieren. Es dürfen keine persönlichen Informationen Anderer ohne deren ausdrückliches Einverständnis veröffentlicht werden.
Der Aufruf zum Verstoß gegen die Regeln ist ebenfalls ein Verstoß gegen die Regeln.
Das imitieren anderer Mitglieder oder Personen des öffentlichen Lebens ist verboten.
Der An- und Verkauf von User-Accounts oder anderer User-Daten ist verboten.
Banns dürfen nicht mit Zweit-Accounts umgangen werden und gehackte Accounts dürfen nicht verwendet werden.
Allgemein positives Verhalten, z.B. Collab-Bereitschaft, ist gern gesehen.
Eine unfreundliche und negative Einstellung ist zu vermeiden. Das gilt auch für das anfeuern von Konflikten, sowie dem 'Canceln' anderer Nutzer aufgrund von Meinungsverschiedenheiten.
Sämtliche NSFW-Inhalte MÜSSEN gekennzeichnet werden. Genauso müssen auch Spoiler und mögliche Trigger gekennzeichnet werden.
