giesing.space.text:
Be Kind: 
Treat all users with respect and kindness. Harassment, hate speech, and personal attacks will not be tolerated.
No NSFW Content: Do not post explicit, NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content, including but not limited to nudity, pornography, and graphic violence.
No Illegal Content: Sharing or linking to illegal content is strictly prohibited. This includes but is not limited to pirated material, illegal drugs, and harmful software.
No Misinformation: Do not spread false information or engage in activities intended to deceive or mislead others.
Respect Privacy: Do not share personal information about yourself or others without consent. This includes addresses, phone numbers, and other sensitive details.
Report Violations: If you see content that violates these rules, report it to the moderators.
No Spam: Refrain from spamming. This includes posting repetitive messages, excessive self-promotion, and irrelevant content.
Limited Advertising: Advertising is allowed in moderation. Ensure it is relevant to the community and does not become intrusive.
Constructive Discussions: Engage in constructive discussions. Debates are welcome, but they should remain respectful and focused on the topic.
Follow Requests: Respect the preferences of other users regarding follows, mentions, and direct messages.
Bot Accounts: Clearly identify bot accounts and ensure they follow the server rules. Bots should not spam or engage in disruptive behavior.
Moderation Actions: Moderators have the authority to warn, mute, or ban users who violate the rules. These actions are taken to maintain a safe and respectful environment.
Appeals: Users can appeal moderation actions by contacting the moderation team. Appeals will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis.

giersig.net.text: Tue, was gut ist und vermeide, was schlecht ist.
In einem höflichen, ruhigen Tonfall kann man auch über sehr unangenehme Dinge reden.
Es ist OK, über eigene negative Gefühle zu reden, solange man damit niemanden angreift.
Verletzender Sarkasmus oder Zynismus vergiftet das Gesprächsklima.
Überprüfe deine Quellen. Fake News untergraben unsere Gesellschaft.
Manche Menschen wollen lieber ein wenig privat(er) bleiben. Es ist ein Gebot der Höflichkeit, das zu respektieren.

Menschen sind gleich viel wert und verdienen respektvolle Behandlung. Intoleranz gegenüber anderen Menschen hingegen, die auf ethnischer Zugehörigkeit, Geschlecht oder anderen schicksalshaften Eigenschaften basiert, verdient keinen Respekt und ist abzulehnen.
Das Strafrecht ist NICHT die Grenze des zu Tolerierenden. Moralisches Handeln beginnt weit davor.

girlcock.club.text: No illegal content is allowed on the server and sharing such content will result in an immediate suspension.
Hate speech is not tolerated. This includes but is not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, classism, ableism, etc. Please report any hate speech encountered.

Centrist and right-wing politics are not allowed. The politics of hate (and tolerance of hate) have no place on this instance and any discussion of these policies framed in a positive light will result in the user being silenced.
Do not misuse the report system. Only report dangerous content pertaining to the rules above; do not create frivolous reports for disagreements over discourse or leftist politics.
Posts containing NSFW content or content that users may not wish to engage with must be tagged with the content warning feature.

girlboss.ing.text: Do not post or access any content via this instance which is illegal in the UK.
Hate (racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia, classism, along with other forms of hate like holocaust denial) is a ban.
Harassment is not allowed. However, criticism is not considered harassment if the nature of the criticism is both true and non-aggressive.
Sensitive content, even which is not NSFW, should have content warnings.
Posting NSFW photos / drawings are not allowed (boosting it is allowed, though). NSFW text content (including screenshots of NSFW text) is fine but needs a content warning.

girldick.gay.text: Absolutely no bigotry against marginalized/repressed groups; including, but not limited to, homophobia, trans-/enbyphobia, misogyny, racism, classism, ableism, etc. As a general rule, don't discriminate against anyone further down the social ladder or, in other words, just don't be an asshole.
No illegal content, specifically anything illegal under the jurisdiction of Germany. Yes, be gay do crime, but i don't have the resources to fight legal battles just for girldick.gay to stay online.
Provide alt text for images and videos
Use content warnings where appropriate. For example: selfie/ec (eye contact), mh (mental health), sh (self harm), etc. You get the idea.

Give a hint as to what kind of person you are when signing up. I can't afford to run an instance that needs 24/7 monitoring and moderation, so please reference your website/twitter/previous fediverse account or any other indication that you might fit in this community.
Don't be completely inactive. New accounts should at the very least set up their profile after being accepted; and i reserve the right to delete those that don't after a reasonable time.

We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form. Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone.

gloomily.isitjosh.com.text:
Respect Privacy
Do not publish others' private information without consent.
Respect everyone's right to express themselves in a safe and private manner.

Be Respectful
Treat each other with respect. Harassment, discrimination, and abuse are not tolerated.
Aim for constructive conversation and avoid personal attacks.

No Hate Speech or Violence
Content that promotes violence or hate against individuals or groups based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual preference, disability, or any other characteristic is strictly prohibited.

Keep It Friendly.
Be a good person.

No Spam or Excessive Self-Promotion
Spamming and relentless self-promotion detract from the communal experience. Please be thoughtful about the frequency and nature of your promotions.

Follow the Law
Illegal activities or content that promotes illegal actions are forbidden.

Content Tagging
Use content warnings and NSFW tags where appropriate to help maintain a comfortable environment for all.

Respect Copyrights
Do not post content that infringes on others' copyrights without permission.

Moderation and Reporting
Our moderators are here to help. If you see something that violates these rules, please report it.
Moderators reserve the right to remove content or suspend accounts as needed to keep the community healthy.

Enjoy Your Stay!
Most importantly, have fun, make connections, and enjoy the music and camaraderie of Gloomily!

gluck.cc.text: Children under 13 prohibited. You must be at least 13 years of age, and you must not collect personal information online from a child under 13 years of age. See https://www.ftc.gov/legal-library/browse/rules/childrens-online-privacy-protection-rule-coppa
Gluck.cc is federated with almost every other instance that allows federation including threads.net

Use empathy and respect. Remember that your words can have consequences and don't say anything here if you wouldn't say it to a friend. The culture here is different from Twitter or Facebook. Observe how people interact and try to behave as well or better than everybody else

Content warning (CW) should be used for stressful or triggering content. Mark any toxic posts with a descriptive CW to allow other members of the Fediverse to engage with it or not. Use the CW like the subject for a email to a large audience that some may not want to read
Cite sources, credit others. Images and media should be annotated. Where the material is not yours, source attribution should be provided, preferably with a link to the original.
Mind your gigabytes. Please upload your videos to another platform like PeerTube  or YouTube and post links instead of uploading video here.

Expect pruning of old data. Data entered into this server is stored temporarily and I do not plan to provide a long-term archive. Retention is currently set to store content for 90 days but I’ll adjust retention depending on costs.

gnulinux.social.text: No automated cross posting from Twitter, RSS, or other services.
Please do not spam or self-promote yourself (humor and m3m3s, however, are most welcome).
If you impersonate someone, please state that in your profile and exercise discretion.
We recommend using descriptions for images and video (ALT tag) to be inclusive of those with vision issues.
Challenging the community with critical ideas and good thought partnering is welcome, ass holes are not - be respectful during dialogue or debate.
No hate or targeted harassment of any other user, regardless of what side of an issue you reside on.
Accounts for and/or promoting proprietary products are prohibited. You may make accounts for and/or to promote Free Software products, whether commercial or otherwise.
We respect the individual freedom of the community member in deciding whether reposts are endorsements or otherwise, and whether the content they post should contain a warning.

gnurfl.de.text:
Liebe Mastodonier, Tröter oder wie ihr selbst genannt werden möchtet  :)

Wir freuen uns, euch auf unserer Social Plattform willkommen zu heißen. Um ein angenehmes und respektvolles Miteinander zu gewährleisten, bitten wir euch, die folgenden Regeln des Umgangs zu beachten:
Respektiere andere Mitglieder: Sei höflich und respektvoll gegenüber anderen Nutzern. Beleidigungen, Diskriminierung, Mobbing oder jede andere Form von respektlosem Verhalten sind nicht toleriert.

Halte dich an die Gesetze: Veröffentliche keine Inhalte, die gegen geltende Gesetze verstoßen. Dies schließt illegale Aktivitäten, Urheberrechtsverletzungen, Verbreitung von Gewalt oder Hass, sowie jegliche Form von Belästigung ein.
Beachte die Privatsphäre: Respektiere die Privatsphäre anderer Nutzer. Veröffentliche keine persönlichen Informationen anderer Mitglieder ohne deren Zustimmung.
Keine Spaminhalte: Vermeide das Veröffentlichen von Spam oder unerwünschten Inhalten. Dies beinhaltet auch das Versenden von Massennachrichten oder das Erstellen von Fake-Profilen.
Melde Missbrauch: Wenn du auf Inhalte stößt, die gegen diese Regeln verstoßen, melde sie bitte umgehend unserem Support-Team. Wir werden angemessene Maßnahmen ergreifen, um die Situation zu klären.

Nutze die Plattform verantwortungsbewusst: Denke daran, dass du für deine Handlungen und veröffentlichten Inhalte verantwortlich bist. Verbreite keine Gewalt, illegale Aktivitäten oder Hassbotschaften.

Come to our first Assembly and let's discuss the rules
https://museum.care/events/mastodon-assembly/

grafana.social.text:
This instance is only for current employees of Grafana Labs in possession of an @grafana.com email address.

The server exists to provide a verifiable way for Grafana staff to participate in #FOSS and #opensource discussions within the #fediverse.

grandma.space.text: If someone asks you to stop, STOP. Ignoring such a request, especially from a mod, will result at minimum in a timeout.
If there is an issue, use the reporting tools so moderators and admins can handle it.

No bigotry or harassment. grandma.space has a ZERO TOLERANCE policy for the instigation or perpetuation of hateful speech and ideology, disrespect of its members or staff, incendiary behavior, or other such inappropriate conduct.
Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use nsfw tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.

graphics.social.text: No advocating violence. Do not engage in harassment, including but not limited to bullying, stalking, and unwanted sexual advances.
No bigotry of any kind. Including but not limited to: racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, ageism, fascism, nationalism, colonialism, white supremacy, or religious extremism.
No hacking. Do not engage in unauthorized access or abuse of the server's systems or data.
No pornography. It's just not that kind of instance, find another home on the fediverse.

No deceptive content. Do not post deceptive or misleading content, including but not limited to impersonation, phishing, misinformation and explicitly: cryptocurrency, multilevel marketing scams, NFTs and anti-vax misinformation.

No illegal content. Do not post illegal content, including but not limited to child pornography, non-consensual pornography, threats of violence, incitement to commit violent acts, and any content that violates the DMCA.
No doxxing. Do not share personal information about others without their consent.
Be kind, don't be a jerk. It's what all these other more specific rules are trying to define.

No scraping the contents of this site for machine learning training. That includes using any text, image, video or audio posted for training, testing, or general use with artificial intelligence, including but not limited to large language models like GPT and neural networks.

graphvisualization.masto.host.text: Connect about all things graph visualization.

gratefuldread.masto.host.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, antisemitism, or casteism.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment of, doxxing, or dogpiling other users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
No ad hominem attacks. Don’t discredit someone because of who they are.
No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, confederate symbolism, white supremacy, or white nationalism.
No spam, no ads, you of course may talk about your own projects and those of your friends.
Don't send any sensitive, personal, or private information, even via DM, you are not comfortable posting publicly.

graz.social.text: Keine rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache. "Starke Sprache" muss mit einer Inhaltswarnung versehen werden.
Kein Belästigung einzelner Personen durch ungewünschte Kontaktaufnahme, Stalking oder Doxing.
Keine Beiträge, die in der Republik Österreich oder in der Europäischen Union gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen.
Kein Verbreiten von Verschwörungserzählungen oder Fake-News.
Nicht jugendfreie Beiträge müssen als solche gekennzeichnet werden.
Profilbilder und Banner, die nicht jugendfrei sind, werden nicht toleriert.
Kommerzielle Werbung auf eigene Produkte muss als solche gekennzeichnet sein. Übermäßige oder automatisierte Werbung wird nicht toleriert.

Automatisiertes Posten von Texten und Medien dritter, sofern es nicht als Zitat behandelt und darauf Bezug genommen wird, ist nicht erlaubt. Darunter fallen insbesondere automatische Re-Tweets von Twitter.

Bot-Accounts, also Nutzerkonten, die größtenteils automatisierte Inhalte erstellen, müssen als solche gekennzeichnet sein, dürfen nicht auf der lokalen Timeline posten und dürfen nur mit Nutzer:innen interagieren, wenn sie dazu eingeladen worden sind.
Beiträge dürfen nur in deutscher oder englischer Sprache verfasst werden.
Rücksicht, Menschlichkeit und eine respektvolle Diskussionskultur.
Zusammenhängende Posts sind im Allgemeinen in Threads zusammen zu fassen. Antworten sind dabei bis auf thematische Außnahmen auf "ungelistet" zu setzen.

greenfield.masto.host.text: 이 곳은 사적 자치의 기반 아래 개인이 운영하는 사설 인스턴스입니다. 이용자들은 자신의 양심과 가치관에 따른 게시물 작성의 자유가 일반적으로 보장되며 그 결과에 대해 인스턴스 소유주의 판단 및 사회상규와 대한민국의 법이 정하는 바에 따라 책임을 지게 됩니다.

이 곳에 머무시는 분들끼리 상호 배려를 권고하며 유저 간의 개인적인 분쟁에 대해서는 소유주가 관여하지 않음을 원칙으로 합니다. 다만 필요하다고 생각할 시 소유주 및 소유주가 조정 권한을 위임한 대리인이 개입하여 필요하다고 여기는 조치 (인스턴스 이용 관계의 변경에 한정된 케이스부터 법적 조력을 구하거나 사법기관의 조력 요청에 응하는 등의) 조치를 취할 수 있습니다.

본 인스턴스는 masto.host측에 서버의 기술적 운영 일반을 위임하는 방식으로 운영됩니다. 소유주는 가입사유 신고 처리 등의 사무 처리 과정에서 직접 정보가 들어오는 아이디 (가입사유 신고 처리와 인스턴스 내부 신고에 한함. 외부 신고의 경우 신고자의 신원을 알 수 없음)와 메일 주소, 신고 내용, 신고자의 소속 인스턴스까지 볼 수 있으며 masto.host 측에서 관리하는 데이터베이스의 접근 권한이 없어 개인의 비공개 처리된 내밀한 게시물 및 기타 비공개 정보와 원천적으로 차단이 되어 있다는 사실을 알립니다.

본 인스턴스 내의 의견 개진에서 과한 표현이 있을 수 있으나 본질적인 내용에서 인간에 대한 성찰과 따뜻함을 저버리지 않는 의견의 경우 저희는 제재하지 않습니다. 다만 그런 표현이 불편하신 분들의 이용상 편의와 배려를 위해 먼저 침묵 혹은 차단 처리를 부탁하겠습니다. 알기 쉬운 예시로 "그렇게 닫는다고 문이 뿌사지는겨?" 가 "기물 파손에 대한 장려"로 이어지지 않는다는 점과 비슷함을 다시 상기시켜 드릴 수 있겠습니다.
본 인스턴스는 가입 심사 후 승인 절차로 운영됩니다. 신규 유저로서 가입승인이 되신 이 경우 유저는 인스턴스 약관 전문을 읽고 약관에 규정된 내용 (인스턴스의 성격, 소유주와 유저의 기본적 관계, 중재 등 처분 절차와 그 결과의 행사)과 그에 따른 인스턴스 내부 관계의 변경에 동의하신 것으로 의제합니다.

또한 유저는 마스토돈이 AP 프로토콜을 따라 연합우주 내에서의 수많은 상호작용을 매개하는 수많은 인스턴스들을 구동하는 소프트웨어임을 이해하며 마스토돈으로 구동되는 수많은 인스턴스 중 하나인 본 인스턴스 내에서 한하여 이루어지는 소유주의 사적인 조치에 따르는 내부관계 변경 (인스턴스 이용의 제한 및 정지)은 근본적으로 대한민국의 법에서 규정하는 기본권의 침해가 아님과 동시에 연합우주 내에서의 발언자유를 제한하는 조치 또한 아님을 이해합니다.

이용 플랜의 데이터 용량의 한계가 있어 각종 이용자 데이터의 보존 기한 설정은 다음과 같이 정해집니다.   
필요하신 데이터는 꼭 따로 갈무리를 하시길 바랍니다.

미디어 캐시 유지 기한 : 5일  
콘텐츠 캐시 유지 기한 : 60일  
사용자 아카이브 유지 기한 : 6일

groupthink.fun.text: All people are welcome and entitled to take part in the discourse. Speech that objectifies, marginalizes, belittles, ridicules, or is hostile to any demographic recognized by the United States as protected(http://jk.mt/yq), will result in a ban.

growers.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media should not be posted, there are other options better suited for this.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other people.
Use a content warning when sharing news items or politically related media. We're here to be social and respectful, politics can be an unwieldy beast and we'd really appreciate not dealing with it.

When creating an account here note the service is still small and self-funded. I'm don't soliciting payments for this service and intend to keep this running as best as I can. Service interruptions can happen and in this case, I will try my best to bring everything back online as soon as possible.

gruene.social.text: Achte die Würde deiner Mitmenschen und Mitnutzer*innen
Beachte die geltenden Gesetze, insbesondere das Urheberrecht, das Persönlichkeitsrecht und den Datenschutz.

Solltest du Inhalte, insbesondere Ton, Video und Bild, veröffentlichen, die andere verstören könnten, beispielsweise durch Darstellung von Gewalt, verwende bitte die Inhaltswarnung-Funktion ("Als heikle Medien markieren")
Solltest du eine Verletzung dieser Regeln bemerken, nimm das bitte nicht stillschweigend hin, sondern informiere die Moderator*innen unter @moderation

grumble.social.text: No bigotry. Any form of bigotry is grounds for account termination. Since I vet everyone the chance of this happening is exceedingly low, but I want it to be explicit. Also: TERFs and nazis fuck off.
Don't be a dick. There's no value to it. It just makes you a dick.
Post in good faith. If you assume someone is posting in bad faith... well, your reply will probably also be in bad faith. So just don't.
Don't dog-pile. There's no value in it, it doesn't make the world a better place. No one wants to see it, and it's a waste of your own time.
Vet your content. Looking at you metal folk. No one wants to see known white supremacists boosted, so if you get called out for it, that's on you.

Unfollow/mute/block and move on. While I encourage using CWs for trauma triggers, there is no expectation of CWs for topical content. If someone is posting content you don't want to see, remove them and move on.
Don't post anything illegal in the EU, because that's where this site is hosted and doing so risks me simply taking the server entirely offline to avoid any legal issues.

h4.io.text: Votre contenu doit être en français pour préserver une cohérence des fils et faciliter la modération.
Nous n'autorisons pas le cross-postage (se référer à la page "À propos" pour plus d'explication).
Ne rejoignez pas h4 simplement pour promouvoir un contenu en le spammant.
Les propos illégaux (racistes, homophobes, transphobes, sexistes) sont proscrits.
Les propos discriminants, incitants à la violence ou contribuant au harcèlement sont proscrits.
Les tentatives de retournement d'oppressions systémiques ("racisme anti-blanc, sexisme anti-homme, hétérophobie, cisphobie, etc) sont proscrites.
Les contenus répréhensibles par la loi française sont proscrits.
Les contenus pornographiques ne sont pas autorisés sur la plateforme puisque nous n'avons pas la capacité d'en assurer la provenance éthique et légale.
Les contenus érotiques (ou explicites et personnel) sont autorisés mais doivent avoir un avertissement de contenu pour ne pas les imposer à la communauté.

h-net.social.text: Be courteous, respectful, and understanding in interactions with fellow users.
No racism, sexism, ableism, religious-based hate, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or classism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent or white supremecist ideologies.
No harassment, intimidation, or other abuse of other users.
No intentionally false or misleading information, including unfounded or disproved conspiracy theories.
No libelous or slanderous posts about users and nonusers.
H-Net reserves the right to suspend, block, or remove accounts that do not abide by our rules of engagement, including harassment of other users.
H-Net Network Accounts - If you are joining the instance on behalf of an H-Net network, your account name must follow the naming format “@H_NETWORKNAME@h-net.social”

hackaday.social.text: Respect Others. Harassment of other users in any form will not be tolerated.
Stay Work Safe. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for this server, and excessive foul language will get you muted or kicked.
No Illegal Activity. We aren’t those kinds of hackers, so keep discussion on-topic.
No Spam. Repeatedly posting the same messages and images is disruptive and annoying.
No Ads. Personal projects are OK, but links to commercial products or paid services may be deleted.

hachyderm.wtf.text: Used for dev/test activity for hachyderm.io only.

h-i.social.text: This instance has a zero-tolerance policy for racism, sexism, queerphobia, Islamaphobia, antisemitism, etc. Any accounts that engage in these behaviors will be banned.

Boundaries are to be respected. If a person asks to disengage from a discussion, please honor that request politely. Accounts that continue to harass, stalk, and abuse after the request is made will be banned.

This is a sex-positive instance, so nudity and NSFW content is acceptable. Just put it behind a CW. Accounts that do not put this content behind a CW will be warned. After three warnings, the account will be banned.
Harassment, bullying, and antagonization will result in an immediate ban.
If using an artist's work in your post, always give credit to said artist.

Accounts that post sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, and conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism will be immediately banned.

hackers.town.text: No commercial accounts, advertising, or excessive promotion.
No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning).
No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, or promotion of National Socialism.
No fake accounts unless they are clearly labeled as such.

Don't make us make a new rule.
If the defense of an action is that it's not specifically outlined as against these rules, consider instead this rule
Any siloed corporate social media entity that is not fediverse native that tries to federate with hackers.town will be blocked.

Typical Content warnings include (But are not limited to) politics, food, alcohol and drugs, eye contact and NSFW material (If you would not share it in a work chat, it probably needs a CW) . 
If staff or other users ask you to CW something, please edit the post.
If you willfully misgender or deadname a person, we will kick/ban/block/defederate.

hackademiker.se.text: Ingen rasism, sexism, homofobi, transfobi eller högerextremism
Ingen uppmaning till våld, varken mot enskild person eller folkgrupp

hackodon.com.text: All content moderation decisions are final.
All bans are non-negotiable and at the sole discretion of the server's owner
Don't post stuff that can't or shouldn't be posted. If you don't know what this means, please contact the moderator!

Your interest in this private instance is appreciated, but your registration will be rejected unless you have made prior arrangements with the instance's owner. Honestly, you probably would rather be somewhere else.

hackerspace.au.text: No bots that are not labeled as such in their profile
Keep conversations civil and respectful even in disagreement
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, anti-Semitism, or casteism

hades.town.text: No racism, sexism, queerphobia or other forms of hate speech.
No incitement or glorification of violence (including war and the military)

halfey.moe.text: This is a single-user instance. I (halfey) am the rule(s).

hallihan.net.text: No violence or threats of violence

hameln.social.text: Diese Instanz ist noch in einer Testphase. Sie können sich schon anmelden, aber derzeit läuft noch ein Probebetrieb. Die Anmeldung ist aus Speichergründen auf Menschen aus Hameln oder mit einem besonderen Bezug zu unserer Stadt beschränkt.
Wer sich bei hameln.social anmelden möchte, wir gebeten sich kurz vorzustellen. Er/Sie erklärt sich mit den nachfolgenden Verhaltensregeln einverstanden:

Wir legen Wert auf einen respektvollen, freundlichen Umgang. Basis für alle soll eine faire, gern auch kontroverse Diskussionskultur sein. Politische Diskussionen sind erwünscht, allerdings bitte ausschließlich sachlich.

Diese Instanz wendet sich vor allem an Organisationen, Vereine und Menschen, die sich für das Gemeinwohl engagieren. Kleine und mittelständische Firmen aus Hameln und der näheren Umgebung können sich gerne vorstellen und in Maßen über ihre Angebote informieren.
Rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache verbietet sich von selbst und wird nicht geduldet.
Alle Nutzenden sind für die eigenen Beiträge und die Einhaltung aller (lizenz)rechtlichen Bestimmungen ihrer Beiträge (Tröts) selber verantwortlich.
Behörden und Institutionen wie Feuerwehr, THW, DRK und vergleichbare sind ausdrücklich eingeladen/erwünscht.
Politische Parteien sind ausdrücklich eingeladen. Rechts- wie linksextremes oder verschwörungsideologisches Agieren führt zum Ausschluss.
Beiträge nur jugendfrei. Pornographische und sexualisierte Inhalte sind unerwünscht.

Hilfe bei Fragen untereinander sollte selbstverständlich sein. Wenn Dir ein Tröt auffällt, der diese Verhaltensregeln verletzt, schreibe dem/der Verfasser/in des Tröts. Erste wenn das nichts ändert melde den Beitrag. Die Admins entscheiden bei Streit als Hausrechtsinhabende.

hamont.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: Canada
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

hamradio.tel.text: We'll try to keep the rules pretty simple here, basically, treat others with decency and respect.

hci.social.text: Treat everyone with respect and consideration; under the umbrella of respect, we expect all participants to be mindful of their speech and behaviors.
Communicate openly and thoughtfully with others and be considerate of the multitude of views and opinions that may be different than your own.
Be respectful and mindful in your critique of ideas.
Respect others’ identities in full, e.g., using their specified pronouns.
Respect others' right to engage or disengage in conversation.
Accept responsibility to take action, as bystanders and advocates, to call out and report misbehavior and to hold each other accountable to these rules.

Do not engage in harassment in any form, including comments that target other participants based on characteristics such as gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, age, ability, status, physical appearance, body size, or religion.
Do not engage in unwelcome personal attention, particularly when one individual has authority over the other.
Do not engage in persistent, unwanted attempts to contact another group member, particularly when one individual has authority over the other.
Do not deliberately intimidate, stalk, or threaten violence.
Do not engage in sustained disruption of online discussions.
Do not advocate for, or encourage, any of the sanctioned behavior described above.
Do not use this server if you are younger than 18 years old.
Do not post content unlawful in the United States or the State of New Jersey.

hax.social.text: No corporate entities. Contact @rallias@hax.social for your own instance instead.

heads.social.text: No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
No pornography, nudity, or something that would be considered "NSFW" in a U.S. workplace, even behind a NSFW warning.

hear-me.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, threats, doxing, trolling, or ageism. No attacks on someone's religion, culture, language, or country of origin. Don't be insulting and argumentative.To be here, you must be nice to people.

NO CHILD SEXUAL ABUSE POSTINGS (CSAM)! Be aware that we have Cloudflare automatically scan cached images for CSAM violations. They match mathematical image hashes to a database of known CSAM hashes.

Posting nude photos or controversial pictures and posts without content warnings and appropriate hashtags is not allowed. Also, using inappropriate hashtags to unfairly extend the reach of a post is also not allowed
Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

hellinger.wtf.text: Respect for All: We are committed to maintaining a community where everyone, regardless of their gender identity, sexual orientation, race, religion, or background, is treated with respect and dignity.
LGBTQ+ Friendly: We proudly support the LGBTQ+ community. Any form of discrimination, hate speech, or derogatory comments related to gender identity or sexual orientation will not be tolerated.

Harassment-Free Zone: Harassment in any form, including but not limited to, bullying, stalking, and unwanted advances, is strictly prohibited. We strive to create a safe space where everyone can communicate freely without fear of harassment.

No Political Extremes: While respectful political discussions are welcome, this is not a space for extreme political views, hate speech, or promoting divisive ideologies. Let's keep our conversations constructive and inclusive.

Report Violations: If you witness or experience any violations of these rules, please report them to the moderators. We rely on the community to help us keep this space safe and welcoming for everyone.

Moderation and Enforcement: Moderators are here to enforce these rules and ensure a positive environment. Violations can result in warnings, temporary suspensions, or permanent bans, depending on the severity.

helvede.net.text: Serveren er tiltænkt feminister, queers, progressive nørder og andre cool beans! . Den er modereret af @solgudinde og @maiathecyberwitch og vi sørger for et safer space til alle jer der mangler.

Indhold der promoverer fascime, nazisme og hvidt overherredømme eller andre xenofobiske voldelige ideologier tolereres ikke. 

Symboler der associeres med disse bevægelser bør desuden ikke bruges som en joke.
Undlad at fortsætte en diskussion med en bruger, der har frabedt sig kontakt.
Stalking og doxxing tolereres ikke. Anmeld straks til moderatorerne, hvis du oplever eller bevidner det.

At opfordre andre til at engagere negativt med en anden bruger (brigading) vil resultere i at vi fjerner dig fra serveren. Hvis det er tydeligt at en anden bruger ønsker at stoppe kontakten, kan vi bedømme gentagende forsøg på at etablere kontakt  som chikane.
Opfordringer til at ødelægge helvede.net fællesskabet eller at angribe dets tekniske infrastruktur, på denne server eller andetsteds, kan resultere i bortvisning.
Indhold der er ulovligt i Danmark eller Frankrig, hvor serveren er lokaliseret, tolereres ikke.
9. Vi tolererer ikke spam og bots. Det inkluderer automatisk crossposting af indhold fra andre platforme over på din profil på helvede.net.
Helvede.net is a signatory to the Fedipact, meaning we block all domains owned by Meta operating on the fediverse https://fedipact.online/

helmholtz.social.text: Diese Mastodon-Instanz dient der institutionellen Wissenschaftskommunikation der Helmholtz-Gemeinschaft, ihrer Mitgliedszentren und ausgewählter Helmholtz-Initiativen.

Eine Anmeldung von persönlichen Accounts von Helmholtz-Mitarbeiter:innen ist mangels Moderationskapazitäten leider auf absehbare Zeit aus juristischen Gründen nicht möglich.
Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Interesse bezüglich eines persönlichen Mastodon-Accounts an die Kommunikationsabteilung Ihres Helmholtz-Zentrums!

hessen.social.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu Weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

hhsocial.de.text: Sei freundlich und höflich! Hasserfüllte und diskriminierende Beiträge sind unerwünscht. Hetero/Homo..., Cis/Trans..., Christ/Moslem..., HSV/FC. St. Pauli... toleriere es. Akzeptiere es vielleicht sogar!

Bleib bei der Sache, greife nicht die Person an! Es gibt viele unterschiedliche Standpunkte. Diskussionen dienen  dem Austausch von Meinungen und Argumenten. Diskussionen können auch kontrovers sein. Was für einen Sinn hätte sonst diskutieren? Aber, bleib bei der Sache!
Beachte das Persönlichkeitsrecht! Beleidige niemanden! Belästige niemanden! Wenn jemand keinen Kontakt wünscht, dann lass die Person in Ruhe! Poste Persönliches nur mit Zustimmung der Betroffenen!

Der Betreiber behält sich vor, den  Dienst ganz einzustellen. Er wird dies mit drei Monaten Vorlauf ankündigen. Du hast dann genügend Zeit, zu einer anderen Instanz umzuziehen.

Der Betreiber behält sich vor, diese Regeln anzupassen. Er wird dies mit 30 Tagen Vorlauf ankündigen. Für den Fall, dass Du mit den geänderten Regeln nicht einverstanden sein solltest, hast Du in diesem Zeitraum Zeit, den Account zu löschen oder zu einer anderern Instanz umzuziehen.

higheredweb.social.text: Be mindful of using inclusive language. Words matter, people.
Active members should feel free to share their work but no "cold" spamming. Whatsoever. In any format. No one wants that.
No harassment of any kind. You will be gone so quick.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, or any other kind of discrimination.
No nationalism, colonialism, white supremacy, fascism, or religious extremism.

We will suspend your account if we feel like your account was created from an automated service. For example, if your account name is just a blob of letters and numbers, e.g. "c4j29ag". What also looks suspicious is not having a profile photo.

higher-edu.social.text: Fördere eine Kultur der Wertschätzung und Akzeptanz, indem du jegliche Form von gruppenbezogener Menschenfeindlichkeit wie Rassismus, Sexismus, Homophobie, Transphobie oder Xenophobie vermeidest.

Teile Inhalte, die auf Fakten basieren und rechtlich unbedenklich sind, um eine sichere und respektvolle Gemeinschaft zu gewährleisten. Das Teilen von Verschwörungsmythen, Nazi-Propaganda und andere Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, führt zum Ausschluss dieser Instanz.
Markiere sexuell explizite oder gewalttätige Medien deutlich als sensibel, um den unterschiedlichen Empfindlichkeiten innerhalb der Community Rechnung zu tragen.
Nutze Bildbeschreibungen und Inhaltswarnungen, um allen ein umfassendes und barrierefreies Nutzungserlebnis zu bieten.
Trage zu einer friedlichen Atmosphäre bei, indem du Gewalt in keiner Form unterstützt oder propagierst.
Stärke die Gemeinschaft, indem du Belästigungen vermeidest und einen respektvollen Umgang pflegst.
Biete verlässliche und ehrliche Informationen an, um das Vertrauen und die Integrität innerhalb der Community zu stärken, verbreite keine falschen oder irreführenden Informationen.
Bereichere die lokale Timeline durch originelle und relevante Beiträge, anstatt automatisierte Cross-Postings zu nutzen (automatisierte Crossposts können vom Moderations-Team unterdrückt werden).
Nutze Bots verantwortungsvoll und nur in engem Rahmen, um Spam zu vermeiden und einen Mehrwert für die Community zu schaffen.
Zeige dich von deiner besten Seite und pflege einen respektvollen sowie inklusiven Umgang miteinander.

Kommuniziere mit dem Moderations-Team in deutscher oder englischer Sprache, um eine effiziente und klare Kommunikation zu gewährleisten. Jegliche Meldungen, Einsprüche und Begründungen in 
anderen Sprachen müssen/können wir gegebenenfalls im Zweifel ablehnen, bzw. nicht bearbeiten.

holonet.social.text: Embrace Harmony (Respect Others): There is no room for emotional turmoil on Holonet Social. Strive for tranquility and foster an atmosphere of peace among all users.

Illuminate the Path (No Discrimination or Hate Speech): Ignorance has no place within our galactic community. Encourage the pursuit of knowledge, sharing wisdom and insights to enlighten and uplift one another.
Cultivate Serenity (No Harassment): Passion may fuel the stars, but seek serenity. Let calmness be your guide when interacting on Holonet Social.

Seek Enlightenment (No Spam): The pursuit of personal gain is not the way of Holonet Social. Instead, channel your energy towards acquiring knowledge and enlightenment, nurturing your own growth and that of others.
Embrace the Living Force (No Bots): A sentient being must create and maintain all accounts on Holonet Social. Automated droids will be disconnected from the network.
Guard the Peace (Report Issues): As members of Holonet Social, we bear the duty of safeguarding peace within our galaxy. Be vigilant and report issues to the Magistrate.

honeycomb.engineer.text: No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
No xenophobia, nationalism, casteism, or fascism; No sympathizing with or advocating for these things.
No gore or graphic violence. Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning).

No stalking or harassment. In general, if someone asks you to stop interacting with them, then stop. Stalking, harassment, hate speech, or doxing that is posted to other instances or on other social media platforms is still grounds for having your account terminated here.
No posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information ("doxing").
No promotion of conspiracy theories (eg anti-vax, anti-mask, anti-COVID).

hoosier.social.text: Hoosier.Social is inclusive to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.  Racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia (including misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy") are forbidden & posts that violate this rule will be removed.
Please keep our space safe for all and family friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

Hoosier.Social Admins have unilateral authority and judgment over users that violate rules.  Users can be immediately suspended without appeal.  Admins will de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
Users should not assume privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including direct messages, are publicly visible.
These rules can be changed or updated at any time by Hoosier.Social Admins.
By joining Hoosier.Social you agree to these rules.

hydrate.space.text:
请务必阅读以下规则，不长，但很有用。
以下为本实例规则，当您注册时则代表您赞成或接受规则条例。
请认真阅读，这有助于塑造良好的讨论环境。

禁止 以任何的形式发布 对任何群体的侮辱性、仇恨性言论，及违反社会公德与伦理的内容。
禁止 以非私密形式发布 未经核实的、易煽动情绪、易挑拨群体对立的内容。

禁止 骚扰任何用户。
禁止 对任何用户发送带有不受欢迎的性暗示、令人感到不安的内容。

涉及现实政治、宗教、民族、地域等的内容应在发布时带有敏感内容标签。（即CW，Content Warning）
且可见性应当仅限于非公开，关注者可见或更私密。

不宜在工作场合浏览的内容（含有性暗示的内容等）应在发布时带有敏感内容标签/警告（即CW，Content Warning），还都应该使用恰当的CW标签描述，如：
该内容可能不适宜在公共场合浏览。
并且请将公开程度至少改为不列出或仅限关注者。否则可能会直接遭到警告，设置为敏感内容，隐藏或删除。
如果您的账号产出大量（定义：接近半数或更多的时间）的不适宜在公众场合浏览的内容，或产出直接的成年限制级内容，请您将账号更改为锁嘟，需要手动批准申请，否则可能会遭到警告，直接设置为锁嘟，或暂时冻结。

一些您可能会用到的设置。
个人资料-外观下可以设置锁嘟。
首选项-其他下可以设置默认把媒体文件标为隐藏。
发送嘟文时，CW字样或警铃图样为内容警告，地球图样为可见性（即公开 非公开等）
#技巧 话题下有更多的使用技巧。
#更新 话题下有更新报告和投票。

ijug.social.text: Der iJUG Interessenverbund der Java User Groups e.V. (iJUG) betreibt diese Mastodon-Instanz. Mitglieder des iJUG können nach Zulassung durch uns einen Account auf ijug.social einrichten.
Accountinhabende sind für Inhalte und den urheberrechts- und datenschutzkonformen Betrieb des Accounts verantwortlich.
Wir möchten einen respektvollen und konstruktiven Umgang miteinander pflegen. Vulgäre, menschenverachtende, diskriminierende oder beleidigende Beiträge werde nicht geduldet.

Der iJUG behält sich im Rahmen der Moderation vor, Accounts, welche diese Grundsätze oder gesetzliche Vorschriften verletzten, unter Angaben von Gründen vorrübergehend oder dauerhaft zu sperren oder zu löschen.
Sollte eine zufriedenstellende Moderation einmal nicht gelingen, gehe nicht einfach nur still weg, sondern sprich uns bitte an, damit sich alle Beteiligten bei uns wohlfühlen und einbringen können.

Das Anbieten von ijug.social als Instanz und die Zulassung von Accounts liegt im Ermessen des iJUG. Ein Anspruch auf Betrieb der Instanz oder die Zulassung gegenüber dem iJUG besteht nicht. Der iJUG behält sich die Änderung der Nutzungsbedingungen nach Ankündigung vor.

im-in.space.text: Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia) and fight in direct messages.

Please keep bad memes or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.  
Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

Not safe for work (NSFW) content is allowed if you put it behind both a #NSFW tag and add a content warning (the "CW" or warning button below the message text box). 
Content depicting sexualized minors (including drawn, a.k.a. loli/shota), self-harm, gore and forced acts is not allowed.
As stated in our ToS you must be 16 of age or more to use this instance.
Don't make parody accounts or try to impersonate someone or a group.

Accounts for for-profit companies or used for advertising only, SEO boosting, or SPAM will be suspended.
If you truly want to participate in the Fediverse, please ask the admin for permission before joining.

Please do not use a public anonymizer email service (like temporary boxes or forwarders). 
You will be asked to change your email under a time limit or will be suspended. Self-hosted forwarders are exempt of this rule.
No promotion of cryptocurrencies or NFTs. Commenting on the surrounding news about it is still allowed.

Please put politics and activism behind CWs when posting with the "public" visibility. A few times is OK but repetitive ignorance of this rule will result in a limitation of visibility of your account.
Respect Switzerland's (owner's country) and Germany's (server location) laws.

implausiblyaverage.online.text: Be kind. This is supposed to be a cool, fun place where we want people to feel welcome. You don't have to be nice all the time, but you do have to be kind.
Don't be a jerk. No bigotry of any kind, don't be an ass, don't harass or attack others, don't harass people off this instance, and don't make the instance worse.

Being on the instance is a privilege, not a right. If we think what you're doing harms the server, makes it worse, or generally makes people unwilling to be here, then you don't get to be part of the instance anymore.
Mods/Admins get the final say. This is an extension of rule 3, but we're going to mod to the best of our ability to keep the Implausibly Average community welcoming, kind, and fun.

indiepocalypse.social.text:
Free speech does not mean freedom from consequences.

No racism, sexism, queerphobia, transphobia, xenophobia or bigotry of any kind are allowed.
Indiepocalypse has a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, dogpiling, bullying or doxxing.
No NFTs, no crypto, no blockchain. There are crypto-related instances on the Fediverse that are better suited.
The following content will be removed and will result in revocation of access to the service: sexual depictions of minors, beastiality, and promotion of Nazi symbolism and ideology.
Promotion of your games, projects and storefronts *are* allowed and encouraged, but spam is not. Do *not* directly message users to advertise.
Bots need to be approved by the admins or moderators of Indiepocalypse before being allowed.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive an/or hidden under a Content Warning (CW) when posting. Because they cannot be marked, all avatars, headers, and bio content must be appropriate for all audiences.
Accounts for groups / organizations / brands / sites / doujin circles, et. al are welcome as long as they are indie. If you question if your group is "indie", feel free to ask!
AI-created and AI-altered art and writing is generally **not** allowed on this instance. There are valid ethical concerns regarding what material is being used to train models for AI bots.

inductive.space.text: No content that is illegal in Germany. No spam. No pornography.

Use content warnings for spoilers or sensitive subjects such as sexual content, violence, mental health, et cetera. Err on the side of caution, but please don't use content warnings as general subject line, use hashtags on top of your posts instead.

No commercial accounts, such as accounts used mainly for advertising a commercial entity, without approval.

infosec.exchange.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity.  One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.  Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world.  Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.

No attacks against (or from) the instance.

You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of Infosec.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.
For more details see https://wiki.infosec.exchange/rules/start
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop

Automated posting:
- accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a “bot” in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors
- automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to “public”. There is no limit on “unlisted” posts.

isocial.cloud.text: Using a disposable email address is not permitted.
It is prohibited to buy, sell, or transfer any account.
Please ensure that all bot accounts are properly marked and identified.
Do not Interfere with, disrupt, or create an undue burden on the Site or the networks or services connected to the Site.
Harassing, annoying, intimidating, or threatening any of our admins or agents engaged in providing any portion of the Site to you is strictly prohibited.
Don't bypass Site restrictions, including restricted sections. We take security seriously and need your cooperation to maintain a safe platform.
Copying or modifying the Site's software, which includes Flash, HTML, PHP, JavaScript, CSS, Ruby, PostgreSQL, and Redis, is strictly prohibited.

Violence, harassment, and other similar types of behavior discourage people from expressing themselves and ultimately diminish the value of global public conversation. Our rules are to ensure all people can participate in public conversation freely and safely.

The following content is prohibited on our platform: Violent Speech, Violent and Hateful Entities, Sexual Exploitation, Abuse/Harassment, Hateful Conduct, Perpetrators of Violent Attacks, Sensitive Media, Illegal or Regulated Goods or Services.

Private Information: You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as home phone number and address) without their express authorization and permission. We also prohibit threatening to expose private information or incentivizing others to do so.
You must not infringe on the intellectual property rights of others, including their copyright and trademarks.
It is prohibited to create accounts with the intention of replacing or imitating a suspended account.
It is unacceptable to impersonate an admin or a system account.
We will maintain certain data that you transmit to the Site for the purpose of managing the performance of the Site, as well as data relating to your use of the Site.
Although we perform regular routine backups of data, you are solely responsible for all data that you transmit or that relates to any activity you have undertaken using the Site.

You agree that we shall have no liability to you for any loss or corruption of any such data, and you hereby waive any right of action against us arising from any such loss or corruption of such data.
Using bots for malicious purposes is not permitted.
Content created by the use of AI must be disclosed.
Ai Profiles that solely share AI-generated content will not be tolerated.
You are not allowed to spam multiple reports for the same content.

You agree that by accessing the Site, you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by all of these Terms of Use. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ALL OF THESE TERMS OF USE, THEN YOU ARE EXPRESSLY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE SITE AND YOU MUST DISCONTINUE USE IMMEDIATELY.

julialang.social.text: By being here, you agree to follow the Julia Language Code of Coduct: https://julialang.org/community/standards/
Please do not use overtly sexual language or imagery.
Do not attack anyone based on any aspect of personal identity, including gender, sexuality, politics, religion, ethnicity, race, age, or ability.

Keep in mind that what you write or say in public forums is read or heard by many people who don't know you personally, so please refrain from making prejudiced or sexual jokes and comments – even ones that you might consider acceptable in private.
Ask yourself if a comment or statement might make someone feel unwelcomed or like an outsider.

In particular, do not sexualize the term "Julia" or any other aspects of the project. While "Julia" is a female name in many parts of the world, the programming language is not a person and does not have a gender.
All participants in the Julia community are expected to respect copyright laws and ethical attribution standards. This applies to both code and written materials, such as documentation or blog posts.
Materials that violate the law, are plagiaristic, or ethically dubious in some way will be removed from officially-maintained lists of resources.

If you believe one of these standards has been violated, you can either file an issue on an appropriate repository or confidentially contact the Julia Stewards at stewards@julialang.org. Keep in mind that most mistakes are due to ignorance rather than malice.

Be concise. Constructive criticism and suggestions are welcome, but high-traffic forums do not generally have the bandwidth for extensive discourse. Consider writing a blog post if you feel that you have enough to say on a particular subject.

We welcome the participation of researchers of all kinds in the Julia community. However, please remember that open source development is a social process and that the participants on the other side of any interaction are (obviously) humans.

If you are doing research on the community or its processes, you are likely performing Human Subjects Research (HSR) and are expected to abide by the highest standards of ethics and professional practice. Meeting this expectation is your responsibility.
We consider engaging in unethical research (human subject or otherwise) to be a cause for bans or other sanctions from the community.

The Julia community is built on a foundation of reciprocity and collaboration. Be aware that most community members contribute on a voluntary basis, so ideas and bug reports are ok, but demands are not.
If you have a conflict or concern that requires resolution, please contact the Julia Community Stewards

Of course, we can also socialize and talk about other topics, and it's ok. But if you plan to use mastodon ONLY for other topics, there are a lot of better servers for you out there.

karlsruhe-social.de.text:
Geht nett und freundlich miteinander um und respektiert einander.

Es ist eigentlich klar, trotzdem sei nochmal darauf hingewiesen: Das Internet ist kein rechtsfreier Raum. Auch hier und auf diesem Server gelten die deutschen und europäischen Gesetze und Verordnungen!

Es ist nicht erlaubt, sich mit Wegwerf- bzw. temporären E-Mailadressen an diesem Server anzumelden.
Der Betreiber dieses Mastodonservers hat das Recht, entsprechende Konten zu löschen.

English:
Be nice and friendly to each other and respect each other.
No insults or put-downs are accepted.
English: It is actually clear, but it should be pointed out again: The Internet is not a legal vacuum. German and European laws and regulations also apply here and on this server!

English: It is not permitted to log in to this server with disposable or temporary e-mail addresses.
The operator of this Mastodon server has the right to delete such accounts.

Español: Sé amable y cordial con los demás y respétate mutuamente.

Wir kommunizieren diskriminierungsfrei, gewaltfrei, respektvoll und wertschätzend.
Dabei legen wir von Betreiberseite einen besonderen Wert auf den Datenschutz, also den Schutz der Daten aller Menschen, die auf diesem Server unterwegs sind.

kei.fashion.text: The minimum age to join this server is 16 years old. If found to be younger, you will be banned.

Racial slurs, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities (including trans-exclusionary radical feminism), ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, and targeted harassment of any other kind is not allowed. Accounts flagged will be investigated and banned from the server.
Copyright protections still apply to images and other content. Please cite sources when reposting content. Content may be removed if the original creator requests.

DDLG, kink, sexual harassment, sexual interaction with minors, and other sexually explicit content is absolutely unpermitted on this server and are bannable offenses. This includes boosts to the server.
NSFW content is allowed but it cannot be sexually explicit content and must be properly tagged #NSFW and marked as sensitive with appropriate content wrappers.
No flooding of public timelines (making public posts in quick succession) You will potentially be flagged for spam.
Coordinate criticism is not allowed as default unless EXPLICITLY REQUESTED by the original poster.
Discussion & images regarding print replicas outside of an educational context (contrasts between original & fakes, how to avoid buying fakes, verifying a fake, etc.) are not permitted.

kind.social.text: Don't be an asshole, and don't post anything illegal. Those concepts guide most other rules & moderation.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, discrimination, ableism, harassment, conspiracists, trolls, etc. Please, also report this whenever seen.

Content Warnings & Sensitive Media labels are required for depictions of nudity, bloodshed, or extreme harm (NSFW.)
CWs, Alt Text, & PascalCase hashtags are encouraged to improve everyone's experiences, especially disabled users. However, policing or bullying people to use them is unacceptable.

No big corporate advertising, spam, or accounts.
No crypto advertising, spam, or accounts.
No "AI" advertising, spam, or accounts.
However, small businesses & independent creators, along with their self-promotion, are welcomed and encouraged.

Automated & Bot accounts must be labeled as such. If the account will be regularly posting more than 3 times a day, posts should be set as Unlisted by default to prevent clogging up the Local timeline.

Check out the admin's Pinned Posts for new user info like: app suggestions, moderation principles, Mastodon norms, & more. The admin's profile can be found at https://kind.social/@Texan_Reverend
If you have questions or want help configuring your account & app, Texan_Reverend is only an @ away.

kinky.business.text: Exclusively 18+. Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content.
Keep everything here consensual. No exceptions.
Do not flood the server with posts. No more than a small number of pictures in rapid succession. Violating it will get you silenced or suspended.
If you're posting a picture that's not yours, attribute it correctly. We like original content (text, pics, etc.) 100 times more than random porn off the Internet.
Use sensitive media flag *and* content warning (CW) for NSFW media. No full-on nudity in avatars.
Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

You're here to *be* here - the main purpose of an account on this instance should be to contribute to the community, not advertising a business or directing traffic elsewhere. Any advertisements should be unlisted or follower only.

Protect yourself.
No one will ask for your private information for any reason in the Apartment. Even including Kokoro-chan. Protect yourself against spam and online fraud.

No spammy content.
Please do not refer to sensitive content such as violence, harassment, and pornographic content. However, this rule is not strictly sentenced, since "spammy" is the main(and also a blurry) definition. If you can be sure the content will bring joy and not trouble, go ahead.

Það er bannað að vera með eða endurbirta hatursáróður. Dæmi: rasismi, transfóbía

Setjið innihaldsviðvörun á nekt. Auðvitað geta verið undantekningar þannig að þið notið dómgreindina.

Crypto (Bitcoin, NFT og þess háttar)

Ofbeldi og fólk í neyð

Notið innihaldsviðvaranir á efni sem inniheldur ofbeldi. Ekki deila myndum af fólki í neyð ef líkur eru á því að það vilji ekki að slíkt efni fari í dreifingu.

Engar falsfréttir

Breytingar á færslum

Það er mögulegt að breyta færslum á Mastodon. Vinsamlegast farið varlega í að breyta færslum sem þegar eru komnar í dreifingu (og búnar að fá endurbirtingar). Sumsé, ekki breyta færslum á villandi hátt þannig að meining þeirra breytist.

kraut.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

krigskunst.social.text: Du må skrive på det sprog, du vil. Du skal dog kunne kommunikere på dansk, som er serverens officielle sprog.

krefeld.life.text: Auf krefeld.life können sich Menschen aus Krefeld und vom Niederrhein sowie alle, die sich für Krefeld interessieren, finden und austauschen.

Hier wird über Veranstaltungen informiert und von Veranstaltungen berichtet. Es gibt Tipps rund um Kunst und Kultur, zu Gastronomie und Freizeitgestaltung und ihr könnt Kontakt zu anderen Krefelder:innen knüpfen.
Hier gehen Krefelder:innen immer freundlich und höflich miteinander um. Behandle andere Personen mit Respekt!

Das Persönlichkeitsrecht ist uns wichtig. Belästige und beleidige niemanden. Unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Veröffentliche keine sensible Information eines Menschen. Beachte das Recht am eigenen Bild.
Nimm keinen Kontakt zu einer Person auf, wenn du erwarten kannst, dass die Person keinen Kontakt wünscht. Verwende keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente oder schwarze Rhetorik!
Bitte keine Veröffentlichung, die niemand lesen will. Sexualisierte Inhalte, Pornographie oder nationalistische Propaganda führen zur Sperrung deines Accounts.

Es gibt keine bezahlte Werbung auf krefeld.life. Kulturschaffende Personen und Kultureinrichtungen sollen gern auf ihre Angebote hinweisen. Wir vertrauen auf das Fingerspitzengefühl von Geschäftsleuten und Gastronomiebetrieben! Plumpe Werbung ist unerwünscht und wird keine Leser:innen finden.

Beachtet das Urheberrecht! Die Veröffentlichung von Bildern, Texten, Video- und Audiodateien ohne ausdrückliches Einverständnis verletzt die Rechte der Fotograf:innen, Autor:innen und Kulturschaffenden.
Wir dulden keine Bots, die ohne explizite Anfrage mit Nutzern interagieren. Accounts, die eine falsche Identität vorgeben, sind unzulässig.
Bitte veröffentliche auf krefeld.life nur Beiträge in deutscher oder englischer Sprache. Andere Sprachen können wir zur Zeit nicht zulassen, weil uns eine zeitnahe Moderation nicht möglich wäre.

krpgpub.net.text: RPG주점은 RPG와 각종 관심사를 올리기 위해 만든 인스턴스지만, 그 밖의 내용도 대부분 자유롭게 올릴 수 있습니다. 다만...
RPG주점은 약자와 소수자를 향한 차별과 멸시를 금지합니다.
RPG 주점은 대부분의 정치적, 사회적 발언을 금지하지 않지만, 극우/우파 세력에 대한 지지는 금지합니다. 관리자는 이들이 인권과 노동 환경을 위협하는 세력이라고 판단합니다.
연합 우주 내 특정한 개인이나 집단에 대한 비판은 “미등재” (연합우주 타임라인 제외)로 올리기를 권장합니다. 만약 연합 우주 내에서 혐오발언이 보이면 직접 대응하는 대신 신고 기능을 적극 이용해 주세요.
보기 불쾌한 내용이나 민감한 주제, 비속어가 들어간 내용은 CW 기능 사용을 권장합니다.
2번과 3번 사항을 위반할 경우에는 제재를 실시합니다. 제재의 정도는 위반 정도, 구체적 피해자의 유무에 따라 글 삭제부터 차단, 정지까지 이릅니다.
4번과 5번 사항 위반은 기본적으로 제재 사항이 아니나, 사이버불링의 위험이 있거나 단시간 내에 반복적으로 글을 쓴다고 관리자가 판단하는 경우에는 (이 부분은 관리자가 임의로 판단할 수 밖에 없으니 양해 부탁드립니다) 제재에 들어갈 수 있습니다.
그 밖의 기타 사항(스팸 글 등)에 관해서는 관리자가 임의로 판단 후 처리하겠습니다.

kurry.social.text:
This Server is for Furries who can use Korean. The account may be suspended if the IP is located in a country other than Korea or if you write in a language other than Korean.
이 서버는 한국어를 하거나 읽고 쓸 수 있는 사람 전용 인스턴스입니다. IP의 소재지가 한국 이외 국가이거나 한국어 이외의 언어로 글을 작성하면 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다.
타인을 모욕하거나 괴롭히는 등 평화롭지 못한 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 반달리즘, 트랜스포빅, 사칭 등이 여기에 포함됩니다.

다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 내용은 CW/NSFW 표시를 꼭 해주세요. 
예시로는: 고어물, 과도한 성적 묘사, 잔혹한 묘사, 과도한 빛의 반짝임 등이 있습니다.
사전에 승낙을 득 하지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다. 사전 승낙은 @kurry 로 Direct 툿 부탁드립니다.
성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다.

"이상한 짓"을 하지 말아주세요!
(다음 것들이 포함 - 그러나 국한되지 않은)되어 있습니다: 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 것 등등
실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 위배되는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.
특정 문화를 강요하거나, 행동을 강요하지 마세요. 단, 서버 규칙 및 기타 관련 법규는 준수하셔야 합니다.
본 서버는 “퍼리 특화” 서버입니다. (5531) 서버를 제대로 들어왔는지 확인해 주신 후 가입 절차를 진행해 주세요.
가입 사유 작성란 시작 부분에, 규칙 안에 숨어 있는 4자리 숫자 코드를 입력해주세요. 이 코드는 논퍼리들이 규칙을 읽고 가입에 동의하였음을 증명하기 위한 코드로 사용되며, 가입 사유로 퍼리임을 확인할 수 없고 코드가 없는 경우 가입이 거부됩니다.

lawfedi.blue.text: Do not discriminate against discrete, insular, minorities.

Advocacy directed to inciting or producing imminent lawless action and is likely to incite or produce such action falls clearly outside the bounds of First Amendment protection and will result in moderation action.
Spamming others is an act of non-excellence. Thus, spammers will be banished.
Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and casteism are not allowed as they fail to meet the excellence threshold. See supra Rule 1.
Do not post content that is unlawful in the United States, the state of New York, or the state of Florida.
Do not create or share misinformation. It is low value speech that falls outside the protection of the freedom of speech and will result in moderation action.
Place adult content behind a content warning and flag such images as sensitive.
Must be 18 years of age or older to join this server.

lawsocial.org.text: Minimum age: Users must be aged 18 years or older to register for an account.
Free Speech: We encourage our members to engage in meaningful discussions on social, legal and political issues.
No abuse based on descent: Any abuse or threat to individuals or a community based on descent like caste, religion, race, gender or place of birth  will not be tolerated on this server.
No casteist speech: No untouchability or caste superiority or reinforcing caste prejudices or  mocking/abusing anyone based on their caste is allowed.
No queerphobia, transphobia, xenophobia or anti-semitism permitted.

No hate speech allowed that abuses, harms or insults based on real or perceived “identity factors” of an individual or a group, including: “caste, religion, ethnicity, nationality, race, color, descent, gender” and also characteristics such as language, disability, health or sexual orientation.
Trigger Warning: Consider adding content warnings to your posts about controversial subjects or commonly-held phobias.
Criticism, parody, comedy or self expression through creative outlets that offends other server rules will be allowed.

No harassment of others or organize, promote, or participate in harassment. Disagreements happen and are normal, but making continuous, repetitive, or severe negative comments or circumventing a block or ban can cross the line into harassment.

Do not make threats of violence or threaten to harm others. This includes indirect or suggestive threats, as well as sharing or threatening to share someone’s personally identifiable information (also known as doxxing). If you notice any instances of such threats, please report.
No advertising, spam or excessive promotion: We encourage sharing research outputs and publications for discussions but please do not treat it as Linkd.in (job hosting/finding platform).
No promotion or support of violent extremism. This also includes glorifying violent events, the perpetrators of violent acts, or similar behaviors.

No sexualizing of children: You cannot share content or links which depict children in a pornographic, sexually suggestive, or violent manner, including illustrated or digitally altered pornography that depicts children (such as lolicon, shotacon, or cub) and conduct grooming behaviors.

Anti-sex worker perspectives or advocation against sex workers and discrimination or advocation against genders and sexual minorities is prohibited. Every "unpopular opinion" should be expressed in a respectful and civil manner.
Do not share content that glorifies or promotes suicide or self-harm on LawSocial, including any encouragement to others to cut themselves or embrace eating disorders such as anorexia or bulimia.

Do not share false or misleading information that can cause physical or societal harm. We may remove content if we reasonably believe its spread could result in damage to physical infrastructure, injury of others, obstruction of participation in civic processes, or the endangerment of public health.
We prohibit any sort of self-harm threats used as a form of emotional manipulation or coercion.
We prohibit promotion of scams, including web3/crypto and other ponzi schemes.
We prohibit impersonation of other people, companies, organizations, brands, etc.

We prohibit distributing or providing access to content involving the hacking, cracking, or distribution of stolen goods, pirated content, or accounts. This includes sharing or selling game cheats or hacks.
We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant.
If five toots or more are removed in a period of three months or less, then the user account will be suspended for six months.

leds.social.text:
This is a Civilized Place for Public Discussion
Please treat this server with the same respect you would a public park. We, too, are a shared community resource — a place to share skills, knowledge and interests through ongoing conversation.

Improve the Discussion
The topics discussed here matter to us, and we want you to act as if they matter to you, too. Be respectful of the topics and the people discussing them, even if you disagree with some of what is being said.

Be Agreeable, Even When You Disagree
You may wish to respond to something by disagreeing with it. That’s fine. But remember to criticize ideas, not people. Please avoid:

Name-calling
Ad hominem attacks
Responding to a post’s tone instead of its actual content
Knee-jerk contradiction

Always Be Civil
Don’t post anything that a reasonable person would consider offensive, abusive, or hate speech.
Keep it clean. Don’t post anything obscene or sexually explicit.
Respect each other. Don’t harass or grief anyone.
Don’t post spam.

legal.social.text: Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird als privates Hobby ohne Garantie für Verfügbarkeit betrieben. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf jederzeit funktionierenden Zugang zum Konto. Downtimes (Updates, Wartung, Migration etc) werden - soweit möglich - vorher angekündigt.

Es ist grundsätzlich jedermensch willkommen, egal welcher politischen, religiösen oder sexuellen Ausrichtung und geschlechtlicher Identität. Bei beleidigendem, diskriminierendem oder schlicht nervtötendem Verhalten werden die Admins (auch ohne Ankündigung) Accounts sanktionieren oder deaktivieren.

Wer meint, Transfrauen seien keine Frauen, wer denkt, man könne als Mann heute ja gar keine Komplimente mehr machen oder wer glaubt, es gäbe "Rassismus gegen Weiße", ist auf dieser Instanz falsch. Diese Instanz ist gedacht als Safe Space. Von diesem Ideal lassen sich die Admins leiten.

Es wird erwartet, dass alle Nutzenden in der Lage sind, sich selbst zur Wehr zu setzen und Querelen unter einander zu klären. Die Meinungsfreiheit erlaubt zwar auch hitzigen Debatten, die Admins lassen sich aber nicht von "false balance" leiten. Werden Grenzen überschritten, gelten Ziffern 2. und 3.

lepoulsdumonde.com.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

lewacki.space.text: Absolutny zakaz rasizmu, ksenofobii, seksizmu, klasizmu, LGBTQ-fobii oraz innych niefajnych rzeczy uderzających w słabsze jednostki.

Brak absolutorium wolności słowa. Jeśli uważasz, że pole do dyskusji należy zapewnić każdemu, nawet osobom z najbardziej totalitarnymi poglądami, to prawdopodobnie nie będziesz się czuć w tym miejscu dobrze.

Pro-inkluzywnie. Na serwerze respektujemy różne zaimki osobowe, wspieramy feminatywy, neutratywy, osobatywy i inne formy. Jeśli to tylko możliwe, wypełniaj w wrzucanych zdjęciach tekst alternatywny. Jeżeli to konieczne, korzystaj z funkcji CW/TW. To ważne dla braku wykluczenia.

Instancja skierowana jest przede wszystkim do osób lewicowych, jednak nie banujemy osób o innych poglądach. Jeżeli nie przeszkadza Ci to, a zamierzasz respektować inne zasady serwera, czuj się jak u siebie.
