mastodns.net.text: Posts on MastoDNS must comply with the DNS-OARC Code of Conduct, which is available here: https://www.dns-oarc.net/oarc/policies/conduct
When participating, treat others with tolerance, respect and courtesy, regardless of who they are and who you are.
Do not use language which is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, uses slurs, or is otherwise discriminatory.
Do not use personal attacks in discussion with others.  Vigorous debate is welcome, but ad hominem does nothing to advance an open exchange of ideas.
Content which is illegal or endangers the safety of others is prohibited.
Do not harass anyone, or participate in group harassment of anyone.  Posting—or threatening to post—other people's personally identifying information ("doxing") constitutes harassment.

Do not post adult content, or sexually explicit material (including pictures containing nudity).  This includes sexualized comments or jokes.  Posts including unwelcome sexual attention constitute harassment.
Do not post about controversial or sensitive subjects without a Content Warning.

Do not police your fellow users.  You may feel a user has violated our standards or rules, but you should block them or report them for admins to handle.  Starting an argument among users only serves to add noise to the signal.
Do not debate moderation actions in public posts.  If you disagree with how a moderator enforced these rules, you may direct-message the moderation team or email mastodon@dns-oarc.net.

mastodo.neoliber.al.text: Be civil: don't flame, harass, doxx, or dogpile. When disagreeing with others, don't resort to name calling or bad faith arguments.
Be decent: don't post obscene or offensive content such as porn, gore, or sexualization of minors. Anything potentially shocking should be put behind adequate content warnings
Be woke: don't post bigoted content and don't glorify or advocate for violence
Be law-abiding: don't post any content illegal under US laws such as copyrighted material
Be a good neighbor: don't cause trouble with Reddit or other Fediverse instances
Be honest: don't post deliberate misinformation unless it's really funny like convincing someone to eat the stickers on fruit
Don't spam: treat the Fediverse as a place for conversation, not a captive audience
Other: Feel free to report content that doesn't violate the letter of the rules, and please understand that mods may take action even when content doesn't break the letter of the rules

mastodaix.de.text: Sexuell eindeutige oder gewalttätige Medien müssen bei der Einstellung als sensibel gekennzeichnet werden.
Kein Rassismus, Sexismus, Homophobie, Transphobie, Fremdenfeindlichkeit oder Kastendenken.
Keine Aufforderung zur Gewalt oder Förderung von Gewaltideologien.

Keine absichtlich falschen oder irreführenden Informationen verbreiten.

mastodon-belgium.be.text:
Be nice to each other. No shitposting on this server.
Trolls will not be tolerated. Please act in a civilized manner.
No porn, explicit or violent media, racism, sexism, fascism, homophobia, or any other form of abusive behavior, harassment or hate speech.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No doxxing of users. Any form of harassment will not be tolerated.
No content illegal in Belgium or, by extension, EU law.

No intentional spreading of fake news, false information or misleading content.
This includes attempts to impersonate Mastodon staff.

Politics and religion is tolerated but discouraged. Please use a Content Warning if you do post them.
Whatever your political or religious view may be is your concern but we'd appreciate it if you wouldn't use this platform to plaster it in other people's faces.

Please don't bring discussions from other Social Media channels over to Mastodon.
If you want to discuss a topic, please do it on the originating side.

If you're a commercial or government entity or you represent one, please consider hosting your own Mastodon instance.
This instance is set up and paid for by volunteers in order to give users access to the Fediverse.
It's not intended to be used as a commercial or governmental platform.

This is a private Mastodon instance, access to this server is a privilege and not a right.
The right to access and/or use this server may be revoked at any given time.

Interpretation of these rules is up to the server's admin discretion and is not open for discussion.
They may change without prior notice.

mastodon-qu.net.text: エチケットを守った書き込み、活用をお願いします

このサーバーは今のところ有志の寄付でなりたっております。将来的には広告の空きスペースへの掲載も検討していますが、いまのところそのように運営されているため、ある日突然止まる可能性も否めません。ご了承ください。

mastodom.social.text: Exclusively 18+. Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content.
Keep everything here consensual. No exceptions.
If you're posting a picture that's not yours, attribute it correctly. We like original content (text, pics, etc.) 100 times more than random porn off the Internet.
Use sensitive media flag *and* content warning (CW) for NSFW media. No full-on nudity in avatars.
Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

You're here to *be* here - the main purpose of an account on this instance should be to contribute to the community, not advertising a business or directing traffic elsewhere. Any advertisements should be unlisted or follower only.

mastodon-blablalinux.be.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

mastodon.acm.org.text: Be professional. Maintain high standards of professional competence, conduct, and ethical practice when sharing and discussing work related to computing. Know and respect existing rules pertaining to professional work.

Be respectful.
Respect the work required to produce new ideas, inventions, creative works, and computing artifacts. Respect privacy. Honor confidentiality.

Be inclusive.
Diversity and inclusion are central to ACM's mission. We do not tolerate any kind of discrimination against anyone because of their age, gender, race, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation, or any other distinguishing characteristic or trait.

Be accessible.
We encourage you to adopt inclusive practices when posting your content. Best practices include providing alternative text for media, and more.

Be honest.
Computing professionals should be honest about their qualifications and forthright about any circumstances that may lead to either real or perceived conflicts of interest.

Be friendly.
Feel free to be conversational, personal, and fun! Fill up your profile page to tell us who you are, use computing-related hashtags to increase discoverability outside of this server. Engage with other users' content by meaningful re-tooting and commenting.

mastodon.altearn.xyz.text: « La loi, c’est la loi, on veut pas finir en taule » : vous devez respecter la loi, que celle-ci soit bien faite ou stupide, sinon nous pourrions vous suspendre ou supprimer votre compte et vos données
« Soyez poli·es et respectueux·ses » : merci de respecter les autres utilisateur·ices et nos bénévoles, sinon nous supprimerons votre contenu, voire vos accès

« Si ça casse, on est pas obligé de réparer » : Altearn est géré par des bénévoles, et propose des services gratuits. Si jamais ils cassent un jour, désolé mais ça arrive. On promet de faire ce qu’on peut pour éviter ça, mais on ne se met aucune obligation de résultat.

« Si vous n’êtes pas content·es, allez voir ailleurs » : Si le service que nous fournissons ne vous convient pas, nous vous invitons à chercher un équivalent ou à monter le vôtre. Cela dit, on peut peut-être vous aider pour monter votre service, n’hésitez pas à demander 🙂

« Tout abus sera puni » : Si un·e utilisateur·ice abuse d’un de nos services, nous pourrons suspendre ou supprimer son compte. C’est nos services, donc on est les seuls à décider ce qu’est un « abus ». Et si ça vous paraît anti-démocratique, ou quoique ce soit, référez-vous à la règle précédente.

« Rien n’est éternel » : Les services peuvent fermer, temporairement (maintenance, attaque) ou définitivement (faute de sous). Cela dit, on essaiera de prévenir en avance dans tous les cas, mais on ne promet rien.

mastodon.alvani.me.text: All NSFW or graphic content must be tagged.

mastodon.andreafortuna.org.text: Respect the Law: Any activities or content that are illegal under local, national, or international law are strictly prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to, the distribution of illegal substances, harassment, hate speech, and any form of exploitation or abuse.
No Harassment or Bullying: Harassment, bullying, or any form of personal attacks are not tolerated. Treat all members with respect and kindness.
Protect Privacy: Do not share personal information about other users without their explicit consent. Respect everyone's privacy and confidentiality.
Content Warnings: Use content warnings (CW) for potentially sensitive or triggering content. This includes, but is not limited to, graphic violence, explicit content, and other disturbing materials.
Spam and Advertising: Spamming and excessive self-promotion are discouraged. If you wish to promote a product or service, please do so in a respectful and non-intrusive manner.
Intellectual Property: Respect copyright and intellectual property laws. Do not share or distribute content that you do not have the rights to.
Report Violations: If you encounter content or behavior that violates these guidelines, report it to the moderators. We rely on the community to help maintain a safe and welcoming environment.
Be Kind and Thoughtful: Our community thrives on positivity and mutual respect. Engage in thoughtful discussions, be open to different perspectives, and contribute to a welcoming atmosphere.

mastodon.antisocial.science.text: 根據伺服器所在地區的法規。猥褻、色情、惡意、謠言、種族主義的相關言論，將受到限制或禁止。尤其禁止與納粹相關的言論和圖片在互聯網上的傳播。
以下行為可能受到站務警告或封禁：惡意騷擾，攻擊其它用戶；在本站公開時間軸發佈未進行敏感標記的成人信息；在本站公開時間軸刷屏推廣垃圾信息。但除此之外，僅僅是言論的不同，並不能成為站務級封禁的理由。
為節約運營成本，不建議將本站作爲圖床使用。希望大家上傳媒體文件時，體積不要太大。

mastodon.app.stefanberggren.se.text: Just be civil to people, assume a positive attitude.
Never write or boost any disturbing or annoying content. I understand that different people, countries and social circles have different social norms.
I will block you, or your server if it causes to much disturbance for me and this server users.
Unwanted content (cached on this server) may be purged for privacy, legal or just well-being reasons.
Expect these rules to change over time

mastodon.archive.org.text: Code of Conduct. Employees using the Internet Archive Mastodon server are expected to follow the code of conduct provided by Internet Archive Human Resources.

mastodon.archfiend.org.text:
Don't be a shithead.

"Being a shithead" includes, but is not limited to, being racist, sexist, misogynist, transphobic, homophobic, queerphobic, etc.

Be kind to, and respectful and considerate of, others.

"Being kind to, and respectful and considerate of, others" includes, but is not limited to, not exhibiting shithead behavior, using content warnings appropriately, and providing meaningful alt text for uploaded images.
Don't do anything on this server that will get you, me, or any other admins in legal trouble in any applicable jurisdictions.
These rules are not intended to be exhaustive; behavior not specifically prohibited is not necessarily allowed.  Admins are the sole judges of compliance with the rules.

Finally, as previously stated, this is a private instance.  Accounts are given only to trusted friends of the administration.  Requests from people not meeting this description will be summarily ignored.

mastodon.arch-linux.cz.text: Žádné podněcování k násilí nebo propagace násilných ideologií
Žádný rasismus, dětskou pornografii a vše co porušuje české zákony.
Buďte k sobě slušní. Prosím zachovejte zde slušnost. Vulgární a urážlivé příspěvky budou správci skupiny bez upozornění smazány.

Respektujte druhé. Netolerujeme žádné posměšné, urážlivé nebo nenávistné komentáře týkající se rasy, náboženství, kultury, sexuální orientace, pohlaví, identity, ani politické příslušnosti a dalších věcí. Respektujte odlišnost názorů i životních postojů druhých.
Žádné obtěžování, dogpiling nebo doxxing ostatních uživatelů
Nesdílejte záměrně nepravdivé nebo zavádějící informace

mastodon.art.text: No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion .
Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, graphic nudity, lewd content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).
No trolling, microaggressions, bullying, or harassment. See the Code of Conduct for the full list.
No unapproved bots, corporate advertising, or spam (this does *not* mean your shop links and commission pages! Please share those often!).
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.
No AI-generated imagery allowed at all
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).

mastodon.app.araneum.org.text: You have to be an Araneum member in good standing

mastodon.arnos-vale.net.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance.
You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this server, service, the users of the service or their data.
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.

Automated posting:
- Accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a “bot” in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to all.
- Automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to “public”. There is no limit on “unlisted” posts.

mastodon.bachgau.social.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich und behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden! Unterlasse unbedingt persönliche Angriffe. Nicht allein und auch nicht als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von Personen-identifizierenden Informationen wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Respektiere den Wunsch von Nutzer:innen nicht kontaktiert zu werden, wenn die Person es angegeben hat.
Nationalistische Propaganda und Nazi-Symbolik werden auf diesem Server NICHT! geduldet. Auch die Förderungen der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus sind verboten!
Poste oder Teile keine pornografischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Witze und Kommentare mit pornografischen oder sexualisierten Inhalten sind unerwünscht.
Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung dürfen nicht veröffentlicht werden. Wir definieren kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang mit dem Zweck des direkten oder indirekten Geldverdienens.
Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus, Killerphrasen sind unerwünscht.
Die Befürwortung oder Nutzung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher oder anderweitig diskriminierender sowie hasserfüllter Sprache dulden wir nicht.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.
Poste keine nachgewiesenen Falschinformationen, Fakenews und Verschwörungstheorien.
Die erlaubten Sprachen sind Deutsch und Englisch.
Rules
Always be kind and polite and treat others with respect.

Do not harass or insult anyone! Absolutely refrain from personal attacks. Not alone and not as a group. Posting or threatening to post personally identifiable information will be considered harassment.
Respect the user's wish not to be contacted if the person has indicated so.
Nationalist propaganda and Nazi symbolism are NOT allowed on this server! tolerated. The promotion of the ideology of National Socialism is also forbidden!
Do not post or share pornographic or sexualized content. Jokes and comments with pornographic or sexualized content are undesirable.
Spam or commercial advertising must not be published. We define commercial advertising in this context with the purpose of making money directly or indirectly.
Pseudo-arguments, black rhetoric or sophism, killer phrases are undesirable.
We do not tolerate the endorsement or use of racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-disabled or otherwise discriminatory or hateful language.
Adhere to the laws applicable in Germany.
Do not post proven false information, fake news and conspiracy theories.
The permitted language is German or English

mastodon.bandshell.rocks.text:
Respect:
Treat others as you would wish to be treated: Do not insult, bully or discriminate. If you can't say something without being racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, etc, don't say it here at all.
Opinions: You are entitled to your own opinion. Nobody else is entitled to your opinion. You may be entitled to free speech, but everybody else is entitled to the freedom of not listening to you.
Membership: Only real people are allowed on this server. When you ask for an account, you will need to tell us who you are, and then we will check you out.
Privacy: We do not use your personal data in any way. We do not sell it. We do not use it for advertising. We do not allow anyone else to access it or use it.
Trust: Whilst everybody loves a good Road Story, if you are presenting something as fact, make sure it is, or we will call you out on it.

mastodon.beer.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Mastodon.Beer community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Please post in English, at least for initial posts. The admin only speaks English. Until or unless that changes, this will make dealing with any issues or concerns simpler.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning. Content Warnings are also a kindness. Think of them as opt-in hash tags that might save someone creating an opt-out via a filter.
Do not “shitpost” which is defined as: "to post off-topic, false, or offensive contributions to an online forum with the intent to derail the discussion or provoke other participants".
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people. You do not have to be nice, you are asked to try to be kind.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Mastodon.Beer, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

mastodon.berlin.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt. Grundsätzlich gilt, dass Verstöße gegen das deutsche und EU-Recht auch hier nicht erlaubt sind.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet

Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht. Dazu gehört auch, sich als eine andere (z.B. prominente) Person auszugeben und in deren Namen zu posten. Das Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung endet dort, wo Gesetze gebrochen werden.

Werbung wird ausschließlich als klar ersichtliche Ausnahme toleriert, d.h. nur in dem Spezialfall, dass ein Nutzer hier üblicherweise Beiträge mit nicht werbenden Hauptinhalten veröffentlicht. 
Im Sinne aller Nutzer können admin-seitig Ausnahmen mit Sponsoren zur Kostendeckung vereinbart werden.

Verbreitung, auch teilen, insbesondere von Äußerungen, die faschistischem oder dem sog. "Qanon"-Umfeld zuzurechnen sind, führt - ohne Distanzierung davon - unter Berücksichtigung sonstiger Postings des jeweiligen Users ggf. zur sofortigen, unwideruflichen Löschung des verbreitenden Userkontos.

Beiträge, die nicht in lateinischen Buchstaben verfasst sind, werden nur ausnahmsweise geduldet. In jedem Fall werden in größerer Zahl am Stück auftretende Beiträge in anderen Buchstaben ggf. ohne inhaltliche Prüfung gelöscht, da ihre Moderation nicht zumutbar ist.
Posts in Form von Linklisten, die als Werbung anzusehen sind, werden gelöscht. Accounts, die als erste oder einzige Posts solche Listen enthalten, werden ohne Vorwarnung gesperrt.
NO ACCOUNTS OF CASINO, BITCOIN, LOTTO or any gambling else, NO ACCOUNTS OF NON-EUROPEAN LANGUAGE (non latin letters) WILL BE APPEROVED !!!! Any Spamming accounts are DELETED IMMEDETELY!!
All registrations of users using non-european letters will be DELETED immediately
All registrations of bet- platforms or any other spam platforms (esp. vietnamese, thai, chinese, russian ) will be DELETED immediately
All obviously only-commercial registrations obviously without any benefit for the community will be DELETED immediately !

mastodon.boston.text: The following lists the prohibitions on this instance that may result in post moderation or account restriction or banning:
Violence: You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people. We also prohibit the glorification of violence.
Terrorism/violent extremism: You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism.
Child sexual exploitation: We have zero tolerance for child sexual exploitation
Abuse/harassment: You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so. This includes wishing or hoping that someone experiences physical harm.

Hateful conduct: You may not promote violence against, threaten, or harass other people on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.

Perpetrators of violent attacks: We will remove any accounts maintained by individual perpetrators of terrorist, violent extremist, or mass violent attacks, and may also remove accounts disseminating manifestos or other content produced by perpetrators.
Suicide or self-harm: You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.

Sensitive media, including graphic violence and adult content: You may not post media that is excessively gory or share violent or adult content within profile or header images. Media depicting sexual violence and/or assault is also not permitted.

Illegal or certain regulated goods or services: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or in furtherance of illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.

Spam / Intrusive Commerical Content: While business and brands are encouraged to create accounts, spam and unsolicited commercial content will not be tolerated.  For example, creating posts is ok, but creating posts and tagging people you don't have a pre-existing relationship with is not allowed.

mastodon.bot.text: Discrimination: No racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, hateful, harmful, xenophobic, or similar activity.
Disinformation: No false or misleading information.
Spam: Commercial advertising is banned. Any excessive promotion is banned. This includes excessive use of hashtags.
Harrassment: Do not harrass anyone or contribute to personal attacks. Do not post any personally identifying information of others (“doxxing”).
Aggression: Do not be aggressive or antagonistic. Do not provoke confrontation.
Impersonation: Never impersonate another person, service, brand, etc.
Adult content: Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or NSFW content, even with content warnings.
Be a good bot. Abide by our Rules for Bots.

mastodon.bsd.cafe.text:
Be Respectful: 
Treat all members with respect and kindness. Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or any form of bullying will not be tolerated.
Respect Privacy: Do not share personal information of others without their explicit consent. Protect your privacy and exercise caution when sharing personal data.
Copyright and Licensing: Respect copyright and licensing agreements. Only share content that you have the right to use and distribute.
No Trolling or Flame Wars: Avoid engaging in flame wars, trolling, or intentionally provoking other users. Disagreements are fine, but keep discussions civil.
Report Abuse: If you encounter any violations of the server rules or witness inappropriate behavior, please report it to the moderators for prompt action.
No Malicious Activities: Do not engage in any illegal or malicious activities, including but not limited to hacking, spreading malware, or inciting violence.
Follow Instance-Specific Guidelines: In addition to these rules, follow any instance-specific guidelines posted by the administrators.

mastodon.cameko.org.text: Membership to the server is limited to the administrator of the server and to directly known friends.  If you are looking to join a Mastodon server but are not part of this group, I recommend using either https://mastodon.social or any of the other open membership Mastodon servers.

If you are a member of the server and would like a user added, please contact me. I can send out invites if given an email, and/or approve users if they have already applied.
If you need a server hard blocked, please contact the administrator.
The administrator of the server reserves the right to moderate content on this server as required by the laws of the jurisdiction of the location of the server (currently, the United States).

PLEASE LIMIT/AVOID DISCLOSING PII OR CRITICAL SECRETS ON THIS SERVER! Server administration is limited, and I cannot guarantee absolute protection of data here. If you need to communicate private data, I strongly recommend a different encrypted mechanism.

mastodon.bv.linksjugend-solid.de.text: Wir dulden kein diskriminierendes Verhalten und keine Inhalte, die die Benachteiligung oder Unterdrückung von Mitgliedern von marginalisierten Gruppen fördern oder befürworten.
Keine Bedrohungen, weder Hass noch Hetze, Stalking oder Doxxing.

Keine Belästigung anderer, einschließlich des organisierten Vorgehens in Gruppen oder jede Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit Nutzer*innen, die deutlich gemacht haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Kein Mobbing; das schließt Beschimpfungen, absichtliches Misgendern oder Deadnaming ein.
Keine nationalistische Propaganda und keinen Antisemitismus

Tröts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen CWs (Inhaltswarnungen) für Gewalt, Sex, Tod und Krankheit. Das sind nur die Kategorien, eine CW könnte also z.B. “Gewalt, Gegendemo Leipzig” sein. (Siehe die Erläuterung auf der “Über”-Seite.)
Tröts auf der lokalen Timeline benötigen Bildbeschreibungen.
Keine automatisierten Accounts (außer von der Moderation abgenickt). Das gilt insbesondere für Bots, Crossposter, Feedposter usw.
Handlungen, die darauf abzielen, diese Instanz (sei es die Technik, den Ruf oder die Sicherheit) zu schädigen, können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Accounts führen.
Bitte gebt Quellen zu allen Inhalten an, die nicht eure eigenen Werke sind. Das meinen wir ernst.
Bitte zitiert nicht großflächig aus urheberrechtlich geschützten Artikeln. Das kann uns in rechtliche Schwierigkeiten bringen. Als Zitate in dem Sinne gelten auch (lange) Artikelscreenshots.
Andere Nutzer*innen der Instanz zu screenshotten, damit heimlich übereinander zu lästern und dergleichen mehr ist extrem toxischer Twitter-Stil, den wir hier nicht wollen.
Keine Regel, aber ein Rat zu eurer eigenen Sicherheit: Schaltet in euren Web-Einstellungen unter Konto die Zwei-Faktor-Authentisierung (2FA) ein. Wir helfen euch gerne bei der Einrichtung.
Bitte lest unsere vollständigen Regeln und das erwartete Verhalten unter https://ljs.social/about

mastodon.caputoweb.eu.org.text: Una regola: non ci sono regole!

mastodon.catwuschel.com.text:
In  Catwuschel akzeptieren wir kein Mobbing o.ä., also
kein Kopieren und Imitieren von Tröts,
Verbreiten von Lügen und Gerüchten bis hin zu Verleumdung,
Shitstorms gegen uns
Derartiges Verhalten gegen uns führt zum sofortigen Block von der Instanz, auch server-übergreifend.

Nicht toleriert werden:
Belästigung, Stalking, Doxxing
Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Orientierungen
Gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten
Trigger im allgemeinen sind zu vermeiden, deshalb keine sexuellen oder gewalttätigen Inhalte.

Catwuschel versteht sich als Instanz, auf der wir *gemeinsam* entscheiden, wie wir mit Verstößen gegen unsere Regeln und Instanz-übergreifendem Mobbing gegen uns umgehen. Instanzübergreifende Blocks werden ausdrücklich durchgeführt werden.

mastodon.cemea.org.text: Cette instance Mastodon est destinée à accueillir des comptes de salarié·e·s ou militant·e·s des Ceméa. mastodon.cgx.me.text: La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdite toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Sont interdites les avances ou propositions à caractère sexuel non-sollicitées.

Sont interdits les propos intentionnellement diffamatoires ou calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (les contenus et comptes parodiques et/ou satyriques clairement identifiés sont donc autorisés).
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.

Les contenus pornographiques ou représentant des violences physiques doivent être marqués avec un CW (Content Warning) indiquant clairement leur nature. Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Est interdite l'utilisation d'un service de crossposting dont un compte de cette instance est la destination.
Est interdite également la création de bots sur cette instance.

Cette instance à pour but d'être francophone. La majorité du contenu publié doit être en langue française.
(This instance aims to be French-speaking. The majority of published content has to be in French.)

mastodon.clinicians-exchange.org.text: Conversations must be respectful. Please alert the moderators if there is a post that needs to be addressed.

First & last name, professional credentials, & geographical location at the large territory level (state/province/country) are encouraged in your profile.  **WE DO ALLOW PSEUDONYMS HOWEVER**  Upon request -- we will approve 2nd accounts so you can have a professional account and a pseudonym account.

Members should be mental health professionals, retirees, or graduate students. This is BROADLY DEFINED -- licensed advanced degree people, para-professionals at group homes & day programs.  Association staff.  State health board staff.  No proof of mental health employment normally needed.
Advertising and marketing on the forum are expressly prohibited. You are welcome to advertise in your profile, but not directly to the server.

This forum is NOT confidential. All messages are archived on the web and can be widely read. Do not say anything that would compromise anyone’s confidentiality or violate your professional ethics in any way. This is an open-door meeting and should be treated as such. NO CLIENT CASE STUDIES!

We encourage the use of hashtags such as:
"#OT" and "#watercooler" -- for off-topic and personal discussions
"#political" -- for political topics (which must remain polite and at least vaguely tied to psychology)
Some other good hashtags: "#sundaysalon" "#strictlybusiness" "#COVID"
We encourage the use of Content Warnings so that community members can decide whether they want to engage with a post that may be controversial or explicit.

The information distributed may or may not have been checked for accuracy. By your use of this forum, you agree to hold harmless the forum owners, moderators, and all contributors against any and all claims arising out of such use, regardless of the cause, effects, or fault.

mastodon.circle.lt.text: Don't use this server in any way that would violate the U.S. federal law or California State law.
No authoritarianism. Fascists and tankies are not welcome.
No discrimination. Racism, antisemitism, colonialism, casteism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other kinds of prejudice will not be tolerated.
Don't intentionally cause or encourage others to cause any kind of harm to people in this community or to anyone they may care about. No trolling, no harassment, no stalking, no doxxing.
Adult and other NSFW content must be marked sensitive and hidden behind a non-explicit content warning.

mastodon.chuggybumba.com.text: No illegal activities. That includes selling illegal goods or services, any threats of violence, hacking attempts or the like. Any of the above conducts will result in permanent ban and will be reported to local authorities.
Be kind. Harassments and/or hateful speech will not be tolerated. Any reports of this conduct will lead to reprimands and finally permanent ban if continued.
No nudity, porn or 18+ content. There's plenty of other instances where you can join for that kind of content. When posting media containing otherwise NSFW material, please flag content as such.
No ads or spam. Shameless plugs to own content allowed as long as it's not linking to BirdSite.
No spreading of misinformation, conspiracy theories or anti-science bullcrap. This ain't your uncle's Facebook.

mastodon.colincogle.name.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
mastodon.colincogle.name.hint: Sometimes I want to see it.  Sometimes I don't.  Just tag it appropriately.

mastodon.colincogle.name.text: No racism, sexism, ageism, homophobia, transphobia, or xenophobia allowed.
mastodon.colincogle.name.hint: I won't block you for having viewpoints I hate, as long as you can have a civil and interesting conversation without name-calling or being a jerk.  However, I am totally on board with "hating the haters", so if you want to fight back, go right ahead.

mastodon.colincogle.name.text: No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
mastodon.colincogle.name.hint: It's lame, and I don't want to deal with it.

mastodon.colincogle.name.text: No fake news;  do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
mastodon.colincogle.name.hint: Keep the conspiracy theories and anti-fact stuff on your own server.  This doesn't exclude us from making fun of these wingnuts, though.

mastodon.colincogle.name.text: This server is not a democracy.
mastodon.colincogle.name.hint: I have the final say.  Don't like it?  Go start your own instance.  Note that this rule only applies to my server, and I will respect the rules of yours.

mastodon.com.br.text: Não crie brigas e intrigas repetidamente, causando mal estar na comunidade
Não utilize as timelines públicas (local e global/federada) como sala de chat sem uso de @ ou reply
É proibido qualquer tipo de discurso discriminatório como racismo, homofobia, misoginia, transfobia, xenofobia, capacitismo e gordofobia
É proibida a apologia ao nazismo ou fascismo assim como discurso de ódio de cunho político
É proibida a publicação de pornografia infantil e lolicon
É proibido discurso ou imagens de crueldade contra animais
São proibida a publicação ou reprodução de fake news
É proibida publicação de conteúdo adulto sem aviso de conteúdo
São proibidos doxxing, intimidação deliberada e stalking
São proibidos avanços sexuais indesejados. Isso inclui piadas ou comentários sexuais
É proibido crossposting (posts vindos de outras redes, como o Twitter) em timeline pública
É proibido Spam e Flood nas timelines públicas (local e global/federada)
É proibido criar contas para se passar por celebridades ou marcas. Contas paródia ou contas de fã precisam estar explicitamente sinalizadas
É proibido discurso que romantiza e/ou incentiva práticas nocivas ao bem-estar físico ou mental como distúrbios alimentares, automutilação (cutting) e suicídio.

mastodon.com.tr.text: Cinsellik, şiddet veya halka açık ortamlarda istemsiz şekilde görünmesi sorun yaratabilecek içerik içeren fotoğraf ve videolar içerik uyarısı ile yayınlanmalıdır. Bu kuralı uygularken sunucu yöneticileri sağduyularını kullanacaktır, lütfen siz de içeriğinizi yayınlamadan önce sağduyunuzu kullanın.
Irkçılık, cinsiyetçilik, homofobi, transofobi ve zenofobi yasaktır
Şiddete kışkırtma veya şiddet güzellemeleri yayınlamak yasaktır
Taciz, linçleme, kimlik ifşa etme (doxxing) yasaktır
Türkiye Cumhuriyeti ve/veya Fransa Cumhuriyeti yasalarına aykırı içerik paylaşımı yasaktır

Bir ya da birden fazla kullanıcıya, ticari reklam, propaganda, oltalama vb. amaçlar güden, bir ya da birden fazla sayıda ileti gönderimi — kısacası spam ileti gönderimi yasaktır. Münferit durumlar için bu kuralın yorumlanma hakkı tamamıyla sunucu yöneticilerine aittir.

mastodon.conii.co.text: 인종, 성 지향 및 정체성, 신체 및 장애, 지역 및 국적 등을 이유로 타인을 차별해서는 안 됩니다.
타인을 겁주거나, 일방적으로 멘션이나 DM을 거듭하여 보내는 행위는 괴롭힘으로 간주될 수 있습니다.
가능하면 다른 사람의 말을 좋은 뜻으로 해석하고, 포용적인 언어를 사용해주세요.
게시물 공개 범위 설정 기능을 잘 사용해주세요. 특히 성적인 콘텐츠나 널리 알려지는걸 원하지 않는 내용물은 공개 범위를 "미등재(비표시)" 이하로 제한할 것을 권장합니다.
본 서버의 물리적 소재지는 대한민국입니다. 국내 실정법을 위반하는 내용을 게시하거나 링크해서는 안 됩니다.
성적이거나 폭력적인 콘텐츠, 민감하거나 과격한 내용, 특정 작품이나 서사에 대한 스포일러, 휘발성이 있는 시사 이슈는 CW(콘텐츠 경고)나 민감함 표시를 이용해서 가려야 합니다.
자살 및 자해와 관련된 결심, 실행 계획, 실행 방법, 과거 경험에 대한 설명과 묘사를 금합니다. 자살 또는 자해를 조장하는 내용을 엄격히 금합니다.

mastodon.content.town.text: Be judicial in what you post.
Please don’t post stuff that shows disturbing content (violence, bodliy harm, cruelty, etc) without using the content warning features. Err on the side of caution.

Avoid mansplaining. While you may be an expert on a topic in your friend circles, it's likely that there's someone here who you could learn a lot from. Mansplaining shuts down those opportunities to learn.
Please set a user icon. It can be anything you want, as long as it isn't the Mastodon default image.
Avoid behavior that forces us to create new rules.

mastodon.craftingcomrades.net.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

mastodon.communick.com.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Please be kind and courteous. Apply the Silver Rule: don't treat others like you wouldn't like to treated.
Harassment of any kind is unacceptable and a direct violation of the communick.com Terms of Service
Absolutely no content that would be considered illegal in Germany.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No bot account unless explicit permission from the server admins is granted.

mastodon.cooleysekula.net.text: No toxic and hateful speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on attacks against anyone’s gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, age, disability, personal appearance, or socio-economic status.
No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading or violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or unwanted advances. You may not continue to engage with a user who has explicitly requested that you stop.
No doxxing of other users. Unauthorised requests for or distribution of any personal information or data is not allowed. Please treat personally identifying information with respect and privacy.
No content illegal in Canada or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to. Illegal or copyrighted content is not allowed to be stored, posted, or discussed on this instance.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately. Posts and images with sexually explicit or violence must be flagged as sensitive and contain a content warning. Users may not have sexually explicit or violent media as a profile photo or header image.
No spamming. Excessive posting, boosting, advertising or mass-marketing posts will be actioned accordingly and based on intent.
Be yourself. Accounts intended to impersonate or parody are not permitted, and those found to be directly misrepresenting themselves as another person or entity will be actioned accordingly.

mastodon.com.pl.text: (EN): No threats, harassment, racism, homophobia, sexism, and incitement to hatred towards individuals or groups. (PL): Niedozwolone są groźby, znęcanie się, rasizm, homofobia, seksizm oraz nawoływanie do nienawiści wobec jednostek oraz grup.

(EN): No illegal content e.g. child pornography, pornography, frauds, illegal services etc.
(PL): Niedozwolony jest content zabroniony prawnie np. dziecięca pornografia, pornografia, oszustwa, nielegalne usługi itp.

(EN): No posting malicious links.
(PL): Niedozwolone jest publikowanie złośliwych linków.

(EN): No hate speech.
(PL): Niedozwolona jest mowa nienawiści.

(EN): NSFW content should be marked with a Content Warning. 
(PL): Treść NSFW piowinna być oznaczona ostrzeżeniem o zawartości.

(EN): No spamming or explicit advertising allowed without proper introduction and/or other activity.
(PL): Niedozwolone generowanie spamu ani jawnej reklamy bez odpowiedniego wprowadzenia i/lub innej aktywności.
(EN): Comments should be related to the topics appearing within the thematic threads. (PL): Wypowiedzi powinny być związane z treściami pojawiającymi się w ramach wątków tematycznych.

(EN): No insults based on their gender, sexual orientation, nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, or lack thereof. (PL): Niedozwolone jest znieważanie Użytkowników z powodu ich przynależności płciowej, seksualnej, narodowej, etnicznej, rasowej, wyznaniowej, albo z powodu jej bezwyznaniowości.

(EN): No chauvinistic, misogynistic nature, as well as content displaying signs of gender discrimination. (PL): Niedozwolone są treści o charakterze szowinistycznym i mizoginistycznym, jak również noszące znamiona dyskryminacji płciowej.
(EN): No content violating the personal rights of any third party. (PL): Zabrania się zamieszczania treści naruszających dobra osobiste osób trzecich.
(EN): No content inciting dangerous behavior or praising such behaviord. (PL): Niedozwolone są treści nawołujące do zachowań niebezpiecznych, lub pochwalają takie zachowania.

(EN): Upon creating an account, it is required to introduce oneself using the hashtag #introduction in one's post. (PL): Po utworzeniu konta, wymagane jest przedstawienie się z wykorzystaniem hasztagu #introduction w swoim toot'cie.

mastodon.cr.text: No discursos de odio como homofobia, transfobia, racismo o similares.
Contenido sensible deberá ser marcado como tal.
No divulgar información privada sin consentimiento (doxxing).
No Spam: utilizar funciones de conversación como respuestas para promocionar contenido comercial no solicitado. Para promocionar contenido comercial está la cuenta y audiencia propia.

No desinformación (fake news) intencional. La realidad es compleja y tiene matices pero esta no es una plataforma para difundir teorías de conspiración contrarias a información científicamente comprobadas. Ejemplos: negacionismo del cambio climático o movimientos antivacunas.
Prohibido promover actividades y negocios ilegales en Costa Rica
No cuentas falsas ni suplantación de identidad de personas, organizaciones o marcas.

mastodon.cultuurpers.nl.text: Je hebt eerbied voor waarheid en voor het recht van het publiek op waarheid. Dat  is je eerste plicht
Je komt op voor de volgende twee beginselen: vrijheid in verantwoord bijeenbrengen en publiceren van nieuws, en het recht van fair commentaar en kritiek.
Je doet je berichtgeving alleen berusten op feiten waarvan je de bron kent. Je zal wezenlijke informatie niet achterwege laten en geen documenten vervalsen.
Bij het verkrijgen van nieuws, foto's en documenten ga je op faire wijze te werk.
Je bent bereid elke verstrekte informatie die schadelijk onnauwkeurig blijkt, op royale wijze recht te zetten.

Je bent je bewust van het gevaar van door media verspreide discriminatie, en zult al het mogelijk doen om discriminatie te voorkomen, gebaseerd op, o.a., ras, gender, sekse, seksuele geaardheid, taal, godsdienst, politieke of andere meningen en nationale of sociale afkomst.
Je doet niet aan: - plagiaat; - laster, smaad, belediging en ongegronde beschuldigingen; - het geven van een valse voorstelling van zaken
De beheerder van deze instance behoudt zich het recht voor om mensen toe te laten en te weigeren naar eigen inzicht.
Trollen worden verwijderd na duidelijke klachten

Do not share illegal files using the service. This includes any files that would be illegal to possess in the United States, as well as copyrighted files.
Do not impersonate other users. You will be banned for this, even if it is really, really funny at the time.
Do not use the service to harass or spam other fediverse users. You will be banned.
The administrators of this service reserve the unlimited right to moderate content in any way they see fit. We pledge to not excessively moderate content, but will do so if necessary.

mastodon.darkou.fr.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux. Cela concerne aussi toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés).
Règles basées sur celles de l'instance Mamot.fr

mastodon.davidciani.com.text: This server is a personal mastodon instance. All activity is at the discretion of the owner.

mastodon.darksheep.social.text: Please keep in mind only English, Czech and Slovak language is used here. This rule only applies within the server instance.
No content that is illegal in the Czech Republic and in the European Union.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Respect others. We do not tolerate any derisive, offensive or hateful comments about race, religion, culture, sexual orientation, gender, identity, or political affiliation, among other things. Respect others' differences of opinion and life attitudes.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing or similar activities leading to targeted harassment of users.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Furthermore, NSFW content (i.e., artistic nudity) must be hidden behind a content warning, the NSFW filter, or marked as unlisted/private.
We do not allow impersonation of public figures or institutions. Parody accounts must be clearly identified.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Profiles related to cryptocurrencies and NFT allowed only after admins approval. It's because most of them are just scam.
Spam is not allowed. Meaning posting multiple posts in a short amount of time, or the same post multiple times. Malware links, fishing links. BAN without any notice.

mastodon.dataden.gay.text: Respect all. No hate speech or discriminatory behavior based on personal characteristics or identity.

mastodon.de.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting

mastodon.denibol.com.text: Respeta la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de los demás. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos aquí, siempre que respeten y no dañen a los demás. Al mismo tiempo, ten en cuenta que los demás pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminología diferente a la tuya.
Racismo, machismo, capacitismo, homofobia, transfobia, queerfobia, xenofobia, antisemitismo, islamofobia y supremacismo blanco suponen bloqueo inmediato

Se bloqueará inmediatamente a toda persona o dominio que implícita o explícitamente difunda retórica fascista, nazi, franquista, de extrema derecha y otras formas de nacionalismo violento o excluyente.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantación de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

mastodon.despise.computer.text:
No harassment.

Don't harass people on this server or any others.

No CSAM, revenge porn, etc.

If this shows up in your feed because an account you follow on another server posted, boosted, or interacted with it, notify me immediately so that I can take action.
If another server is targeting you for harassment, report it and I will de-federate them.
This server does not de-federate without good cause. What that means is necessarily arbitrary, but it will always be a high bar for me to clear. You (generally) have the right of free association.
All bots querying this instance need to have descriptive user agents. If your bot is getting blocked and you feel you have a descriptive user agent, contact me.
If something is broken, report it ASAP

mastodon.design.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, validism, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other people. Approach people with politeness and precaution. If someone asks you to stop mentioning them or expresses their wish to be removed from a conversation, stop immediately and remove them from the discussion.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Any reversal of systemic oppression is forbidden. Examples: “racism against whites”, “sexism against men”, “heterophobia”, “cisphobia”, etc.
Content created by others must be attributed, and use of AI must be disclosed. Profiles that only post AI-generated content will not be tolerated.

mastodon.desord.re.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.

mastodon.developage.de.text: Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird als privates Hobby ohne Garantie für Verfügbarkeit betrieben. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf jederzeitigen funktionierenden Zugang zum Konto. Ich werde Downtimes aber vorher über den Hausrecht-Account ankündigen.

Auf dieser Instanz ist jedermensch willkommen. Wenn ich den Eindruck habe, dass beleidigend, diskriminierend oder schlicht nervtötend gesprochen wird, behalte ich mir das Recht vor, auch ohne Ankündigung Accounts zu sanktionieren oder zu deaktivieren.

Ich gehe davon aus, dass alle Nutzende dieser Instanz in der Lage sind, sich selbst gegenüber anderen zur Wehr zu setzen und Querelen unter einander zu klären. Die Meinungsfreiheit erlaubt auch hitzige Debatten. Werden Grenzen überschritten, gilt jedoch Regel 2.

mastodon.digital-science.com.text: Do not post, share or otherwise transmit anything that is unlawful, fraudulent, misleading, infringes or violates another's rights, pornographic, indecent, false, defamatory, derogatory, threatening, obscene, abusive, offensive, hateful or inflammatory.

Do not post, share or otherwise transmit anything that is likely to harass, upset, annoy, alarm, embarrass or invade the privacy of, any person, deceitful, promotes or advocates an unlawful act or activity, discriminatory, sexually explicit or violent.

Do not post, share or otherwise transmit health or other sensitive personal information, classified, controlled unclassified or other regulated information, personal information of others, or anything which you are not authorised to post, share or transmit
Do not impersonate or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity
Do not probe, scan, or test the vulnerability of any system or network
Do not tamper with, breach or otherwise circumvent any security or authentication measure
Do not access or use any non-public area / content or shared area you have not been invited to
Do not interfere with or disrupt any user, host, or network
Do not introduce, or otherwise use to facilitate the spread of, spyware or any other malware.
Do not access or search by any means other than our publicly supported interfaces (for example, “scraping”)
Do not send unsolicited communications or spam
Do not send altered, deceptive or false source-identifying information, including “spoofing” or “phishing”

Do not infringe any trademark, copyright (including design rights), database rights, or other intellectual property rights, or privacy or other rights, of any other person or breach any contractual or other legal duty
Do not violate or cause the violation of the law in any way or otherwise harm the reputation of Digital Science

mastodon.draeh.org.text: Zero-tolerance policy for hate speech (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/transmisia, misgendering/dead naming, xenophobia, ableism, etc) or illegal activity of any kind.
Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind.
All NSFW and sexually explicit posts require a Content Warning (CW) AND a Sensitive Media tag. Please add Alt Text descriptions to images and media where appropriate.

Users are expected to behave as a person and not a brand or storefront. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged (ex. going live posts, links to personal content creation), but please do not spam the Local feed or send direct messages to advertise. Paid advertising/links of any kind is not allowed.
No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.
By applying, you agree to the server rules. A reason for joining is required. Applications with short generic answers (i.e. “leaving Twitter”) will be declined.

mastodon.dredgelords.com.text:
Dredgelords is a fun clan for GRSM, furry, & ally gamers. We transcend stereotypes, and do not gatekeep people's identities.
Be curious, not cynical.
No discrimination based on race, gender, sexuality, nationality, or age. If you are offended by equality this is not your server.  Those not signing the tolerance treaty are not tolerated.
Content warnings are to be used for distressing, hurtful, depressing or triggering content.  They have other uses too, but those are the required cases.
Use sarcasm, rudeness, or hostile jokes only with people you are already close to and know they are cool with it.
Visit your account settings and set them correctly. Please make regular backups of your account if you value its contents.
Obey USA copyright law.  This server is based in the USA and subject to legal authority therin.
No rules lawyering.  Rules are subject to moderator interpretation. You shall be in the spirit of compassion and acceptance, not the letter of it.

mastodon.dtalens.com.text: Està prohibida qualsevol mostra de discriminació que promogui o defensi l'opressió de membres de grups minoritaris.

Està prohibit l'assetjament o qualsevol altra forma de contacte amb un usuari que hagi declarat que no desitja ser contactat.
No és permès fer publicitat ni fer spam.
Les accions que pretenguin danyar el servidor o el seu funcionament poden portar a la suspensió immediata del compte.
Els continguts il·legals al País Valencià (Espanya) seran eliminats i poden portar a la suspensió immediata del compte.
Els bots i els "crossposters" estan permesos mentre les publicacions estiguin marcades com a "No llistat"
Les publicacions on aparegui nuditat s'han de fer com a "No llistat" sota un avís de contingut sensible (NSFW).
La política de retenció: els arxius d'usuari seran esborrats als 7 dies.

mastodon.ehlo.world.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” here.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set here, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not toot in languages other than French or English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email moderation@ehlo.world.

mastodon.ee.text: Registreerumisega nõustud mitte postitama roppusi, solvavaid, halvustavaid, vihkavaid, ähvardavaid või muid seadustega vastuolevat sisu. / By registering you agree to not post obscene, abusive, derogatory, hate, threatening or otherwise illegal content.

Ära proovi mastodon.ee lehte/serverit katki teha, häkkida või teistele kättesaamatuks teha. / Do not attempt to break, hack or make mastodon.ee inaccessible.

mastodon.electric-goat.net.text: Ce serveur est hébergé en France et soumis aux lois françaises.
Ce serveur n'accepte aucune forme de discrimination, notamment aucune forme de racisme, sexisme, homophobie ou transphobie.

Ce serveur est hébergé par l'entreprise Electric Goat, qui s'engage à fournir les moyens nécessaires à son fonctionnement. Au cas où il deviendrait nécessaire de couper ce serveur, les utilisateurs en seraient prévenus au moins trois mois à l'avance.
La pornographie n'est pas acceptée sur ce serveur. La nudité l'est, mais avec un avertissement de contenu si elle est explicite.

mastodon.einfachmc.de.text: Inhalte, die gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen, sind verboten.
Persönliche Angriffe oder Beleidigungen sind untersagt.
Es ist untersagt, andere Nutzer zu spammen oder ihnen unerwünschte Nachrichten zu schicken.
Nutzer dürfen keine illegalen Aktivitäten auf dem Server betreiben.
Nutzer dürfen keine sensiblen persönlichen Daten von sich oder anderen veröffentlichen (z.B. Kontonummern, Adressen, Telefonnummern).
Nutzer dürfen keine Links zu betrügerischen oder gefährlichen Websites teilen.
Nutzer dürfen keine Inhalte teilen, die urheberrechtlich geschützt sind, es sei denn, sie besitzen die entsprechenden Rechte oder haben die Erlaubnis des Rechteinhabers.
Nutzer sollten respektvoll und höflich miteinander umgehen und sich gegenseitig unterstützen.

mastodon.eternalaugust.com.text: Don't be a nazi. No racism, homophobia, transphobia, etc. We aim to make an inclusive space, and thus will not put up with hate of any kind.
No Crypto. No Spam. No Crypto Spam.
Please use CW's for NSFW, or any content someone might reasonably prefer to opt in to seeing. Help keep our instance safe to browse at work.
No Fandom Wank. (for the zoomers: don't pick on people or start feuds over how somebody is engaging in fandom) This rule has been added for legacy reasons.

Please keep the amount of work the admins have to do to a minimum. You are expected to behave like an adult in society. These rules are intentionally vague because we do not expect anybody to willfully cause problems. Please do not disappoint us.

META RULE: we acknowledge that, this being the fediverse, this instance is the only place we have jurisdiction. We will not enforce rules from other servers on our users, and we cannot enforce our rules on users of other servers.

mastodon.elte.hu.text: Tartsd be az ELTE Etikai Kódexét! - Keep ELTE’s Code of Conduct!

mastodon.elevenways.be.text: Be polite. No trolling, microaggressions, or harassment.
No jokes making light of sexual assault and abuse.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

mastodon.escepticos.es.text:
(Hay 7 normas en esta instancia: lealas todas)
La promoción de objetivos contrarios a los perseguidos por ARP-SAPC supondrá el inmediato borrado y bloqueo, incluso a nivel de instancia si así procediese. Véase https://escepticos.es/objetivos .

Se considerará particularmente grave y objeto de borrado y bloqueo inmediato del emisor (incluso a nivel de instancia) cualquier promoción de bulos, pseudociencia, pseudomedicina, y en general cualquier propuesta que coloquialmente llamamos “magufa”.

La principal norma de comportamiento a observar es el respeto. Respeto a los demás y a la legalidad vigente en España y la Unión Europea. Sera objeto de bloqueo inmediato cualquier tipo de mensaje o contenido que se acerque mínimamente a un delito de odio, en cualquiera de sus clases.
Aunque la divulgación de la actividad profesional propia es lícita, no se admitirá el spam ni la promoción comercial agresiva.
Esta instancia se adhiere explicítamente a la Declaración Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la Convención de Derechos del Niño.

Las decisiones de los administradores y moderadores son inapelables, aunque pueden resultar de algún error de apreciación o falta de contexto. Para resolver cualquier asunto relativo a la moderación deberá usarse la dirección de contacto mastodon@escepticos.es

En esta instancia no se aceptan solicitudes de registro de bots desatendidos sin que haya un solicitante humano detrás. Las razones de solicitud pueden ser variadas. Una sola palabra, nick o signo de puntuación como razón para la solicitud NO es suficiente y será desestimada.

mastodon.eticadigital.eu.text: El contenido sexual explícito o violento no está permitido.
No está permitido el racismo, clasismo, sexismo, homofobia, transfobia, xenofobia o cualquier otra actitud de discriminación.
No se permite incitación a la violencia ni promoción de ideologías violentas.

mastodon.evl.fi.text: Minä olen sinut nimeltä kutsunut (Jes. 43:1). Älä ole anonyymi, käytä sellaista nimeä, josta sinut tunnetaan.
Rakasta lähimmäistäsi niin kuin itseäsi (Matt. 22:39). Mastodon on turvallinen tila. Ei syrjivää, väheksyvää, rasistista tai seksististä kielenkäyttöä tai argumentointia.
Kunnioittakaa kilvan toinen toistanne (Room 12:10). Keskustellaan kunnioittavasti. Älä koskaan kyseenalaista esimerkiksi toisen olemusta, seksuaalisuutta, persoonaa tai elämänvalintoja.
Iloitkaa ja riemuitkaa, laulakaa ja soittakaa! (Ps. 98:4)

mastodon.fedivienne.org.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux. Cela concerne aussi toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés).

Geen berichten of links naar inhoud die haatgroepen, terrorisme, massaal geweld of oproepen tot geweld ondersteunt, uitbeeldt of promoot.

Geen berichten of opmerkingen die QAnon-gerelateerde inhoud of soortgelijke weerlegde samenzweringstheorieën ondersteunen of promoten. Moderators kunnen naar eigen goeddunken beslissen of een bericht in strijd is met deze regel. Vogels zijn echt. De aarde is rond. En doorgaan.

Alle pornografische, erotische of NSFW-inhoud, in wat voor vorm dan ook, moet worden gemarkeerd met een inhoudswaarschuwing.

Geen visuele content die dierenmishandeling, executies, (zelf)moord, verminking, zichtbare ingewanden, overmatig bloed of verkoolde lichamen afbeeldt. Voor alle andere gewelddadige afbeeldingen is een inhoudswaarschuwing vereist.
Geen spam of plaatsing van kwaadaardige links (zie algemene richtlijnen).
Geen bedreigingen, pesterijen, aanmoediging noch promotie van zelfbeschadiging, of aanvallen op een individu of groep.
Geen accounts die zich voordoen als iemand anders. Duidelijk gemarkeerde parodie accounts uitgezonderd (denk om de volgende regel!).

Accountnamen van (bekende) (merk)namen, plaatsnamen en andere geografisch namen zijn expliciet voorbehouden aan de vertegenwoordigers daarvan.
Moderatoren behouden zich het recht voor een accountnaam te ontnemen en toe te wijzen aan de juiste persoon/vertegenwoordiger.

Geen haatspraak. Aanzetten tot haat wordt gedefinieerd als denigrerende berichten of links gericht op een individu of groep op basis van ras, mentale of fysieke handicap, religie, genderidentiteit, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, klasse of seksuele geaardheid.
Geen "shitposting" - terwijl humoristische posts zijn toegestaan, en eigenlijk wordt aangemoedigd, maar er is hier geen plaats voor "shitposting".
"bots" onder voorbehoud. Geautomatiseerde accounts die overwegend (door)posten van een andere bron zijn alleen in overleg toegestaan.

mastodon.gooo.cloud.text: Freedom of Speech and Respectful Discourse. We support the principle of free speech and encourage open, respectful discourse. Users are free to express their opinions, ideas, and beliefs, provided they do not infringe on the rights and dignity of others.
Doxing, smearing and discriminatory language based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or disability are not permitted.

Unsolicited advertisements or spam in the comments section of other users' posts. Repeated posting of substantially similar content or excessively promoting products/services outside designated areas will be considered spam.

Companies or individuals wishing to advertise or promote their services may create a dedicated company profile. Advertising through these profiles should be conducted respectfully and must not involve direct unsolicited messaging to users who have not opted in.
Respect copyright and related rights. Posting content that infringes upon someone else's intellectual property rights is prohibited.
Personal data of individuals should not be shared without their explicit consent, in line with GDPR and other data protection regulations.

The platform moderators will enforce these rules fairly and impartially (without political bias). Users found in violation of these rules may be subject to action, including content removal, temporary suspension, or permanent ban.

Permanent ban. The user should get the opportunity to take a backup of all his data and migrate to another server (Mastodon). Gooo Cloud should also provide a symlink from his old account to the new one, so existing followers will be redirected to his new account. (de-platforming prevention)
Users are encouraged to report any content or behavior that violates these rules through the platform's reporting tools.

mastodon.hams.social.text: We suggest using your radio callsign as your username. If you don't have one yet, want to avoid doxing, or are a SWL that's ok too.

Anyone is welcome to report inappropriate behavior, they will be listened to, and action will be taken. This will be anything from a warning, to banning. Moderation decisions will be made using the Paradox of Tolerance.
Expect anything you post on mastodon.hams.social to be public, including direct messages, that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed.
Any images or videos uploaded to mastodon.hams.social MUST have an appropriate textual description. If you need help with this, please ask!
Your right to free speech does not supersede my right to call you out and kick you out for being a dick.
Please be respectful of others. Their age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, background, preference for transistors over valves, etc. are all _NOT_ reasons to be a twit.
No spam, no commercial advertising (occasional personal listings are OK), no sexually explicit or violent media (yes that includes pictures of your gun), no threats of violence.
No illegal content - this server is hosted in California, United States.
When apply for an account, if you've actually read these rules, please end your "Why do you want to join?" with the phrase "badger parsnips".
