mastodon.infodocs.eu.text: Ce projet de réseau social est encore en phase de test et d'expérimentation (fonctionnement, modération, règles de fonctionnement. Sa pérennité à long terme ne peut être assurée et garantie pour le moment.
Cette instance de Mastodon est un espace de collaboration et d'échange dédié aux acteurs (étudiant.e.s.; professionnel.le.s; chercheur.ices) des sciences de l'information et des bibliothèques.
Il n'y a pas de limite sur le contenu et la teneur des échanges qui peuvent dépasser le cadre de l'information-documentation.

Vous consentez à ne pas poster de messages injurieux, obscènes, vulgaires, diffamatoires, menaçants, sexuels ou tout autre message qui violerait les lois applicables. Le faire peut vous conduire à être banni immédiatement de façon permanente.

Vous êtes d’accord sur le fait que que l’administrateur et les éventuels modérateurs de cette instance ont le droit de supprimer, éditer et verrouiller n’importe quel sujet de discussion à tout moment et de suspendre et supprimer un compte créé sur cette instance s'il ne respecte pas ces principes.

Vous avez la possibilité de créer un compte, mais l'inscription n'est pas automatique. La demande de création d'un compte doit être justifiée et validé par l'administrateur. Le délai d'acceptation ou de refus peut être de durée variable.

mastodon.iow.social.text:
Do:
Using welcoming and inclusive language.
Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accepting constructive criticism.
Focusing on what is best for the community.
Showing empathy towards other community members.

Do not post:
Sexualised language/imagery/unwelcome sexual attention or advances.
Personal/political attacks inclusive of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia.
Publishing others’ private information.
Publish any illegal content in the UK.
Incitement of violence/violent ideologies

Commercial:
Company accounts are welcome but advertising is not permitted on this server. Over promotion, bot like behaviour replying to users, etc. will not be tolerated.

Public interest accounts:
Use of accounts for public figures is encouraged however, we ask you interact with comments and the community and not use your account as a notice board or press release hub by ignoring comments/interactions with other users.

** You must **
Have a link to the IoW (UK) and state how in the signup process.
Requests with no link stated in the "Why do you want to join" will be rejected.

Respect privacy: Do not share personal information without explicit permission and respect the privacy rights of others.
No spam posts: Refrain from publishing unwanted advertising or similar content that does not fit the community.

Mark sensitive content: Please mark any content that may contain common triggers, is sexually explicit or violent as sensitive (CW) to ensure the safety of other members. Note: Accounts that exclusively post such content may be limited or banned.

(GDPR免責) あなたがデータを削除したい場合、我々は可能な範囲で対応します。しかし連合先のサーバ上のデータの削除について完全な責任を持つことは非常に困難です。これはEUのGDPRに厳密には適合しません。ユーザはこれに同意した上でアカウントを作成したものとみなします。

mastodon.kbpmessick.com.text: Be Respectful: Treat others with courtesy and respect. Avoid offensive language, personal attacks, or any form of discrimination.

No Harassment: Harassment of any form is strictly prohibited. This includes but is not limited to bullying, stalking, or unwanted attention. Additionally, the instance does not tolerate gender-critical, sex and gender discrimination, transphobia, or misogyny.
Content Guidelines: Ensure your posts adhere to our content guidelines. No explicit or adult content, hate speech, or illegal activities are allowed.
Privacy Matters: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent. Report any violations promptly.
Stay On Topic: Keep discussions relevant to the instance's purpose. Off-topic posts may be removed.
No Spam or Self-Promotion: Refrain from spamming or excessive self-promotion. Share content responsibly and engage meaningfully.
Follow Instance Moderation: Follow the guidance of instance moderators. Report issues and cooperate in maintaining a positive community.
Use CWs Appropriately: Utilize Content Warnings (CWs) for sensitive or potentially triggering content. This fosters a considerate environment for all users.
Multiple Accounts: Limit the number of accounts per user to avoid confusion and maintain transparency.
Respect Server Resources: Do not overload the server with excessive posts or activities. Be mindful of resource usage.

Forbidden Topics: Strictly no promotion or gathering of sexual content involving minors, gore, graphic violence, National Socialism, Nazism, Holocaust denial, racism, Alt-Right (disguised as freedom of speech), spreading falsehoods, violence incitement, conspiracy theories, or disinformation.

mastodon.kintsugi-lab.com.text: This server is a safe place.

Account / post language identification. We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning).
Be Kind and Respectful. Don’t be racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, fatphobic, etc.
Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.
Must consider others at all times.
No NSFW content without Content Warning.
Include relevant #HashTags to aid discoverability & filtering potenital and add image descriptions (Alt-TXT).
Misinformation and deceptive content is prohibited
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No impersonation of an entity or another individual. Your identity must be your own, whether this is yourself or your online persona.

mastodon.lamacchinadesiderante.org.text: Puoi iscriverti solo su invito, così l'istanza rimane piccola. Difficilmente verrai invitato.
Hai a disposizione 20000 caratteri per toot. Cerca di avere anche qualcosa di interessante da dire. Cerca di scrivere in modo decente. Sii poeta!
No ai seguenti tipi di pornografia: selfie, unboxing, foto di animali domestici.
Alla sessualità genitale preferiamo quella nomadica. Se proprio ci tieni a farci vedere il cazzo, fallo in modo creativo, assicurati che il materiale sia tuo e usa il CW.
Sì alla contro-pornografia. Leggi il Manifesto Contro-Pornografico. Lo trovi sul nostro sito.

Se sei fan delle criptovalute, se ti sei formato sugli scritti di Hayek, Nozick, Rothbard (o simili), se non capisci di cosa stiamo parlando, ti suggeriamo l'istanza Twitter.com gestita dal signor Musk.
No ai fascismi, soprattutto a quelli molecolari.
No al body-shaming. Sì al Corpo Senza Organi.
No allo scientismo e alle altre religioni patriarcali. E' tollerata al più quella dell'Antica Grecia. Quelle matriarcali vanno bene.
Seguiamo le teoria secondo cui le bestemmie sono state inventate dalla Chiesa Cattolica per far parlare di Dio anche chi non ci crede.
Ti è comunque concesso di inventare una tua religione personale. Ti chiediamo solo di non imporla agli altri.
No al razzismo e all'abilismo. No agli -ismi come visioni del mondo pre-confezionate.
No alla bifobia. Sì a Bifo Berardi (ciao Franco!).
Istanza LGBTQIABCDEFGHILMNO+ friendly. Se non ti va bene, schwaffənculo!
Al machismo e alla virilità preferiamo i plug anali. A Carla Lonzi preferiamo Donna Haraway. A bell hooks preferiamo Gayatri Spivak.
Se devi condividere la tua depressione, fallo NON sotto forma di comizio/lamentela. Altrimenti non effettueremo il download.
Non usare il tuo account come se fossi un bot. Usalo come se fossi un cyborg.
No allo SPAM. Non chiederci cosa sia SPAM e cosa no. Non lo sappiamo.
Se hai trovato qualche contraddizione nel regolamento, sappi che è stata inserita volutamente.
Se qualcosa non ti è chiaro sei invitato a fare domande, non defederazioni.
E' comunque il regolamento di istanza più brillante che tu abbia mai letto.

mastodon.lescommuns.org.text: Aucune discrimination ni dénigrement ne sera toléré : les messages racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes, validistes etc. sont interdits.

Tout contenu illicite sera immédiatement retiré. Cela inclut notamment la pornographie enfantine (y compris dessinée), l’incitation à la haine, l’apologie des crimes de guerre, des crimes contre l’humanité, des crimes de réduction en esclavage, l’apologie publique des actes de terrorisme.
Le contenu pornographique n’est pas autorisé sur cette instance, car nous n’avons pas la capacité d’en assurer la provenance légale et éthique.
Les comptes parodiques sont acceptés mais doivent mentionner explicitement qu’ils sont parodiques dans leur description.

Les bots sont autorisés. Cependant, les bots qui s’immiscent dans les timelines publiques peuvent être réduits au silence s’ils abusent (flood, spam, etc.). Les robots qui mentionnent trop souvent des utilisateurices sans leur consentement peuvent être suspendus.

Nos adhérents ont fait le choix d'utiliser des logiciels libres et sans traçage. Si vous repostez du contenu vu sur d'autres réseaux, évitez de mettre des liens vers ces réseaux et recopiez le contenu ou, le cas échéant, le lien vers l'article d'origine (site web, article de presse par exemple).

mastodon.lucas.inf.br.text: Respeito mútuo: Todos os usuários devem tratar uns aos outros com cortesia e respeito, independentemente de suas opiniões ou identidades.

Sem discurso de ódio: Não é permitido qualquer forma de discurso que promova o ódio com base em raça, etnia, gênero, orientação sexual, religião, deficiência ou qualquer outra característica protegida.
Sem assédio: O assédio, incluindo bullying, perseguição, intimidação ou ameaças, não será tolerado.
Sem spam ou propaganda: Evite publicações excessivas, repetitivas ou promocionais. A publicidade é permitida apenas nas áreas designadas para isso.
Conteúdo sensível: Marque o conteúdo sensível, como imagens violentas, explícitas ou perturbadoras, para que os usuários possam optar por visualizá-lo ou não.
Respeito aos direitos autorais: Não publique conteúdo protegido por direitos autorais sem permissão adequada ou violando leis de direitos autorais.
Privacidade e segurança: Respeite a privacidade dos outros usuários e evite compartilhar informações pessoais sem consentimento.
Resolução de conflitos: Se surgirem conflitos entre usuários, você pode incentivá-los a resolverem de forma civilizada ou procurarem a moderação se necessário.
Respeite as leis: qualquer conteúdo que viole leis sensíveis não será tolerado. A exceção são postagens que exprimam liberade de opinião.

mastodon.ml.text: Относитесь к другим пользователям с уважением. Харрасмент, разжигание ненависти (hate speech), трансфобия, гомофобия, расизм, сексизм, фашизм и прочие проявления шовинизма — запрещены
Не разглашать чужую персональную информацию без согласия. Это относится как к пользователям сервера так и к людям вне него.
Администрация сервера/модерационный состав оставляет за собой право решать спорные случаи исходя из ситуации и с учётом предыдущих жалоб на пользователей.
Уважаемые щитпостеры, просим вас знать меру и не засорять ленты спамом. Излишнее злоупотребление будет наказываться.

Проставляйте Content Warning и NSFW-метки на спорный контент (политика, описание/изображения жестоких сцен, сцен насилия, крови, порнографии, эротики, хентая, использование оскорбительной лексики, и.т.п)

Размещение рекламного контента, рекламирование внешних ресурсов или размещение ссылок на внешние ресурсы с целью рекламы будет рассматриваться администрацией. В некоторых случаях могут быть применены меры
Убедительная просьба: заполняйте описания картинок. Это не обязательно, но очень сильно выручает незрячих пользователей, и не отнимает много времени
ДЛЯ РЕГИСТРИРУЮЩИХСЯ: Заявки в которых меньше пяти слов отклоняются автоматически. Если не знаете, что написать — напишите о себе, своих интересах или как узнали о Мастодоне/Федивёрсе.

mastodon.moule.world.text: No Illegal Content – This server has ZERO tolerance for content illegal in the USA (server host) or Australia (operated from), such as CSAM (and everything close to it), terrorism, copyright violations, crime instructions, etc. Any domain that hosts illegal content has and will be defederated.

No Bigotry – No racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, Islamophobia, xenophobia, body-shaming, antisemitism, white supremacy, fascism, nazism, casteism, or any other hateful, discriminatory, or harmful ideology.
No Misinformation – No conspiracy theories, propaganda, sensationalism, pseudoscience, and disinformation campaigns. Only information from high-quality, reputable sources.

No Harassing nor Violating Privacy – No harassment, stalking, doxxing, dog-piling, witch-hunting, or otherwise violating others’ privacy. No instances, bots, and anyone who ignores no-indexing requests and scrapes / reposts others’ content without their permission.

No Closed Sources nor Trackers – I will only share non-paywalled, open-access content from sources that respects user privacy (like not requesting disabling ad-blockers and browser extensions). No federation with instances ran by big tech or has a lot of trackers or commercial interests.
No NSFW content – I want to have a SFW experience on the Fediverse and will block users and instances that post or link to NSFW accounts or other content.
No Spam – No trolling or low-quality content nor spamming hashtags with off-topic posts. No users and instances with extremely high posting rates that could overwhelm smaller instances like my own.

Accessibility and Inclusion – Use concise and descriptive alt text in all media uploads and only boost media with alt text. Respect everyone’s identity by referring to them by how they wish to identify. No inaccessibility, deadnaming, or misgendering.
Content Warnings (CW) – Use CWs liberally, especially on posts referencing triggers such as (but not limited to): food, eye contact, or references to traumatic events.
Referencing – When uploading media, always cite the original creator of the media. No plagiarism or posting others' work without permission or citation.
No Advocating Violence – Do NOT threaten others with violence, death, nor encouraging self-harm nor suicide. Do not encourage others to threaten these.
Defederating Without Explanation – This server reserves the right to defederate from other instances for reasons not outlined in these Server Rules.

mastodon.mrak.at.text: Verbreite keine illegalen Inhalte - das Internet ist kein rechtsfreier Raum.
Verbreite absichtlich keine falschen oder irreführenden Informationen.
Bleib in Diskussionen immer sachlich und höflich.
Es ist in Ordnung, über negatives zu reden, solange man damit niemanden angreift.
Verletzender Sarkasmus oder Zynismus vergiftet das Gesprächsklima.
Kein Rassismus, Sexismus, Homophobie, Transphobie, Fremdenfeindlichkeit oder Kastendenken.
Wir stellen ausschließlich für Familienmitglieder der Familie Mrak ein Konto auf unserer Instanz bereit.

mastodon.murkworks.net.text: DON'T be a dick. That's not a suggestion; we use active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Trans men are men, trans women are women. If you disagree, don't be here.
The easier it is for me to maintain this server, the more likely it stays up long term. See rule 1!
If we don't know you personally, you can't have an account. We're confident we can handle 20 people (up from *two* two weeks ago) but we are resource-limited. Really. Stop asking.

As we operate under United States jurisdiction, we are required to follow DMCA protocols. Here is a copy of our DMCA statement and compliance rules: https://solarbird.net/mastodon.html - please do not make us have to use them.

While we are a private instance, we can be required to turn over user data where required by law or by order or other legal requirement of a court, administrative or law enforcement agency, or governmental entity.

Data posted here but replicated to other instances can be similarly subpoenaed in those instances under the terms of their local laws. This information includes but is not limited to posted content and identifying information such as IP addresses.

No new links to Twitter as of 2 June 2023.

I will not be in any way aid Elon Musk's alt-right propaganda machine, or a man who personally sticks anti-trans propaganda video in the faces of tens of millions of people.

If that is not acceptable, you are welcome to migrate to another instance.

mastodon.mx.text: En esta instancia es obligatorio publicar bajo aviso de contenido lo siguiente: Desnudos (reales o artísticos), imágenes violentas o desgarradoras y contenido sobre política actual (especialmente si es un tema polémico).

No cuentas bot (excepciones: medios de comunicación e instituciones publicas o privadas que emitan avisos/alertas de interés para salvaguardar a la población en México. Cualquier otra contactar por email al admin)
No racismo, discriminación, acoso, ni ningún otro tipo de lenguaje que incite al odio (prevalecer la tolerancia de ideas)
No crossposting de otras redes sociales (en especial de la del pajarito azul) hacia mastodon.mx

No nombres de usuario relacionados directamente con una localidad, ciudad, estado, rol de administrador, moderador o algo relacionado con la administración de esta instancia. Las cuentas serán ser suspendidas y los usernames confiscados sin previo aviso.
No cuentas de suplantación de identidad. Las cuentas parodia deben de especificarlo claramente en la bio del usuario.
No SPAM. Cuentas que únicamente realizan la publicación de enlaces, ventas de cualquier índole, crypto, esquemas piramidales, etc.
Cuentas a nombre de una empresa, organización pública o privada  deben de especificarlo en la bio y tener los derechos para realizar el registro.
El idioma principal de la cuenta debe ser el español
Respetar la normatividad legal mexicana. No publicaciones que inciten/atenten contra: la vida de un individuo, ser vivo o grupo social; los derechos de marca/propiedad intelectual.

No AI/ML Clause.  You are prohibited from using any data/content from this website for training or developing any artificial intelligence or machine learning model.  Any unauthorized use of data for AI/ML purposes will be considered a violation of copyright law and may result in legal action.

This instance does not agree with, nor consent to the "bridging" of any content to any closed platform, such as BlueSky, Reddit, Twitter, or any other platform that is not using the ActivityPub protocol.

Grow a thick skin. Learn to be talked to aggressively, and sometimes, shouted at.
If you don't like it, leave. This place is not public. It is not yours. And you have no entitlement to anything other than an adherence to the LAWS. And your feelings do not govern this server.

mastodon.no2nd.earth.text: Bevorzugte Sprache ist Deutsch, aber auch Englisch ist gerne gesehen.

Was wir keinesfalls dulden ist Rassismus, Antisemitismus, Diskriminierungen jedweder Art, üble Nachrede, Verhetzung, Gewalt oder Pornographie (und natürlich alles, was die Gesetze in Österreich verbieten).

Werbung ist nicht erwünscht. Links zu Artikeln oder Blog-Posts, die zum Thema Nachhaltigkeit und Klimakrise unserer Instanz passen, sind aber natürlich gerne gesehen.
Wir behalten uns vor, diese Regeln nach Bedarf anzupassen oder zu erweitern.

Twitter Cross-Posting ist für uns kein Problem, solange du die Twitter Account-Links entfernst. Diese geben hier keinen Sinn und wir behalten uns vor, solche Posts kommentarlos zu löschen. Wir wünschen uns eine lebhafte Diskussion, tote Accounts-Links torpedieren das.

mastodon.nz.text: You MUST describe your link to NZ as part of your reason for wanting to join on the next page. Applications without this will be declined. You must be a kiwi or honorary kiwi, at home or abroad, to join Mastodon.nz.
You may only have one account on Mastodon.nz and be at least 13 years of age.
Personal accounts only. We do not allow bots, commercial, business, organisation or purely promotional accounts.
Automated cross-posting from other services such as twitter is considered to be a bot and is not allowed. If you have a blog or something and you want feed that through, this is generally fine.

No spamming. The occasional mention of your shop, fundraiser etc. is fine. It's hard to give a defined daily limit of what constitutes spam. Personal or professional (i.e. Mutual Aid/Kickstarters) fundraisers must be clearly tagged as such.

Content Warnings are mandatory on posts containing gore and/or violence. Posts about politics must be tagged one or more of #nzpol, #tōrangapū, #pol, and/or #politics, and optionally may be content warned.
No impersonation of others. We may consider obvious parody accounts, but they must be agreed with @theMods in advance.
No hate speech, racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.
No illegal content, gore or violence for the sake of it, incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies or conspiracy theories.
No NSFW content. A bit of casual swearing is fine, but don't be derogatory or aggressive to other users (see rule 12).
Be kind. No abuse or harassment will be tolerated.
Content hosted on Mastodon.nz or produced by its users may not be reused outside of the fediverse without the express permission of the author(s).
Mastodon.nz complies with copyright laws. We expect you to as well. Your content must be your own or acceptable use.

Image descriptions: It is expected that users will add image descriptions to their uploads for
our visually impaired users. Unless there is a reason you can not, you must do so.
Copy of rules with more detailed guidance can be found at https://mastodon.nz/rules.pdf

Focus on what is best not just for us as individuals, but for the overall community

No racism, sexism, ableism, transphobia, or otherwise harassing individuals for what they are.
No commercial accounts for proprietary products. We want real people and Free and Open Source Software/Hardware projects (commercial is fine).
Be civil and be kind. If you need to criticise, punch up, never down. Hate speech, intended to incite or offend, is not acceptable.

mastodon.online.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
mastodon.online.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

mastodon.online.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
mastodon.online.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

mastodon.online.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
mastodon.online.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

mastodon.online.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
mastodon.online.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

mastodon.online.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
mastodon.online.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

mastodon.online.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
mastodon.online.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

외국어도 허용되지만 가능한 한국어 사용을 권장합니다.
타인을 모욕하거나 괴롭히는 등 평화롭지 못한 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 반달리즘, 트랜스포빅, 사칭 등이 여기에 포함됩니다.

다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 내용은 CW/NSFW 표시를 꼭 해야하며. 예시로는: 고어물, 과도한 성적 묘사, 잔혹한 묘사, 과도한 빛의 반짝임 등이 있습니다.
추가로 실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 어긋나는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.
사전에 승낙을 얻지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다.

성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다. 
이러한 행동은 경고 없이 제재될 수 있습니다
특정 문화를 강요하거나 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 행동은 경고 없이 제재될 수 있습니다

위의 해당하는 규칙을 위반할 경우 처벌 수위에 따라 영구 정지 혹은 제재를 당하실 수 있으며
처벌 수위는 담당 관리자에 의해 결정됩니다
무분별한 가입과 어뷰징 행위를 막기 위해 저희 서버는 가입 이유를 필수로 묻고 있습니다. 특별한 이유가 있어 가입 제한을 하는 것은 아니니 자유롭게 하고 싶은 말이나 하고 싶은 일들을 적어주시면 누구든지 가입할 수 있습니다.

mastodon.pl.text: Nie używaj rasistowskich, seksistowskich, homofobicznych, transfobicznych, ableistycznych lub w inny sposób dyskryminujących innych ludzi wypowiedzi. Unikaj języka nienawiści. Nie promuj nienawistnych ideologii.

Nie wolno nękać ani uczestniczyć w grupowym nękaniu kogokolwiek lub w inny sposób angażować się w ataki osobiste. Publikowanie lub grożenie publikacją danych osobowych innych osób jest traktowane jako nękanie.

Pisanie postów za pomocą automatycznego narzędzia jest w porządku, o ile jesteś aktywnym członkiem społeczności. Nie lubimy kont, których aktywność sprowadza się jedynie do automatycznej publikacji postów.

Nie zamieszczaj spamu. Tooty (posty), które nie są niczym innym niż linkiem i/lub zawierają nadmierną ilość hashtagów możemy potraktować jako spam, podobnie jak każdą nadmiernie komercyjną autopromocję. Pisz o swojej działalności, ale nie rób tego w przesadnie komercyjny sposób.

Unikaj publikacji postów na tematy zapalne i kontrowersyjne bez ostrzeżenia o takiej treści. Mastodon ma narzędzie do oznaczania takich postów więc korzystaj z niego jeśli publikowana treść może być kontrowersyjna dla niektórych odbiorców.
Staraj się nie angażować w wyzwiska, nieprzyjemne epitety, ataki ad hominem ani inne niegodne zachowania. Krytykuj idee, niekoniecznie ludzi.

Nie stawaj w roli policjanta. Wpis może naruszać standardy grzeczności, które ustaliliśmy, ale postaraj się nie krytykować użytkowników za jego sposób czy ton komunikacji. Nie angażuj sie w to. Jeśli w jakiś sposób dana Ci przeszkadza możesz użytkownika zgłosić lub nie krępuj się go zablokować :)

Mastodon.pl to instancja dla polskiej społeczności stąd taka domena i nazwa "Mastodon Polska". Staraj się pisać w naszym ojczystym języku. Dopuszczamy język angielski, ale umówmy się, niech to nie będzie język dominujący i jedyny w Twoich postach.

mastodon.pnpde.social.text: Sei freundlich. Kannst du einmal nicht freundlich, höflich und respektvoll sein, warte ab, bis du es wieder kannst.

Wir akzeptieren weder Queer-, Homo- und Transfeindlichkeit, Rassismus,  Behindertenfeindlichkeit, Sexismus noch andere Diskriminierung, Gewalt oder Hass. Wir tolerieren keine Intoleranz. Wir mögen keine Nazis, TERFs, AfD-Mitglieder, Reichsbürger und Querdenker.
Wir blocken Instanzen die Hatespeech dauerhaft nicht moderieren.
Halte dich ans Gesetz. Maßgeblich sind die Gesetze in Deutschland. Insbesondere Copyright-Verstöße werden nicht geduldet.
Serversprachen sind ausschließlich Deutsch und Englisch.
Die Serverregeln sind nicht allumfassend, bitte versuche nicht Regelungslücken zu finden und auszunutzen.
Das letzte Wort hat das Moderationsteam.

mastodon.positivenerd.duckdns.org.text: 특정 인물, 사상, 단체 등을 향한 혐오 표현은 금지입니다.
분쟁을 조장시 높은 확률로 활동 정지를 부여받게 될테니 웃으면서 지냅시다.
의견의 피력은 타인의 감정에 침습적인 행위이며 이는 받는 입장이 되었을 때에도 마찬가지 임을 인지해야 합니다.
꿀빨러, 핑프족, 비매너 등 우리 커뮤니티에 피해를 입힌 대상을 보호할 의무는 우리에게 없습니다.
기본적으로 운영자들은 갈등 개입을 최소화 하는 것을 목표로 하고 있습니다. 적극적인 갈등 중재 및 해결을 원한다면 운영자에게 반드시 의견을 표해주세요.
본 커뮤니티는 유니티 개발자에 대한 역량을 향상 시키기 위해 소통하는 그룹입니다. 따라서 입문자부터 이미 고수이신 분들에 대해 가려 받지 않음을 밝힙니다.
구글은 현 메일 전송해도 수신이 안됩니다. 가입신청 하시고 방장한테 알려주세요~

mastodon.pretendo.network.text: Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or hate speech, etc, will be tolerated.

No NSFW or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content. Swearing and other strong language is allowed as long as it is not over used or used in a way to insult/harm others.
No spam or self-promotion (server invites, advertisements, etc) without permission from a developer/staff member, unless otherwise allowed by the channel.

Do not share/discuss anything illegal. This includes, but is not limited to, game/firmware dumps, any parts of any console SDK, etc. If it feels illegal, it probably is. If you aren't sure, don't share it. Do not share downloads or links to tools which promote piracy.
Keep all discussion in English, please. This makes moderation a lot easier, so we ask you to please use a translation service if necessary.

mastodon.projetretro.io.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, psychophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

mastodon.raddemo.host.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Raddemo community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” on Raddemo.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behavior; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Raddemo, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@raddemo.host.

mastodon.radio.text: We suggest using your radio callsign as your username. If you don't have one yet, plan to change it soon, want to avoid doxing, or just enjoy listening, that's ok too.
Please be respectful of others. Their age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, background, preference for transistors over vales, etc. are all _NOT_ reasons to be a twit

Anyone is welcome to report inappropriate behaviour, they will be listened to, and action will be taken. This will be anything from a warning, to banning. Moderation decisions will be made using the Paradox of Tolerance.
Expect anything you post on mastodon.radio to be public, including direct messages, that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed
Any images or videos uploaded to mastodon.radio _MUST_ have an appropriate textual description. If you need help with this, please ask!
Your right to free speech does not supersede my right to call you out and kick you out for being a dick
No spam, no commercial advertising (occasional personal listings are OK), no sexually explicit or violent media (yes that includes pictures of your gun), no threats of violence.
No illegal content - this server is hosted in UK
When apply for an account, if you've actually read these rules, please end your "Why do you want to join?" with the phrase "hippo cornflakes"

mastodon.redgarterclub.com.text: 1) This instance does contain sexually explicit content and language. No one under 18 or who cannot view explicit adult content under the law will be allowed. Violators will be removed post haste.

2) Debate is welcome here, but be civil and respectful. However, snark or smack towards those who are obviously disrespectful or just being plain scmucky will be allowed at my discretion. To avoid that, simply don't be a schmuck or a bootyhole.

3) THIS IS A PRO SEX-WORK/PRO-SEX WORKER INSTANCE. My bias is clear and distinct; I am for full decriminalization of sex work and full and free adult sexual expression and exchange. Don't come here expecting to change my core beliefs; you won't be successful.

Consensual sexual adult speech and media is more than welcome here. However, it's strongly suggested for the sake of respect towards the squeamish and sensitive that you label any nudity or explicit sexual content as "sensitive".

Do not upload any content that does not involve legal consensual *adult* sexual acts, images, or language. Also, sexual content involving animals or children, scat, golden showers, or lack of consent IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED, and subject to instant removal and banishment of its provider.

Spamming of links to adult sites is strictly prohibited and subject to instant banishment. Linkage to official adult sites of performers is allowed, as long as it goes to the splash pages of the content providers, or to legitimate fan support sites. "Catfishing" to fake sites is strictly prohibited.

This instance is explicitly and very much Left of center. I toot from a sex-positive feminist/Independent Left/Socialist POV; and my opinions are mine alone. Take it as you wish. Your opinions of me do not matter, unless I make it so.

I reserve to myself as administrator and moderator of this instance the right to run it as I see fit, and my decisions are final, and not subject to debate. This is not a free carrier for abuse, hate, bigotry, poop posting, or otherwise hostile speech. Don't temp fate!

mastodon.researchinstitute.at.text: Keine Inhalte, die die Unterdrückung von Mitgliedern marginalisierter Gruppen fördern oder befürworten. Keine Belästigung, kein Stalking, kein Mobbing, kein Deadnaming/Misgendern. Keine Diskussion, wenn Leute klarmachen, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden wollen.
Keine Inhalte, die in Österreich illegal sind. Keine Handlungen, die dieser Instanz schaden (sei es der Technik, dem Ruf oder der Sicherheit).
Keine automatisierten Accounts (außer wenn mit der Moderation abgeklärt). Das gilt insbesondere für Bots, Crossposter, Feedposter usw.

Keine NSFW Inhalte!
Posts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen CWs (Inhaltswarnungen) für Gewalt, Sex, Tod/Krankheit.
Posts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen Bildbeschreibungen.

mastodon.scollectif.fr.text: L’inscription sur l’instance SCOllectif implique le respect de la charte d’utilisation et de modération de l’instance mastodon.scollectif.fr, le contenu des publications doivent rester en adéquation avec les valeurs et le projet de l'association.
Les usagers de cette instance demeurent responsables de leurs identifiants, de leurs comptes et de ce qu’ils peuvent écrire ou dire.
Les usagers de cette instance sont responsables de la protection des mineurs contre des contenus dégradants, violents ou favorisant leur corruption.
Les usagers de l’instance doivent respecter les personnes (pas d’atteinte à la vie privée ou au secret de la correspondance, ni d’injures ou de diffamation).
Toute forme d’incitation à la haine, à la violence ou la discrimination est proscrite.
Les usagers de l’instance doivent respecter le droit d’auteur et le code de la propriété intellectuelle.

En cas de réception d’un message contenant des éléments inappropriés (à caractère raciste, violent, pornographique ou injurieux), les usagers de l’instance doivent informer le compte @scollectif@mastodon.scollectif.fr
En cas de non-respect des règles établies, les modérateurs peuvent supprimer des messages, limiter ou suspendre les droits d’accès. Des poursuites peuvent être engagées si nécessaire.

mastodon.scop.coop.text: La loi française s'applique à ce serveur et la modération sera effectuée conformément à la législation en vigueur mais ira encore plus loin, sans tolérer aucune forme d'intolérance.

Adressez-vous aux personnes avec respect et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter quelconque interaction (mention, discussion, etc.), arrêtez immédiatement. Autrement, cela pourra être considéré comme du harcèlement.
Est interdit de recueillir, publier et/ou diffuser les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son consentement explicite.

Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos à caractère calomnieux, outrancier, outrageux, diffamatoire, injurieux, raciste, sexiste, homophobe, transphobe, nudité, pornographie, incitant à la violence ou la discrimination. Ces contenus feront l'objet d'un signalement immédiat.
Sont interdits tous propos incitant la perpétration d'un crime ou d'une infraction et à propager des actes malveillants.

Sont interdits, conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée. Ils seront supprimés et les comptes impliqués supprimés (si local) ou bloqués (si distants).
Sont interdites les avances ou demandes à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Est interdit toute publicité répétée(spam) et/ou intrusive (mentionnant d'autres utilisateurs·ices). Ne rejoignez pas l'instance dans un simple but promotionnel.
En fonction de la gravité des faits, un certain nombre de réactions sont possibles, allant d'un simple rappel à l'ordre jusqu'au bannissement de l'utilisateur·ice fautif·ve.

Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.

Sexuelle oder gewalttätige Medien müssen bei der Veröffentlichung als sensibel gekennzeichnet werden.

wir befolgen  den Mastodon Server Covenant

mastodon.scot.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

mastodon.sdf.org.text: This server abides by the Mastodon Covenant
Organizations are welcome to engage with the community in a non-commercial, non-advertising manner.
Artists, musicians, writers and artisans are welcome to engage with the community regarding their craft.
Do not engage in harassment, hateful content or posts of a derogatory nature.
Do not make advertising posts for the sake of purely promoting a commercial product or service.
Content originating from this site may not be used for machine training or other data mining activities without the individual author's consent.

mastodon.schub.social.text: As with any self-hosted server, the rules are what I want them to be. It's fun, you should host your own server, too! (If you have the resources and abilities, that is. It's perfectly fine to use another server if you don't!)

mastodon.seattlematrix.org.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a Content Warning.
Gratuitously obscene content serving no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
Hate speech, abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted.
Lack of a specific rule does not mean something is permitted.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication that the account is unofficial and/or parody.
No attacks against (or from) the instance.
Above borrowed with love from Infosec.Exchange

mastodon.snmsoc.org.text: No racism. However, "reverse racism" does not exist.

mastodon.snld.ca.text: Respect others: Avoid hate speech, bullying, and harassment. Treat others with kindness, respect, and understanding, regardless of their background, beliefs, or opinions.
Embrace Diversity: Celebrate and embrace differences in race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, and more.
No Spam or Scams: Avoid posting spam, excessive self-promotion, excessive advertising, or false information.
Be Mindful of Content: Be mindful of the content you post. Avoid posting explicit or graphic material and respect others' privacy by not sharing their personal information without their consent.
No Trolling or Incitement: Avoid engaging in trolling or inciting others, including making inflammatory comments or starting arguments.
Follow the Law: Do not engage in any illegal activities or post content that violates any laws or regulations.
Have Fun: This is a social platform, so remember to have fun and enjoy the community!

mastodon.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
mastodon.social.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

mastodon.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
mastodon.social.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

mastodon.social.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
mastodon.social.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

mastodon.social.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
mastodon.social.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

mastodon.social.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
mastodon.social.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

mastodon.social.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
mastodon.social.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

mastodon.stickbear.me.text: ABSOLUTELY ZERO TOLERANCE of child pornography, or discussions of minors in inappropriate and explicit manners.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No content illegal in Canada, The United States, or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm.

Be Decent Do not harass, insult, discriminate against, or otherwise intentionally harm other users of any kind, local or federated. Do not deliberately spread misinformation, including pseudoscience and conspiracy theories.
Parody and accounts intended to impersonate are not permitted.
Be Sentient Avoid creating advertising or bot accounts on this instance without permission. There may be exceptions, but it is best to consult with either of the administrators before going ahead.
Be Lawful Do not post or link to content that could get us hit with a violation of copyright. Only post personally identifiable information if you have explicit permission to do so.

Be Mindful Politics, Religion, and other controversial topics should be posted behind a content warning. Be mindful of people you interact with, as they may have had experiences drastically different from yours, including severe psychological or physical trauma.

Describe your content. Please try to describe your media posts to the best of your ability to accommodate disabilities such as blindness and deafness. If you cannot do so, there is nothing wrong with asking for help. Currently, tagging @ImageCaptionsPls@a.gup.pe is the best way to do so.
Please post any sexual content as Unlisted or stricter, and make sure to add an appropriate content warning.

Cross posting (using software to post the same content on multiple social media services) is only allowed if you regularly check your account here and interact with notifications. IMPORTANT: Please do not cross post twitter retweets or quoted tweets!

bans, violators, etc. If you are caught violating these rules you will be informed of your violation, exactly what the violation is, and depending on the sevarity of the violation your account may be suspended or perminantly terminated with or without warning.

coming from another instance. If your coming over from somewhere else, due to being terminated, your account is subject to stricter review and limitations. Note that even if your account is approved, if violations come to light, from instances you left previously, your account may be terminated.

The password When signing up, please include the following password alongside your reason in the why you'd like to join text. woof. This ensures to us that you have indeed read and will abide by the rules set forth in this instance! make a complete sentence with the password in it if you can!

mastodon.tekdmn.me.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.

Remember that different communities may have different standards for communication, choice of words, and expectations of civility. It's not your job to determine what is and is not acceptable tone, topic, or language, for the greater Mastodon community.

mastodon.teia.art.text:
Read the Full Code of Conduct/Core Values/Terms & Conditions document here:
https://github.com/teia-community/teia-docs/wiki/Core-Values-Code-of-Conduct-Terms-and-Conditions#code-of-conduct
We do not condone harassment or abuse against any member in any community environment, online or offline, for any reason. Abusive actors can get banned from any Teia related spaces.
Be civil and respect each other. Don't harass, impersonate, or belittle others. Respect each others personal boundaries.
Don't post spam or vandalize the space.
Look for ways to contribute and find positive solutions. Stay open minded and empathetic around areas of improvements. And take initiative to help out where you can.
If you see something wrong, voice it and try to help people without a voice.

mastodon.tetaneutral.net.text: L'ouverture et l'utilisation d'un compte sur cette instance implique le respect de la législation française en vigueur.
Tout contenu manifestement illégal sera supprimé ou bloqué dès lors qu'il est signalé à l'équipe de modération.

Afin de ne pas encourager le harcèlement en ligne, tout pouet signalé comme injurieux ou constituant aux yeux des personnes qui le voient une agression sera supprimé. La répétition des signalements de ce type peut entrainer la suspension du compte. (ajout le 2 août 2023)

Le fascisme, le racisme et l'anti-sémitisme avancent souvent masqués sur les réseaux sociaux. Si un pouet est signalé pour l'une de ces raisons, il sera traité et supprimé comme tel, même s'il peut paraitre inoffensif. La répétition des signalements amènera à la suspension du compte.

mastodon.theshowshow.tv.text: Impersonation is strictly forbidden. Anyone caught impersonating may face account termination. Impersonation does not necessarily mean a specific person. It can also mean using misleading usernames (E.g., containing "admin").

Keep it friendly. We all have good days, and we all have bad days. Some of us are wicked video producers with tons of experience, and others are brand new to the content creator game. This is a place where no matter how your day is going, you'll treat other people with respect.

Try to be helpful. A big part of this community is about sharing our own experience and knowledge with others. Have you created a tutorial? Publish it here. See a question or struggling creator? Share your knowledge. Let's build a great community together.

This server is for content creators. Clearly, the discussion doesn't always have to be about content creation or production, however if you are not a content creator, this is not the server for you. Please read the About page for more details about the focus of this server.

On this server, we respect all people. Period. If you disrespect any person or group, or attempt to use our server as a "platform" for your own agenda which could be perceived as disrespectful toward any other person or group, your account may be terminated at our moderator's discretion.

mastodon.thenewoil.org.text: Our most up-to-date community guidelines are available here: https://thenewoil.org/en/rules/

Treat everyone equally and with respect.
No form of hate speech or discrimination is allowed.
No illegal content, including discussions and recommendations.

mastodon.thomaspreece.net.text: This instance does not host NSFW accounts or content. Anything that is even slightly non-family-friendly is CWed.
All images should have descriptive text. All accounts are following @PleaseCaption@botsin.space in order to be reminded of missing captions.
General decency is expected on this instance. I don't ever post anything racist, homophobic, transphobic, discriminatory, hateful, harassing or dishonest.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom will be posted on this instance.

Accounts or content from other instances that contravene this code of conduct will be blocked. This instance does not knowingly federate with instances that are generally considered harmful by the wider Fediverse community.

mastodon.tinyfox.dev.text: All images featuring animals must be suitable for all ages, including minors, and must not contain any explicit, graphic or violent content.
No images of animal cruelty or abuse will be tolerated. This includes but is not limited to images of animals being hunted, trapped, or subjected to any form of physical harm or violence.
Images of animals in captivity or in zoos must be respectful and not exploit the animals in any way.

Images of animals in the wild must not disturb their natural habitats or behaviors. This includes but is not limited to images of animals being fed by humans or interacting with human-made structures.
No images featuring dead or hunted animals for sport or personal gain will be allowed. This includes images of taxidermy or hunting trophies.
Any images featuring animals must have proper context and should not be used for misinformation or spreading false information.
If an image featuring an animal is posted, it must not be used to promote or glorify speciesism, hate speech or any form of discrimination.

All images featuring animals must be in accordance with the laws and regulations related to the treatment and depiction of animals, including but not limited to animal welfare laws, endangered species laws, and wildlife protection laws.
Any image that does not comply with these rules may be removed by the server administrators without prior notice. Repeat offenders may face temporary or permanent bans from the server.

If you have any questions or concerns about these rules, please reach out to the server administrators for clarification. We aim to maintain a safe and respectful environment for all users, including our animal friends.
Replies to posts featuring animals must also adhere to the same guidelines and rules listed above.

No inappropriate or offensive comments will be allowed in response to animal posts. This includes but is not limited to hate speech, abusive language, or derogatory comments about the animal or its species.
Replies should be respectful and not exploit or degrade the animal depicted in the post.
All opinions and discussions in replies should be based on facts and credible information. Misinformation or spreading false information about the animal or its species will not be tolerated.
We encourage all users to engage in respectful and educational discussions about animals, their habitats, and their welfare. Let's work together to promote empathy and compassion for all species.

mastodon.tn.text: Soyez respectueux envers les autres utilisateurs.

Pas de racisme, ou de sexisme.
Pas d’incitation à la violence ou de promotion d’idéologies violentes.
Pas de harcèlement et d’intimidation d’autres utilisateurs.
Ne pas partager d’informations intentionnellement fausses ou trompeuses.

mastodon.twictee.org.text: L’inscription sur l’instance Twictée implique le respect de la charte d’utilisation et de modération de l’instance mastodon.twictee.org. Le contenu des publications doit rester en adéquation avec les valeurs et le projet de l'association.
Les usagers de cette instance demeurent responsables de leurs identifiants, de leurs comptes et de ce qu’ils peuvent écrire ou dire.
Les usagers de cette instance sont responsables de la protection des mineurs contre des contenus dégradants, violents ou favorisant leur corruption.
Les usagers de l’instance doivent respecter les personnes (pas d’atteinte à la vie privée ou au secret de la correspondance, ni d’injures ou de diffamation).
Toute forme d’incitation à la haine, à la violence ou la discrimination est proscrite.
Les usagers de l’instance doivent respecter le droit d’auteur et le code de la propriété intellectuelle.

En cas de réception d’un message contenant des éléments inappropriés (à caractère raciste, violent, pornographique ou injurieux), les usagers de l’instance doivent informer le compte @plomberie@mastodon.twictee.org.
En cas de non-respect des règles établies, les modérateurs peuvent supprimer des messages, limiter ou suspendre les droits d’accès. Des poursuites peuvent être engagées si nécessaire.

mastodon.uniastur.com.text: No discriminación: cualquier transgresión del espíritu del artículo 2 de la Declaración Universal de los Derechos Humanos será expulsión directa.

Sin recursos: la disponibilidad del servidor más allá del 95% no está garantizada y la posibilidad de pérdida de datos por copias de seguridad deficientes es muy probable. No implica expulsión pero sí por adelantado un perdón por las molestias que se causarán.

Eficiencia: debido a no existir presupuesto el servidor no es ilimitado con lo que un alto consumo de recursos como disco duro, procesador, RAM... podría llevar a una expulsión amistosa (avisando con tiempo para que se puedan exportar los datos e irse a otro servidor).
Presunción de adultez: cualquier comportamiento no esperable por un adulto (insultos, acoso, spam...) no tiene cabida aquí, es decir, será expulsión directa.

Libertad: si no te gusta este servidor ni sus normas cierra la pestaña del navegador, abre otra y busca cómo montarte tu servidor para adaptarlo a tus normas. Que la ventaja de internet es esa ¡aprovéchala!

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not intentionally share misleading information

Organizations and companies must use their organization/company e-mail address when signing up. Although we reccomend that they set-up their own instance or using an managed hosted Mastodon platform (see ToS)
Do not try to inpersonate other users or brands. Unless it's a parody. But keep it civilized.

mastodon.vtip.me.text: No spoilers (unless properly marked and warned)!
No racism, sexism, anti-Semitism, transphobia, homophobia, ableism or gender discrimination will be tolerated!
Don't be a jerk!  Be kind to others.  No trolling, harassment, personal attacks, doxing, dog piling or overall a**holery.
No violent threats or incitement to violence!
No disinformation or misinformation. Spread quality information to the community.
When in doubt ask. NSFW items should be avoided (unless it's good)!
Don't just sit there! Introduce yourself when you become a member!
Don't be offended if this is not the right community for you. Come and go as you wish. Invite others you think would enjoy and contribute to this community.
Be mindful!  This is a public forum.  Unless you know how to (i.e. DM) do not share phone numbers, email addresses, home address, locations where you are or will be, etc.
Remember this is a private server!  No guarantees it will be around forever or safeguard your data. Use at your own risk!!
Use common internet sense. While people here may seem nice, they may not be.  Do not communicate with people you don't know outside this space unless you take precautions.
Unless otherwise noted, this is not a place for kids.  18 and over please.

mastodon.well.com.text: Do not use slurs based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, ethnicity or national origin.

Do not promote violence toward or engage in harassment of any individual or group. “Harassment” includes posting private information that makes it easier for others to target an individual ("doxing"). Harassment may also include taunting, being deliberately provocative or posting in bad faith.

Do not use your account to post irrelevant advertisements, promote high-risk investment opportunities, or link to sites that may install malware. Announcing, linking to or promoting your own work
is allowed.
Do not knowingly or repeatedly spread misinformation, especially about important topics of public concern such as elections or epidemics.

Demonstrate awareness of community expectations and use best practices for hiding explicit posts and graphic images behind content warnings. Use privacy tools to limit the audience for your posts if appropriate.
Follow relevant laws, including the DMCA. See https://www.well.com/tools-and-help/member-agreement/ and  https://www.well.com/tools-and-help/dmca-policy/ for complete rules

mastodon.world.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
A Content Warning must always be used when posting all other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No “shitposting” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” here.
No targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy".
Banner and Avatar images must comply with the other rules, so no NSFW images etc

mastodon.xy-space.de.text: There is no room here for insults, hatred, misinformation, falsified data, racism, Nazism, homophobia, hostility towards the disabled, faecal language, threats to minors, and the like... this applies to texts as well as pictures and videos.

Hier ist kein Platz für Beleidigungen, Hass, Fehlinformationen, gefälschte Daten, Rassismus, Nazismus, Homophobie, Behindertenfeindlichkeit, Fäkalsprache, Bedrohung von Minderjährigen und dergleichen... dies gilt sowohl für Texte als auch für Bilder und Videos.

Il n'y a pas de place ici pour les insultes, la haine, la désinformation, les données falsifiées, le racisme, le nazisme, l'homophobie, l'hostilité envers les handicapés, le langage ordurier, les menaces envers les mineurs, etc... ceci s'applique aussi bien aux textes qu'aux images et aux vidéos.

Здесь нет места оскорблениям, ненависти, дезинформации, фальсификации данных, расизму, нацизму, гомофобии, враждебному отношению к инвалидам, фекальным выражениям, угрозам в адрес несовершеннолетних и тому подобному... это относится как к текстам, так и к изображениям и видео.

Aquí no tienen cabida los insultos, el odio, la desinformación, los datos falsificados, el racismo, el nazismo, la homofobia, la hostilidad hacia los discapacitados, el lenguaje fecal, las amenazas a los menores y similares... esto se aplica tanto a los textos como a las imágenes y los vídeos.

Qui non c'è spazio per insulti, odio, disinformazione, dati falsificati, razzismo, nazismo, omofobia, ostilità verso i disabili, linguaggio fecale, minacce ai minori e simili... Questo vale sia per i testi che per le immagini e i video.

Тут немає місця образам, ненависті, дезінформації, фальсифікації даних, расизму, нацизму, гомофобії, ворожості до інвалідів, ненормативній лексиці, погрозам неповнолітнім тощо... Це стосується як текстів, так і фото- та відеоматеріалів.

Burada hakaret, nefret, yanlış bilgilendirme, tahrif edilmiş veriler, ırkçılık, Nazizm, homofobi, engelli düşmanlığı, dışkı dili, küçüklere yönelik tehditler ve benzerlerine yer yoktur... Bu, metinler, resimler ve videolar için de geçerlidir.

Εδώ δεν υπάρχει χώρος για προσβολές, μίσος, παραπληροφόρηση, παραποιημένα στοιχεία, ρατσισμό, ναζισμό, ομοφοβία, εχθρότητα προς τα άτομα με αναπηρία, περιττώματα, απειλές προς ανηλίκους και άλλα παρόμοια... αυτό ισχύει τόσο για κείμενα όσο και για εικόνες και βίντεο.

Siin ei ole ruumi solvangutele, vihkamisele, valeinformatsioonile, võltsitud andmetele, rassismile, natsismile, homofoobiale, vaenulikkusele puuetega inimeste suhtes, fekaalsele keelele, alaealiste ähvardamisele jms... see kehtib nii tekstide kui ka piltide ja videote kohta.

Šeit nav vietas apvainojumiem, naidam, dezinformācijai, viltotiem datiem, rasismam, nacismam, homofobijai, naidīgumam pret invalīdiem, fekālijām, draudiem nepilngadīgajiem un tamlīdzīgi... tas attiecas gan uz tekstiem, gan attēliem un video.

Čia nėra vietos įžeidimams, neapykantai, dezinformacijai, suklastotiems duomenims, rasizmui, nacizmui, homofobijai, priešiškumui neįgaliesiems, fekalijoms, grasinimams nepilnamečiams ir panašiai... Tai taikoma tiek tekstams, tiek nuotraukoms ir vaizdo įrašams.

Nie ma tu miejsca na obelgi, nienawiść, dezinformację, fałszowanie danych, rasizm, nazizm, homofobię, wrogość wobec osób niepełnosprawnych, język fekalny, groźby wobec nieletnich i tym podobne... dotyczy to zarówno tekstów, jak i zdjęć oraz filmów.

Nie ma tu miejsca na obelgi, nienawiść, dezinformację, fałszowanie danych, rasizm, nazizm, homofobię, wrogość wobec osób niepełnosprawnych, język fekalny, groźby wobec nieletnich i tym podobne... dotyczy to zarówno tekstów, jak i zdjęć oraz filmów.
侮辱、憎悪、誤報、データの改ざん、人種差別、ナチズム、同性愛、障害者への敵意、汚い言葉、未成年者への脅迫など、テキストだけでなく画像やビデオにも適用されます。

Her er der ikke plads til fornærmelser, had, misinformation, forfalskede oplysninger, racisme, nazisme, homofobi, fjendtlighed over for handicappede, fækal sprogbrug, trusler mod mindreårige og lignende... dette gælder både for tekster, billeder og videoer.

mastodonmusic.social.text:
Be good and kind to each other.
Give people's music a try.  You don't have to like it, but you also don't have to tell everyone you don't like it either.
Polite disagreements are fine but being rude will get you banned.
Invalidating someone else's music preferences, except for intolerant types of music (hate music etc) will earn a ban.
No advertisements except of musical bands or acts and related ads.  "My band is on tour" is fine.  "My cryptocurrency ad has music!" is not fine.
Links to illegal content are banned, especially music downloads you don't permission to distribute.
NSFW content without tagging will get you banned.
If you're looking for Mastodon that rock / metal band, they're over at @mastodonmusic@mastodon.social (they're welcome to be here too but wow, epic namespace crossover).
No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion.
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France and/or United States, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.

Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).  Weird that this might happen on a music instance, but yet here we are...
Mastodon Music has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying — your account will be immediately suspended.

No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam.  One big exception is direct posts by musicians about their music and concerts.  For now there's no rule on corporate posts, but if things get noisy and less-useful, we'll reword this to exclude excessive-profit-generating posts.

Prefer music purchase links over streaming links.  
(This isn't a hard and enforced rule, but musicians need everyone's support.  In other words, post Bandcamp or Store links at the top, and Spotify / YT Music links in the reply or comment whenever possible.)

Twitter and Meta etc have a documented history of enabling hate speech under the guise of "free" speech. This is bad for the world. Ultimately the safety of the users of this server is paramount. If you want to connect with Threads users, another server is your best bet.

mastodonkenya.com.text:
Respect and Tolerance:

Treat all users with respect and kindness.
Hate speech, harassment, and discrimination based on race, ethnicity, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, religion, disability, or age are strictly prohibited.

Content and Conduct:

No posting of illegal content, including child pornography, violent threats, or anything that violates local and international laws.
Explicit adult content must be marked as sensitive and should be properly tagged to ensure appropriate warnings.

Intellectual Property:

Respect copyright laws and do not share pirated or unauthorized content.
Properly attribute content when sharing others' work and ensure you have permission to do so.

User Interactions:

Encourage constructive and respectful dialogue.
Avoid engaging in or encouraging flame wars or trolling.
Report any abusive behavior to the moderators instead of responding directly.

Safety and Well-being:

Do not post content that glorifies or promotes self-harm, suicide, or violence.
Offer support and report concerns if you notice someone in distress or exhibiting harmful behavior.

Content Warnings and Sensitivity:

Use content warnings (CW) for posts that might be sensitive or triggering, such as discussions about politics, mental health, or graphic content.
Be considerate and mindful of the diverse audience and their potential sensitivities.

Moderation and Enforcement:

The moderation team reserves the right to warn, suspend, or ban users who violate these rules.
Decisions made by the moderation team are final and are made to ensure the safety and integrity of the community.

Bot and Automated Accounts:

Clearly label any bot or automated accounts.
Ensure bots do not spam or disrupt regular user interactions.

Language and Communication:

Primarily use the language(s) supported by the server for public posts.
Respect the language preferences of users when communicating directly.

Reporting Violations:

Use the provided tools to report any violations of these rules.
Provide as much context and evidence as possible when reporting issues.

mastodonczech.cz.text: Rasistické, sexistické, homofobní či xenofobní projevy jsou zakázány
Nepublikujte obsah, který porušuje zákony České republiky
Sexuálně explicitní nebo násilné příspěvky musí být při zveřejňování označené jako citlivé
Nepovolujeme vydávání se za veřejně známé osobnosti či instituce. Parodické účty musí být jasně označeny.

mastodonsweden.se.text: Must follow Code of Conduct, and you must be able to read the CoC which is found in Swedish down below.
Content must adhere to Swedish or European laws.
Absolutely no harassment of any kind, this is covered by the CoC.
Anything remotely NSFW should be labeled as such and hidden and is in general not advised to post at all. Like blood, gore, violence, sexual images and videos.
No advertising. You may advertise your own work to a reasonable extent, reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:    
Excessive advertising, Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, 
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:    
Racism, Sexism, Casteism or advocation of thereof

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:    
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof,

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:    
 Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism, Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:    
Sexual depictions of children, Content illegal in Sweden, Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

mastodoom.social.text: Please abide by the community standards.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.

mastodont.cat.text: No és permès fer publicitat ni spam.
L'ús de "crossposters" está acceptat només si és des de mastodont.cat cap a Twitter.
Aquest servidor bloqueja totes les instàncies del programari birdsitelive
La política de retenció dels fitxers multi mèdia remots és de 30 dies (seràn esborrats automàticament als 30 dies). Els arxius d'usuari seran esborrats als 7 dies.
Està prohibida qualsevol mostra de racisme, xenofòbia o homofòbia contra cap usuari local o remot.
L'ús d'altres llengües diferents del català en la majoria dels tuts publicats, pot provocar un avís i fins i tot suspensió del compte si és repetitiu.
Està prohibida qualsevol mostra de nuesa, excepte quan aquesta tingui una procedència artística reconeguda i estigui degudament referenciada en el contingut del missatge

Està prohibida qualsevol mostra explícita de contingut sexual o pornogràfic, i especialment aquelles que continguin pederàstia o impliquin a menors d'edat, fet que a més serà denunciat a les autoritats pertinents.
No és permeten faltes de respecte contra usuaris locals o remots.

Els serveis addicionals de Blog (Wordpress), Git (Forgejo) i xmpp (Ejabberd), estan dedicats als usuaris actius. Els comptes registrats en aquests serveis addicionals seran esborrats si es detecta una falta d'activitat, a mastodont.cat i en els darrers 30 dies, dels usuaris locals relacionats.

mastorol.es.text: Está prohibido faltarle al respecto a un usuario de esta u otras instancias.
Está prohibido todo comentario de caracter homófobo, tránsfobo, sexista, capacitista y en términos generales discriminatorio.
Está prohibido el contenido religioso que sea intolerante, así como el fascista o que ponga en conflicto a los usuarios de la instancia.
Está prohibida la difusión de fake news así como cualquier otro método de desinformación, provocando el borrado de dichos toots.
Está prohibido hacer spam de manera reiterada. La publicidad está permitida, pero cualquier abuso de la misma provocará un aviso y una sanción posterior si el aviso es ignorado.

El contenido explícito (NSFW) debe ser marcado como contenido sensible, añadiendo los CW correspondientes. Así mismo, las cuentas que se dediquen en exclusiva a subir este tipo de contenido no están permitidas en la instancia.
Las cuentas que son creadas para jugar a rol dentro de la instancia (cuentas de roleplay) están permitidas pero deberán hacer sus toots de rol/ficha de personaje como toots No Listados o Privados.

Está prohibida la distribución de material con derechos de autor sin el permiso explícito de los poseedores de dichos derechos. Esto incluye (pero no se limita a) imágenes, videos, PDFs, música, etcétera.

mastoot.fr.text: Pas de spam ni de Bot cross-post (cas particulier, contactez l'admin avant)

Évitez l'utilisation du mot "Pouet" (qui a une connotation misogyne) : utilisez plutôt "Toot" ou "Publier"
/!\ Si vous ne recevez pas le mail de confirmation, envoyez-moi un mail à contact@stefofficiel.me il se peut que ça arrive dans vos SPAMS /!\

mastotut.cat.text: Gaudiu i mantingueu relacions humanes. Si no respecteu els altres, no vingueu

mathstodon.xyz.text: Don’t do anything that’s illegal in the UK or EU.
Aggression and elitism are unwelcome here - it’s not a competition. Don’t assume you know better than the person you’re talking to.

We want to be inclusive; do not engage in exclusionary behaviour or language against anyone based on their race, caste, gender (binary, assigned or otherwise), disability, mental health, sexual orientation, level of education or age.
Don’t make exclusionary jokes. Don’t even make them “ironically”.
Don’t harass people. Unconsented contact or sexual attention can constitute harassment, even if it wasn’t intended to cause upset. Dressing or acting in a certain way is not consent.
