md.5273.me.text: Trolling and Spamming: Mastodon is a community-driven platform, not a playground for trolls or spammers. Avoid posting repetitive, irrelevant, or misleading content with the intention of disrupting others' experiences. Report any suspicious activity to our moderators.
Free Speech Absolutist: "I detest what you say, but I would give my life to defend your right to say it." ~ Voltaire (Dec. 11, 1770)

mcr.wtf.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the United Kingdom
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
No spam or SEO. Accounts existing entirely or mostly of spam will be suspended. Self promotion and limited advertising is acceptable, especially where relevant to the community.
No posting in languages other than English. Unfortunately this makes moderation impossible for us.

mastodon.wg0.xyz.text: Запрещается повторение деструктивной риторики российской пропаганды на тему войны, либо её поддержка. Для проверки: всё, что сейчас в РФ льётся с "разрешённых" каналов и СМИ - пропаганда.

Запрещается продвижение антинаучных точек зрения, вроде поддержки гомеопатии, лечения молитвами, отрицание COVID-19 или отрицание того, что вакцины от него намного больше защищают, чем угрожают жизням.
Запрещается продвижение каких-либо религий и сект.
Запрещается поддержка развязывания войн, поддержка терроризма, поддержка уголовного преследования по политическим мотивам.
Запрещается при регистрации использовать электронную почту сервера которой находятся под контролем РФ. (yandex.ru, mail.ru, rambler.ru) Используйте gmail.com и подобные сервисы.
Запрещается размещение абсолютно любых ссылок на социальную сеть vk.ru

md.muyactual.com.text: IMPORTANTE: Las cuentas que no cumplan mayoritariamente con la temática de la instancia podrán ser suspendidas. Si no vas a cumplir la temática y normas de la instancia, NO te registres aquí.
Prohibidos discursos de odio (racismo, nazismo, transfobia...)
Prohibido el SPAM y limitaciones al "crossposting"
Oculta y avisa del contenido sensible
Cuentas no personales pidan permiso para usar la red
El idioma principal de la cuenta debe ser el español
No insulte, ofenda, ni moleste a otros usuarios
Prohibido contenido sexual con visibilidad pública (salvo arte no pornográfico)

md.uzla.net.text: 公序良俗に反する、またはそれらを助長するいかなる投稿を禁止します。これには、違法な行為、不適切な言葉遣い、暴力や性的内容を含む画像、動画を投稿したり共有する行為が含まれます。
人種、宗教、性別、性的指向、国籍、障碍、またはその他の特定のグループに対する蔑視や侮辱を目的とした差別的な言語使用を禁止します。誰もが安全に利用できるコミュニティを維持するため、ヘイトスピーチや差別的な発言は許容されません。
他のユーザーや第三者を威嚇、脅迫、人を傷つけるような言葉遣いは一切禁止します。また、暴力的な表現、脅迫、侮辱、人格攻撃など、他人を不快にさせる全ての行為を禁じます。
第三者の著作物を侵害する行為は禁止します。これには、イラスト、音楽、映像、文学作品、写真などが含まれます。著作権や知的財産権を尊重することが求められます。
他ユーザー、および第三者の個人情報を共有する行為は禁止します。これには、住所、電話番号、メールアドレスなど、特定の個人を特定できる情報が含まれます。
意図的に誤った情報を共有したり、誤解を招くような情報を流布する行為は禁止します。信頼性と正確性を保つことが重要です。
広告、プロモーション、またはその他の未承認の商業的な内容（いわゆるスパム）を送信したり、投稿することは禁止します。
SNS上で個人的な紛争をエスカレートさせることは避けてください。問題が発生した場合は、プライベートな通信手段を使用したり、必要な場合には適切な法執行機関に連絡してください。

我们欢迎各种思想，各种性取向，各种倾向的理性言论的发表，但反对一切谩骂，特别是针对种族、性别及性取向的言语攻击，我们支持你发表倾向性的看法，比如对某个事件、某个事物、某个种类的情绪性表达，但请注意你的言辞是否会给特定人群造成严重不适，无论是LGBT、特定性别、特定种族~ 长毛象宇宙是许多联邦构成的，维护整个宇宙的环境是每个小象义不容辞的责任~

medibubble.org.text: Beiträge, die eine Person oder Gruppe diskriminieren, sind nicht erlaubt. Dies betrifft insbesondere ableistische, transfeindliche, rassistische, homophobe, misogyne, misandrische und antisemitische Inhalte sowie vergleichbares.

Beiträge, die die freiheitlich-demokratische Grundordnung in Frage stellen oder gar gefährden, sind nicht erlaubt. Dazu gehört auch die Unterstützung undemokratischer Parteien, NGOs und Gruppierungen, wie beispielsweise der AfD, Querdenken oder Russia Today.
Beiträge, die gegen deutsches Recht verstoßen, sind nicht erlaubt. Dies betrifft insbesondere, aber nicht ausschließlich, Belästigung, Beleidigung, Verleumdung, Drohung und Doxing.
Für Verschwörungsmythen außerhalb eines vernünftigen Diskussionsrahmens bieten wir keine Plattform.

Wissenschaftliche Diskussionen sollen auf der Basis von Evidenz geführt werden, sofern diese vorhanden ist.
Entsprechende Falschaussagen und deren Verbreitung haben auf dieser Instanz keinen Platz.
Ein Verstoß kann durch Entfernen des Beitrags, Verwarnung, zeitweise Sperrung oder Löschung des Kontos sanktioniert werden.

Alle* haben das Recht, via Beitragsmeldung oder E-Mail an kontakt@medibubble.org zeitnah Hilfe zu erhalten.
Im Streitfall gilt hier das gleiche wie bei Munchkin: ob gegen eine Regel verstoßen wurde, entscheidet das Moderationsteam.

Vor der zeitweisen Sperrung oder Löschung eines Kontos soll die betroffene Person gehört werden. Widerspruch gegen Sanktionen wird im Vieraugenprinzip entschieden. Die Gründe werden mitgeteilt. Transparente Moderationsrichtlinien sollen nach und nach erarbeitet werden.

Instanzen, die gegen o.g. Regeln verstoßen oder solche Verstöße fördern, werden instanzweit gesperrt. 
Twitter-Relays werden instanzweit stummgeschaltet, sodass sie auffindbar sind, aber nicht aktiv angeboten werden. Einzelne dieser Botkonten werden nach Meldung des/der Betroffenen gesperrt.

medic.cafe.text: No snake oil, no "alternative" medicine. We keep it evidence based.
We're here to interact, meaning we do not allow bot-only accounts and view accounts auto-posting without any interaction in the comments or others' content with suspicion.
Hate speech, any form of discrimination, anything that violates the First Law, "do no harm," is strictly forbidden and will lead to a ban.

meemu.org.text: Content warnings required. Use common sense with Content Warnings(CWs). Tag nudity, politics, violence, and kink content. Tag anything lewd, or inappropriate for an office environment, generally considered stuff the average person wouldn't wish to see at work.
Don't abuse crossposting. Crossposters from other services must be CW'd and set as unlisted.
Use image descriptions as much as you can.
Harassment and abusive behaviors are not allowed. This includes harassing other instances because you disagree with their policies

We have a zero tolerance policy for racism, sexism, homophobia, promotion of right wing/nazi ideology, transphobia, ableism, animal abuse. We reserve the right to expand this list at moderator discretion for topics we may have missed.

No advertising This means no accounts on behalf or brands, or accounts representing organizations and/or for the purpose of advertisement allowed. Exceptions: personal accounts promoting artistic services like commissions.

You must be at least 18 years of age to register. Although we aren't an adult-oriented instance, we do federate with instances which are, and we cannot guarantee the timeline to be suitable for minors.

meerjungfrauengrotte.de.text: Gruppenbezogene Menschenfeindlichkeit, Rassismus, Sexismus, Antisemitismus, Nationalismus, Queerfeindlichkeit, Ableismus, Intoleranz, Diskriminierung werden auf diesem Server nicht geduldet

Respektiere andere Benutzys, sowohl auf dieser Instanz als auch im Fediverse. Absichtliches Misgendering und Deadnaming sowie das Empfehlen von Konversionstherapien werden nicht geduldet. Geschlechtergerechte Sprache ist erwünscht.
Verwende bei Bedarf Triggerwarnungen bzw. tagge Bilder bei Bedarf als NSFW ("Not Suitable For Work")

Offensichtlich sexualisierte Inhalte ohne Triggerwarnung und NSFW-Tag, Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sowie bloßstellende, beleidigende oder herabwürdigende Abbildungen werden auf diesem Server nicht geduldet
Beschimpfungen, Belästigungen, Stalking oder Doxxing sowie Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten werden auf diesem Server nicht geduldet
Verstöße gegen in Deutschland geltende Rechtsvorschriften sind nicht zulässig

Werbung von Künstler*innen und eher kleinen Unternehmen ist zulässig, wenn die beworbenen Produkte oder Dienstleistungen einen deutlichen Bezug zum Meer bzw. Mermaiding haben und Werbung nicht den einzigen Zweck der betreffenden Accounts darstellt
Bots sind zulässig, wenn sie im Profil ausdrücklich als Bots gekennzeichnet sind, nur ungelistet posten und ein #NoBot in Profilen respektieren
Bitte benutze die Meldefunktion für Spam sowie unzulässige Inhalte

megatherium.org.text: Megatherium.org is a private server. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone at any time for any reason.
Posting of the following types of content is not allowed: advertising and spam, pornographic or sexually explicit imagery, graphic violence

meh.social.text: All People registering an account on meh social are accepting these rules as the starting point for conduct guidance. You are also agreeing to review and abide by our to abide by our full Code of Conduct described in our About section.

No Person registering a meh.social account shall use the account for harassment, threat or intimidation, nor to compromise the safety, privacy or comfort of any other person on this or any other instance.

The following are not permitted anywhere on meh.social: Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism; promotion of fascist, supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism, including in choice of user name or avatar; willful mis/disinformation that may harm others.

The following are not permitted on the Public timelines: graphic sexual, violent, or otherwise disturbing images without a content/media warning; excessive advertising, spam, or excessive cross-posting; post forwarding from other instances/networks, including bots and repeaters.
No Person shall engage in behavior disruptive to the ongoing communication amongst others; if you are asked to cease an interaction or contact, publicly or personally, you will do so.

If a participant engages in behavior that does not conform to these rules, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including deletion of an account from meh.social and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

megalonyx.social.text: Be a personal friend of Al. This really is a private server for a couple of people.

mejia.social.text: Let's keep it simple. We want mejia.social to be inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
Please keep our space safe and family friendly for all . No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

I actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in my sole judgement any account that violates these rules. I also, from time to time, de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
By joining mejia.social you agree to adhere to these rules. Thank you!
Please understand - you have no privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including DMs, are publicly visible.
Please DO NOT post any copyrighted material anywhere on this Mastodon instance/server.

melendez.land.text: Respect Others: Treat fellow Mastodon users with kindness and courtesy. Remember that behind every avatar is a real person with feelings.

Mind Your Language: Keep the conversation friendly and inclusive. Avoid offensive language, hate speech, or anything that could make others uncomfortable. We're all adults here, but try to stick to this one :)
No Spamming or Trolling: Nobody likes their feed cluttered with spam. Keep the content meaningful and avoid any form of trolling or harassment.
Mind the Privacy: Be cautious about sharing personal information. Respect the privacy of others and avoid sharing content that could compromise anyone's safety.
Think Before You Post: Take a moment to consider the potential impact of your words. Remember, once it's out there, it's out there.
Give Credit Where Due: If you're sharing content or ideas from others, acknowledge the source.
Report, Don't Retaliate: If you encounter any issues or violations of the rules, report them to the moderators of the server that posted the toot. instead of engaging in confrontation.
Be Patient and Understanding: Not everyone will share your views. Be open to diverse opinions and engage in constructive discussions rather than heated arguments.

mellified.men.text: No trolling, bullying, or harassment of other users, on this instance or elsewhere. Honest conflicts are inevitable, but if someone asks you to leave them alone, you are expected to do so.
No endorsement of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, anti-Semitism, etc. Period.
Mark images in your posts that could be inappropriate for public viewing as "sensitive." This includes graphic violence, sexual content, and images that may be shocking.
Do not publicly reveal the personal information of others. This includes sharing the contents of other users' followers-only posts or direct messages without permission.
All content uploaded to this service must be legal in the United States.
No spamming or otherwise abusing this service. This includes followbots and other bots that interact with users without their consent.

Include a descriptive content warning (CW) if you're posting something that readers will likely find upsetting or prefer to be opt-in. Explicit discussion of sex and violence must always be CW'd. For everything else, use your judgment.

Welcome to the decentralised community! :love:
There are some basic rules everybody must follow.

 :dot: 1. Treat everyone with respect. Harrassment, Sexism, Racism, Hate-Speech, etc. can result in an instant ban from the server.

mementomori.social.text: Be kind. Be human to one another.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No content illegal in the following countries: Finland, United Kingdom, Germany
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No things above "We have questions" in the conspiracy chart. Look it up.
No spam, excess flood. No crypto ads (talking about cryptos and invesments are obviously allowed). No hoaxes. Companies are OK and being active does not equal spam.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
Accept using Mastodon Bird UI as your main theme. The theme is inspired by Twitter and is not the default Mastodon interface. It is exprerimental and in ongoing development.
Accept modifications to the Mastodon core. The most notable features are: 10000 character limit, bigger link previews, opt-out extensive open text search. See all of them at help.mementomori.social.

Accept the mortal nature of things, that anything can change in any moment and all rights to changes are reserved by the owner of this server (@rolle@mementomori.social). Accept that even though servers are the lifeline of the owner there could still be downtime (see status.mementomori.social).

Accept that we are using the nightly version of Mastodon. We are using the bleeding edge version of Mastodon and it may sometimes contain bugs. Accept that the owner of the server is not responsible of these bugs, they can be reported to github.com/mastodon/mastodon/issues.

memtech.social.text: By joining memtech.social, you are agreeing to follow the Python Code of Conduct (https://www.python.org/psf/conduct/)

menot.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

mendeddrum.org.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.

This server runs on hardware, free time and nerves donated by volunteers. Don't abuse any of the three.
Please do not upload videos; use video services like vimeo, youtube, or other services instead and post a link. This preserves storage and bandwidth and keeps costs down.

mental.social.text: 法に触れる行為や、医療行為をしない。

meow.cloud.text:
🟥 You may not post contents that violate Japanese laws.
🟧 您不得发布违反日本法律的内容。
🟨 您不得發布違反日本法律的內容。
🟩 日本の法令に違反する内容を投稿してはならない。
🟦 일본 법률을 위반하는 콘텐츠를 게시할 수 없습니다.

🟥 Pornography, violence, gore, and horror contents must be marked as sensitive and set to unlisted. You may not use such contents in avatar, header, or banner.
🟧 色情、暴力、血腥、恐怖内容必须被标记为敏感内容，并且设置为不公开。您不得在头像、头条或横幅中使用这些内容。
🟨 色情、暴力、血腥、恐怖內容必須被標記為敏感內容，並且設定為不公開。您不得在頭像、頭條或橫幅中使用這些內容。
🟩 ポルノ、暴力、ゴア、ホラーなどのコンテンツは、センシティブマークを付け、未収載に設定する必要があります。これらのコンテンツをお客様のアバター、ヘッダー、バナー等に使用することはできません。
🟦 음란물, 폭력, 유혈 및 공포 콘텐츠는 민감한 것으로 표시하고 미등록으로 설정해야 합니다. 이러한 콘텐츠는 고객의 아바타, 헤더, 배너 등에 사용할 수 없습니다.

🟥 You may not promote violence against, threaten, or harass others on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.
🟧 您不得以种族、民族、国籍、种姓、性取向、性别、性别认同、宗教信仰、年龄、残疾或严重疾病为由宣扬针对他人的暴力、威胁或骚扰。
🟨 您不得以種族、民族、國籍、種姓、性取向、性別、性別認同、宗教信仰、年齡、殘疾或嚴重疾病為由宣揚針對他人的暴力、威脅或騷擾。
🟩 人種、民族、国籍、カースト、性的指向、性別、性自認、宗教、年齢、障害、重病などに基づいて、他者への暴力を助長したり、脅迫したり、嫌がらせをしたりしてはなりません。
🟦 인종, 민족, 출신 국가, 카스트, 성적 취향, 성별, 성 정체성, 종교, 연령, 장애 또는 심각한 질병을 이유로 타인에 대한 폭력을 조장하거나 위협하거나 희롱할 수 없습니다.

🟥 You may not promote or encourage harassment or threaten violence against others, or incite other people to do so. This includes wishing or hoping that someone experiences physical harm, self-harm, or suicide.
🟧 您不得宣扬或鼓励骚扰或威胁对他人使用暴力，或煽动他人这样做。这包括期盼或希望某人遭受身体伤害、自残或自杀。
🟨 您不得宣揚或鼓勵騷擾或威脅對他人使用暴力，或煽動他人這樣做。這包括期盼或希望某人遭受身體傷害、自殘或自殺。
🟩 他者に対する嫌がらせや暴力の脅威を助長、奨励し、または他者を扇動してはなりません。これには、誰かが身体的危害を受けたり、自傷行為や自殺をすることを望んだりすることが含まれます。
🟦 괴롭힘을 조장하거나 조장하거나 다른 사람에 대한 폭력을 위협하거나 그렇게 하도록 선동해서는 안 됩니다. 여기에는 누군가가 신체적 상해, 자해 또는 자살을 경험하기를 바라는 것이 포함됩니다.

🟥 You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism.
🟧 您不得威胁或宣扬恐怖主义或暴力极端主义。
🟨 您不得威脅或宣揚恐怖主義或暴力極端主義。
🟩 テロ行為または暴力的過激主義をほのめかすことや助長することは禁じられています。
🟦 테러 또는 폭력적 극단주의를 위협하거나 조장해서는 안 됩니다.

🟥 You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or in furtherance of illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.
🟧 您不得将我们的服务用于任何非法目的或促进非法活动。这包括出售、购买或促进非法商品或服务的交易，以及某些类型的受管制商品或服务。
🟨 您不得將我們的服務用於任何非法目的或促進非法活動。這包括出售、購買或促進非法商品或服務的交易，以及某些型別的受管制商品或服務。
🟩 非合法な目的で、または違法な活動を促進させるためにTwitterのサービスを利用することを禁じます。こ当社のサービスを違法な目的または違法行為を助長する目的で使用してはならないものとします。これには、ある種の規制された商品またはサービスと同様に、違法な商品またはサービスの販売、購入、または取引の促進が含まれます。
🟦 불법적인 목적이나 불법적인 활동을 조장하기 위해 당사 서비스를 사용할 수 없습니다. 여기에는 특정 유형의 규제 대상 상품이나 서비스는 물론 불법 상품이나 서비스의 판매, 구매 또는 거래 촉진이 포함됩니다.

🟥 You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as address, phone number, intimate photos or videos) without their express authorization and permission. You may not threatening to expose private information or incentivizing others to do so.
🟧 未经他人明确授权和许可，您不得公布或张贴他人的私人信息（如地址、电话号码、私密照片或视频）。您不得威胁要暴露私人信息或鼓励他人这样做。
🟨 未經他人明確授權和許可，您不得公佈或張貼他人的私人資訊（如地址、電話號碼、私密照片或影片）。您不得威脅要暴露私人資訊或鼓勵他人這樣做。
🟩 他人の個人情報（住所、電話番号、親密な写真やビデオなど）を、本人の明示的な許可なく公開または投稿してはなりません。個人情報を公開するよう脅迫したり、他者にそのような行為をするよう煽ったりしてはいけません。
🟦 귀하는 다른 사람의 명시적 승인 및 허가 없이 다른 사람의 개인 정보(예: 주소, 전화번호, 친밀한 사진 또는 동영상)를 게시하거나 게시할 수 없습니다. 개인 정보를 노출하겠다고 위협하거나 다른 사람이 그렇게 하도록 장려해서는 안 됩니다.

🟥 You may not impersonate individuals, groups, or organizations in a manner that is intended to or does mislead, confuse, or deceive others.
🟧 您不得冒个人、团体或组织之名，计划或者实际做出误导、迷惑或欺骗他人的行为。
🟨 您不得冒個人、團體或組織之名，計劃或者實際做出誤導、迷惑或欺騙他人的行為。
🟩 他者を誤解させ、混乱させ、または欺くことを意図し、またはそのような方法で、個人、グループ、または組織になりすますことはできないものとします。
🟦 다른 사람을 오도하거나 혼동시키거나 기만할 의도가 있는 방식으로 개인, 그룹 또는 조직을 가장할 수 없습니다.

🟥 You may not use our services in a manner intended to artificially amplify, suppress, synthetic or manipulated information or engage in such behavior that manipulates or disrupts people’s experience on Meow Cloud or other Mastodon instances.
🟧 您不得以旨在人为放大、压制、合成或操纵信息的方式使用我们的服务，也不得从事操纵或扰乱用户在 Meow Cloud 或其他 Mastodon 实例上的体验的此类行为。
🟨 您不得以旨在人為放大、壓制、合成或操縱資訊的方式使用我們的服務，也不得從事操縱或擾亂使用者在 Meow Cloud 或其他 Mastodon 例項上的體驗的此類行為。
🟩 人為的に情報を増幅、抑制、合成、操作することを目的とした方法で当社のサービスを利用したり、Meow Cloudや他のマストドンインスタンスでの人々の体験を操作したり混乱させるような行為を行ってはならないものとします。
🟦 귀하는 정보를 인위적으로 증폭, 억제, 합성 또는 조작하기 위한 방식으로 당사 서비스를 사용하거나 Meow Cloud 또는 기타 Mastodon 인스턴스에서 사람들의 경험을 조작하거나 방해하는 행위에 가담할 수 없습니다.

🟥 You may not use Meow Cloud for political or religious purposes, including propaganda, fabrication and denigration of any country or region, political or religious group.
🟧 您不得将 Meow Cloud 用于政治或宗教目的，包括对任何国家和地区，政治或宗教团体的宣传、捏造和诋毁。
🟨 您不得將 Meow Cloud 用於政治或宗教目的，包括對任何國家和地區，政治或宗教團體的宣傳、捏造和詆譭。
🟩 Meow Cloud を、いかなる国や地域、政治的または宗教的集団の宣伝、捏造、誹謗中傷を含む、政治的または宗教的な目的のために使用することはできません。
🟦 국가 또는 지역, 정치 또는 종교 단체에 대한 선전, 날조 및 모욕을 포함하여 정치적 또는 종교적 목적으로 Meow Cloud를 사용할 수 없습니다.

🟥 You may not violate others’ intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark.
🟧 您不得侵犯他人的知识产权，包括版权和商标。
🟨 您不得侵犯他人的智慧財產權，包括版權和商標。
🟩 著作権や商標など、他者に帰属する知的財産権を侵害することは禁じられています。
🟦 저작권 및 상표권을 포함한 타인의 지적 재산권을 침해해서는 안 됩니다.

🟥 You may not use any interactive features (mentions, replies, direct messages, etc.), public timelines, unrelated tags to post, display, or promote any products or services. You may not post a promotion more than once in a 24-hour period.
🟧 您不得使用任何互动功能（提及、回复、私信等）、公共时间线、无关的标签来张贴、展示或推广任何产品或服务。您不得在24小时内发布多于一次的推广信息。
🟨 您不得使用任何互動功能（提及、回覆、私信等）、公共時間線、無關的標籤來張貼、展示或推廣任何產品或服務。您不得在24小時內釋出多於一次的推廣資訊。
🟩 インタラクティブ機能（メンション、返信、ダイレクトメッセージ等）、公開タイムライン、無関係のタグを使用して、製品またはサービスを投稿、表示、または宣伝してはならないものとします。24時間以内に1回以上プロモーションを掲載することはできません。
🟦 대화형 기능(멘션, 답장, 다이렉트 메시지 등), 공개 타임라인, 관련 없는 태그를 사용하여 제품 또는 서비스를 게시, 표시 또는 홍보할 수 없습니다. 24시간 동안 한 번 이상 프로모션을 게시할 수 없습니다.

metsubo-jinrai.net.text: 日本国内法は守ってください。法律違反や迷惑行為の自慢や助長する書き込み、犯罪に加担していそうだったり、法律に抵触するようなトゥートは禁止です。最悪警察や裁判所の要請に応じてログを開示することになります。
無修正エロ画像は絶対禁止です。その他のエロについては二次三次を問わず、18禁になりそうな文章にはCW:Content Warningを、画像にはNSFWタグを付けてください。例え付けていても日本国内法に抵触するような画像は禁止です。
スパム行為など迷惑行為にしか見えないような宣伝とかもやめてください。
自分がされたら嫌なことは他人にしない、みんな仲良く。 （どうしても合わない人とかいると思います、その場合はブロックやミュートを上手に活用してね）
本サーバーは1人の管理者によって管理されています。そのため、24時間365日の稼働や、障害の即時復旧などを保証するものではありません。
サーバーの設定・構成やサーバスペックについては、負荷度合いを見て調整を実施します。
サーバーのメンテナンスに伴う停止などは管理者アカウントにて告知します。
本サーバーの名前はテレビ特撮作品「仮面ライダーゼロワン」からきていますが、他の特撮作品の話題も大歓迎です。また特撮に関係ないことでも別に投稿していただいても問題ありません。

mikrobloggen.no.text: Mikrobloggen følger Mastodon Server Convenant som krever at vi skal slå ned på rasisme,  seksuell trakassering, homofobi og transfobi. Poster du ting som kan oppleves som forstyrrende for andre, (nakenhet, vold, m.m) bruk innholdsadvarsel for tekst og bilde. Ikke post noe som bryter norsk lov.

Brudd på regel nummer 1 medfører automatisk sletting av innlegg og skriftlig advarsel. Gjentatte brudd vil bli tatt opp i driftsrådet og kan i ytterste konsekvens medføre utestengning uten tilbakebetaling av medlemsskap.

Mikrobloggen har et driftsråd som er ansvarlige for å vedlikeholde reglene og diskutere eventuelle sanksjoner mot brukere som har brutt reglene flere ganger. Ingen enkeltstående vaktmester kan utestenge en bruker uten at det har vært diskutert i rådet.

Alle brukere på Mikrobloggen forplikter seg til å betale et årlig medlemsskap til Topdogs Sosietetsforening for å dekke sin del hosting-kostnaden. Medlemsskapsavgiften er satt til kr. 200. Brukere som ikke betaler blir automatisk utestengt 14 dager etter forfall.

mitchelltribe.social.text: No Sexually explicit or violent media. Please keep our space safe for all and family-friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

I actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in my sole judgment any account that violates these rules. I also, from time to time, de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
Please understand - you have no privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including DMs, are publicly visible.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No content that is illegal in the United States of America.
If there is an issue you think needs to be brought to attention DM @michael@mitchelltribe.social

mkultra.me.text: You will immediately cease and not continue to access the site if you are under the age of 18.
Mark sexually explicit or violent content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No posting of malicious links, spam or advertising.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality integrity or availability.

Automated posting: accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a "bot" in the user profile. Posts must be limited to one post/hour with post visibility set to "public". There is no limit on "unlisted" posts.
Admin and Moderators have final say in removing users. Admin has final say in defederating with instances.
Avoid getting this server banned from the fediverse, but if you do, bring it down spectacularly.

mkultra.monster.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression and hate of members of marginalized groups or communities.
We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user that would be considered block-evading. This includes sea-lioning.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Content that is illegal will be deleted and will lead to immediate account suspension.

moris.social.text: Respect and Kindness: Treat everyone with respect, kindness, and empathy. Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, and personal attacks will not be tolerated.
No Hate Speech: Hate speech, racism, sexism, or any form of discrimination will result in immediate removal from the server.

No Illegal Content: Do not post, share, or promote illegal content, including but not limited to child exploitation material (CP), illegal drugs, hacking, or any activities that violate local or international laws.
Content Guidelines: Do not post explicit, offensive, or adult content. Keep discussions and content suitable for all ages.
No Spam or Self-Promotion: Avoid spamming the server with excessive links or self-promotion. Promote your work or content responsibly and in relevant channels.
Privacy and Consent: Respect the privacy and consent of others. Do not share personal information about someone without their permission.
No Trolling or Flame Wars: Do not engage in trolling, flame wars, or intentionally disruptive behavior. Constructive criticism and civil discourse are encouraged.
Respect Copyright: Do not post copyrighted materials without proper permission or attribution. Always give credit to creators when sharing their work.
Stay On-Topic: Keep discussions relevant to the channels you're in. Use appropriate channels for specific topics.
No Impersonation: Do not impersonate other users, moderators, or public figures.
Reporting Concerns: If you witness any violations of these rules, report them to the moderators for swift and fair resolution.
English/French Preferred: While we celebrate Mauritius' cultural diversity, the primary language for communication on this server is English or French to ensure inclusivity.
No Political or Religious Debates: To maintain a peaceful environment, refrain from engaging in heated political or religious debates.
Use CWs for Sensitive Content: Use Content Warnings (CWs) for sensitive or potentially triggering content to give users the option to view or skip such posts.
Respect Server Staff: Follow the instructions and decisions of server administrators and moderators. They are here to maintain a positive community.
Stay Informed: Familiarize yourself with these rules and any updates to them. Ignorance of the rules is not an excuse for violations.

mrnet.pt.text: Try hard not to be an idiot... as a general rule, this is all you need to know.

Never insult strangers!  Unless you know the person,  and that is your thing as a group...You weirdos... Seriously,  I am not policing anyone; block people you dislike and be "violent" with your silence. You are all guests in my system, you have no right to mistreat my other guests.

No illegal activities of any kind! You are getting ME in trouble by posting or linking to illegal stuff -  not only will I kick your ass out of the gate, but also deliver your data to authorities. If you see something illegal, please report it to me ASAP.

Be mindful that I have NO COMMITMENT to keep the server running. The party will last as long as I am willing to pay for the drinks. It can end at any point in time. Sounds harsh, I know, but I have to be blunt about this...

You can bring people in (invite people to this server), but please make sure they behave and understand the rules. I am trusting you and your judgment... please don't let me down. If someone you invited is misbehaving let me know.

Mastodon provides you with moderation tools! You may mute/block users and/or entire instances; please don't expect me to provide you with a safe environment. Do it yourself; block/mute away to your heart's content.

ms.vg.text: Keine Inhalte, die die Unterdrückung von Mitgliedern marginalisierter Gruppen billigen oder befürworten, oder die allgemeine Diskriminierung von Gruppen aufgrund von Merkmalen wie Geschlecht, Rasse, Behinderung, Nationalität, Bildung, Religion usw.
Keine Belästigung, Stalking, Mobbing, Deadnaming, falsches Geschlecht, Kontaktaufnahme mit Benutzern, die deutlich gemacht haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Selbstverständlich: keine in Deutschland rechtswidrigen Inhalte, keine Handlungen, die darauf abzielen, dieser Instanz (Leistung, Reputation, Sicherheit) zu schaden.
Kein Rechts- oder Alt-Right-Bullshit, Nazi-Inhalte, Verschwörungserzählungen.
Keine automatisierten Konten (sofern nicht von den Moderatoren genehmigt). Dazu gehören Bots, Crossposter, Feedposter usw.
Geben Sie beim Posten in der lokalen Chronik Inhaltswarnungen für Gewalt, sexuell explizite Inhalte, Tod/Krankheit und Politik an.
Geben Sie beim Posten in der lokalen Chronik Bildbeschreibungen an.

Klarstellung: Sie posten in der lokalen Timeline, wenn Sie Ihren Beitrag „öffentlich“ sichtbar machen. Wenn Sie die Regeln der lokalen Zeitachse nicht befolgen möchten, können Sie mit der Sichtbarkeit „nicht gelistet“ posten.

„nicht gelistet“ Posts sind weiterhin für alle sichtbar (Ihre Follower und alle anderen), sie werden nur nicht auf den lokalen und föderierten Zeitachsen angezeigt. Boosts erscheinen auch nicht auf der lokalen Timeline.
Wir bitten, die folgenden Richtlinien zu beachten, um eine rücksichtsvolle und zugängliche Atmosphäre zu fördern.

Sie zu vergessen ist nicht so schwerwiegend wie ein Verstoß gegen die Instanzregeln, aber wiederholte böswillige Unwilligkeit, die bewährten Verfahren zu befolgen, wird als Verstoß gegen eine Regel betrachtet.
Verwenden Sie Inhaltswarnungen großzügig, insbesondere bei Themen, die möglicherweise verstörend oder kontrovers sind oder Menschen, die mit Sucht oder Trauma zu kämpfen haben, das Leben erschweren.
Geben Sie Anerkennung für kreative Arbeiten, die nicht Ihre eigenen sind.

Seien Sie kein Antworttyp – von unerwünschten Kommentaren über die persönlichen Entscheidungen, den Lebensstil oder die Familie eines anderen Benutzers wird dringend abgeraten und kann als Belästigung angesehen werden.
Bleiben Sie in Gesprächen bitte zivilisiert, beleidigen Sie die Gesprächspartner nicht. Eskalieren Sie nicht.
Regeln sind nur so viel wert wie ihre Durchsetzung, also können Sie Folgendes von den Moderatoren erwarten:
Ein Verstoß gegen diese Regeln kann dazu führen, dass Sie aus der Instanz geworfen werden, aber wenn Sie sich nicht in böser Absicht verhalten, werden wir Sie zuerst mehrere Warnungen aussprechen.
Wenn Sie gegen die Best Practices verstoßen, können Sie auch aus der Instanz geworfen werden, aber Sie müssen wirklich hartnäckig dagegen vorgehen.
Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie stört. Wir werden Ihre Meldung vertraulich behandeln.
Wir bitten um einen Daten sparsamen Umgang bei Bildern und Videos.
Letzten Endes, wir pflegen diese Instanz in unserer Freizeit und mit unseren Nerven. Überstrapazieren Sie keines von beidem.

mstdn.games.text: Be yourself. Be genuine. Make connections. Have fun. We welcome you to post about topics outside of gaming as well!
We have a zero-tolerance policy for hate speech (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/transmisia, misgendering/dead naming, xenophobia, ableism, etc) or illegal activity of any kind.

Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No sexually explicit or violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind (bullying, trolling, name-calling, etc) or spreading of disinformation.

Users are expected to behave as a person and not a brand or storefront. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged (ex. going live posts, links to personal content creation), but please do not spam the Local feed or send direct messages to advertise. Paid advertising/links of any kind is not allowed.

Use 'Content Warnings' (CWs) on your posts with respect for your fellow users (i.e. politics, graphic imagery, spoilers, personal topics, etc). In addition, NSFW posts require a Content Warning (CW) AND a Sensitive Media tag. Please add Alt Text descriptions to images and media where appropriate.

Crossposting using a 3rd party app is OK: Those posts MUST be posted as Unlisted or Followers-only and cannot be listed as Public. Accounts here are expected to be created with the intention of interacting with the community directly. Accounts that appear to be bots will be suspended.
No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.

IMPORTANT: By applying, you agree to the server rules. **PLEASE GIVE A GENUINE REASON why you would like to join.** Applications with short generic answers (i.e. “I like games” or “leaving Twitter”) will be declined. *We are an English-speaking server* Thanks!

mstdn.science.text: Please avoid using overtly sexual aliases or other nicknames and sexual avatars/banner images  that might detract from a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all.
Please be kind and courteous. There’s no need to be mean or rude.
Respect that people have differences of opinion and that every design or implementation choice carries a trade-off and numerous costs. There is seldom a right answer.
Please keep unstructured critique to a minimum.
We will suspend your account from interaction if you insult, demean or harass anyone. That is not welcome behavior.
Private harassment is unacceptable. No matter who you are, if you feel you have been or are being harassed or made uncomfortable by a community member, please contact a moderator
Likewise any spamming, trolling, flaming, baiting or other attention-stealing behavior is not welcome.

No Distribution of Misinformation. Our server aims for a positive community by prohibiting the spread of inaccurate or misleading information. This includes false news, deceptive stats, and incorrect advice.

サーバーへの攻撃行為の禁止: 不適当にサーバーに過度な負荷を与えることを禁止します。これには DDoS や Web API の不適切な使用、サーバーのクラッキングなどが含まれます。

mtg.garden.text:
Nothing discriminatory 	

Instances by the Fediverse Foundation are expressly inclusive and open to everyone.

Therefore, any form of discrimination is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to: ableism, antisemitism, homomisia, islamomisia, classism, racism, sexism, transmisia, etc.
Nothing illegal 	Do not post anything illegal (Austrian law / EU law).

Nothing harassing 	

No spam, trolling, bullying, or similar annoyances.

No calls for hate or violence.

No pornography.

Nothing (intentionally) fake 	

No fake news, misinformation, science denial

No spreading rumors or propaganda

Nothing automated 	

No bots, no crossposting (e.g. mirroring of Twitter posts etc.) without context or other interaction.

mudhut.social.text: The owner has the right to cancel any account or remove any post that is deemed "inappropriate"
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

No spam. This includes promotional campaigns, and SEO. If you have a self-run small business, please request permission before linking to any products for sale. We would like to make sure all items being sold are legal under this instance's USA laws.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

I am just a dude with a home lab that does this in my spare time. I use this instance myself and make sure it stays up, but this server is free to use so no complaining about downtime here and there, please. Any issues can be directed to @muddy@mudhut.social

mublog.nl.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia (including targeted misgendering or deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy")
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images
No harassment of other users on this or other instances
No content illegal in the following countries: France, Germany

No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody

muenchen.social.text: Keine Belästigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen.
Rassismus, Sexismus oder Beschimpfungen haben hier nichts verloren.
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten haben hier auch nichts verloren.
Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus ist verboten.
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt und/oder Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sind nicht erlaubt.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden gelöscht.
Übermässige Werbung / Spam / Spamflut von wiederholenden Tröts sind nicht erwünscht.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Allgemeine Verstöße gegen geltendes Recht in Deutschland.
Gezieltes Misgendering, Deadnaming oder Werbung für sogenannte "Konversionstherapien" sind verboten.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Löschung von einzelnen Beiträgen, oder der Stummschaltung/Löschung des gesamten Accounts führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Accounts akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

muenster.im.text: Seid freundlich. Jeder hier möchte respektvoll und freundlich angesprochen werden.

musicians.today.text: Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.

No hate speech, derogatory language, offensive comments, or the use of slurs directed at groups of people, especially those historically marginalized. Neo-Nazi, alt-right, and anti-LGBTQ content is explicitly forbidden.
No incitement or promotion of violence including self-harm and suicide.
Do not hit on people. Do not pry or inquire into people's sexual or personal lives.
No harassment, dogpiling, bullying or doxxing.
No NFTs, no crypto, no blockchain.
NSFW content must be marked as sensitive and/or marked with a relevant Content Warning (CW) when posting. Avatars, headers, and bio content must be appropriate for all audiences.
No explicit sexual, violent or gory content. No sexual depictions of minors.
Sign-ups will only be approved for musicians (professionals and hobbyists).

musician.social.text: No spam or excessive self-promoting in posts.
No bots that are not labeled as such in their profile.
Keep conversations civil and respectful even in disagreement.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, anti-Semitism, or casteism
No sexually explicit or violent posts or media allowed

musicworld.social.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be marked with a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No Spam (see Code of Conduct above).
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No “shitposting” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” here.

muso.social.text: We try to be inclusive, so exclusionary, divisive, aggressive, or consistently obnoxious behavior is unwelcome. Thus, no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism, ageism.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies will be tolerated.
No harassment, piling on, ganging up on, or doxxing of other users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Don’t do anything that’s illegal in the US.

mustard.blog.text: 머스타드는 모두에게 친숙하고 편안한 서버를 지향합니다.
성적이거나, 폭력적이거나, 타인에게 불쾌감을 줄 수 있는 이야기 또는 컨텐츠는 CW 기능을 사용해주시길 바랍니다. 공개범위도 비공개/비표시로 설정해두면 더 좋습니다.
불법적이거나, 다른 사람을 괴롭히는 목적인 계정, 컨텐츠는 뮤트 또는 정지될 수 있습니다. (불법의 기준은 대한민국 법의 기준을 따릅니다.)
여기는 모든 사람의 취향을 존중합니다. 다른 사용자에게 특정 문화를 강요하거나, 행동을 재단하려고 하는 행위는 삼가주세요.
머스타드는 인종, 성별, 성적 지향 등에 대한 모든 종류의 차별을 엄격히 금지합니다. 차별적인 언행에 대한 글이 올라올 시 즉시 삭제처리되며, 3번 이상 반복될 시 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다.

myke.social.text: Be kind. Be respectful of other users, refraining from name-calling, personal attacks, shaming and argument tactics like devil’s advocate positions.

myprivate.social.text: As the famous Wil Wheaton proclaimed, don't be a dick.

You will not engage in any form of harassing, discriminatory, threatening, or offensive speech or behavior including but not limited to race, gender identity and expression, national origin, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, or other protected categories.

We strictly prohibit transphobic behavior, hateful speech, and any form of violence targeted towards transgender individuals. Our commitment is to create a platform where everyone feels welcome and respected.
Clearly content warn (content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature [gore, war, trauma, etc.]). Keep it safe for the casual observer.
No promotion of gambling, Crypto, NFTs, anti-vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities, abuse/exploitation, or violence.

myopic.one.text: Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Myopic.one, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not attempt, under any circumstances, to use Myopic.one to engage in, publish or contribute to any form of illegal activity, whether housed on this server or otherwise.
Do not engage in discourse with the intent to anger, distance, gaslight or generate conflict with others.

Abuse of the Report feature, and attempts to engage mods to ban other users without demonstrable breach of instance rules will be interpreted as an attempt of targeted harassment and in breach of Rule 1.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Myopic.one community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.

mysocial.community.text: Be considerate of others. You don't have to agree, but you do need to treat one another with fairness and kindness.
There will be more rules. Make a suggestion.

mystical.garden.text: We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
Toots containing a piece of art must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
Use of bots on this instance is subject to admins' authorization.

mytter.jp.text:
当サービス「まいった～」は、「あえて大手インスタンスをドメインブロックするMastodonコミュニティ」というコンセプトのもと運営しております。
ご賛同いただける方のみ、ご登録願います。

なお、あえて大手インスタンスをブロックしている関係上、当サービスのアカウントから、あなたが必要とする情報の発信者にアクセス出来ない可能性があります。
そのため、こことは別に一般的なMastodonサーバのいずれかにもアカウントをお持ちいただくことを強くおすすめします。

「まいった～」では、基本的には招待制を採用しており、ユーザ登録フォームは補助的に開放しております。

招待状が必要な方は、管理者アカウント（ @Telmina@mytter.jp または @Telmina@one.telmina.com ）もしくは既に「まいった～」に参加されているユーザにご請求願います。
登録フォームからご登録いただく場合は、日本語にて60文字以上の｢意気込み｣の記載をお願いします。ただしその場合でも、審査を通過する可能性は高くありませんので、可能な限り招待状からのご登録をお願い致します。

nasface.cz.text: Udržujme společně bezpečný mediální prostor založený na základních lidských právech a svobodách s respektem k sobě samým i svým oponentům.
Nesouhlasím s vaším názorem, ale udělám všechno pro to, abyste jej mohl říkat.

Zachovejte prosím náboženskou a politickou neutralitu ve svých příspěvcích. NášFace si chce zachovat tvář neutrálního prostoru, kde není protěžována žádná politická strana, politická osoba či náboženský směr.
Za obsah příspěvku na zdi odpovídá jeho autor.
Pokud se čtenář domnívá, že příspěvek na zdi autora porušuje Základní listinu práv a svobod a je tedy v rozporu s pravidly této skupiny, může jej NAHLÁSIT moderátorům.

Podpořte prosím svobodný přístup k informacím na neziskovém projektu NasFace.cz platbou na transparentní účet 2202030573 / 2010 nebo na https://blog.nastub.cz/donate. Sledujte videa na https://NasTub.cz

neovibe.app.text: This instance is 18+. Absolutely no underage or illegal content.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.

No spam or unverified use of copyrighted material. This includes promotional campaigns, and SEO. If you have a self-run small business, please request permission before linking to any products for sale. We would like to make sure all items being sold are legal under this instance's USA laws.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organizations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
Final Rule: ONLY FUN IS ALLOWED! Have fun!

nerdculture.de.text: Be friendly and polite to each other
No hate speech, no discrimination of others, regardless of their age, gender, nationality or whatever
Don't annoy others and don't get easily annoyed by others.
Do not upload material for which you don't have the rights
No automated posts by bots, except when you have permission to do so by the server admins
Don't abuse this service or server.
Treat other how you want to be treated by them - with respect!

This is a service running on a private server and as a friendly user you are welcome to use this service, but in the end the server admin can cancel user accounts and will do when the user misbehaves. The admin will decide in the end.
Valid mail address required! You'll receive reminder mail after 6 months of inactivity to log in again. If you don't react to those mails, your account will be deleted after 7 months of inactivity.
Allowed languages are German and English as main languages while as the following languages are tolerated: Dutch, French, Spanish, Italian.

This service is free of cost for you.
However offering this service does have cost implications. If you can afford some cents per week it would be great when you could contribute in sharing the server costs. Of course this voluntarily for you.

No free-speech extremists, no far-right extremists, no nationalists. This includes people that elect or support such political parties like AfD in Germany, Fratelli d'Italia in Italy or Rassemblement National in France, etc.. If you support these parties, this instance is not for you.

neurodifferent.me.text: We support self-identification/diagnosis as these are often inaccessible due to cost, biases and other factors. Questioning folks are welcome.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, able-ism, etc. will be tolerated.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand).
No advertisements for cryptocurrencies, NFT's, or multi-level marketing schemes.
We strongly discourage posting un-described images or video on Public privacy setting.

No neurodifferent user is to create cross-post only accounts from Twitter, RSS on Public privacy setting on this server. Note: this rule applies to the users of neurodifferent.me.  Other instances have their own rules regarding this.
No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others shall be posted by a user on this server.
No promotion or support of treatments which aim to suppress characteristics of individual identity (ABA, Conversion Therapy) is permitted on this server.

neuromatch.social.text: No discriminatory language, sexism, racism, misogyny, ableism, homophobia, or transphobia

neurology.social.text: Disagreements and scientific debates are fine, but refrain from personal attacks.
Zero tolerance for hate messages of any kind.
No discrimination, including racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No incitement to violence or promotion of ideologies of violence.
No spam, no scamming, and no posting of malicious links

This server offers accounts for researchers and medical professionals in the areas of neuroscience, clinical neurology and psychiatry. Please provide proof that you belong to the intended user group, e.g. through a relevant website link, in the "Why do you want to join?" field on the next page.

neurodiversity-in.au.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior will be removed. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.
The Content Warning ("CW") flag should be used for anything that, again, you wouldn't feel comfortable showing to your grandmother. This includes NSFW content, gore, and other similar items.
Account registrations are monitored. Even though account signups are open, your account may be suspended if a human considers it potentially fake or bot.
Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face.
This server is actively moderated. You will probably not be advised of the outcome of a complaint that you made, but rest assure it will be investigated.
Moderation and administration decisions are Final.
This server is in NSW, and all your data will remain in Australia. We are firm believers in data sovereignty.
No bots without explicit permission from the server admin team
Obey Australian law and international treaties.
The goal of these rules is to ensure that this remain a safe, non-judmental space where it is ok to unmask.

No commercial accounts without admin approval

Neurodiversity-in.au is provided without any payment required to ensure it is available for the most vulnerable in our community.

newsmast.social.text: You'll find our Community Guidelines at https://www.newsmastfoundation.org/community-guidelines/
Age restrictions: Newsmast account holders must be at least 18 years old.
Be you: Users are not allowed to assume someone else’s identity or that of other groups or organisations to mislead people.
Misinformation & Fake news: Do not share false or misleading information, including medical claims that can’t be backed up or manipulating content with intent to mislead.
Defamation: Do not make false statements about others that unjustly harm their reputation.
No hate speech: We don’t allow hate speech or the encouragement of violence for any reason. This includes promotion of so-called 'conversion therapy'.

Abuse, harassment and trolling: Do not harass people or encourage harassment or abuse of any kind, including threats, degrading statements and making private details public without permission. Do not post or comment solely to offend or annoy. This includes targeted misgendering and deadnaming.

The following content is strictly not allowed. Posting this content will result in your account being deleted: Adult content (including pornography), Illegal activity, Graphic content, Child sexual exploitation, Encouraging self-harm, Terrorism.

Fraud: Do not attempt to generate traffic or revenue from fake lotteries, sweepstakes, giveaways, phishing links, or spamming. Do not use third-party apps to artificially distort your views, likes and comments.
Bot accounts: Bot accounts and other automated feeds must be marked as such, or be deleted. We impose a follow limit of 5,000 profiles and discourage excessive posting.

nfld.me.text:
No hate speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on hate speech. 
This includes slurs or any form of degrading, dehumanizing, or derisive speech based on characteristics such as race, heritage, disability, age, sex, sexual preference, gender, socio-economic status, or religion.

No harassment or doxing. 
Treat any other users' known personally identifying information with respect.

No content which is illegal in the countries of Canada or the United States of America. 
We are hosted on a US server and serve content to users in Canada. Content which violates law in either of these nations will be removed and offending users/instances will be limited or banned.

Mastodon servers which break our rules will be banned from federating with nfld.me. 
It is possible to follow users on servers all around the world. The Federated Timeline also streams posts from other servers. Those which break our rules will be limited or blocked from communicating with us.

Don' go postin' tings ya wouldn' want yer mudder ta see. 
In other words, be considerate of others when posting. Remember that your neighbours, family, and friends are here. Let's maintain a good sense of community.
No spam. Excessive advertising or mass-marketing posts will be limited accordingly. Local business endorsement is allowed in moderation. This is not a marketplace, however.

No impersonation of other individuals or entities. Those found to be representing themselves as another person or entity will be dealt with accordingly. Clearly indicate whether your account is a parody account.

No pornography, gore, or obscenity. This is not the place to share that content. Please provide a content warning (CW button in post box) for material depicting non-pornographic nudity, violence, unsafe actions, and/or potentially disturbing media.
Do not attack or abuse the host, and please report any found vulnerabilities or bugs to the instance admin.

Please direct requests for site features to the Mastodon open-source project. While we may implement downstream changes specific to our instance as we see fit, we wish to maintain relative parity with the latest stable Mastodon release.
Nobody under the age of 13 is permitted to use nfld.me. If you know your child aged 13 to 17 is using this service, please ensure they know how to use online social spaces safely.
No intentionally false or misleading information. Please ensure any news you post is factual and from a reputable source. Intentionally reported misinformation (disinformation) will not be tolerated.

nicuverse.org.text: You shall follow this Code of Conduct (CoC).
Content must adhere to laws in Sweden.
Absolutely no harassment of any kind is allowed, as also covered below by the CoC.
Anything remotely NSFW should be labeled as such and hidden and is in general not advised to be posted at all. Like blood, gore, violence, and sexual images and videos.

You may advertise products or services to a reasonable extent.
It is the moderators discretion to decide what is reasonable.
We do not allow racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
We accept no harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: Excessive advertising, uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources, nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: Racism, Sexism, Casteism or advocation of thereof.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism, Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: Sexual depictions of children, content illegal in Sweden, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism or other extreme political or religious movements.

You are personally held responsible for any content you post, also in a legal sense.
No such responsibilities are held by 99nicu, the server admin's or mod's or any person connected to those.

niedersachsen.social.text: Keine Aufruf zur Gewalt oder Förderung von gewalttätigen Ideologien.

nineworlds.social.text: This site is intended to create frith. Exchanges of information, ideas, and fun are encouraged.
UPG is personal—it's right there in the name "Unverified Personal Gnosis". Don't like someone's UPG? Don't argue, don't comment, just move on to the next post.
No bigotry of any kind; no threats; no harassment.
While it's fine to promote your books, art, business, etc. you are expected to engage in the creation of community, not just sell your stuff. Interact, don't just post.

If your behavior undermines any of the above in any way, you may be warned and given a chance to correct your behavior. Or you may simply find yourself banned.

Thor has given the admins a version of Mjolnir which works in Cybergard for our Ban Hammer. We will use it.

nileane.fr.text: Hateful conduct • I will not permit any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the “debate” about their right to a safe existence.

Harassment • I will not permit harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling, or boundary violations. Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.

Safeguarding • I will not permit content that endangers others, such as others’ personal or identifiable information (“doxxing”) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.

CSAM/Abuse • Sexualised depictions of children, real (“child porn”, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (“lolicon”, “shotacon”), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, “revenge porn”), are not permitted and will be removed.
Misinformation • I will not permit the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating individuals or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.

Spam • I will not permit spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion, crossposting on the public timelines.
Illegal content • This instance is subject to French law. Therefore, any content illegal in France may be removed without prior warning.
Be nice • Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis.

njust.club.text: 发布内容时请注意下方“可见范围”，当选择“公开”的时候，你所发布的内容将同时推送到其他高校网络上，将会被其他学校同学看到。
政治相关的敏感话题绝不允许发布到公共时间轴（其他的高校网络），被举报后会被删除，发布者将受到封号处罚。
发送内容时，请务必考虑他人感受，不适合大众所接受内容，请主动使用“内容警告”功能，且正确打上与内容相关的标签，站内尊重每位同学的想法和你的发言权。
为了不影响整体版面，不允许发布任何二手内容。
以下内容被严格禁止，被举报后会被删除，发布者将受到禁言、封号等处罚：违反中华人民共和国相关法律法规的行为和内容、严重影响其他用户使用体验的不友善内容，包括但不限于对其他用户或自然人的开盒、骚扰、攻击、诽谤等。
仅支持http://mail.njust.edu.cn邮箱注册，站内均为同学。注册用户名可以使用喜欢的ID(不用学号)，进入后可以修改昵称。无法注册或不方便注册的校友可以联系QQ:927462862 获取注册链接。
目前本校已连接清华大学站、清华大学校友站、上海交通大学站、麻省大学站、闽南科技学院站、福州大学站、东北大学站、郑州轻工业大学站、上海海事大学站、西北工业大学站、北京工业大学站、电子科技大学站、中南大学站、山东大学站、武汉大学站、中国科学院大学、广东海洋大学站、西安交通大学站。

nnmdon.com.text: nnmdonの管理人（以下、「管理人」）は、nnmdonに登録したユーザー（以下、「ユーザー」）のipアドレス・登録メールアドレス（以下、「登録情報」）を知ることができます。（これはmastodonの仕様です）。

nixos.paris.text: Respectez le travail des autres et faites preuve d'empathie : Les membres de la communauté peuvent partager leur travail créatif, des projets personnels ou des opinions importantes.

nnia.space.text: Do not insult others' personal identities and do not make derogatory or dismissing statements about marginalized demographics. This applies to jokes about marginalized demographics you don't belong to.

Maps of any contact stance are allowed to join, but pro contact and pro c-leaning views should not be promoted. Contact discourse can happen on a cross-instance basis. This rule does not apply to contact discourse around other paraphilias.

Respect boundaries of other members. Do not behave aggressively towards them (suicide baiting, mockery, gaslighting), do not share what they said with people outside of map fediverse without explicit permission.

Posting NSFW images is not allowed. NSFW topics can be discussed (jokes, educational questions, etc). The requirements are that the post is impersonal (no suggestive conversations between members, no explicit fantasies), content warnings are added, and the post setting are set to "followers only".

Do not approach chronological children and young teens with relationship intentions, on site or offsite, and do not accept their advances, unless you are their chronological peer. But if you're struggling with your behavior and realize you need help, it's safe to reach out, and we'll do our best.
Don't post, solicit, or advertise child sexual abuse images. Also, don't post non-abusive and casual images of real life children, even if that's your own childhood photos.
If you are a chronological young teenager, do not use this site to approach chronological adults or way older teenagers with relationship intentions.
Images with potentially distressing content, such as photos of accidents or surgeries, need to be marked as sensitive.

nlyze.net.text:
Be clean, be nice, be responsible, be respectful.

Treat others as you would like to be treated, otherwise you will leave.

noctua.social.text: Play nice. Don't be awful. Things that won't be tolerated include, but are not limited to, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.
Stay legal. Don't be scamming people or harassing people or trying to incite riots or anything that's going to get you or us in trouble.

nodespace.social.text: We ask that the conversation and any associated media be rated “PG-13”. For reference, it is fine to occasionally swear, or post something suggestive, but keep it limited. And when in doubt, mark it as sensitive.
Attack ideas, not the person. We like to have debates and we’re all passionate and care about our ideas. Just because an idea is bad, doesn’t mean the person who came up with it is.

We believe that you have the right to say whatever you want. But we also have the right to not want it on our servers. We absolutely will not tolerate racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or xenophobia.
We also do not tolerate incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. If you can't play nice, you'll be removed from the playground.
Most importantly, have fun and learn something new every day!

noclick.se.text: Be nice and do creative stuff

nodutiesowed.com.text: No boneheads, trolls will be bounced. Behave as if you are in the room with a person. Treat each other as fellow humans.

nofan.xyz.text: 保持友善，善用折叠屏蔽功能
不鼓励发布色情暴力内容，如发布，务必主动标记为敏感内容
请尽量避免将用户消息截图转发至其他平台

nomadic.social.text: No illegal content or conduct. Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.
Don’t stalk or harass other users. Respect other users of our service and other federated instances.
Use content warnings (CW) liberally. CW are required for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions.
Misinformation, scams, NFTs, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive content is prohibited.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.
Access to nomadic.social data by Meta inc., it’s subsidiary organizations, or 3rd party organizations working on their behalf, is strictly prohibited.

nomanssky.social.text: No Racism, No Sexism, No Queerphobia, No Fascists or Fascist Adjacent, Hate Speech, Bullying, Harassment, etc.
Mark sensitive content, and spoilers with a content warning.
No impersonating Admins, Moderators, or Hello Games - you will be banned
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…
Just because something isn't prohibited doesn't mean it's automatically permitted
Do not offer to give people in game items for real world money.
Mods/Admins can remove any posts/messages/content they feel have broken rules. Ignoring warnings from Mods/Admins will result in a ban. Do not argue with Mods/Admins, their decisions are final.
If you feel that you were unfairly punished or reprimanded by an Admin or Moderator, talk to another Admin or Moderator or email support@assistantapps.com or support@nmsassistant.com.

NMS Bots are welcome & need to have dedicated and marked accounts.  Owners/operators should be listed on the bot's profile.
Bots are subject to the same rules as Travelers but will be held to a higher standard.  Bots/owners/operators found violating the rules are subject to suspension or ban.

nonentity.fedicity.net.text: 法令違反・犯罪行為・反社会的行動を推奨・助長する行為は禁止です。
サーバーに負荷のかかる行為・他者への迷惑行為・嗜好の侵害行為は禁止です。
即消し転生を繰り返す方と1PL過多PCの方は登録を遠慮願います。
PLが18歳以下(高校生含)の方のPCはご利用いただけません。
お互いに楽しく生きましょう。
ロールプレイの範囲と捉えられないような過度なネガティブ・了承の無い他者への攻撃的なアクションは不可とします。
大人のコンテンツ(R18)は極力CW・NSFWでワンクッションを付けましょう。
その他、国内法に反するものは削除、またはアカウント停止対象となります。

nonsense.direct.text: Right now, the only rule is that you have to be literally me to use this site. For the record, I do have a personal code of conduct that bans hate speech, harassment, racism, sexism, and being a thoughtless jerk. A more codified version would cover those points before I allow a second user.

nonprofits.masto.host.text: Unless otherwise specified, rules apply not only to original posts but also to boosts.

Hate and threats of violence will not be tolerated. Disagreements and differing viewpoints are allowed, but they should be kept to a professional level and not devolve to personal attacks, attacks on any person's identity, or implied or explicit threats.

Harassment is forbidden, which mostly consists of failing to stop engaging with someone in ways they have asked you to cease. Other situations may be considered harassment and the final decision is up to the administrators.
Keep posts professional and only boost posts which are fitting to a professional environment.
Images, videos, audio recordings etc that are directly attached to a post should have a description alt tag, be described in the post itself, or contain the #Alt4Me hashtag.
Do not randomly mention people with advertisements. To let others know about your services, post public content or, within reason, reply to ongoing conversations if you have something to add.

Administrators have final say. If a specific local user is jeopardizing the server or harassing others on any instance, action will be taken. In extreme cases, we may reach out to the user's organization. The intent is not to be heavy handed, but to protect others on mastodon from abusive behavior.

You represent your company. As such, registration will only be approved with your work email address. This is different from other instances, but needed so that nonprofits have a place to reach out to and engage with interested parties on other servers that may not welcome company related accounts.

nonsocialand.space.text:
Be excellent to each other. 

Try not to be too toxic or to abuse the platform spaming people. Will try to give warnings depending on context or recommendation to join another instance.

nonexiste.net.text: I don't want people telling me that you're behaving badly -- that means don't behave badly.

noods.fun.text: No illegal, inappropriate or unsafe content.
No racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.
NSFW content (including nudity) is permitted so long as it's marked as sensitive and behind a content warning.

noot.pingu4.me.text: Seien Sie freundlich und respektvoll gegenüber anderen Nutzer*innen.
Belästigungen, Mobbing, Diskriminierung oder Hassrede werden nicht toleriert.
Verbreiten Sie keine falschen oder irreführenden Informationen.
Vermeiden Sie aggressive, gewalttätige oder beleidigende Sprache.
Veröffentlichen Sie keine Inhalte, die illegal, obszön oder pornografisch sind.
Veröffentlichen Sie keine Inhalte, die Urheberrechte oder andere Rechte Dritter verletzen.
Veröffentlichen Sie keine Inhalte, die Gewalt oder Hass fördern.
Vermeiden Sie Spam oder unerwünschte Werbung.
Veröffentlichen Sie keine Links zu betrügerischen oder gefährlichen Websites.

Verwenden Sie keine Bots oder automatisierten Tools, um Inhalte zu veröffentlichen. Außer es dient zur allgemeinen Belustigung, allgemeine Nützlichkeit oder mit der Erlaubnis des Systemadministrators.
Die Moderation behält sich das Recht vor, Inhalte zu entfernen, die gegen diese Regeln verstoßen.
Bei wiederholtem oder schwerwiegendem Fehlverhalten kann die Moderation Maßnahmen ergreifen, einschließlich der Sperrung des Accounts.
Du übergibst mir am ersten Vollmond im Mai dein Erstgeborenes

noot.noot.cloud.text: Do not post stuff that is considered illegal by German law.
In general, the rules of chaos.social (https://chaos.social/about/more) also apply here.

nora.social.text: 日本の法律を守る（ユーザーご自身の責任において利用）
誹謗中傷や嫌がらせ・人格否定などをしない
スパム行為を行わない
トラブルや損失・損害等につきましては一切責任を問わない
未記載の事項ついては運営しながら修正＆変更していく（その旨は本サイトにて通知）
主張を他人に押し付けたりしない
