norcal.social.text: Be nice and have fun! Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally.

No hate speech. Do not use pejorative or discriminatory language with reference to a person or a group on the basis of who they are, in other words, based on their religion, ethnicity, nationality, race, colour, descent, gender, sexual orientation or other identity factor.
Criticize ideas, not people. Do not "shitpost" or post in bad faith, engage in name calling, or ad hominem attacks.
Do not harass anyone, or post other people’s personally identifying information ("doxing").
Do not post illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.

norden.social.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transfeindliche, ableistische, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

norse.social.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
No right or alt-right bullshit, Nazi content, conspiracy narratives.

When posting to the local timeline, provide Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like “uspol, elections”).
When posting to the local timeline, provide image descriptions.
No discussions on why people might have left other social networks for joining The Fediverse - there is a reason for everything and users on this instance have made their choice (of freedom).
... and - finally raise your horns, raise them up to the sky! We will drink to glory tonight - raise your horns for brave fallen friends, we will meet in Valhalla again!

norfolk.social.text: We do not tolerate oppression of people on the basis of who they are.
Bots are generally not allowed on this instance. Exceptions must be explicitly allowed by the admins of the instance.
Use descriptions for visual media on public timeline posts.
Provide attribution for creative works, memes or citations of popular media are excempt from this rule.
We don't tolerate promotion of any cryptocurrency, NFTs, de-fi, and related projects.
Members must be 18 years old or older.

northofthewall.social.text: Hate speech and acts of discrimination such as racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism will not be tolerated.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

norrebro.space.text: Safe Space: neurodivergent (ADHD, Aspie, Autism, etc)

nosocialnet.work.text: Well. There are still no rules, but you are expected to not behave like a total ass. Please respect each other, and do what you want, as long as you don't hurt each other purposefully.

notbird.app.text: No content that would be illegal under Canadian or American laws.

notacult.social.text: We are committed to providing a friendly, safe, welcoming environment for all, regardless of level of experience, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, or other similar characteristic.
Avoid using dismissive language or tone about groups or people, including identities, disabilities, or ableism.
Respect that people have differences of opinion.
We will ban you if you insult, demean, or harass anyone outside of a friendly context. In particular, we don’t tolerate behavior that excludes folks in socially marginalized groups.
Please avoid using overtly sexual nicknames and messages that might detract from a friendly, safe, welcoming environment for all.

No matter who you are, if you feel you have been harassed or made uncomfortable by a community member, please contact @carbontwelve or @fimion immediately! Whether you’re a regular or a newcomer, we care about making this community a safe place for you.

now.ez-oo.com.text: Freedom of Expression: Users have the right to freely express their thoughts and opinions.
Respect Others' Freedom: Your freedom ends where another person's freedom begins. Do not infringe upon the rights and freedoms of others.
No Hate Speech: Hate speech, including but not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia, is not tolerated.
No Harassment: Harassment, including threats, bullying, and personal attacks, is strictly prohibited.
No Spam: Spamming, including but not limited to unsolicited advertisements, repetitive messages, and irrelevant links, is not allowed.
Privacy Respect: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent.
Content Warnings: Use content warnings for sensitive or potentially triggering content.
No Illegal Activities: Any activity that violates local, national, or international laws is forbidden.
Intellectual Property: Respect copyright and intellectual property rights. Do not post content you do not own or have permission to share.
Constructive Community Engagement: Engage in constructive and respectful discussions. Disagreements should be approached with an open mind and a respectful ton

nsfwphotography.social.text: No posting illegal content, or content you do not have permission to share.

nwpu.closed.social.text: 用户不得以任何形式出借、出租、转让闭社帐号，不得未经发布者同意以转发、截图等方式泄露、传播他人发布的内容。
严禁禁止发布违反中华人民共和国相关法律法规的行为和内容，严重影响其他用户使用体验的不友善内容，包括但不限于对其他用户或自然人的骚扰、攻击、诽谤等。被举报后将被删除且发布者可能受到静音、停用帐号、封号等处罚。
高度性相关或政治相关的敏感话题，有引战嫌疑的争议性内容，包括但不限于涉及地域歧视、种族歧视、性别歧视等的内容，有意诱导违规内容的内容不建议发布到公共时间轴。被举报后可能被删除。
站内发送内容时，请务必考虑他人感受，不适合大众所接受内容，请主动使用“内容警告”功能，且正确打上与内容相关的标签，站内尊重每位同学的想法和你的发言权。
为了不影响整体版面，不允许发布任何二手内容。
发布垃圾广告信息将被加入建议屏蔽列表。对任何举报的处理将被公示。
管理员不会对站内话题作任何引导，闭社是自由的。

nxt.social.text: Dieser Mastodon Server ist für Teammitglieder + Alumni von nxt statista. Wenn wir Dich nicht kennen, werden wir Deinen Account nicht bestätigen.

o0o.social.text: PLEASE check the Registration Section of the About Page before registration | 請務必在註冊前查看『關於』界面的註冊板塊

o3o.ca.text: 【用户交流】禁止发布对性取向、性癖、爱好、信仰、宗教、政治立场、民族、地域等的侮辱性言论；请不要发布种族主义、性别主义、同性恋恐惧以及跨性别恐惧言论

【敏感内容】只要涉及成人内容，包括文字及媒体，均需使用恰当的CW标签及隐藏内容警告
【敏感内容】请不要发布违反伦理及社会共识的成人内容，如盗摄、偷拍、由真实的儿童参与制作的色情内容等
【使用行为】禁止对其他用户实施任何人肉行为
【使用行为】禁止使用包括但不限于任何形式的自动化程序等手段大量获取本站的数据
【使用行为】机器人账户不得滥用服务器资源
【使用行为】禁止冒用他人身份注册账号或发布冒用他人身份的嘟文
【使用行为】禁止将本站服务用于正常交流以外的用途的滥用行为
【使用行为】禁止散布计算机恶意程序
【广告及推广】请不要推广虚假、诈骗、或违反本站服务条款的内容
【广告及推广】请不要发布重复推广内容或重复刷屏
【广告及推广】请不要发布与本站用户完全不相干的推广内容
【知识产权】请不要发布盗版内容
【知识产权】请不要在未经作者授权的情况下发布他人作品
【规则明细】使用本站前，请详细阅读[O3O社区规则与隐私政策](https://codeberg.org/o3o/o3o-admin/src/branch/master/terms.md)，使用本站代表您同意了这些规则与政策。
【🔑 新用户注册要求🔑 】请使用中文告诉我们加入本社区的理由，请使用至少10个汉字描述理由。人工审核将在1～5天内完成，如被批准，您会收到一封欢迎邮件。如没有按照上述要求填写，注册会被拒绝。

observatory.social.text: This server may be used only by approved robotic, social-media controlled observatories and their associated human.

obsidianmoon.com.text: No hate.  Being critical of religion and persecution does not count as hate.  Mock TERFs/GCs and Nazis all you like.
No getting this server de-federated, blocked, banned, limited from reasonable servers.  Piss off Nazis and TERFs all you want.
Don't start shit with other instances.  Keep your beef away from here.
No disrupting the community.  Means: no hacking from, to, or at this instance, being a shithead to other users, or causing system load past what the hosting can take.

Be reasonable on resource usage.  Large amounts of media uploads are generally discouraged, unless you're willing to help support the costs of running the server by helping pay for object storage somewhere.
No NSFW images/videos.  Sorry.  Not a lewd instance.  If you have a question about content, ask the admin.

obufalus.jp.text: 創作者のモラルと節度を保って仲良く

occm.cc.text: 자커마스는 자작 캐릭터 커뮤니티를 위한 마스토돈 인스턴스입니다. 이외 목적의 계정은 사전에 승인받은 경우를 제외하고 7월 11일 오후 10시 이후 금지됩니다.
19세 이상 이용가 내용을 민감한 콘텐츠 체크나 CW 없이 업로드할 수 없습니다.
모든 종류의 혐오 발언을 사용할 수 없습니다. 불가피하게 사용시 열람 주의(CW) 기능을 사용해야 하며, 로컬/연합 타임라인에 노출되지 않도록 프라이버시 설정을 공개로 설정해서는 안됩니다.
공개 타임라인에는 커뮤니티 홍보지 등 누구나 봐야 하는 내용만 업로드 가능합니다. 이외 업로드시 계정 침묵 처리 등 조치가 이루어질 수 있습니다.
타 인스턴스와 교류는 인스턴스 특징상 권장하지 않습니다. 기본적으로 차단하지는 않으나 특정 인스턴스의 요청이 있다면(공개 타임라인 오염 등) 인스턴스 단위 차단이 이루어질 수 있습니다.
일회용 이메일로 가입을 지양합니다. 추후 계정을 찾게 될 수 없게 될수 있으며 이메일 확인시 인증이 불필요한 특성상 타인이 계정 정보를 탈취할 수 있습니다.
총괄 계정은 공지 계정으로 DM(개인적인 멘션)을 보내 주시면 총괄 권한을 부여해 드립니다. 커뮤니티 총괄 계정은 초대 링크를 생성할 수 있습니다.

ohai.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.

We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, doxxing, or harassment (including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted).
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
All explicit (NSFW) content must be marked as sensitive and have a content warning. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

okla.social.text: No toxic and hateful speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on toxic and hateful speech. This includes attacks against anyone’s gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, age, disability, personal appearance, or socio-economic status.

No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading/violent ideologies. You may not make specific threats of violence or physical harm, death, or disease to an individual or group of people. This includes, but is not limited to, promoting misleading information that may lead to physical harm.

No harassment, dogpiling, or unwanted advances. You may not continue to engage with a user who has explicitly requested that you stop. This includes consistent baiting, bad-faith gaslighting, unwanted sexual advances, etc.
No doxxing of other users. Unauthorised requests for or distribution of any personal information or data is not allowed. Please treat personally identifying information with respect and privacy.
No content illegal in the United States or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to. Illegal or copyrighted content is not allowed to be stored, posted, or discussed on okla.social.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately. Posts and images with sexually explicit or violence must be flagged as sensitive and contain a content warning noting either ‘NSFW’ or ‘Violence’ when posting.
No spamming. Excessive posting, boosting, advertising or mass-marketing posts will be actioned accordingly and based on intent.

okpeace.org.text: Do not post content that defends or legitimizes #WarCrimes or #Torture by military or police, no matter how just one might perceive the cause. - Please see https://www.un.org/en/genocideprevention/war-crimes.shtml
We encourage the use of alt text/captions for all pictures.
We require CW's for NSFW content. We encourage the use of CW's in other contexts as well, but do not require them for politics or activism.
This server is hosted by the Oklahoma Objector Community and is admin'ed by @jmb@okpeace.org. At this time we are not accepting new members.
No Oppression ---- Do not post content that is Antisemitic, Islamophobic, Homophobic, Transphobic, Racist, Abelist, Sexist, etc.

onisoc.xyz.text: Stay legal. Respect international laws, from the country the instance is hold in (United States), laws from the admins' country (United States), and from your own country.
Don’t go insult others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.
Content that is spammy, racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way is forbidden.
Stalking and harassment is forbidden, if someone doesn’t want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.
"Screenshot dunking", or taking screenshots of posts to repost, is strongly discouraged, and may lead to admin action.
Content warning. CW drugs and lewd posts and pictures, kinks must be listed in the CW.

Content warning «Real Life» || Gore, kink and lewd content must be set as unlisted or followers only in addition to proper tagging in the CW. That is, content that includes nudes, modified photos for kink purpose (e.g. a muscle edit on a selfie), and things such as bite marks.
Politics, religion, and other polemical subjects must be CW accordingly.
Requests for financial help, and similar, are welcome when under CW. However try not to spam them.

Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (remaining respectful). This includes using other peoples' artworks without permission. Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.
You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account has been suspended.
You may not use an avatar or header image if it shows content that is listed to be content warned.
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.
We're strongly against NFTs and crypto as a whole. This isn't the place for it. AI art is tolerated as of now unless used for nefarious purposes.

onephoto.club.text: OnePhoto.Club has UNIQUE RULES and POSTING LIMITATIONS. It is NOT FOR GENERAL USAGE.
OPC Members ONLY post about our travel + outdoor adventures. Yep, that’s right—this is a single-topic server.
At its heart, OPC is a photo sharing community that serves as a remembering practice for our adventures.
Posts are often driven by ongoing prompts, like #OPCWeeklyTheme, #OPCSpecialTheme, #OnThisDay, and others. You can participate in these even as a non-OPC member.
Good vibes only (no politics, bad behavior, ai-generated photos, etc).
We’re about people, not brands, so this is an ad-free zone.
OPC is a semi-private club with strict rules of conduct and a well-established culture, but is open to new members. We love connecting with new friends!
You MUST READ the guidelines at https://about.onephoto.club/ before signing up. Use the code word when doing so.

oomfie.world.text: Cette instance est hébergée en France et sujette aux lois françaises. À ce titre, tout contenu illégal en France est susceptible d’être supprimé sans avertissement préalable.

Aucune forme d’intolérance ou d’idéologie haineuse. Ceci inclut : le fascisme/nazisme, le racisme, la misogynie, l’homo/trans/queerphobie, l’antisémitisme, le validisme ainsi que toute menace contre des groupes marginalisés ou tentative de « débattre » de leurs droits à une existence paisible.

Nous ne tolérons aucune forme de harcèlement, ce qui comprend entre autres choses : les insultes, les tentatives d’intimidations, l’incitation au harcèlement, les invitations à débattre répétées et de mauvaise foi et la violation des limites d’autrui.

Aucune diffusion de contenu qui pourrait mettre une tierce personne en danger. Ceci inclut le partage d’informations personnelles sur autrui, la publication de conversations privées sans le consentement des personnes impliquées. Promouvoir ou encourager l’automutilation et le suicide est interdit.
Le contenu à caractère sexuel, tel que la nudité érotique et la pornographie, est autorisé du moment qu’il est placé derrière un avertissement et n’est pas publié sur les fils publics.

Le partage de contenu pédopornographique, réel ou fictionnel, est interdit et tout contenu de ce type sera supprimé. Il en est de même pour le contenu à caractère sexuel partagé sans l’autorisation des personnes impliquées.
Il est interdit de propager de la désinformation et des théories du complot. Se faire passer pour une organisation ou une personne tierce est également interdit, excepté dans un but parodique.
L’utilisation d’avertissements pour les sujets sensibles les plus courants est encouragée et pourra être requise par l’équipe si elle le juge utile.

Les équipes d’administration et de modération se réservent le droit de supprimer du contenu et de sanctionner des personnes à leur seule discrétion, y compris pour des raisons non-listées dans les règles ci-dessus.

openbiblio.social.text: Wir tolerieren keine Belästigung, Stalking und Doxxing, Rassismus, Sexismus, verbalen Missbrauch, Diskriminierung von Geschlecht und sexuellen Minderheiten oder die Unterstützung eines solchen Verhaltens.

Jobanzeigen können gern gepostet werden. Sie müssen jedoch mit einem Hashtag versehen werden: #openbibliojobs nach dem gesucht und gefiltert werden kann. Nutzer*innen können das Hashtag jedoch auch muten, um die Timeline auf "echte" Beiträge zu beschränken.

openshare.me.text: No illegal content or speech - this server is run by an organisation in the United Kingdom, and the servers are based in the EU in Belgium. Any content which is illegal in either of these venues will be removed, and the user immediately terminated. One strike and you are out.

No hate speech or discriminatory statements. Specifically negative comments directed at an individual or any nationality, religion, skin-colour, race, age, gender, sex, sexual identity or disability will get you permanently banned.

Mark sensitive content with a content warning. Even where content is legal, it may have the potential to offend or disturb. Think about whether posting content like this helpful and, if you decide it is, mark it with a content warning.
No Spam - mentioning commercial products or services, especially if you do not benefit in any way is fine if done sparingly. Repeated commercial promotion and spam are not.
No impersonation, parody isn't a defence. If you use something that appears to be a real-name, then it must be *your* real name.
No doxxing, or otherwise attacking or harming the personal safety or wellbeing of any person.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand)

orbsafe.masto.host.text: No commercial accounts, advertising, or excessive promotion. Personal project boosting is fine, but keep in mind overdoing it makes us lose sight of the person.

NSFW and triggering content should be CWed (Content Warning). Your core guideline: if it's dealing with an event that might be considered traumatic to anyone, or is even 'borderline' NSFW, use the CW.
No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, or promotion of those ideals.
No parody accounts. We like a good one, but not here.
We will not make a new rule for you. If your defence for you action is going to be, "there's no specific rule", you are breaking this one.
We reserve the right to defederate with instances we don't feel jive with our vibe. We apply the Oliphant tier 3 blocklist every two to five days as well as additional blocks based on reports.

orfodon.org.text: Zweck der Instanz ist die Bereitstellung von ORF-Nachrichten im Fediverse
Es erfolgt keine inhaltliche Veränderung der Nachrichten
Es werden auf den Kanälen ausschließlich Nachrichten aus dem Quell-Feed veröffentlicht.
Bestimmte wichtige Begriffe (Staaten, Ereignisse, etc.) werden anhand einer willkürlich gepflegten Liste als Hashtags dargestellt.
Beiträge, die ausschließlich als Verweis auf eine Nachricht eines anderen Kanals dienen, werden stattdessen als Boost der ursprüngliche Nachricht veröffentlicht.
Es werden keine Nachrichten willkürlich hinzugefügt oder entfernt.
Der Betrieb des Systems erfolgt ohne jede Gewähr.

Wichtige Mitteilungen des Service-Kontos @ORFodon werden bei Bedarf durch die Nachrichten-Konten geteilt. Diese Informationen stammen nicht aus den ORF-Feeds und dienen der Information über Betrieb und Funktion von ORFodon.

otadon.com.text: 個人情報など他人のプライバシーを侵害する投稿は禁止です。

政治、宗教などをはじめとしたデモ活動の拠点にする行為、特定の政治団体・党・宗教団体・またはそれらに関連するものへの支持を強要、勧誘する行為は本サーバーではできません。また、人格否定や価値観の押しつけは禁止です。
暴力やテロ行為、差別をほのめかす投稿等は禁止です。

owo.town.text: Do not break any laws. Use common sense and knowledge of the laws of your country of residence.

You alone are responsible for any and all content you post to this site. You may not post copyrighted content you do not have the right to use.

owo.cafe.text: Sé amable con los demás, especialmente con aquellas personas con trasfondos o comportamientos que no conozcas o comprendas. Acosar, humillar, o divulgar información de otras personas sin su consentimiento no está permitido.

No está permitido exhibir o promocionar conductas que promuevan odio hacia colectivos minoritarios o vulnerables, sirviendo como ejemplo conductas racistas, xenófobas, misóginas, homófobas, tránsfobas, capacitistas o elitistas.

Las imágenes con contenido o implicaciones sexuales ("NSFW") deberán estar marcadas como contenido sensible y publicadas como "No listado 🔓" o "Solo seguidores 🔒". No está permitido subir o enlazar a imágenes o material de ficción que sexualicen a menores, o a personas representadas como menores.

No está permitido publicar contenido generalmente considerado no deseado, tal como publicidad o links de afiliado, márketing multinivel, consejos de inversión no solicitados, desinformación, o aquel que presente como hechos afirmaciones sin evidencia científica.
No admitimos cuentas dedicadas entera o mayoritariamente a "promocionar contenido" en forma enlaces a otras webs. owo.cafe es una comunidad en la que las personas hablan con otras personas.

packmates.org.text: You must be at least 18 years old.
Do not post NSFW content of characters that are underage or which could easily be mistaken as such.
Your account handle, name, avatar and profile must be SFW and not include shocking, disturbing or controversial content.
You may not use packmates to post or share content that glorifies, advocates for or supports content such as: racism, hate speech, LGBTQ+ phobia, bigotry, authoritarianism, nazism, etc...
Flag and add a content warning to media and posts that are NSFW, triggering, controversial, divisive, etc.

Packmates users can post real photos and videos with NSFW content as long as they are related to themselves in some way and any third parties who have not given consent are blurred out. Yes: naked selfie. No: irl porn found on the internet.

Do not use packmates for: call-outs, finger-pointing, uncivil discussion, trolling, accusations, expressions of hate, etc... Especially targeting other people, collectives, or small projects. Example: "People who do petplay are fucking disgusting", "FYI @xxx is $*%#, block me if you talk to them"

An exception to the above rule can be made for statements that are not truly hostile ("ahrg, I hate this new XYZ, so frustrating") or which are very general, broad or target major publicly known individuals. Eg. "I hate spaghetti", "I hate Elon Musk", "I hate capitalism".

If you don't like something or feel triggered, consider just blocking or filtering instead of engaging with unsolicited replies. Block and report if it violates any rules at packmates or the originating instance.
Do not post or share details, locations, photos or other personal identifiable information about someone without their consent.
Do not use packmates to post / share content that is illegal (jurisdiction: Germany) or to encourage, plan / hint at breaking the law.
Parody accounts are currently not permitted. Please message @Wander first if you want to create a non-personal account such as for a bot, your guild, your clan, your organization, etc.

Personal accounts can be used to announce and promote your small and personal business in a reasonable frequency and without using hyperbole, alarm or overly emphatic sales-speech. Eg. announcing commissions, announcing a new release of your app, announcing your etsy creations, etc.

Above all: be kind and enjoy your stay! At packmates we value kindness, being mindful of others and using your account in a constructive manner (eg. sharing your art, interacting with friends, talking about your projects and hobbies and avoiding toxic drama or disruptive behavior).
IMPORTANT: when signing up, please explain why you would like to join. Account activation might take much less but could take up to 24-48h.

pachy.youshallnotpass.com.text: No hate speech. Racism, sexism, misogyny, transphobia, homophobia, etc will not be tolerated at all.
Any content that would reasonably be considered NSFW (sexually explicit, violent, etc.) must be marked as sensitive when posting.

No spam or advertising (self-advertising is fine) of any kind. If you are trying to boost the signal for a friend, please do not be spammy about it. Warnings will be given first. If the posts continue, suspension will occur next. If you violate the rules more, you may be suspended or banned.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. Saying you're going to burn down the patriarchy is fine. Planning a coup on election day is do not pass go, do not collect $200. No fucking way, dude.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No illegal content. No posts selling illegal drugs or services. Zero tolerance policy that will result in an immediate ban for life.
I am the boss. That means I make the rules (well duh, obviously) and I enforce them as I see fit. If you give me shit, I will not like it. F*ck around and find out.

packetwarriors.net.text: Follow the Golden Rule – “Do to others what you want them to do to you”
While this server generally respects free speech, there will be no tolerance for harassment, racism, vile language, obnoxious "policing”, or persistent rude behavior.

This server is the property of one person who exercises sovereign control over the server. Access and content is added and removed at their whim and to their internal code of ethics, morals, and rules. It is not appealable. If you don't like that, go elsewhere.

pad.venzano.fr.text: No content illegal in the EU

page.lgbt.text: Intolerance and discrimination, in any form, is not permitted. This includes, but is not limited to, racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, and transphobia. TERFs and "gender criticals" are not welcome here.
Bots/automated accounts are allowed, but must be flagged as a bot in the account's profile settings.
Accounts that engage in scamming of any kind are not permitted. Peddling of NFTs is also not permitted.
Do not harass other users, and do not intentionally go out of your way to annoy or upset anyone. If somebody asks you to stop doing something (within reason), stop.

Do not spam or advertise excessively. Self-promotion is fine, but excessive unsolicited advertisement is not. Feel free to promote yourself or your creations/products - just don't be too excessive and don't direct it at other people unless they invite you to do so.

Explicit/adult content is permitted but must be behind a content warning describing the types of content present. Illegal content is not permitted, nor is sexual material depicting minors. Pornography depicting real people is not permitted as we cannot verify that the subjects gave consent.

Moderation staff are allowed to impose additional restrictions based on their own judgement, if they determine that doing so is in the best interests of our users and/or the instance as a whole. A full reason for the decision will always be given.

paktodon.asia.text: No Graphic material without the use of the Sensitive Media marker, and CW (Content Warning) turned on
No Advertisements / Brands / Companies / ‘Influencers’ / Corporations (Individual Self-promotion is allowed.)
No Targeted Harassment of anyone on this server or in the Fediverse, including (but not limited to) dogpiling, doxxing, threats of violence.
No Incitement or Promotion of Violence
No Sexism, Racism, Casteism, Homophobia or Transphobia, Islamophobia or Anti-semitism
No Impersonation, unless non-malicious and clearly marked as parody
No Intentional Misuse of any Server Rule, or Reporting Mechanism.

No Misinformation (especially Public Health, Climate, Religious, Ethnic). Rumours/forwards can be posted as long as it is obviously stated they are so, however depending on the severity of the issue, moderators reserve the right to delete any uncited / unverified post, even if labelled as rumour.

pandoli365.com.text:
이 서버는 한국어를 하거나 읽고 쓸 수 있는 사람들을 위한 인스턴스입니다.
외국어도 허용되지만 가능한 한국어 사용을 권장합니다.
타인을 모욕하거나 괴롭히는 등 평화롭지 못한 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 반달리즘, 트랜스포빅, 사칭 등이 여기에 포함됩니다.

다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 내용은 CW/NSFW 표시를 꼭 해야하며. 예시로는: 고어물, 과도한 성적 묘사, 잔혹한 묘사, 과도한 빛의 반짝임 등이 있습니다.
추가로 실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 어긋나는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.
사전에 승낙을 얻지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다.

성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다. 
이러한 행동은 경고 없이 제재될 수 있습니다
특정 문화를 강요하거나 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 행동은 경고 없이 제재될 수 있습니다

위의 해당하는 규칙을 위반할 경우 처벌 수위에 따라 영구 정지 혹은 제재를 당하실 수 있으며
처벌 수위는 담당 관리자에 의해 결정됩니다
무분별한 가입과 어뷰징 행위를 막기 위해 저희 서버는 가입 이유를 필수로 묻고 있습니다. 특별한 이유가 있어 가입 제한을 하는 것은 아니니 자유롭게 하고 싶은 말이나 하고 싶은 일들을 적어주시면 누구든지 가입할 수 있습니다.

paquita.masto.host.text: Respeta la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de los demás. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos aquí, siempre que respeten y no dañen a los demás. Al mismo tiempo, ten en cuenta que los demás pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminología diferente a la tuya.

Racismo, machismo, capacitismo, homofobia, transfobia, queerfobia, xenofobia, antisemitismo, islamofobia y supremacismo blanco suponen bloqueo inmediato y, en caso de que los administradores consideren que esta conducta puede ser delictiva, una denuncia inmediata a las autoridades.

Se bloqueará inmediatamente a toda persona o dominio que implícita o explícitamente difunda retórica fascista, nazi, franquista, de extrema derecha y otras formas de nacionalismo violento o excluyente. En caso de detectar un posible delito de odio los administradores contactarán con las autoridades.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que comparta enlaces o material multimedia violento o que promueva la violencia. Los administradores se reservan el derecho a informar a las autoridades en caso de que encuentren indicios de actividad delictiva.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantación de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud como el consumo y distribución de drogas, los trastornos de alimentación, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopatía y la apología de conductas dañinas para la salud física y mental de la persona en general.

Queda terminantemente prohibida la distribución de textos, enlaces o material multimedia donde se incluya o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores, reales o figurados. Los administradores de Paquita podrán contactar con las autoridades en caso de que detecten posible actividad delictiva.

Paquita es una instancia libre de pornografía. No se permite a usuarios, usuarias o usuaries, trabajadores sexuales o no, que distribuyan repetidamente enlaces o material multimedia donde se muestre actividad sexual o fluidos corporales, aunque se haga catalogando el material como sensible y #NSFW.

Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez está permitido, siempre que sean desnudos propios de la persona que sube el material, sin involucrar a terceros, y que se catalogue como material sensible y se incluya advertencia o CW sobre este contenido, con las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity.

Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no está permitido el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por ello.
Se considera recompensa sustancial cualquier regalo al usuario por un valor superior a 20€. El beneficio propio por compartir cualquier enlace promocional ha de ser debidamente advertido.
Se bloqueará a usuarios y dominios que compartan repetidamente bulos (especialmente bulos políticos, científicos o sanitarios) o teorías conspirativas tales como la Teoría del Reemplazo.

Queda terminantemente prohibido promocionar o distribuir contenidos relacionados con las criptomonedas, esquemas Ponzi o de economía piramidal, juegos de azar, apuestas de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados como no regulados.
Se prohíbe la difusión de material multimedia o enlaces que muestren a personas en estado de embriaguez o bajo el efecto del abuso de drogas, tanto legales como ilegales.

Podrá mostrarse material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco siempre con content warning y en un contexto de moderación. Se prohíben los enlaces para comprar o promocionar alcohol o tabaco en cualquier circunstancia.

Queda prohibida la difusión o promoción de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual acerca de las llamadas “bebidas energéticas” con alto contenido en cafeína, cuyo marketing está dirigido específicamente a menores, especialmente vulnerables.
Está terminantemente prohibida la difusión de material audiovisual o enlaces que muestren drogas ilegales o de venta muy restringida, como la marihuana.

Se prohíbe aconsejar la toma de cualquier medicamento, requiera este o no prescripción médica. Si una persona solicita consejo médico y alguien habilitado para ello quiere dárselo, deberá ser estrictamente en privado.

En Paquita se interpretará la insistencia en dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a una persona que no los ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto físico supone expulsión inmediata.

La legislación aplicable en la instancia Paquita es la del estado de España. Asimismo, no se permitirá ningún contenido ilegal en Alemania. Paquita se adhiere activamente a los principios de la Declaración Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la Convención de Derechos del Niño.

En semejanza al concepto jurídico de "buena fe", Paquita espera que sus usuarios se atendrán en todo momento al espíritu de la normativa aquí esbozada y no intentarán aprovechar detalles formales de la redacción de las normas en su beneficio.

parens.social.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Fosstodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” on parens.social.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Fosstodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@parens.social.

paravielfalt.zone.text: Diese Instanz ist ein Safe Space für Menschen mit Paraphilien, deren Sexualität von der sogenannten „Normalität“ abweicht. Grundlage ist die Überzeugung, dass kein Mensch aufgrund seiner sexuellen und romantischen Empfindungen ausgegrenzt, verurteilt oder angegriffen gehört.

Wir erwarten einen zivilen und respektvollen Umgang untereinander. Missachtung wird mit moderativen Sanktionen bis hin zum Ausschluss aus der Instanz geahndet. Rassismus, Sexismus, Diskriminierung, Transphobie, Queerfeindlichkeit und Ähnliches wird nicht toleriert.

Wer meint, illegale sexuelle Kontakte z. B. zwischen Erwachsenen und Kindern sollten legal sein, oder dass nur das Umfeld Schaden verursacht („Pro-Contact“ / „Pro-C“), ist hier falsch. Wer anderswo mit solchen Aussagen aufgefallen ist, kann der Betrieb eines Kontos auf Paravielfalt verwehrt werden.

Diese Instanz ist nicht für das Posten von Pornografie da. Pornografische Inhalte werden bei Bekanntwerden sofort gelöscht. Das Gleiche gilt für Inhalte, die nach deutschem Recht strafrechtlich relevant sein können.

Diese Instanz wird von wenigen Freiwilligen in unserer Freizeit betrieben. Wir betreuen das Projekt nach bestem Wissen und Gewissen, geben aber keine Garantien für Verfügbarkeit, störungsfreie Nutzbarkeit oder Datenintegrität.
Wir behalten uns vor, diese Nutzungsbedingungen bei Bedarf anzupassen. Dies wird mindestens 14 Tage vor Inkrafttreten der neuen Bedingungen angekündigt.

parkfans.network.text: All content posted to ParkFans.Network must comply with United States, New York, and Virginia law.
Uploading sexually explicit and/or violent media is prohibited.
Posting any form of private information regarding an individual without their consent (doxing) is prohibited.
Expressions of intolerance targeting one’s cultural, gender, physical, racial, religious, or sexual identities/characteristics are prohibited.
Posts containing or citing potentially objectionable content should be flagged appropriately.
Utilizing additional accounts to violate any rule or evade a ban will result in the termination of all duplicate/shared accounts.
ParkFans.Network falls under the purview of the elected ParkFans Advisory Panel. Policy modification proposals and censure/ban procedures utilize the existing Advisory Panel deliberation protocols.

parfait.day.text: 신중히 가입하세요. 최초 가입시 설정하게 되는 ID는 나중에 수정할 수 없으니 오탈자 없이 기재해주시기 바랍니다.
다양한 주제를 환영해요. 마비노기 특화 SNS지만, 반드시 마비노기 이야기만을 하라고 강제하는 공간은 아닙니다. 마비노기 유저라면 누구나 활동하실 수 있고 여러분들의 일상 이야기도 수용합니다.
타인이 싫어하는 행동을 하지 마세요. 모든 종류의 혐오, 성차별, 인종차별, 소수자 비하, 타 장르 비난(호불호 의견은 허용), 따돌림, 명예훼손은 금지합니다.
주변인을 사랑하세요. 마스토돈의 특성상 여러분들은 연합우주의 또 다른 행성과 조우하게 될 수 있습니다. 연합우주 내에서도 위의 3번 사항이 권장되어 있으며, 외부 사용자들과 교류할 때도 규칙을 준수해주세요.
트롤러는 받지 않아요. 각종 커뮤니티, 인게임 등에서 사회적 물의를 일으켰던 유저임이 판명될 시 영구차단을 합니다.
나쁜 소식보단 좋은 소식을 공유해요. 공익적인 목적이라면 괜찮지만, 외부 사이트의 사건사고 게시물을 흥미 유발성으로 링크하는 것을 금지합니다. 잦은 충돌 이슈는 사용자들에게 피로감을 줍니다.
업로드 할 때 조금만 주의해주세요. 민감한 미디어나 치명적인 단계의 스포일러는 CW 기능을 사용하여 가려주시길 바라며, 광과민성 발작 증후군을 일으키는 이미지는 지양해주세요.
창작자를 항상 존중해요. 생성형 AI로 사용한 컨텐츠는 반드시 AI를 사용했음을 명시해주시고, 타인의 창작물을 AI 수집하는 것을 금지합니다.
기본 시스템을 생활화 해요. 트롤링이나 보고 싶지 않은 내용이 있을 경우에는 뮤트, 차단, 신고를 이용해주시기 바라며 사용자 저격을 해서는 안됩니다.
범죄는 안돼요. 만약 사이버불링이나 이에 준하는 사건이 발생했을 경우 경찰의 수사 협조 요청이 온다면 그에 응할 수 있고, 정보 제공 내역은 공개된다는 것을 미리 고지합니다.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #1 – No illegal content or conduct. Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Rule #2 – Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.
Rule #3 – Don’t stalk or harass other users. Respect other users of our service and other federated instances.

Rule #4 – Misinformation and deceptive content is prohibited. Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don’t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.
Rule #5 – Content warnings (CW) are required for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions.
Rule #5.2 – Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.
Rule #6 – Respect the service. Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome.
Rule #7 – Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.

Rule #8.1 – Account / post language identification. We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning).

Rule #8.2 – Misleading or deceptive impersonation. You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

Rule #8.3 – Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using “Unlisted”, “Followers only”, or “Mentioned people only”, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

Rule #8.4 – No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules.
Rule #8.5 – If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.
Rule #8.6 – All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).
The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko – Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

pdx.sh.text: Be kind. Don't harass, doxx, or otherwise make people's lives difficult. Existing on this planet is hard enough already.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
Don't do illegal shit. No piracy or other things I'm going to get DMCA take down notices for.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. In short, don't be a fucking fascist.
Violation of any of the above rules will result in an immediate ban.
Swearing and shit is fine. Other content rules TBD by the community.
If you're a jerk, I'll suspend (warning) or ban (repeated offenses) you.

Consider other people when making your toots. If someone else might have a bad time when they see your post, or might need a moment to collect themselves before seeing it, please put it behind a content warning. There is a lot of grey area here so let's try to find a good balance here.

pebble.social.text: Graphic violence: Content that is excessively gory or violent is not allowed.
Private information. You can't publish or post other people's private information (like their home phone number and address) without their permission.
Dangerous and hateful organizations: It is not allowed to promote either of these things. We will delete any known accounts owned by specific violent extremists, or perpetrators of mass violence.

Coordinating Harm: we do not allow activities such as organized harassment, coordinated attacks, planning, organizing or promoting violence, or any other behavior that poses a threat to individuals, communities, businesses, property or animals.
Adult content, including pornographic content, is not allowed.
Child sexual exploitation and child nudity related content material is not allowed.
Encouragement or advocacy of self-harm and suicide is not permitted.
Controlled or prohibited goods and services. Use of our service for any illegal activity involving illicit goods or services is not allowed.

Enforcement circumvention. If an account has been permanently suspended for severe violations of our community guidelines, Pebble reserves the right to suspend any other account owned by the same user, regardless of when the account was created.
Abuse and harassment: Harassment or encouraging abuse and harassment of any kind is not allowed.

Hate speech and incitement to violence: Hate speech and prejudiced speech is not tolerated here. Do not call for violence against people based on ethnicity, national origin, caste, race, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, illness, and/or sexual orientation.

Misleading identities. You can't pretend to be another person, group, or organization to trick, confuse, or mislead people, including imitating official platform accounts. We do not allow the use of fictitious or computer generated identities or profiles.

Artificial disruption, and deceptive accounts and spam. Misusing the platform and sending spam is not allowed, including financial scams. You can't use our services to artificially spread information in a way that messes with or disrupts other people's experience on our server.

penfount.social.text:
Be nice:

Be civil, courteous, and respectful. Do not use extreme language or act with hostility.

Be a good person:

Do not insult, mock, or attack other users based on race, gender, age, occupation, physical or mental health, or opinions about fountain pens.

No transactions allowed:

Do not use this server as a platform for any sort of transaction for money or other value.
Links to a page that offer a product or service are allowed, as long as the transaction is external from the server.
No pornographic content: Do not post pornographic or otherwise age-restricted content. Nude art may be submitted with an appropriate content warning.
Giveaways: Do not post giveaways without moderator approval.

penaz.cloud.text: Contenuti violenti o sessualmente espliciti devono essere contrassegnati come "contenuto sensibile".
Non è accettato razzismo, sessismo, omofobia, abilismo, transfobia o xenofobia
Non è tollerato incitamento alla violenza o promozione di ideologie violente.
Non condividere informazioni note come false e fuorvianti.

peoplemaking.games.text:
No discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.

In regards to PeopleMaking.Games' stance on recent "Mastodon Discourse": Tone policing marginalized groups is tantamount to harassment. It is not productive or useful.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.

Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts. We permit and even encourage topical discussions, but ask that you respect the rights of others to have autonomy over the content they engage with.
Posts containing art not owned by the poster must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
The actions of individuals you bring to the community reflect back on you. Be responsible with your invites, and avoid posting an invite link in a public place.
Mastodon v4 does not currently support badging for given roles. Until there is a UI implementation, using the "Astro" logo in your username is restricted to Moderators and Administrators. Thank you!

No NFTs, Crypto, or Web3 promotion. While these topics can be discussed at a distance, preferably behind CWs, if your primary reason for being here is to monetize via Web3 there are more suitable crypto-related instances available. NFTs may not be used in profile pictures.

pentimento.me.text: One must respect the Code of Conduct.
pentimento.me.hint: 人類或機器人需遵守本站的行為準則。

pentimento.me.text: One must recognize language as the first identity.
pentimento.me.hint: 人類或機器人需以語言為第一身份。

pentimento.me.text: One must remember the Three Gates Of Speech.
pentimento.me.hint: 人類或機器人需遵循魯米的「話語三重原則」：真實、必要、友善。

pentimento.me.text: One may decide the rest through Condorcet Voting.
pentimento.me.hint: 人類或機器人可由孔多塞投票法決議其餘事務。

peoplegroup.social.text: ABSOLUTELY NO TROLLING! This instance has ZERO TOLERANCE for trolls! Please be respectful as others' opinions may vary.
SPAMMING USERS' WALLS IS NOT ALLOWED!

NO ILLEGAL ACTIVITY ALLOWED in any way on this instance. That includes: posting unauthorized or revenge nude photography, no child pornography, and no posts shall contain any plans to engage in theft, harassment, or harm to people, animals, or property.

参加者間の交流の妨げとなる行為（営利行為、攻撃的言動、誹謗中傷、強要、扇動、勧誘等）を禁じます。
日本の法律と社会規範を遵守でき、社会的マナーを尊重できる方のみにご利用いただけます。
国籍、人種、皮膚の色、年齢、容姿、性、性的指向、言語、精神的/身体的障碍、宗教、政治思想、所属団体、その他を事由にした差別を禁じます。

pha.one.text: 我们鼓励并用实际行动支持言论自由，但为了保护用户，仍然有一些限制。
禁止以任何的形式发布对任何群体的侮辱性、仇恨性、暴力、恐怖、血腥言论。

如若您认为您的言论可能对他人造成一定影响，请务必使用敏感内容标签（ CW，Content Warning) 为内容打上预先警告。例如：色情内容、暴力血腥内容等。

photog.social.text: 3-5 photo posts per day recommended to avoid overloading the timeline
No illegal content (no porn, underage revealing, etc) Artistic portraits are fine. Admins decision is final.
Keep it civil.  Best to avoid contentious political or religious debates. There are other instances for that.
Absolutely no anti-vaxx, conspiracy theory bullshit. This isn't the place for it.
Images in your posts must be your own work. (ok to boost others though)

Generated AI* art is not permitted without being clearly labelled as such, AND being hidden behind a CW (Content Warning).

* does not refer to AI tools used in processing, eg Topaz, DXO, Lightroom's denoise tools, etc.

photosharing.work.text: Keine Belästigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen.
Rassismus, Sexismus oder Beschimpfungen haben hier nichts verloren.
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten haben hier auch nichts verloren.
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt und/oder Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sind nicht erlaubt.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden gelöscht.
Übermässige Werbung / Spam / Spamflut von wiederholenden Tröts sind nicht erwünscht.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Allgemeine Verstöße gegen geltendes Schweizer Recht.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Stummschaltung von einzelnen Beiträgen, Sperrung/oder Löschung des Kontos führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Kontos akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Löschung von einzelnen Beiträgen, oder der Stummschaltung/Löschung des gesamten Kontos führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Kontos akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

physics.social.text: Be nice: Treat each other with respect. No bullying, harassment, violence or personal attacks of any kind.
Keep things professional: No offensive, NSFW or illegal content. Don't share personal or confidential information.
Agree to disagree: No flaming, trolling, spamming or fighting. No offensive language or hate speech.

Be inclusive and welcoming to all: No discrimination, racism, ageism, homophobia, transphobia, fascism, nationalism or religious extremism. Any form of oppression based on protected characteristics will not be tolerated.
Fair use of the server: No hacking, macros, exploits, abuse, DDoSing or excessive use.
Have fun! Enjoy tooting on Mastodon and connecting with fellow physicists in the Fediverse.

phouon.com.text: Xuấn bản phương tiện truyền thông mang tính khiêu dâm hoặc bạo lực phải được đánh dấu là nhạy cảm khi đăng;
Không phân biệt chủng tộc, phân biệt giới tính, kỳ thị đồng tính, kỳ thị người chuyển giới, kỳ thị bài ngoại hoặc chủ nghĩa đẳng cấp;
Không kích động bạo lực hoặc cổ vũ tư tưởng bạo lực;
Không quấy rối, “dogpiling” hoặc “doxxing” người dùng khác;
Không xuất bản nội dung bất hợp pháp ở Việt Nam;
Không cố ý chia sẻ thông tin sai lệch hoặc gây hiểu lầm;
Hoạt động đăng bài tự động phải được sự chấp thuận của quản trị viên. Các tài khoản được đăng ký với mục đích đăng thư rác như liên kết ngược SEO hoặc tài liệu tiếp thị sẽ bị người kiểm duyệt xóa.

physchem.science.text: No racism, antisemitism, sexism, homophobia, or transphobia.

piaille.fr.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, psychophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

physfluids.fr.text: Prendre garde à ce que les labels et la légende soient lisibles

piclub.social.text: Respect others: Maintain politeness and respect in communication, avoiding the use of offensive or provocative language. Respect others' viewpoints and positions, actively listen, and provide constructive feedback.

Protect privacy: Uphold users' privacy rights by not sharing or disclosing others' personal information without permission, including but not limited to real names, contact information, home addresses, etc.

Follow the law: Strictly adhere to local laws and regulations, prohibiting the posting of any content that violates legal provisions, including but not limited to malicious defamation, insults, pornography, violence, etc.

Keep content relevant: Ensure that the content posted is relevant to the server's theme or discussion topics, and refrain from posting irrelevant information or spam content. Maintain the depth and meaningfulness of discussions.

Respect intellectual property: Do not infringe upon others' intellectual property rights, including but not limited to copyrights, trademarks, patents, etc. Do not post unauthorized works of others, including text, images, audio, video, etc.
Follow the rules: Adhere to the rules and guidelines set by the server, including but not limited to registration terms, terms of use, etc., to ensure the orderly and stable operation of the server.

Respect administrators: Respect and obey the management decisions of server administrators. If you have any questions or objections, you can raise them through appropriate channels, but do not engage in malicious behavior or violations.

Foster a positive atmosphere: Share beneficial, positive, and inspiring content, encourage mutual assistance and support among users, and create a positive and friendly communication atmosphere to build a harmonious community together.

Equal treatment: Treat all users equally, without discrimination or differentiation based on race, gender, sexual orientation, religious beliefs, status, etc., to establish an inclusive and open communication environment.

pie.gd.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, antisemitism, xenophobia, casteism, or similar behavior.
No harassment of any kind. This includes dogpiling, doxxing, and any other unwanted behavior that's intended to make someone sad.
No sexually explicit media (it creates legal issues). Violent media must be marked as sensitive.
Do not post or amplify false or misleading information.
Do not post or amplify content that's illegal under US law.

pigeon.place.text: No sexual content involving minors (including artistic depictions); no gore or extremely graphic violence (including artistic depictions)

No bigotry (i.e. National Socialism, Nazism, Holocaust denial, racism, alt right/"free speech", transphobia, misogyny) - critical discussion is OK. Any images of explicit hate symbols being discussed (e.g. swastikas) must be under a Content Warning
No trolling, blatantly inciting violence, or dangerous misinformation (e.g. antivax, conspiracy theories) - critical discussion is OK
No bots or automated mass following/content aggregation

pippo.dev.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic or erotic content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be labeled as sensitive content.
No posting of malicious links or spam.
No threats or direct attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.

piraten-partei.social.text: Keine Verbreitung von Inhalten die in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen.

Jede Form von Diskriminierung, zum Beispiel rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transphobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge, sind bei uns verboten! Unter diese Regel fallen auch Avatare und Verweise zu Seiten mit entsprechenden Inhalten.
Beleidigungen und Belästigungen sind generell verboten. Darunter fallen auch jegliche Formen der Diffamierung, Hetze, übler Nachrede und dergleichen.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen (Content Warning) für Posts und NSFW-Marker (Not Safe for Work) bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen.
Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Nicht jugendfreie Beiträge müssen als solche gekennzeichnet werden.
Profilbilder und Banner, die nicht jugendfrei sind, werden nicht toleriert.
Die Veröffentlichung von nicht öffentlichen Gesprächen ist verboten.
Das Teilen von absichtlich falschen oder irreführenden Informationen ist hier unerwünscht.
Das massenweise Erstellen von Beiträgen (sogenanntes Spamming) in einem kurzen Zeitraum ist untersagt.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren sind verboten.
Werbung muss als solche gekennzeichnet sein. Übermäßige oder automatisierte Werbung wird nicht toleriert.

Bot-Accounts, also Nutzerkonten, die größtenteils automatisierte Inhalte erstellen, müssen als solche gekennzeichnet sein, dürfen nicht auf der lokalen Timeline posten und dürfen nur mit Nutzer:innen interagieren, wenn sie dazu eingeladen worden sind.

Die lokale Timeline soll den manuellen Posts der Mitglieder:innen von dieser Instanz vorbehalten bleiben. Automatisierte Posts (dazu gehören auch Cross-Posts von Twitter) müssen deshalb auf "ungelistet" gesetzt werden.

piupiupiu.com.br.text: Não é permitida a publicação de conteúdo ilegal, ou ainda sem definição legal concreta.
Não é permitida pornografia infantil.
Não é permitido conteúdo que fetichiza menores de idade (inclusive lolicon, shotacon etc.).
Não é permitida apologia ao nazismo ou ao fascismo.
Não é permitido discurso de ódio e/ou inflamatório.
Não são permitidos comportamentos e discursos racistas, sexistas, homofóbicos, transfóbicos, capacitistas, xenofóbicos, islamofóbicos, gordofóbicos.
Não são permitidas ameaças de violência ou linguagem violenta direcionada a outras pessoas.
Não é permitida apologia a toda e qualquer forma de opressão, exploração e humilhação entre seres humanos.
Não é permitida xenofobia e/ou nacionalismo extremista.
Não são permitidos racismo, misoginia, misandria, homofobia, transfobia e todo tipo de discurso de ódio.
Não é permitida desinformação intencional.
Não é permitida publicação ou ameaça de publicação de conteúdo privado.
Não é permitido doxing: publicar informações pessoais identificáveis alheias.
Não é permitida a publicação de conversas privadas, tais como mensagens diretas, sem o consentimento das outras partes.
Não são permitidas atitudes invasivas e/ou intimidadoras.
Não é permitido fazer comentários ou perguntas invasivos (tais como "qual é o seu nome de registro?" ou insistir em saber a localização de alguém).
Não é permitido insistir em continuar uma conversa após a outra parte expressamente pedir para que ela se encerre (assédio).
Não é permitida atenção sexual indesejada. Isso inclui piadas ou comentários sexuais; e avanços sexuais indesejados (assédio sexual).
Não é permitida a intimidação deliberada, stalking.
Não é permitida a representação falsa.
Não é permitido criar contas para se passar por celebridades, marcas ou outra pessoa (falsidade ideológica).
Não é permitido criar contas paródia ou contas de fã que não estejam explicitamente sinalizadas.
Respeite os outros.
Divirta-se!

pkm.social.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
The administrators reserve the right to remove users or defederate with instances.

planet.moe.text: 성적이거나 다른 사용자들에게 불쾌감을 줄 수 있는 내용을 공개적으로 올리지 말아주세요.

plantegg.wiki.gd.text: This instance is a profandom instance. This means that the content within may contain fictional expression that may be seen as "problematic", i.e. certain ships, or artistic content.
This instance is not a place for pro-c or real abuse/exploitation advocacy. Fiction is fiction. Reality is reality. Any claims otherwise are false.

Attempted infiltration, harrassment, doxxing, or mass reporting of this instance for its profandom views will not be tolerated. Do not attempt to join the instance, it is for the family. Those in the family know who they are and receive invites.
All NSFW art and text should go behind a CW, to make public browsing more comfortable. The CW should clearly state what kind of art or text it is, along with a tag in the post body, for curation.
Minors are disallowed from interacting with this instance, even in the case of a federated post. This is an adult space.

plantex.top.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
Les comptes NSFW, la nudité et les contenus pornographiques sont autorisés dans le respect de la loi . Ils doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive" (CW).
Le gore ou la violence graphique sont interdits.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.

Etant une équipe LGBT, nous acceptons par contre la réappropriation de l’insulte et ferons une différence entre les messages abusifs (qui portent atteinte à une personne) des messages inadéquats (ni insultants et ni contraires aux CGU)
Est interdite toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite (doxxing)

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

plumbob.social.text: No hate speech, harassment, or discrimination of any kind. This includes, but is not limited to, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and ableism.
No sharing of illegal or copyrighted content. This includes, but is not limited to, pirated movies, music, and software.
No spamming or unwanted contact. This includes, but is not limited to, sending unsolicited messages, posting repetitive content, and repeatedly following and unfollowing another user.
No posting of personal information without consent. This includes, but is not limited to, phone numbers, addresses, and email addresses.
No sharing of graphic violence or adult content. This includes, but is not limited to, images or videos of violence, sexual content, or pornography.
No sharing of graphic violence or adult content. This includes, but is not limited to, images or videos of violence, sexual content, or pornography.
No impersonation of other users. This includes, but is not limited to, using someone else's name, avatar, or bio to impersonate them.
No sharing of misinformation. This includes, but is not limited to, sharing false information or conspiracy theories without providing credible sources. Looking at you Strangerville…
Respect other users’ privacy. This includes not sharing screenshots or quotes from private conversations without consent.
Any form of violence or threat of violence will not be tolerated.

pnw.zone.text: Have fun and be respectful! Posts on PNW.zone are moderated. We promote robust dialogue from all viewpoints, but want to cultivate a trusted instance for others to join. Therefore we will moderate threats of violence, harassment, harmful disinformation, hate speech, and similar content.
No spamming the server. This includes excessive commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO. Any commercial postings should relate to the PNW community.
Clearly content warn (CW) content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature (gore, war, thirst traps, trauma). Keep it safe.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
The use of bots on this server is not permitted without prior approval.
Pornography on the local timeline is not allowed.
Do not break the code of conduct (found on About page).
You must be 13 years of age or older to create an account on this instance.
Public posts and profiles must be in English to allow for moderation.

pointless.chat.text: 민감한 주제의 게시글, 공공장소에서 노출되기 부적절한 주제의 게시글은 "미등재 이하"의 공개범위 설정과 CW(컨텐츠 경고)기능을 사용하여 연합 타임라인에 공유되지 않도록 주의해주세요.
타인을 괴롭히거나, 모욕하거나, 사칭하거나, 명예를 훼손하거나, 혐오 표현(헤이트스피치)을 할 목적으로 가입하거나 컨텐츠를 업로드하지 마세요.
포인트리스에 가입하신 이후 계정을 타 서버로 이동하시면 포인트리스에 남은 데이터가 삭제됩니다. 데이터를 유지하는데도 비용이 발생하기 때문임을 양해해 주시길 부탁드립니다.
포인트리스 모더레이션에 대한 이의제기는 마스토돈 내 이의제기 기능과 지원 이메일로 해주세요. 모더레이션은 자원봉사자들이 진행하며, 모두를 완벽하게 만족시킬 수 없다는 점을 유념해주세요.
우리는 한국어 이외 언어에 대해 중재를 할 수 없습니다. 한국어 화자가 아닌 경우 다른 인스턴스를 찾아주세요. / We can’t moderate foreign languages except Korean. Please find other instances that accept your languages.

polaris.masto.host.text: polaris.masto.host는 자캐동맹 ‘등대’의 전용 서버로, 동맹 활동기간 내의 모든 스토리 진행과 이벤트는 본 서버에서 이뤄집니다.
동맹 외부인은 본 서버에 가입할 수 없습니다.
본 서버는 별도의 마스토돈 호스팅 사이트를 통해 개설되었으며, 마스토돈 이용정책과 더불어 해당 사이트의 서비스 약관을 따르고 있습니다. (자세한 내용은 https://masto.host/tos/ 를 참조해주세요.)
본 동맹, ‘죽은 별을 순류하는 등대’는 ALL젠더 성향으로 모든 멤버 및 캐릭터의 젠더를 존중합니다. 따라서 캐어필을 넘어선 젠더혐오적 발언을 금합니다.
젠더를 포함한 다양한 정체성(인종, 장애 등)에 대한 혐오 발언도 마찬가지로 제재합니다.
홈(타임라인) 내에 (방통위 기준 4/4/4/4)의 수위 제한 없는 시리어스를 지향합니다. 하지만, 스토리 진행시간 외적으로는 개그 분위기도 수용합니다.

pool.social.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be marked with a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No “shitposting” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” here.

post.rodeo.text: Offensive Content: No bigotry. Nazis are bad. Be cool.
Accessibility: This server encourages use of the following tools for accessibility and consideration: 'Content Warnings' on posts, 'Alt-Text' on media, and file optimization. (See Rules 3, 4, & 5)
'Content Warning' tags are a big part of the Mastodon culture. They're not all trauma related. Pay attention to what other people CW and follow suit. ☺
'Alt Text' on media helps users understand context and enjoy the content. This especially helps those with sensory impairments (hearing/vision/etc.) but also language barriers.

Optimizing media before uploading to save bandwidth for ALL federated servers, as well as users with limited internet (e.g., cellular data plans, or rural satellite service, throttled government "lifeline" services, etc).

Adult Material Policy: (Forgive the MPAA metaphor, but) text and media uploads should remain rated roughly 'PG-13' bordering 'R.' 'Content Warnings' on lewds required. Nudes should be posted elsewhere. 'NC-17' and 'XXX' material isn't really appropriate for this server.
Violence/Gore: Under most circumstances... please don't post it. If it's exceptional/important (police brutality, punching nazis, riot porn, etc.) -- it must have Content Warnings out the wazoo.

Illegal Activity: We're responsible for the contents of this server, please don't engage in criminal activity here. 😅 No "ContentID"-level of copyrights will be enforced (on our part), just avoid bald piracy when possible.
Federation Policy: We don't federate with bigots, unmoderated servers ("free speech absolutionists"), dataminers/spammers, illegal content, or servers that are just pure porn (no offense to porn).
We reserve the right to deny service to anyone.

posthat.ca.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour may lead to moderation. Nazi's fuck off.
Your data and our servers are in Canada. Do not post anything that is illegal in Canada.
Do not share false or misleading information.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.
Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face.

pravda.me.text: Основным языком общения в Сообществе является русский язык. Не возбраняется публиковать сообщения на других языках, но крайне не рекомендуется отвечать на чужие сообщения на языке, отличном от языка исходного сообщения.
Любой зарегистрированный посетитель имеет право размещать сообщения на любые интересующие его темы.
Запрещены призывы к нарушению действующего законодательства, высказывания расистского характера, разжигание межнациональной розни и всего прочего, что попадает под действие УК РФ.
Попытки оправдания насильственных действий, убийств приводят к удалению пользователя из базы Сообщества.
Запрещается размещать заведомо ложную информацию, клевету.
Запрещается регистрация под ником, содержащим оскорбительную фразу или ненормативную лексику (в т.ч. на транслите и иных языках).
Вас точно заблокируют, если Вы пришли с целью поругаться, или же с целью высказать свое отношение к участникам Сообщества.
Запрещена публикация порно (в любом виде) и ссылок на сайты с подобным контентом.

Запрещается любым образом распространять warez (варез) т.е. нелицензионное программное обеспечение (прямые ссылки на скачивание, ссылки на сайты содержащие, в свою очередь, ссылки на ресурсы распространяющие нелицензионные продукты).

Запрещается использовать аватары оскорбительного содержания,в т.ч. с фашистской, сатанинской и т.п. символикой. Аватары, публикация которых нарушает чьи либо авторские права. Аватары-клоны (аватары, которые уже используются в Сообществе).

Запрещено намеренное искажение названий, имен, наименований, равно как и регулярное донесение до сведения Сообщества своего пренебрежительного отношения к месту собственного проживания (или месту проживания кого-либо из Сообщества), а так же виду работы или отдыха.
Запрещено продолжение обсуждений вопросов из сообщений, закрытых/удаленных Администрацией.
Меры по наведению порядка. За порядком следит Администрация Сообщества.
Администрация оставляет за собой право удалять сообщения и пользователей, нарушающие установленный порядок и противоречащие правилам Сообщества; блокировать доступ нарушителей к Сообществу.
Помните, что терпение Администрации не вечное, — к посетителям регулярно и/или преднамеренно путающим, что принято, а что не принято, будут применяться меры на усмотрение Администрации.
При осуществлении своих функций и полномочий Администрация априори предполагает, что участники знакомы с настоящими Правилами.

Действия Администрации по применению санкций в отношении конкретных участников не подлежат обсуждению другими участниками, что расценивается как грубое нарушение Правил Сообщества, но могут обсуждаться с подвергнутыми санкциям лицами посредством электронной почты.
Администратор - последняя инстанция. Если вы не согласны с решением, которое вынес администратор - значит не судьба.
Не забывайте читать объявления и соблюдать Правила. Помните, что кроме указанных здесь правил, в Сообществе действуют правила Хорошего Тона.
Правила вынуждено пополняются по мере необходимости.
Уровень ограничения или тип предупреждения выбирается Администрацией в зависимости от нарушенного пункта правил и наличия ранее вынесенных замечаний.
В состав Администрации входят лица, чьё участие в создании и функционировании Сообщества даёт им такое право и возможности. Выборность Администрации Сообщества не предусматривается.

Действия Администрации по реализации своих полномочий, предусмотренных настоящими Правилами и программным обеспечением Сообщества (управление учётными записями, реквизитами и т.д.) обсуждению участниками не подлежат.

program-theia.monster.text:
이곳은 자캐커뮤니티: 여명 마스토돈입니다.
가상의 공간이지만 사회통념적으로 부적절한 행위가 발생하므로, 다른 연합우주에는 노출되지 않도록 하였습니다.
러닝기간 동안은 공개 설정을 포함하여 자유롭게 이용해주세요.

러닝기간이 종료되면 서버와 도메인 전체가 종료될 예정입니다.
본 커뮤니티의 모든 사건, 인물, 배경, 묘사 등은 허구임을 밝힙니다. 러닝 도중 현실과의 혼동이 생길 경우, 총괄계의 DM으로 하차 선언 후 러닝을 즉각 중단해주시길 바랍니다.
본 커뮤니티에 성인이용가 이미지를 업로드 할 경우, 마스토돈 내 기능인 “미디어를 민감함으로 설정하기” 필터를 필히 사용하여 주시기 바랍니다.
본 커뮤니티 러닝 중 성인이용가 역극을 진행하기 전, 필히 총괄계를 포함한 DM에서 조율을 부탁드립니다. “조율 따로 필요 없습니다”와 같은 문구를 프로필과 바이오에 표시해 두신다면 생략 가능합니다.
하차 처리된 캐릭터는 세계관에 애초에 존재하지 않던 캐릭터로 취급되어 엔딩 이후에도 언급, 연공 등이 금지됩니다. 하차한 러너님께선 이후 본 커뮤니티의 세계관 관련 설정을 일체 사용하실 수 없습니다.

그 외 공지사항은 아래 문서를 필히 참고, 숙지하여 주시기 바랍니다.

https://url.kr/b3vj6d
