scuttle.cloud.text: Please be respectful of others. Age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, background, etc. are all _NOT_ reasons to be unpleasant.

Everyone is encouraged to report inappropriate behaviour, which will be listened to, and action will always be taken. This action ranges from a warning, to a full ban. Moderation decisions will be made using the Paradox of Tolerance (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox_of_tolerance).
Expect anything you post on scuttle.cloud to be public, including direct messages - that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed
If you apply for an account on scuttle.cloud, and you've actually read the rules, please end your "Why do you want to join?" question with the phrase "donkey balls"
No spam, no commercial advertising (you may occasional post personal listings), no threats of violence.
No illegal content - this server is hosted in Finland, but managed in the UK - meaning that the laws of _BOTH_ countries apply here
Your right to free speech does not automatically confer the right to be obnoxious. As such, expect to be challenged for such behaviour

sebitech.social.text: Menschen oder Menschengruppen zu beleidigen, falsche Tatsachen zu unterstellen, oder diese zu verunglimpfen ist verboten.
Jeder hat das Recht, seine freie Meinung zu Themen zu äußern. Auch fundierte und saubere Kritik gehört hierbei mit dazu.
Es ist jeder angehalten, ein gewisses Niveau zu halten. Kein stupides "herumgeschreibe", sondern saubere Artikulierung auf einen ordentlichen Niveau.
Die Meinung der anderen hat jeder zu tolerieren, auch wenn diese nicht im Einklang mit der eigenen Meinung steht. Jeder hat zu jedem Thema eine andere Meinung, welche er offen kommunizieren darf.

securitycafe.ca.text: This server's code of conduct is largely borrowed from BSides San Francisco's Code of Conduct from 2023

selfhosted.cafe.text: Do not abuse, belittle, or insult anyone. Hate speech and harassment of any users on this server or other Mastodon servers or other federated systems is completely unacceptable. Any reports of abuse, in any form, will be logged and will lead to a ban.

Do not discuss piracy (including how to skirt software licensing). This isn't a warez forum. The discussion of software such as Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr and similar software is allowed, but discussing where to get content from is not allowed.
NSFW content is strictly off limits.
This Mastodon server is not an advertising platform. If you come here with the sole intent of advertising your services, you will be removed.

seo.chat.text: Be polite and kind. Don't be a jerk. Religious speech, hate speech, discrimination, and harassment of any kind is not tolerated on this server.
Be respectful - even if you disagree.
This server is intended for anyone who works in Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

The primary language for this server is English. Although it is fine to discuss SEO examples/cases/details related to different markets, languages and locales, make sure that the primary language of your posts are in English.
Read the About page for best practices and content not allowed on this server.

serenityos.social.text: Take all rules as guidelines and act accordingly. In doubt feel free to address @buggie@serenityos.social, @linusg@serenityos.social or @networkexception@serenityos.social directly. The administrator team always has the last word about enforcement of rules and does not have to explain actions taken.
Do the best you can in communication, try your best to keep a positive attitude, and try to not drag others down if/when you're having a bad day.

No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
No content that is illegal in Germany.
Unlike on the Discord server, the discussion of politics is explicitly allowed here, but please keep things civil.
Provide credit for creative works that are not your own.
While we do appreciate all kinds of content you post on here, consider other instances for NSFW posts. If you still wish like publishing on here, use descriptive content warnings.

sfba.social.text: Do not post illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.
Do not use slurs or discriminatory or hateful jokes and language, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia; including tone policing or critiquing lived experience.
Add content warnings to sensitive content (e.x. nudity, violence)
Do not harass anyone, post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”), or incite violence against anyone.
Do not post in bad faith, engage in name-calling, or ad hominem attacks. Criticize ideas, not people.
Do not post spam (e.x. a post with only a link or an image) or promote crypto-related content such as cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
Follow the community code of conduct: https://hub.sfba.social/code-of-conduct  Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally. Be nice and have fun!

No crypto, NFTs, or AI-created content.

shout.3xd.eu.text: Diskutierte mit in einem angemessenen Ton. Ein Forum / Board lebt von der Vielfalt. Dazu gehören auch Meinungen, die nicht mit der euren übereinstimmen. Behandelt andere Nutzer so, wie ihr auch behandelt werden möchtet: höflich und mit Respekt.
Sollte euch ein Nutzer mit seiner Meinung zu nahe treten, bleibt nachsichtig. Tauscht Argumente auf einer sachlichen Ebene aus. Verbale Schlammschlachten sind kein Beitrag zur Meinungsbildung!
Wir respektieren den Wunsch unserer Kommentatoren nach Anonymität. Aber steht doch ruhig zu eurer Meinung. Als registrierter Nutzer könnt ihr eure Kommentare mit eurem Vor- und Nachnamen versehen.

Macht in euren Beiträgen keine privaten Angaben. Veröffentlicht weder eure Adressen noch eure Telefonnummern. Auch ist es verboten, solche Angaben über dritte Personen in diesen Beiträgen zu veröffentlichen.
Beachtet ihr diese Regeln nicht, behalten wir uns vor, Beiträge zu löschen und falls erforderlich, euren Zugang zu sperren.

Wenn euer Beitrag folgende Inhalte enthält, wird er von uns, der Redaktion, gelöscht:
, sexuelle Belästigungen
, persönliche Beleidigungen, Drohungen und Beschimpfungen
, antisemitische und rassistische Äußerungen
, Diskriminierungen
, jede Art von strafbaren Äußerungen

silvan.cloud.text: No person using silvan.cloud shall use their account for harassment nor to compromise the safety and privacy of any other person on this or other Mastodon instances.

The following are prohibited on silvan.cloud: transphobia & queerphobia; ableism, saneism & eugenics ideology; racism, settler colonialism, orientalism, & casteism; promotion of fascist, Nazi, white supremacist, violent or hateful ideology; wilful spread of disinformation and misinformation.
Concern-trolling; sea-lioning; whatabouttism; astroturfing/astroTERFing; and other exhausting interactions that fall broadly under the umbrella of micro-aggressions are strictly forbidden.
No spamming the fediblock hashtag with discussion.

silversword.online.text: Read the message below these rules carefully. It is important for the future of your account on this server!

This is a gaming-oriented Mastodon instance. It is created by a gamer for gamers. Post anything related to video games. PC gaming, console gaming, VR gaming, mobile gaming. All other topics of your interest are absolutely allowed (see the next rule) but the main topic here is video games.

Real-life politics is not allowed. We are gathered on this instance to provide an escape from reality called video games. We love games, we live games. We welcome you into this community with any topic of your interest (besides gaming) except real-life politics.

Before you join this instance, take a moment to think about what these four words mean to you: Peace, Love, Unity, and Respect. It is the intention of this instance to be welcoming of other Human beings no matter their color or identity. As gamers, we set the example.

sizecraft.social.text: Respect Copyright: Only share content for which you hold the copyright or have obtained explicit permission to use.
NSFW Content: Please label and tag content appropriately to ensure that other users can browse the instance comfortably. Use content warnings for explicit or sensitive material.
Content Moderation: Don't post explicit violence, child exploitation, or any illegal activity. Violations may result in warnings, content removal, or account suspension.
Privacy: Do not share personal information or private conversations without explicit permission. If you are sharing others' artwork, ensure proper attribution and obtain consent whenever necessary.
Attribution and Sourcing: Give credit where it is due. When sharing or reposting artwork, always provide a link to the source when possible.
AI-Generated Content: AI-Generated content is allowed, but must be tagged with #AI, #AIGenerated or #AIArt to respect the wishes those who would prefer to hide such content.
Role-Play (RP) Accounts. RP Focused Accounts are allowed as long as the profile indicates as such and other content policies are adhered to.

smilodon.chatslibres.com.text: Les offres de cession d'animaux devront se faire dans le respect de la loi et pointer sur le site du refuge ou de l'association. Tout contenu en dehors de ce cadre sera supprimé et le compte bloqué si besoin.

Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, psychophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

snake.club.text: Be kind and respectful of others. This includes respecting things like pronouns, using content warnings as appropriate, etc.
Don't post anything designed to shock or disgust people.
This is not a NSFW server. I don't particularly care about the occasional not-quite-SFW post. I'm not puritan. But just don't make your account all about NSFW content. That's all!

Disagreement is fine, other opinions are welcome. Keep your discussion and disagreement civil and try to avoid ad hominems. If you venture into areas of denying other people's human rights, you'll find that you'll lose your rights to post here pretty darn quickly.

I'll do my best to use a three-strike system and reach out regarding moderation decisions. But at the end of the day, this is not Elon's "public square". I don't owe you free speech. You can host your own Mastodon server if you want. I can, and will, make any moderation decision I feel is necessary.

soapbox.hackdefendr.com.text:
Respect Privacy
Do not share or post personal information of others without their explicit consent. This includes addresses, phone numbers, emails, and private conversations.

Avoid Hate Speech
Refrain from using language that is discriminatory, racist, sexist, or hateful in any form. Promote a culture of respect and tolerance.

No Harassment
Do not engage in bullying, intimidation, or harassment of other users. This includes any form of cyberbullying or trolling.

Authenticity
Be honest about your identity. Impersonating others or creating fake accounts for deceptive purposes is prohibited.

Intellectual Property Respect
Do not post content that infringes on the intellectual property rights of others. This includes unauthorized use of copyrighted materials, trademarks, or proprietary information.

No Illegal Activities
Do not use the platform to engage in or promote illegal activities. This includes the sharing of pirated materials, instructions for committing crimes, or selling illegal substances.

Appropriate Content
Avoid posting content that is excessively violent, graphic, or sexually explicit. Adhere to community standards and content guidelines.

No Spamming
Refrain from spamming other users with unsolicited messages, advertisements, or repetitive content.

Report Abuse
If you encounter abusive behavior, illegal activity, or content that violates these rules, report it to the platform administrators promptly.

Follow Platform-Specific Rules
Adhere to any additional rules and guidelines specific to the social media platform you are using, as each platform may have its unique set of policies.

Hang out with us. If you go to our streams, we'll go to yours. We can all do more by coming together.

soc42.com.text: Any content presented, served or otherwise visible is not allowed to be used in any training of AI, ML or other algorithmic or statistic activities.

Be Kind and Constructive:

    While disagreements are natural, strive to approach conflicts with empathy and a desire for understanding.

No Fake News or Disinformation:

    Sharing intentionally misleading information or conspiracy theories without basis in fact is not allowed.

Account Limitations:

    Users are limited to creating one account per person, unless given explicit permission by the admins.
    Bots should be clearly marked as such and must follow all community rules.

Report Issues:

    If you encounter rule-breaking behavior, report it so the moderation team can address it.

Respect the Mods/Admins:

    Our moderation team is here to maintain a safe and welcoming environment. Please cooperate with them and respect their decisions.
    If you disagree with a moderation action, approach the situation calmly and constructively.

Follow the Platform's TOS:

    Adhere to the broader terms of service and community guidelines of the Mastodon platform.

Mind the Algorithms:

    Do not manipulate algorithms for trending topics or engage in behavior to falsely amplify messages.

Respect Boundaries:

    If someone asks you to stop interacting with them, respect their wishes.
    No sealioning (asking questions in bad faith to drain an individual's energy).

No Spam or Malicious Activity:

    Avoid excessive self-promotion or advertising.
    Do not engage in phishing, spreading malware, or other harmful activities.

Safe and Appropriate Content:

    Graphic violence, explicit adult content, and other potentially distressing material should be content warned. Misuse will lead to warnings or bans.
    No illegal content, including but not limited to copyrighted material, is allowed.

No Harassment:

    Do not intimidate, threaten, or stalk other users.
    Do not share another user's personal information without their explicit consent.

Respect Everyone:

    Do not engage in discrimination, hate speech, or harassment based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, disability, or any other personal characteristic.
    Avoid using slurs or derogatory terms.
Data Privacy & AI: No data from this instance, including user content and metadata, may be used for AI training or related modeling. Violations will lead to actions, including potential bans.

socel.net.text: Pornography or Rule 34 content of any kind is not permitted. NSFW content (i.e. artistic nudity) must be hidden behind a content warning, the NSFW filter, or marked as unlisted/private.

Incessant posting, soapboxing, campaigning, or harassment for any cause/belief/opinion violates rule no. 1 and is not tolerated. Accounts that engage in such behaviour publicly or direct it towards other users will be terminated.

Please do not spam or advertise for third parties/sponsors. This includes and is not limited to: selling items that are not your own creation, selling toots or offering toots for sale, and acting as a dealer engaged in trade.
Please report violations of these rules to the admin.
This instance is hosted by Masto.host and abides by its terms of service. The server is located in the EU in France and obeys all applicable laws.
Using Socel to circumvent restrictions or suspensions on other fediverse servers will result in your account being immediately terminated without warning.

NFT and other blockchain-based works in any form are prohibited; even if they are your own creation. Please do not post, share, promote, offer for sale, or otherwise engage in trade, any work based on these technologies.

No posting of copyrighted content (especially photos, artwork, music) that you don't own or have permission to use.

social.64i.de.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
No right or alt-right bullshit, Nazi content, conspiracy narratives.
No automated accounts (unless approved by the moderators). This includes bots, crossposters, feedposters etc.

When posting to the local timeline, provide Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like “uspol, elections”).
When posting to the local timeline, provide image descriptions.
NSFW is allowed as long, as you CW-Tag it and it's not illegal in Germany (so no CSAM, or Gore or other very brutal stuff or stuff, thats generated/filmed without all participants permission).
Provide credit for creative works that are not your own.
Don’t be a reply guy – uninvited comments about another user’s personal choices, lifestyle or family are strongly discouraged and may sometimes be considered harassment.
In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you’re talking to. Don’t escalate.

social.alton.cloud.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.

social.am-networks.fr.text: Respectez les autres utilisateurs de Mastodon. Utilisez un langage approprié et respectueux. Évitez d'utiliser des jurons, des insultes ou des termes discriminatoires.
Ne postez pas de contenu explicite ou sexuellement suggestif sans préciser que cela est sensible.
Ne spammez pas le serveur. Le spam inclut les publications répétitives, la publicité non sollicitée et la publication de liens douteux.
Ne publiez pas de contenu protégé par le droit d'auteur ou la propriété intellectuelle sans autorisation appropriée.
Pas de promotion de comportements illégaux ou dangereux, ni publication de contenus incitant à la violence ou à la haine.
Respectez les lois et les réglementations en vigueur. Tout contenu illégal sera supprimé et signalé aux autorités compétentes.
Ne publiez pas de fausses informations.
N'usurpez pas l'identité d'une autre personne ou d'une organisation.

Communiquez uniquement en Français. Ce serveur est francophone.
Vous pouvez cependant partager des toots rédigés dans d'autres langues.

Pour garantir la sécurité du serveur, nous validons manuellement les demandes d'inscription. Nous demandons également une raison d'inscription pour éviter les comptes SPAM.
Si vous ne savez pas quoi y écrire, vous pouvez y indiquer que vous avez pris en compte les règles du serveur.

social.apcn.nz.text: At the moment this is a single-user server. This is a list of standards to which I hold myself *And anyone else I would let use this server* to.
I will clearly mark any NSFW content

I am not sexist, racist, transphobic or homophobic & do not plan to Post content that is. I reserve the right to discuss such content & may include screenshots in this case content warnings will be applied, discussion of harassment is important but it may be triggering.

Nothing that's illegal in New Zealand.
See: https://www.legislation.govt.nz/act/public/1993/0094/55.0/DLM313407.html

If you spam me I will block you. If a lot of spam is coming from another instance And I am unable to resolve the issue with the administrator of the instance in a timely manner I will black hole that entire instance
The same goes for disinformation On anything important(politics, public health, etc)

This is my instance if I block you there's no appeal. Don't threaten to sue me Over free speech/First Amendment rights I don't live in The U.S. And my server isn't hosted in the u.s. And if you try in NZ Not only will it be thrown out You will probably get some kind of fine
Oh and any bot I create will be clearly marked as such

social.aptx-4869.de.text: Keine rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache.
Kein Belästigung einzelner Personen durch ungewünschte Kontaktaufnahme, Stalking oder Doxing.
Keine Verbreitung von Inhalten die in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen.
Nicht jugendfreie Beiträge müssen als solche gekennzeichnet werden.
Profilbilder und Banner, die nicht jugendfrei sind, werden nicht toleriert.
Werbung muss als solche gekennzeichnet sein. Übermäßige oder automatisierte Werbung wird nicht toleriert.

Die lokale Timeline soll den manuellen Posts der Mitglieder / Mitgliederinnen von social.aptx-4869.de  vorbehalten bleiben. Automatisierte Posts, wie zum Beispiel Re-tweets von Twitter, müssen auf "ungelistet" gesetzt werden.

Bot-Accounts, also Nutzerkonten, die größtenteils automatisierte Inhalte erstellen, müssen als solche gekennzeichnet sein, dürfen nicht auf der lokalen Timeline posten und dürfen nur mit Nutzer oder Nutzerinnen interagieren, wenn sie dazu eingeladen worden sind.

social.arazil.net.text: Excessive violence, hate speech, inciting violence, inciting hate, and/or threatening violence.
Fascist and/or authoritarian propaganda and/or disinformation.
Sexual abuse material including child sexual abuse material (CSAM).
Harassment and/or creating a hostile and/or toxic social environment.
Intentional disruption of normal service functions.
Content must be legal in the United States of America.
Please mark any content that may be considered "NSFW" (Not Safe For Work) in the United States of America. Marked nudity and/or sexual content is allowed given that it follows our content policies.
We reserve the right to terminate service at any time for any reason. Violations of the rules will be dealt with on a case-by-case basis.

We prohibit users from using our site content in commercial data sets without express prior written authorization from site management. Publicly available non commercial Internet preservation efforts (e.g. "Archive.org's Wayback Machine") are exempt from these content usage restrictions.
Users are expected to be 18 years of age or older.

social.arneckestrasse.de.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu Weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

social.asgardius.company.text: Porn or unlawful content is not allowed here
Impersonation of Asgardius Virtualx characters is forbiden
User names that promotes hate is forbidden
If you are using a fictional character' name you must use a related profile picture
If you are from Mars, you cannot sign up here, because we have a radio station at Asteroid Belt (The Red Robot Radio)
Posting from the Area 51 is forbidden. You must know why
Any account that violate instance policies will be banned immediately
You must read privacy policy to check forbidden name list before creating an account. I'll take less than 5 minutes
Use of email providers like Google, Microsoft or Yahoo is forbidden, due their mail sending policies. I suggest using something like protonmail, tutanota, disroot, or even better: host your own email
If you think that an user is infringing some laws send an email to admin. DMCA takedown request authors will be threated as abusive users
We have zero tolerance about child abuse

If you misuse Hacker term, your account will be banned immediately
We don't federate with GAFAM hosted nodes

social.asraelvudogel.de.text: Jegliche Formen des Rassismus, Sexismus, Antisemitismus und sonstigen rechten und rückständigen Gedankengut sind verboten und werden gelöscht.

social.asturias.red.text: No discriminación: cualquier transgresión del espíritu del artículo 2 de la Declaración Universal de los Derechos Humanos será expulsión directa.

Sin recursos: la disponibilidad del servidor más allá del 95% no está garantizada y la posibilidad de pérdida de datos por copias de seguridad deficientes es muy probable. No implica expulsión pero sí por adelantado un perdón por las molestias que se causarán.

Eficiencia: debido a no existir presupuesto el servidor no es ilimitado con lo que un alto consumo de recursos como disco duro, procesador, RAM... podría llevar a una expulsión amistosa (avisando con tiempo para que se puedan exportar los datos e irse a otro servidor).
Presunción de adultez: cualquier comportamiento no esperable por un adulto (insultos, acoso, spam...) no tiene cabida aquí, es decir, será expulsión directa.

Libertad: si no te gusta este servidor ni sus normas cierra la pestaña del navegador, abre otra y busca cómo montarte tu servidor para adaptarlo a tus normas. Que la ventaja de internet es esa ¡aprovéchala!

social.bau-ha.us.text:
We believe in cyberanarchism; and like any good old-fashioned anarchist collective, we look out for each other. Therefore we will not tolerate behaviors resembling...
sexism
nationalism
racism
homophobia
transphobia
ableism
harassment
doxxing
...
...you probably get the picture.

Content Warnings are nice. Please use them when appropriate. As an example: Posts about food, violence or mental health issues should be tagged. If in doubt, use them. People that do not want to see CW's can toggle them off in their settings.

If you use automated posts (bots, twitter crossposts, etc.) please post them unlisted (not appearing in the local timeline, still visible to everyone). Social media is about interaction, so we like to have some of that in our local timeline, too.
We do not like twitter. Please avoid links to birdside. If we wanted to see it, we had an account over there.
Oh, and because we're not really huge fans of this whole capitalism thing: no ads for stupid stuff. Thanks. :)

Please use the "why do you want to join" box to let us know why do you want to join our instance and to convince us that you're human (or a nice non-human). To make it easier for us to filter spam registrations please also tell us about your favorite forest creature.
Be excellent to each other! (J.W.v.Goethe, 1932) [[Citation needed]]

social.bethejustin.com.text: Don't embarrass yourself, don't embarrass the boat (aka this instance, admins, etc).
Don't do anything patently illegal, likely to get the instance/admins sued, attract the attention of any TLAs, etc.
Admins have the final say in all matters involving this instance you're welcome to talk about and advocate for democracy but this instance is not one.
Opinions of individual users of this instance do not necessarily represent those of the Admins and/or maintainers of this instance or any entity other than the user from which the originated.

This is a safe liberally aligned space. If you think that Donald Trump, Ron DeSantis, Greg Abbot, Ted Cruz, Josh Hawley,  MGT...you should be getting the point by now...are the hero of any story there's a Mastodon instance for you! It's called Truth Social.
No soliciting, proselytizing. Be passionate about your passions but not everyone is a potential convert to your cause respect them if they ask you to move on.
Avoid Direct Messages. DMs are not recommended on Mastodon as they are NOT encrypted. Instance admins recommend considering Signal.

social.besties.house.text: Hate (racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia, classism, along with other forms of hate like holocaust denial) is a ban.

Harassment is not allowed. Importantly, though, criticism is not automatically harassment, and this rule is looser when it comes to powerful people (billionaires, politicians) and corporations. In cases where this line is blurry, DM an admin.
Sensitive content, even which is not NSFW, should have content warnings (within reason). Mistakes can be forgiven but if it becomes a pattern you'll be warned.
Posting NSFW photos / drawings are not allowed (boosting it is allowed, though). NSFW text content (including screenshots of NSFW text) is fine but needs a content warning.

social.blackmetal.club.text: BMC is a place of free speech and freedom of art. Black and Extreme Metal will appeal to extreme minds. Speak up! Let your voice be heard!*

BMC values and protects privacy.

We understand that you might want to stay anonymous on the internet. BMC is hosted on a secure server, and is maintained daily.

BMC stands against deplatforming and cancel culture which is hitting the underground music scene. BMC is the instance that allows underground labels, and bands, to promote their art that may otherwise be censored on other platforms.

Be mindful everything has limits. We will not tolerate direct threats to any user in the fediverse. We can all have extreme and radically different views without being a twat. Debate is good, threats are not.

BMC is respectful to all and so should you. While we will not deplatform. If you post any sketch bands with sketch symbols or imagery mark it NSFW! The fediverse is a large place where many exist, don't force shit down everyone's throat. Some regions it's against the law. Be courteous and carry on.
BMC is not a place for bot accounts. Plenty of places for that go use them.

social.boykisser.systems.text:
Be respectful and inclusive. 

Do not discriminate against anyone based on their race, sex, sexual orientation, or gender identity.

Keep your content appropriate. 

Do not share explicit content without proper warnings or markings. Explicit content is not allowed in user avatars or header images.

Treat others with respect. 

Do not harass or bully other users on this or other instances.

Promote peaceful discourse. 

Do not incite violence or promote violent ideologies.

Share accurate information. 

Do not spread misinformation about public health, politics, or military matters.

Avoid unsolicited promotional messages. 

Do not spam the server with commercial advertising, service promotions, or SEO-related content.

Respect others' identities. 

Do not impersonate other individuals, public figures, or organizations without clearly stating that you are doing so for parody purposes.

Identify automated accounts. 

Automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences. Respect #nobot markers and post as unlisted unless posting less than once an hour.

Adhere to local laws. 

Do not post content that is illegal in Finland and Germany.

social.chiefgyk3d.com.text: No Hate Speech: We're committed to maintaining a respectful, inclusive environment. Hate speech or any other form of communication that demeans, belittles, or attacks someone will not be tolerated.
No Bigotry: Any form of bigotry, including but not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, and xenophobia, is strictly prohibited. This server values diversity and respect for all its members.

Cryptocurrency and NFTs: Shilling of joke coins is allowed, but they must be clearly noted as such. Shilling of NFTs with no utility or purpose is not permitted, with exceptions for charitable causes that have been vetted and approved. Our focus is on education, not profit-chasing.
NSFW Content: NSFW content is permitted but must be given a clear content warning and tagged appropriately. This allows members to opt-in or avoid such content based on their comfort level.
Financial Advice: Professional financial advice is permissible if you're legally certified (e.g., CPA). All others should focus on sharing knowledge, not advice.

Civil Discourse: We encourage open, robust debate and intellectual exchange. However, we expect these discussions to be carried out in a respectful and civil manner. Aggressive or offensive language is not allowed.
Content Creator Support: We respect and support the rights of content creators. Unauthorized sharing or copying of another's creative work is not allowed.
Respect for Privacy: Respect for personal privacy is paramount. Do not share another member's private information without their explicit consent.
No Spam: Avoid spamming the chat with repetitive messages, ads, or off-topic content.
Profile Conduct: Inappropriate usernames, avatars, or profile bios will not be tolerated.
Safe Environment: Threats, harassment, or any form of intimidation towards other members is strictly prohibited.
No Illegal Activity: Promotion or encouragement of illegal activities is not allowed.
Constructive Feedback: Offer feedback to other members constructively and politely, maintaining a supportive and positive community environment.
No Fascism: Fascism is in no way compatible with the openness and civility of this server. If you're wondering why, just open a history book.
Any content that promotes or glorifies eating disorders, including Pro-ANA (pro-anorexia) and Pro-MIA (pro-bulimia) content, is strictly prohibited.

Spreading falsehoods, disinformation, conspiracy theories, or any misleading information is not allowed. This includes circular reporting, shock-provoking content, deepfakes, and any form of intentional misinformation.
Engaging in mass following of accounts or aggregation of content for the purpose of spamming or increasing followers artificially is prohibited.

social.coop.text: No use of violence, threats of violence, or violent language directed against another person.

No harassment, defined as continuing to interact with or post about another person after having been asked to stop, including, but not limited to: unwelcome sexual attention; deliberate intimidation; stalking; and dogpiling.
No offensive, harmful, or abusive comments or insults, particularly in relation to diverse traits (as referenced in our values).

Always use content warnings (CWs) when sharing content that: is likely to be distressing or hurtful to others; should require consent to view; includes discussions or depictions of violence, sexually explicit material, and/or common PT triggers; includes flashing or rapidly changing images.
No posting of Personally Identifiable Information about others (“doxing”).
No posting of sexual material that is without consent.
No posting of sexual material that depicts individuals appearing to be under age 18, including Loli.
No excessive, frequent promotions of a product or service (i.e., spam).
No material that promotes bigotry, including fascist, racist, misogynistic, homophobic, or transphobic content.
Respect norms as described in Social.Coop's Code of Conduct here: https://wiki.social.coop/wiki/Code_of_conduct

social.cpress.org.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on bad economic analysis all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate organisational accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of social.cpress.org.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.

social.crabs.life.text: Bigotry or harassment is not tolerated here. This includes, but is not limited to: racism, sexism, xenophobia, transphobia, homophobia, pluralphobia (including endophobia: discrimination towards non-traumagenic systems), misogyny, ableism, or hate symbols.

Always assume good faith from other users. Remember there are humans with their own share of pain, stress, and joy on the other side of the screen, and take the most respectful interpretation from their messages and actions that you can.
Sensitive topics (e.g. death, drug use) should be marked with a content warning.
Avoid discussing or organizing in-person meetups on the instance in any form.
Use reasonable judgement, and avoid topics likely to result in unreasonable moderation burden.

social.coukaratcha.fr.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Est interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

social.crablab.uk.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.

No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
For the avoidance of doubt, your content must not cause this server to be in breach of the Online Safety Act 2023.

Use Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like “uspol, elections”).
Try hard to provide useful image descriptions.
The rules are remixed under CC-BY-SA from chaos.social e.V.

social.daleth.cafe.text:
Man darf niemanden belästigen.

Man darf niemanden stalken.

Man darf keine privaten Informationen über andere ohne Erlaubnis veröffentlichen.

Rassistische Bemerkungen sind nicht erlaubt.

Sexistische Bemerkungen sind nicht erlaubt.

Beschimpfungen sind nicht erlaubt.

Es ist nicht gestattet, Menschen wegen ihres Geschlechts zu diskriminieren.

Es ist nicht gestattet, Menschen wegen ihrer sexuellen Orientierung zu diskriminieren.

Inhalte mit nationalistischer Propaganda sind verboten.

Inhalte mit Nazi-Symbolen sind verboten.

Inhalte, die die Ideologie des National-Sozialismus unterstützen, sind verboten.

Es ist nicht erlaubt, zu Gewalt-Taten aufzurufen.

Sexuelle Inhalte müssen gekennzeichnet sein.

Gewalt-Darstellungen müssen gekennzeichnet sein.

Programme, die automatisch mit Nutzern interagieren, werden entfernt.

Zu viel Werbung ist nicht gewünscht.

Spam ist nicht gewünscht.

Inhalte nur für Erwachsene sollen auf einer anderen Plattform sein.

Diese Plattform ist dafür nicht der richtige Ort.
Alles, was gegen das Gesetz in Deutschland verstößt, ist nicht erlaubt.
Wer gegen Regeln verstößt, muss damit rechnen, dass seine Beiträge gelöscht werden.
Wer gegen Regeln verstößt, darf vielleicht nicht mehr teilnehmen.
Mit der Anmeldung stimmt man zu, alle Regeln zu befolgen.

social.ferrocarril.net.text: IMPORTANTE: Las cuentas que no cumplan mayoritariamente con la temática de la instancia podrían ser y serán suspendidas. Si no vas a cumplir la temática y normas de la instancia, NO te registres aquí.

No se permite la violencia contra otras personas ni las amenazas o acoso por motivo de su raza, origen étnico, nacionalidad, orientación sexual, género, identidad de género, afiliación religiosa, edad, discapacidad, enfermedad grave o cualquier otra situación personal.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que implícita o explícitamente difunda propaganda terrorista, franquista, nazi o promuevan otras formas de violencia, sin importar el tipo. Asimismo, se prohíbe cualquier acto contrario a las leyes del Estado Español o Suiza, lugar donde está alojado el servidor.

No se permite la participación en situaciones de acoso dirigidas a una persona o la incitación a otras personas a hacerlo. Esto incluye desear o esperar que alguien sufra daños físicos o psicológicos. No puedes fomentar ni promover el suicidio o las autolesiones.

No está permitido publicar cualquier tipo de información privada de otras personas (como el número de teléfono y la dirección de su casa) sin su autorización y permiso. También prohibimos amenazar con divulgar información privada o incentivar a otros a hacerlo.

No está permitido publicar ni compartir fotos o videos, tanto íntimos como no, de otra persona que se hayan producido o distribuido sin el consentimiento de ella. Asimismo, no está permitido publicar información privada sin consentimiento.

No está permitido impersonar o usurpar la identidad de personas, grupos u organizaciones para inducir a error, confundir o engañar a otros usuarios, así como tampoco utilizar una identidad falsa para engañar a otras personas.
Está prohibido compartir, con la intención de engañar, contenido multimedia falso o alterado que pueda dar lugar a daños graves.

Está totalmente prohibida la publicación de cualquier contenido para adultos (desnudos, pornografía, violencia o gore) sin su respectiva etiqueta CW. La administración se reserva el derecho de eliminar contenido de este tipo en cualquier caso.
Debes usar los CW (Content Warning/Trigger Warning/Advertencia de contenido) siempre que sean necesarios de forma correcta.

Está prohibido el contenido ilegal. Cada usuaria es dueña de sus comentarios y el contenido que publica y comparte. Esta instancia de Mastodon, no se responsabiliza del contenido publicado por las personas usuarias.

No se permite el crossposting generalizado. Nos gustaría tener interacción entre todas las cuentas. No hagas de tu cuenta un fantasma. Esto solo se permitirá en las cuentas espejo oficialmente autorizadas por la administración.

Por favor, establece una politica de borrado de toots antiguos razonable. Recuerda que esto es una instancia compartida entre todas las personas que la formamos. No disponemos de recursos ilimitados. Haz un uso responsable.

social.fetedelamusique.de.text: Fête de la Musique Berlin is committed to creating a welcoming and inclusive online community that encourages open dialogue, mutual respect, and constructive engagement. As a member of this Mastodon channel, we ask that you abide by the following guidelines:

Respect Others: Treat all members of this community with respect and kindness, regardless of their race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, or any other personal characteristics.
Any form of discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to trolling, flaming, or bullying, will not be tolerated.
Keep it Civil: Engage in constructive and respectful conversations, even if you disagree with someone else's opinion. Avoid personal attacks, name-calling, or insults.
Stay on Topic: Keep your posts and comments relevant to the purpose of the Fete de la Musique Mastodon channel. Do not engage in spamming, advertising, or any other form of self-promotion.
Protect Your Privacy: Do not share personal information, such as your address, phone number, or email address, with anyone in the community. Be mindful of your own privacy and the privacy of others.

Report Any Issues: If you witness any behavior that violates this Code of Conduct, or if you experience any form of harassment or discrimination, please report it to the moderators immediately: hallo@fetedelamusique.de
By participating in the Mastodon channel of Fête de la Musique Berlin, you agree to abide by this Code of Conduct.
We reserve the right to remove any content or member that violates these guidelines, and to take appropriate action against any form of harassment, discrimination, or other unacceptable behavior.

social.fops.one.text:
Be Kind and Respectful
Treat everyone with respect and kindness. Avoid harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or any form of harmful behaviour towards others. This includes but is not limited to race, ethnicity, gender, religion, sexual orientation, or disability.
No Spam or Advertising: Do not spam the timeline with repeated posts or advertisements. Promotional content should be relevant to the community and not excessive.

Content Warnings (CW): Use Content Warnings for sensitive or potentially triggering content such as violence, graphic images, spoilers, or adult content. This ensures that users have the option to view or skip such posts as per their comfort.
Respect Privacy: Do not share personal information about others without their explicit consent. Be mindful of data privacy when discussing or sharing sensitive information.
No Trolling or Flame Wars: Avoid engaging in disruptive behavior, trolling, or flame wars. Healthy debates and discussions are encouraged, but avoid personal attacks.

No Illegal Content: Do not post or share content that violates any local, national, or international laws. This includes but is not limited to copyrighted material, pirated software, or any other illegal content.
Keep It Safe: Do not post links or content that may lead to malware, viruses, or phishing attempts.
Avoid Spoilers: When discussing recent media (movies, TV shows, books, etc.), use appropriate content warnings and avoid spoiling major plot points without adequate warnings.
Be Mindful of Bandwidth: Avoid excessive bandwidth usage and large media attachments that may negatively impact the server's performance.
Language and Etiquette: Maintain a standard level of language and etiquette in your posts and interactions. Avoid excessive use of profanity or offensive language.
Respect Moderators' Decisions: If a moderator takes action regarding a post or account, respect their decision, and use the appropriate channels for appeals or discussions.

social.furryrefuge.com.text: Don’t spam or advertise in a chat. We have channels for advertising art AND other personal stuff, please use them. They will be listed in the chat list. DMing random people for advertising is NOT ok and will result in us removing you. Use the chats designed for advertising.

Don’t be mean. Common sense is your friend, just be nice. In general, if someone asks you not to do something because it bothers them, just dont do it. If we think you are a troll, spammer, or inviting bots, we are going to remove you.
Non-directed jokes in poor taste are acceptable unless someone takes offence. Read your audience.
Glorification or promotion of illegal activities is not permitted. Talking about CP will get you instabanned.
Unless the chat is for a specific language, please expect to use the English language. We have German and Russian chats. If you think we should have another language chat, just ask!
Invalidating someone’s personal identity is not okay. Likewise, don’t make a big deal out of someone’s identity including your own.
This is not the setting to preach your views on a particular subject when others have moved on.
Don’t post politics or religion. It never ends well and you’re only setting yourself up to get into an argument. Everyone is different. Everyone is welcome. Keep this in mind.
Statements which are meant to cause harm or are generally offensive are not allowed. Think before you speak. Your thoughts are your own, however some should stay private.

Casual discussion of self-harm, physically or mentally, is not acceptable. For example, talking about how you frequently drink until you pass out, or having constant mental breakdowns in chat. If you need help, reach out and one of our staff can give you a list of hotlines to call.
When posting images to a chat or channel, keep them on topic. If you’re talking about cars in the musician chat, you should probably join the Auto Furs chat.
If your account looks like a bot (No username, No bio, No profile picture) we might remove it. Take the 5 minutes to edit your profile and appear like a real person.
Obey the per-room rules listed in the description of chats/channels.
AI images should somehow be made known they are AI generated through conversation or use of a tag, title, or spoiler.

social.jdbnet.co.uk.text: Respectful Interaction: Treat all members with respect. Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or personal attacks will not be tolerated.
No Spam: Avoid posting spam or engaging in any form of disruptive behavior. This includes excessive advertising or repetitive content.
Content Warnings: Use content warnings for posts containing sensitive or potentially triggering content. This includes but is not limited to violence, explicit material, and major spoilers.
Illegal Content: Do not post or share any content that is illegal or promotes illegal activities. This includes but is not limited to piracy, child exploitation, and incitement to violence.
Privacy Respect: Do not share private information about other users without their consent. This includes personal data, private messages, and sensitive information.
No Impersonation: Do not impersonate other individuals, public figures, or entities. Clear parody accounts are allowed, but they must be clearly marked as such.
Constructive Discussions: Engage in discussions constructively. Debates are welcome, but they should be based on facts and respect differing opinions.
Moderation Compliance: Follow the guidance and decisions of the moderation team. If you disagree with a decision, you can appeal respectfully through the provided channels.
Report Issues: If you encounter any issues or see behavior that violates these rules, report it to the moderation team for review.

social.kemitix.net.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

social.kiziah.cloud.text: Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as is any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the social.kiziah.cloud community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not post blatantly political content. There are plenty of other spaces dedicated to topical team-based politics. If your feed looks like the front of an election site you will be promptly banned.

social.lavanderblue.art.text: Harassment, threats, and intimidation are not permitted. Neither is inciting violence against others, including by encouraging people to hurt themselves, or by sharing private information to encourage or facilitate crimes against them (doxxing).

No toleration for promotion of fascist, white supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism. This includes but is not limited to Holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, and anti-trans, misogynistic, and/or racist harassment; including in usernames, avatars, and profiles.

No permission for the willful or persistent promotion of misinformation, disinformation, or conspiracy theories. This includes, but is not limited to, bigoted conspiracy theories and misinformation about elections and vaccines.

No permission for the sustained disruption of conversation, including on the local timeline, in hashtags, or in replies. Only use tags that are relevant to your posts, and do not disrupt conversation with excessive tags or replies. If you are asked to leave someone alone, leave them alone.

social.learnlangs.com.text:
Be kind to everyone.

No racism, Nazism, sexism.
Racists, Nazis & similar will be removed from this server; they can join plenty of others.

No homophobia & transphobia.
All we care about is what language-learning tips you have.

Limit unrelated ads.
You can promote your blog / language business here, as long as you don't flood. If your business is SEO or other stuff, limit advertising posts to once every 14 days. People who never post about languages and only advertise other stuff may be asked to move to another server.

German law applies.
If you endanger the server by posting stuff that is against German law, and we're based in Germany, we may have to remove you.

Keine Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind. Keine Handlungen, die dieser Instanz schaden (sei es der Technik, dem Ruf oder der Sicherheit)
Kein rechter Scheiß, kein Nazikram, keine Verschwörungstheorien.
Keine automatisierten Accounts (außer von der Moderation abgenickt). Das gilt insbesondere für Bots, Crossposter, Feedposter usw.

Posts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen CWs (Inhaltswarnungen) für Gewalt, Sex, Tod/Krankheit und Politik (insbesondere bei negativen oder kontroversen Themen). Das sind nur die Kategorien, eine CW könnte also z.B. “depol, Wahlen” sein.
Posts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen Bildbeschreibungen.

Bitte beachtet das DM/direct messages (direkte Nachrichten) keine privaten Nachrichten sind und somit nicht verschlüsselt (lesbar) sind. Falls Ihr private Chats führen wollt, nutzt bitte anders Systeme.

social.lila.network.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
No right or alt-right bullshit, Nazi content, conspiracy narratives.
No automated accounts (unless approved by the moderators). This includes bots, crossposters, feedposters etc.

When posting to the local timeline, provide Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like “uspol, elections”).
When posting to the local timeline, provide image descriptions.

social.macg.co.text: Soyez sympa. Nous encourageons la liberté d’opinion et d’expression, et les débats sont bienvenus tant qu’ils restent courtois. Traitez les autres membres encore mieux que vous n’aimeriez être traité.
Évitez le flood et le spam. Évitez le flood, les chaines de messages, et le copypasta. Donnez quelques explications, même en deux mots, lorsque vous partagez un lien.
Évitez la publicité. Nous n’acceptons aucune forme de publicité sous quelque forme que ce soit. Intervenez uniquement à titre personnel, évitez d’intervenir comme le représentant d’une entreprise.

Évitez les contenus « adultes ». Certains membres ont moins de 18 ans. Évitez les contenus « adultes », qu’il s’agisse de contenus à connotation pornographique, de contenus particulièrement choquants ou violents, ou de contenus visant à la manipulation émotionnelle.
Évitez les contenus illégaux. N’incitez pas au piratage de contenus, et ne partagez pas de ressources portant atteinte à la propriété intellectuelle.

Évitez les sujets inflammables. Nous sommes contraints, pour éviter de surcharger la modération, de proscrire les discussions portant sur la politique et la religion. Dirigez-vous vers d’autres instances pour discuter de ces sujets.

Respectez les autres membres. Évitez le langage SMS et les abréviations que vous êtes le seul à comprendre. 
Ne mentionnez pas les administrateurs et les modérateurs à tout bout de champ. Ne harcelez pas les membres de manière publique ou privée.
Respectez les modérateurs. Ne vous faites pas passer pour un salarié de MacGeneration. Ne harcelez pas les administrateurs et les modérateurs. Respectez les décisions de modération.

social.mapolist.com.text: Respect Others: Treat all members with kindness and respect. Avoid offensive language, personal attacks, and discrimination based on race, gender, religion, or other factors.
No Hate Speech or Harassment: Do not engage in or tolerate hate speech, bullying, or harassment of any kind. Report such behavior promptly.
Stay On Topic: Keep discussions relevant to the group's purpose or topic. Avoid posting unrelated content or spam.
Use Clear and Courteous Language: Communicate clearly and politely. Use proper grammar and avoid excessive use of slang or abbreviations that might confuse others.
No Self-Promotion: Refrain from excessive self-promotion or spamming the group with advertisements. Self-promotion should be relevant and not disrupt the community.
Respect Privacy: Do not share personal information about others without their consent. Respect members' privacy and boundaries.
Fact-Check Information: Before sharing news or information, verify its accuracy to prevent the spread of false or misleading content.
Be Constructive: Provide constructive feedback and contribute positively to discussions. Critique ideas, not individuals.
No Trolling: Do not engage in trolling or disruptive behavior that aims to provoke others or derail conversations.
Report Issues: If you encounter inappropriate behavior or content, report it to the group administrators or moderators rather than taking matters into your own hands.

social.markofall.com.text: Focus on what is best for the community.
Focus on what is best for the community.
No sexualized language, imagery, or unwelcome sexual attention or advances.
No trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, or personal/political attacks.
Do not publish others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission.
Do not engage in conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting.
Do not post image, video, or audio with Public visibility without providing a media description.

social.mashed.cloud.text:

Use content warnings and spoilers judiciously as appropriate.
Be polite and respectful of other people, both on this server and other Fediverse members.

social.mbbit.de.text: Jede Form der Diskriminierung oder Diffamierung von Menschen oder Gruppen aufgrund deren Herkunft, religiöser Zugehörigkeit, Nationalität, körperlicher Verfassung, sexueller Identität, Geschlechts, Einkommensverhältnisse oder ihres Alters wird nicht akzeptiert.
Kommentare, die offensichtlich Teil einer Kampagne sind (Shitstorms), können ebenfalls entfernt bzw. deren AbsenderInnen blockiert werden.
Nicht belegbare Theorien oder nicht belegte Behauptungen und Verdächtigungen können ebenfalls entfernt werden, insbesondere, wenn sie ehrverletzend oder geschäftsschädigend sind.

Wir behalten uns grundsätzlich vor, Anzeige zu erstatten, wenn ein Straftatbestand erfüllt ist. Wer öffentlich im Netz andere beleidigt, kann mit bis zu zwei statt mit bis zu einem Jahr Freiheitsstrafe bestraft werden (§ 185 StGB).

social.mclegoman.com.text: Content containing harassment, racism, sexism, homophobia, or transphobia is not allowed.

social.medienzentrum.rocks.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht.
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots.

social.milktea.io.text: Do not post content that is illegal

social.minecodes.de.text: Respect all users and avoid harassment, abuse, or discrimination.
Post responsibly and avoid sharing misinformation, hate speech, or illegal content.
Protect the privacy and anonymity of other users. Do not share private information without consent.
Abide by the local laws and regulations regarding online communication -> German laws & EU laws
Respect the intellectual property of others and avoid plagiarism or copyright infringement.
Be mindful of the content you share and avoid posting spam, irrelevant content, or excessive self-promotion (except it's useful for a larger user group and is approved by the Admin/@thies).
Refrain from creating multiple accounts to manipulate or disrupt the community. This includes not-marked bot accounts and follow-bots.
Respect the moderation decisions by instance administrators and report violations of these rules.
Be responsible for your online actions and avoid engaging in behaviors that could harm others or the Mastodon community.
Embrace diversity of thought and expression while maintaining a respectful and inclusive online environment.

social.minx.space.text: Be kind to your peers! Treat others with empathy and respect.
Discrimination in any form (including, but not limited to sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia...) is strictly prohibited on the platform.
Harassment, doxxing, or other abusive practices are not allowed.
No content illegal in Germany or the EU.
The intentional spreading of disinformation (“fake news”) is not allowed on the platform.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Promotion of pseudoscience is also not allowed.
Respect the Fediverse etiquette: use content warnings for sensible content and describe your uploaded images using alt text.
So that we can moderate the instance, content has to be in a language for which free machine translation (e.g. Deepl.com) is available.
No sexually explicit or violent content allowed.

social.mkj.earth.text: Don't be a source of trouble

social.mobile-adenum.fr.text: Nous nous respectons en tant qu’avatars, nous considérons les prises de parole individuelles en tant que telles, et elles se doivent d’être respectées. L’équipe de modération se verra obligée d’éliminer toute critique violente ou non argumentée envers tout toot.

Tout écrit sur ce serveur ne reflète qu’un avis défendu par un avatar. L’avatar que vous animez ne défend pas nécessairement votre avis propre : vous l’animez, ce n’est pas vous. 
Mais les informations proposées devront être exactes dans la mesure du possible.
Toute remarque ou commentaire qui prendrait au pied de la lettre tout avis défendu par un autre avatar en le personnifiant directement ou l’essentialisant sera discuté par l’équipe de modération.

La thématique de cette instance Mastodon est dédiée principalement aux sujets culturels ou liés aux problèmes médico-sociaux. Néanmoins, tout écrit qui sortirait de ce cadre en respectant les règles énoncées ci-dessus sera accepté.
Concernant les sujets culturels : tout sujet artistique, culturel ou lié à une création est bienvenu, quelle que soit la définition qu’on donne à la notion de création.
Concernant les sujets médico-sociaux : nous mettons un point d’honneur à ce que les usagers du système de santé ou social puissent s’exprimer librement.

social.mondoweiss.net.text: Content Warnings/Wrappers: Mondoweiss is a news outlet, covering the movements, activists and policymakers who affect the struggle for freedom in Palestine. We endeavor to be friendly participants in the fediverse and we welcome polite feedback about our use of CW tags on our posts.
Users: This server is for staff of Mondoweiss, and is closed to registration from others.
Moving Accounts: Our staff are free to move their accounts to other Mastodon instances when they leave Mondoweiss, or at any other time.

DM's are Not Encrypted: Direct messages on Mastodon are not encrypted, and can be read by administrators on the instances of anyone mentioned. Do not use them for secure or truly private communications.
Alt Text: Users are expected to always add some form of descriptive alt text to pictures and other attached media.

social.moment.at.text: Wir pflegen einen respektvollen Umgang miteinander, gerade auch in hitzigen und kontroversen politischen Debatten.

Kein Rassismus, Sexismus, Diskriminierung von Gendern, Ethnien oder Minderheiten.
Keine Verbreitung von Spam, Desinformation und rechtsextremer Inhalte.
Verstöße gegen diese Grundregeln können dazu führen, dass Toots gelöscht, Accounts stummgeschaltet oder entfernt werden.

social.nerd.net.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
DMCA requests are respected only when sent to the email designated to copyright.gov.

social.nerdyfam.tech.text: There's supposedly a line between dark humor and being offensive, but we've yet to find it. social.nibis.de.text: Freundlicher Umgangston - Keine Inhalte die in Deutschland, Österreich oder der Schweiz illegal sind - Keine Diskriminierung von Personen - Keine Gewalt, keine Propaganda, keine Ideologien - Keine sexuellen Inhalte

social.oddly-influenced.dev.text: This server follows the ethic of the podcast: we ask "*if* this idea is true, what might it mean for developing software?
Consequently, the tone of the community should be "yes, and..." rather than "no, because...".
We can all post things not strictly aligned with the purpose of the site, but: if that's all (or almost all) you do, I'll ask you to go elsewhere.

Do not post things intended to make other people feel bad (racism, sexism - all the things a polite person knows not to do). You're a grown-up, so don't insult me with an "I'm just asking questions" dodge.

Do not post material under someone else's copyright. If you believe your copyright has been violated, please send notices to marick@exampler.com (preferred) or in writing to 913 W White, Champaign, IL, 61821, USA.
The preceding two rules are described in more detail in the Terms of Service, which you can find via the  "About" link on most pages or the "Learn More" link on the home page.

social.owlcode.tech.text: * If you use any data coming from any user in this instance to train an AI of any kind you must pay the user involved 1 000 000€ per toot, 5 000 € extra if it comes with an image per image and 2 power the number of characters in the toot €.

For a post with two images and 600 characters the operation would look like this:

1000000€ + (5000 * 2)€ + (2**600)€
If the resulting number is greater that unsigned integer 64 bits limit as an especial offer we allow to only pay the maximum number that fits a uint64
By making requests to this server you agree to these terms.
Bots allowed if the moderators find them useful or funny.

social.pigelet.org.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdits toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

social.pincade.com.au.text: Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No sexually explicit or violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind (bullying, trolling, name-calling, etc)

No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.
We have a zero-tolerance policy for hate speech or illegal activity of any kind.  Any post engaging in hate speech of any kind will be terminated.
