social.politicaconciencia.org.text: Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org acepta de manera voluntaria los Términos del servicio.

Todo miembro de esta instancia se obliga voluntariamente a respetar cada uno de los puntos del código de conducta. De no hacerlo, recibirá hasta un máximo de tres llamadas de atención, dependiendo de la severidad de la falta. En caso de reincidencia, su cuenta será cancelada.

Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org se compromete a respetar las indicaciones, sugerencias o peticiones directas que le realice el equipo de administración. No hacerlo es causa de suspensión de la cuenta.
El equipo de administración de social.politicaconciencia.org está obligado a resolver los problemas que surjan de la interacción entre los miembros de la instancia.

Se permite la expresión libre de las ideas sin importar las creencias, las convicciones políticas o religiosas de los miembros de la instancia, siempre y cuando no contradigan algún punto del código de conducta.

No está permitido el uso de palabras altisonantes, frases, albures, composiciones lingüísticas, etc., empleadas con el propósito claro de ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.
Está prohibido el uso de imágenes o material multimedia (audio, video, gifs animados, etc.,) destinados a ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.
Se prohíbe cualquier forma de discriminación, ya sea por género, condición económica, nacionalidad, condición de salud o similares, en contra de cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.

Cuando un miembro de la instancia desconozca un tema, queda prohibido responder en términos que lo disuadan de manifestar sus dudas. Siempre que le sea posible,  cada usuario debe ayudar a disipar los vacíos de conocimiento. Nadie puede ser discriminado por su nivel de conocimiento.

Durante el proceso para dirimir una controversia, no se considerará como razón válida en su defensa el que un usuario alegue que desconoce los términos del servicio o el código de conducta para justificar la realización de acciones que vayan en su contra. Es deber de todos los usuarios conocerlos.

Para la buena convivencia, los debates  deben favorecer la exposición de los argumentos y no centrarse en ataques contra el objeto o tema del que se hable, ni en contra de la persona que lo expone. Con ello se busca procurar conversaciones constructivas con contenido informativo enriquecedor.
Se prohíbe subir, compartir o divulgar material pornográfico de cualquier índole, incluida la pedofilia. Infringir este punto es causa de revocación inmediata de la cuenta de usuario.
El material artístico con contenido sexual explícito está permitido; no obstante, debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De lo contrario, podría ser eliminado.

El material audiovisual (imágenes, audio, video, gifs, etc.,) cuyo contenido sea definible como violento, necesariamente debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De otra forma, podrá ser eliminado.
Esta instancia no puede ser usada para la realización de actividades consideradas como delictivas por la legislación vigente en México.
Casos no previstos aquí serán resueltos por los administradores de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org

social.pogo.community.text: No Drama: Ill will and drama toward other members is not acceptable. This includes personal attacks, threats of any nature, harassment, and physical altercations.
No Elitism: Elitism and condescension are not welcome.
In-Game Name: When applicable, your username for this server should be the same as your in-game name.
Keep it Clean: If it doesn't belong in a typical place of work, keep it spoilered.
Follow Niantic’s Terms of Service: Botting, GPS spoofing, and other cheating behavior/discussion is not allowed.
Follow the Law: Abide by all local and national laws and ordinances, including respecting private property.
No Spamming: Do not excessively ping or spam other users
The Staff: Do not block, impersonate, or attempt to pose as a member of staff (Or impersonate anyone for that matter)
You must be age 13 or above to be a part of this community, any anyone not of legal adulthood must have parental consent to be here.

social.pornstarpromote.com.text: Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Don't violate copyright laws; only post what you have rights or permission to post.
Illegal content such as child pornography or any other variant of child sexual abuse material (CSAM) is not permitted at any time.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Keep it civil.  Don't be a jerk.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, or sexual identity.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this system.
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.

Automated posting: - accounts that post over 30% using automation - must be labeled as a “bot” in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors. Automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day.

social.running.cafe.text: Be nice. This is a friendly and inclusive community. This should in theory render most of the following rules unnecessary but I'll write them anyway.

Please keep it family friendly. This mostly means we don't allow any adult content. There is a place for this on the fediverse and feel free to follow NSFW accounts. However I've made the decision to keep this instance safe for people who don't want to or shouldn't see this kind of thing.
Please don't post anything that is against the law in the UK or will get me in trouble with my service provider.

This is not a rule but other than this list, feel free to post about whatever you want in whichever language you would like to use. However we do reserve the right to change these rules in the future or remove posts/accounts that we deem unsuitable for some other reason.

Be respectful. Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and other forms of hate and discrimination are not welcome. Your behaviour elsewhere may also be considered if brought to our attention.
No incitement of violence or promotion of discriminatory or violent ideologies.
No spam, harassment, dogpiling or doxing of other users, this includes mass and spam reporting.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom.
No intentionally false or misleading information. By extension, do not pose as persons of interest.
Controversial, reactionary, NSFW, and satirical or similar content may be removed if not obviously Content Warned where appropriate.
The site's staff team will ultimately have the final say on any and all moderation actions.

social.saarland.text: Kein Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Befürwortung
Keine Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten
Keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Keine Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. (Dogpiling)
Kein nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung

Werbung ist grundsätzlich erlaubt. Wir bitten euch eure Werbung mit dem Hashtag #werbung zu kennzeichnen. Wir behalten uns vor - jeweils situationsabhängig - vereinzelte Werbe-Toots von dieser Regelung auszunehmen.
Keine Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Diese Instanz ist eine Gefälligkeit. Mit dem Erstellen eines Accounts akzeptiert ihr, dass wir euch keine Uptime-Garantien etc. machen können. Wir, die Admins, betreiben diese Instanz auf unsere Kosten und zum Spaß als Hobby-Projekt.

social.sargasso.nl.text: Discriminatie, xenofobie, racisme, moslimhaat, seksisme, transhaat, haatzaaien, aanzetten tot geweld en andere dingen die bij wet of verdrag verboden zijn worden niet getolereerd.
Het verspreiden van aantoonbare valse of misleidende informatie wordt niet getolereerd

Doxen is verboden. Ook wanneer de gegevens al elders staan. Wat is doxen? Het publiceren van persoonsgegevens van iemand anders. Denk aan namen, adressen, telefoonnummers, IP-nummers, (jeugd-)foto’s, -filmpjes, etc…
Sokpoppen liever niet, maar zijn wel toegestaan als dit duidelijk wordt vermeld in het profiel.
Satire en parodie zijn toegestaan, mits dit duidelijk in het accountprofiel wordt vermeld. Zie ook: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poe%27s_law
Bots zijn toegestaan indien zij de API niet overdreven belasten (Wat overdreven is bepalen wij).

Seksueel expliciet materiaal graag achter een content warning, maar is wel toegestaan. Sekswerk is werk! We vragen je echter wel te verhuizen als seksueel materiaal het meeste of alles is wat je plaatst.
Wees geen trol, ook niet als het bovenstaande regels niet breekt.

Les langues à privilégier sur ce serveur sont le Français ou l'Anglais, sans pour autant que cela soit une obligation mais cela aide, pour la modération : en cas de doute, si les modérateurs ne parlent pas la langue, ils utiliseront des outils de traduction automatique imparfaits…
La pornographie et la nudité doivent être obligatoirement indiquées comme « NSFW ». De même pour contenus sensibles/choquants, qui doivent avoir un « Content Warning » approprié.

Le contenu publicitaire n'a pas sa place sur cette instance. Les diffusions scientifiques sont bien évidemment autorisées, en particulier venant d'organismes à but non lucratifs, publics, de presses universitaires, d'écoles, d'universités…
Les comptes automatisés (crosspost automatique depuis twitter, par exemple) doivent être indiqués comme « robots » en cochant « Ceci est un robot » dans l'éditeur de profils.

social.techniverse.net.text: Respektvolles Verhalten | Wir setzen auf gegenseitigen Respekt. Beleidigungen, Belästigungen, Hassrede und jegliche Form der Diskriminierung werden auf unserem Server nicht toleriert.

Keine illegalen Inhalte | Das Teilen von illegalen Inhalten, inklusive Urheberrechtsverletzungen, Kinderpornografie oder die Förderung illegaler Aktivitäten, ist strengstens verboten und wird geahndet.
Umgang mit NSFW-Inhalten | NSFW-Inhalte sind zu kennzeichnen. Bestimmte Arten von NSFW-Inhalten können verboten sein, bitte beachtet die spezifischen Richtlinien.
Verantwortung der Nutzer | Jeder Nutzer ist für seine eigenen Beiträge verantwortlich und muss die Konsequenzen bei Regelverstößen tragen.

social.territorisostenibili.org.text: 1. In conformità con le leggi e la giurisprudenza italiana  i contenuti pedopornografici, anche sotto forma di cartoni animati, sono illegali e saranno cancellati e gli account interessati bloccati (se remoti) o cancellati (se locali).

I contenuti pornografici o visibilmente violenti devono essere contrassegnati con il flag "sensibile/sensibile". Gli account che violano questa regola saranno resi invisibili ai feed locali e federati.

La pubblicità, in forma ripetuta e/o intrusiva (che menzioni altri utenti), non è accettata. Gli account interessati verranno resi invisibili ai feed locali e federati o eliminati, a seconda della gravità della situazione.
Avvicinati alle persone con cura e cortesia. Se qualcuno ti chiede di smettere di menzionarlo o dichiara di non voler più partecipare a una discussione, devi adeguarti.
Sono vietati commenti, immagini o video razzisti, sessisti, omofobi o transfobici.
Sono vietate avances o proposte sessuali non richieste
È vietata qualsiasi condotta, in pubblico o in privato, volta a perseguitare, molestare o intimidire altri
È vietato raccogliere, pubblicare, diffondere dati personali altrui senza la sua esplicita autorizzazione.

È vietato continuare una conversazione o incitare una persona a continuare un'interazione con una persona che ha affermato che la cessazione di tale interazione può essere considerata una molestia, indipendentemente dalla riservatezza impiegata.
È proibito qualsiasi tentativo di invertire l'oppressione sistemica. Ad esempio: “razzismo anti-bianco”, “sessismo anti-maschile”, “eterofobia”, “cisfobia”
È vietato pubblicare o diffondere intenzionalmente dichiarazioni diffamatorie o calunniose. Ciò riguarda anche l'eventuale disinformazione con l'intento di trarre in inganno .

social.toot9.de.text: Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns unerwünscht!
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.

social.uibk.ac.at.text: Die Universität Innsbruck begrüßt quelloffene, datenschutzfreundliche, dezentrale und nicht-kommerzielle Online-Netzwerke wie das Fediverse und betreibt daher die Mastodon-Instanz social.uibk.ac.at.
Die Mastodon-Instanz wird auf einem hauseigenen Server in einer Zusammenarbeit des Kommunikationsteams mit der IT-Abteilung gehostet.

Die Instanz social.uibk.ac.at wird vom Kommunikationsteam der Universität Innsbruck zum Zweck der institutionellen Wissenschaftskommunikation verwendet. Zudem stellt die Universität Innsbruck diese Instanz allen Organisationseinheiten sowie allen Mitarbeiter:innen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung.

Die Anmeldung ist an das universitätseigene Single-Sign-On-System gekoppelt und ausschließlich darüber möglich. Für die Inhalte der Postings auf dieser Instanz sind die Organisationseinheiten und Mitarbeiter:innen der Universität Innsbruck verantwortlich.
Bei Fragen oder Anregungen wenden Sie sich bitte an das Moderationsteam im Kommunikationsteam der Universität Innsbruck unter fediverse@uibk.ac.at (Melanie Bartos, Christian Flatz)

social.zoc.me.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateurs), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

socialfed.nl.text: Deze server wordt gemodereerd volgens de Nederlandse en Europese regelgeving.
Discriminatie op basis van afkomst, huidskleur, geaardheid, overtuiging, etc. is niet toegestaan.
SPAM en andere vormen van ongewenste reclame zijn niet toegestaan. Promotie van eigen content is toegestaan mits het niet tegen de regels in gaat.

Content dat mogelijk ongeschikt is voor een groep gebruikers (bijv. op basis van leeftijd of overtuiging) moet zoveel als mogelijk, binnen de grenzen van redelijkheid, worden voorzien van een CW (Content Warning).

Vrijheids van meningsuiting wordt gerespecteerd, maar het brengen van ongefundeerde en niet onderbouwde feiten moet worden voorzien van een waarschuwing dat de gebrachte informatie 'onjuist kan zijn' en 'niet is voorzien van een redelijke onderbouwing'.
Content die schadelijk kan zijn voor de maatschappij, bijv. door het doen van opruiende uitspraken, is niet toegestaan.
Het beheer heeft de vrijheid om naar eigen inzicht te modereren en heeft het laatste woord bij eventuele disputen.
Vanwege beperkingen in moderatie is op deze server alleen het gebruik van een Europese taal toegestaan.

soundbyte.social.text: All official languages of the European Union are welcome here, as well as Icelandic and Norwegian. All computer languages are also welcome.
Respect the boundaries of other people. They may not share their world-view with you.
Humour is allowed and encouraged. But be aware of the potential to cause offence, and always take remedial action should this occur.

Parody is allowed. But if the parody is not obvious, then it should be explicitly labelled as such. Misinformation, disinformation, and other content shared with the intention to mislead is prohibited.

Use Content Warnings (CW) liberally. Especially for posts that a reader might find offensive, controversial, or difficult. CWs can also be used as a short summary of a long post, like a tl;dr. If in doubt, put your content behind a Content Warning.
Harassment, trolling, microaggressions, bullying, stalking, dogpiling, doxxing and ad hominem attacks are all prohibited, along with the incitement of others to perform such actions.

Do not discriminate on any ground such as sex, gender, race, colour, language, religion, political or other opinion, national or social origin, association with a national minority, property, birth or other status.
Fascism, Nazi symbolism, holocaust denial, incitement of violence and the promotion of violent ideologies are all prohibited.

Do not flood, spam, shitpost, carry out any action intended to impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions.
Include attribution to third party content whenever possible.
Illegal content and links to illegal content are prohibited.
Do not share NFT or crypto content. This is nonsense. Take it elsewhere.
Leave moderation to the moderators. Do not tone police, and avoid debating moderation activity in public. Report content if necessary.

spaceballs.masto.host.text:
No Nazis, Racists, TERFs, Abelism, or Creeps of Any Kind.

Let's be honest, you shouldn't be welcome ANYWHERE. That's what got us into *waves around*.

Respect people's boundaries and privacy. 

No means no. Someone blocked you? Let them be. Is their post not public? Don't scrape it.

Be nice, welcoming, and empathetic.

Other social platforms are intentionally designed to stoke divisiveness, rage, and dischord. The only Dischord you should be paying attention to is the one with Fugazi on it, anyway.

Having a sense of humor doesn't hurt. 

Humor is all around. It's OK to be funny—as long as you're punching up, not down. If you don't know the difference, you shouldn't be on this instance.

No Crypto, Memestocks, DeFi, NFT, or Web3 Chatter.

The communities around these topics frequently slide into conspiracy and fascist horseshit, not to mention just being outright scams.

speedlines.stctp.zone.text: Be excellent to one another! No harassment, trolling, abuse, etc. If you have to ask if something is harassment the answer is probably yes.

No fascism! Not even going to bother explaining this one. Fascism is to be destroyed, not debated.
No "zombie account" auto-posting! If you're going to be here: be here. Automatically dumping your posts here from some other site without participating in the community is not welcome.

spoilertv.social.text:
Respect Others
Every user is expected to interact with others respectfully. Harassment, bullying, or any form of intimidation will not be tolerated.

No Hate Speech

Expressing hatred or promoting violence against individuals or groups based on attributes such as race, religion, gender, age, nationality, or sexual orientation is strictly prohibited.

No Illegal Content
Sharing or promoting illegal content, including but not limited to, copyright infringement and promoting illegal activities, is strictly forbidden.

No Spamming
Please refrain from spamming in any form, including unsolicited advertisements or excessive off-topic content.

NSFW Content
If you're sharing sensitive or adult content, please use the Content Warning (CW) or Not Safe For Work (NSFW) features appropriately to hide such content.

Privacy
Respect the privacy of others. Do not share other people's personal information without their explicit consent.

Bots
Bots are allowed, but they must be clearly identified as such in their profile and must not engage in spamming or disruptive behavior.

Blocking and Reporting
If you encounter someone who is breaking these rules, you have the right to block them. Please also report the violation so our moderators can take appropriate action.

spookykitties.com.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Won’t Be Tolerated. We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.

Consent is Important in all contexts. If you’re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.

spore.social.text: We support justice and action, specifically on climate, with the intention of bringing a better world into being.
We apply content warnings to traumatic conversations but content warnings are never used to silence conversations about justice.
We do not tolerate hate-speech. We allow swearing but we do not allow bigoted language of any kind.
We do not allow misogyny of any kind, particularly trans misogyny.
We do not perpetuate ableism in our actions or language, including refraining from use of ableist language.
We are safe for work (no nudity or pornographic images of any kind). At the same time, we support sex workers and recognize sex work is work.
We are trauma-informed and abolitionist. We believe in bringing people in and giving them space to be better instead of blocking or bans.
We do not allow unfounded conspiracy theories, misinformation, disinformation, and state-sponsored propaganda.

sueden.social.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Wir legen Wert auf eine gesunde Kommunikation untereinander. Falls du deinen Account nur benutzt um Links zu teilen und ohne Rücksicht Crossposter verwendest, oder für Referral-Link nutzt, werden wir Admins uns bei dir melden.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Wir dulden keine Verschwörungstheorien, die das oben genannte (und/oder ähnliche) Verhalten unterstützen oder dazu führen.

supernatural.fans.text: Family don’t end with blood, so be kind to one another. We do not allow racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ageism, xenophobia, classism, ableism, religious discrimination, and so on.
You must be at least 18 years old to use this space.
Tag (CW) your SHIP, your (NSFW) sexual imagery, tag violence, suicidal ideation, painful or triggering SPN screenshots/vids, spoilers ofc, and anything else that might do harm.
No hate speech allowed. Don’t hate on certain actors or their spouses, on a ship, or on other fans. Love what you love, and mute or block what or who you don’t.

Avoid posting art you did not create or fandom photos that you did not take. Boost the original post, or if the art/photo is not from Mastodon, credit and link to the artist/photographer, ideally after asking for their permission.
Do not create any sort of corporate account for advertising purposes. Artists and Makers are of course allowed (and encouraged!) to promote their own shops and commissions.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent idealogies or symbolism, including but not limited to nazis, TERFs, and January 6th insurrectionists.
We do not tolerate abuse. Do not threaten, stalk, doxx, harass, sexually harass, brigade, dogpile, name-call, intentionally misgender, or deadname anyone. Punching up to power is still okay.
Do not post anything illegal in the United States of America.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.

superhappy.social.text: Respeto mutuo: Todos los miembros deben tratar a los demás con cortesía y respeto, independientemente de sus opiniones o habilidades.
Sin spam: Evita publicar contenido irrelevante o promocionar productos o servicios de manera excesiva.
No acoso ni intimidación: No toleramos el acoso, la intimidación, el discurso de odio o cualquier comportamiento que haga que otros se sientan incómodos o inseguros.
Contenido apropiado: Publica contenido relevante para la comunidad y evita compartir material inapropiado o que pueda resultar ofensivo para otros miembros.
Privacidad y seguridad: Respeta la privacidad de los demás y no compartas información personal sin consentimiento.
Colaboración y ayuda mutua: Fomenta la colaboración entre los miembros y ofrece ayuda y apoyo a aquellos que lo necesiten en sus proyectos de desarrollo.
No piratería ni contenido ilegal: No compartas ni promuevas actividades ilegales, incluida la piratería de software o la violación de derechos de autor.
Feedback constructivo: Cuando des feedback o críticas, asegúrate de que sean constructivas y respetuosas, con el objetivo de ayudar a mejorar el trabajo de los demás.
Etiqueta apropiada: Utiliza etiquetas adecuadas al publicar para que otros puedan encontrar fácilmente tu contenido y para mantener la organización en la comunidad.
Moderación: Los moderadores están aquí para garantizar un ambiente seguro y acogedor para todos. Sigue sus instrucciones y colabora con ellos si surge algún problema.

swissodon.ch.text: Keine Belästigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen.
Rassismus, Sexismus oder Beschimpfungen haben hier nichts verloren.
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten haben hier auch nichts verloren.
Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus ist verboten.
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt und/oder Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sind nicht erlaubt.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden gelöscht.
Übermässige Werbung / Spam / Spamflut von wiederholenden Tröts sind nicht erwünscht.
Allgemeine Verstösse gegen geltendes Recht in der Schweiz.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoss gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Löschung von einzelnen Beiträgen, oder der Stummschaltung/Löschung des gesamten Accounts führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Accounts akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

swiss.social.text: 16+ und CH-Bezug: Für Personen ab 16 Jahren aus der Schweiz und solche, die sich mit der Schweiz verbunden fühlen. Für juristische Personen braucht es einen Geschäftssitz in der Schweiz.
Wir stehen ein für Inklusion: Diskriminierung (Rassismus, Sexismus, Homophobie. Transphobie oder andere Formen) sind bei uns nicht geduldet.

Inhaltswarnungen: Explizite Inhalte müssen hinter Inhaltswarnungen (inkl. sinnvoller Beschreibung) verborgen sein und sind in Profilbildern nicht erlaubt. Dazu gehören beispielsweise Nacktbilder und Gewaltdarstellungen.
Explizit pornografische Darstellungen sind nicht erlaubt.
Respektvoller Umgang: Belästigungen von anderen Benutzern werden nicht geduldet. Dazu gehört auch Doxing, Cyberbullying, Stalking und ähnliches Verhalten.
Gesetzeskonform: Es sind nur Inhalte gemäss Schweizer Recht erlaubt.
Aufruf zum Frieden: Aufstachelung zur Gewalt oder Verbreitung und Förderung von Gewaltideologien sind nicht geduldet. Auch sämtliche Formen von Hatespeech sind nicht geduldet.
Wahrheitsgebot: Kritische Diskussionen sind erwünscht, doch es werden keine Desinformationen geduldet. Dazu gehören unter anderem Fake News oder Verschwörungstheorien.

Inhalte von Menschen für Menschen: Werbung ist unerwünscht, wird aber im kleinen Rahmen toleriert. Accounts, die nur Werbung liefern, werden geblockt. SEO, Bots und Crossposting ohne Interaktion wollen wir nicht.

Lokale und föderierte Timeline: Accounts, die regelmässig explizite Inhalte posten, können aus der lokalen und der föderierten Timeline für eine unbestimmte Dauer ausgeblendet werden. Das Ermessen hierzu liegt beim Mod-Team.
Hausrecht: Dies ist eine privat betriebene Instanz. Wir halten uns deshalb das Recht vor, einzelne Accounts ohne Angaben von Gründen auszuschliessen.

systerserver.town.text: This is a space for feminists that have been somehow connected to the systerserver network.

No discrimination: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics such as gender, race, disabilities, ethnicity, class, nationality, education, religion.
No harassment: stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Content warnings: We do not require a content warning (CW). However, we ask that you be kind and considerate: include CWs if you believe your post may be distressing to others.
Bots: Bots are allowed. Try to make them fun.

Cross-posting: Cross-posting from Twitter, RSS, etc. is fine (and even encouraged if it helps you become more active here). If you do cross-post please do it in a way that adds to the conversation in our community.

Self-promotion: Please use your account to promote your work. - we want to see it or hear about it because we are convinced that the world needs more feminist contributions, be they political, artistic, pointing to history or imagning a better world, or anything else.
Just one thing: Please do so in a respectful tasteful and not spammy manner.
Language: There are no language rules on this server. English is by default de facto the main language, but feel free (even encouraged!) to post in other languages.
Accessibility: Help make this space more accessible. Use the available accessibility tools. For instance to provide a summary/description for images. Yes, even for your obscure memes.
Licenses: We support free art licenses, Creative Commons licenses, copyleft, public domain and we don't want to deal with copyright infringements.
The main moderators for this instance right now are @ana, @anne and @gaba. Please report any post or account through the mastodon interface (https://docs.joinmastodon.org/user/moderating/).

This code of conduct is based on the following server rules:

    https://tldr.nettime.org/about/more
    https://blog.chaos.social/rules
    https://post.lurk.org/about/more

syzito.xyz.text: Syzito allows free expression of opinion, within fair boundaries, that means no bigotry, crime, harassment, trolling or malicious misinformation.

tchafia.be.text: Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.

Les contenus reconnus comme potentiellement choquants pour tout public, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

Conformément aux lois belges, européennes et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper; la satire comme le gorafi ou the onion sont autorisés. Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués dans leur nom et description publique.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
il est interdit de mégenrer et/ou morinomer volontairement quelqu'un, de promouvoir les "thérapies de genre"

teal.social.text: Bigotry, including but not limited to discrimination or hate speech based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, disability, or any other attacks on one’s personhood, will not be tolerated.

Threatening behaviour or harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Our community and its platforms are not to be used to launch attacks on anyone. Do not post screenshots of DMs or posts marked as private without the consent of all involved.
When replying, consider whether your perspective is needed or whether you’d gain more by listening.

Use content warnings when posting depictions of sex and sexuality, substance abuse, violence, disease, body horror, and death. Mark images as sensitive if they contain nudity, gore, food, or any of the above subject matter.

When posting someone else’s work (art, cosplay, and so on), please do your best to source it and provide links to the creator's social media or portfolio. If you don't have the source, do a reverse image search to look for it.
The following content is strictly prohibited and will result in an immediate ban: sexual depictions of children, Nazi symbolism, and promotion of cryptocurrency or NFTs.

Discrimination & Bigotry Won’t Be Tolerated.

Respect Other Users.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Consent is Important in all contexts.

If you’re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.

Listen; Don’t Make Excuses.

If you’re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.

No Pedophilia or Zoophilia.

This includes artistic depictions of characters that cannot give consent.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.

Use the Report Feature.
Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.

texasobserver.social.text: Content Warnings/Wrappers: The Texas Observer is a news outlet, sharing information about politics from protests to policy-making. We endeavor to be friendly participants in the fediverse and we welcome polite feedback about our use of CW tags on our posts.
Users: This server is for staff of the Texas Observer, and is closed to registration from others.
Moving Accounts: Our staff are free to move their accounts to other Mastodon instances when they leave the Texas Observer, or at any other time.

DM's are Not Encrypted: Direct messages on Mastodon are not encrypted, and can be read by administrators on the instances of anyone mentioned. Do not use them for secure or truly private communications.
Alt Text: Users are expected to always add some form of descriptive alt text to pictures and other attached media.
We do not tolerate bigoted speech on this server (though we like to think our employees know better!). Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

tfq.social.text: No illegal content, copyrighted material, etc.

th-pape.de.text: Halte alle Gesetze und Regeln ein, die du auch im realen Leben mit deinem Gegenüber einhälst.

Erwünscht
- Ermutigung von Mitmenschen hier in der Gruppe
- Bibelzitate, die uns Stärken und Kraft geben

Wer ist willkommen
Jeder, der den Gott der Bibel kennenlernen möchte, oder schon kennt. Hauptsache ist, dass du IHN und Sein Wort respektierst.

Was wir wollen
Die Liebe zur Bibel und zu dem Gott der Liebe stärken.

Unser Gott ist ein Gott der Ordnung und deshalb sollte es auch hier geordnet zugehen. Bei Fragen kann gerne ein Admin / Moderator kontaktiert werden,letztendlich obliegt es aber diesen zu entscheiden, ob etwas erbaulich für die Gruppe ist oder nicht.
Wir Menschen machen alle Fehler und Konflikte sollten bitte nicht in der Gruppe ausgetragen werden.
Gottes Wort ist uns heilig - wer sich über die Bibel oder über Jehovah lustig machen möchte, ist bei uns falsch und darf sich eine andere Instanz suchen.
Nicht erwünscht - Keine Propaganda - Keine Werbung oder massives Spamming von Nachrichten - Keine unnötigen Diskussionen über Lehr und Dogmatik

tffp.masto.host.text: be respectful to others, if an admin tells you to stop, stop.

add alt text to images, media and other files. This will help the blind and deaf know what is being presented.
add a bio about yourself. this will serve as an introduction. No bio, you will after 3 days get kicked. You are interesting, remember this.

thegoblin.market.text: No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion .
Posting the same content on multiple instances in order to spam local and/or federated timelines is not permitted.

Hide sensitive content such as violence and other potentially triggering topics under a CW, & tag #NSFW. In the CW provide a short indication of why you are using the CW to help people make an informed decision. Non-erotic artistic nudity should be tagged #nudity and behind a CW.
No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam (you *can* post your own shop links and commission pages! Please share those often!).

No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, transphobia, anti-Semitism, ableism, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of any of the above. Talking about your personal experience of suffering any of the above is allowed.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
The Goblin Market has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying — your account will be immediately suspended.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).
If you're posting an image then PLEASE add alt-text to it

thehappyfamily.stream.text: This Machine Kills Fascists! We here at the Happy Family DO NOT support fascism, Nazism, imperialism or any kind of far-right ideology in any form! Anyone promoting them or using their imagery in a proselytizing manner will be banned!

Be kind to others! Anti-BIPOC (Black, Indigenous, and People of Color), sexist, ableist, racist, homophobic, and transphobic views will not be tolerated. Use of racial or offensive slurs will get you banned.
Be kind to yourself! Please avoid using self-deprecating language regarding yourself or your works. Language and how we use it is important, please be mindful of how you speak about yourself.

NSFW is OK within reason! We allow R18/NSFW images, but all such content must be tagged as sensitive, and you should add CWs as necessary. If you repeatedly fail to mark said post as sensitive, we will make your account enforced-sensitive.

Creators are welcome! Artists, musicians, writers & artisans are welcome to engage with the community regarding their craft, just don’t make advertising posts for the sake of purely promoting a commercial product or service.

Well ran & corpo free Fedi! This server abides by the Mastodon Server Covenant (joinmastodon.org/covenant). We are also a proud signer of the Anti-Meta Fedi Pact (fedipact.online) as well as actively block Meta Threads and connections there of.
This server is volunteer run! If you would like to help defray hosting/server costs, you can send funds to Admin Mini: (ko-fi.com/ministryofennuicontrol) Just say it’s for the Mastodon server!

thejuniverse.no.text: Respect for All: Treat all members with respect. Personal attacks, harassment, and hate speech are not permitted.
Freedom of Speech: While we support free speech, it must not infringe on the rights and safety of others. No promotion of violence or illegal activities.
Authenticity: Maintain authenticity in your posts and comments. Do not impersonate others or spread misinformation.
Privacy: Respect the privacy of others. Sharing personal information without consent is strictly forbidden.

Content Guidelines: No explicit content, including graphic violence or adult material, is allowed outside designated areas specifically for adult content. Keep discussions accessible to all age groups in all other areas.
No Spam: Avoid posting spammy content or unsolicited advertisements.
Constructive Discussions: Encourage constructive and thoughtful discussions. Avoid derailing conversations or engaging in disruptive behavior.

Intellectual Property Rights: Ensure you have the rights to any material you share on the platform. Unauthorized sharing of copyrighted material is prohibited. Respect the intellectual property of others and only post content for which you have legal permission.

theweird.space.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, etc.  Particularly marginalized people have to put up with too much of this as it is.
Be generous with content warnings. Generally R-rated stuff is cool if behind a CW, but also CW not safe for lunch stuff as well. Nothing graphic or explicit please.
No harassment, dogpiling, doxxing, etc. Be nice; don't threaten people.

thinkydoers.social.text: This is an anti-racist, trans-inclusive feminist, and LGBTQ+ friendly and welcome server.
We use CWs (content warnings) liberally and not only as “trigger warnings.” CWs enable consent: using them lets folks who see your posts decide what they do and don’t wish to click to expand.

That said: Black community members, members of underrepresented or historically oppressed communities and cultures may choose as they wish about CWs especially when posting about racism. White fragility will be moderated / educated about on this server.

Harassment and/or abusive behavior will not be tolerated. Racism, sexism, homophobia, and/or transphobia — whether overt, casual, or ignorance-based — will be called in by moderators, and will not be tolerated.

Please DO report hurtful or harmful behavior (which does not include interactions that trigger white fragility). In response to abuse reports, I will block outside users and problematic servers to help ensure that the Thinkydoers community is a safe and welcoming place without harassment or abuse.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning / propaganda, duplicate accounts or accounts impersonating others) will be moderated or removed.
No law-breaking. I’m still a lawyer, so please. Our laws matter. This server is moderated under U.S. law on a host located in Estonia. Don’t make me read a statute, please.

tiphon.nerv-project.eu.text: Veuillez lire et accepter le règlement intérieur sur le lien suivant. / Please read and accept internal rules at the following link. / https://nerv-project.eu/collectif/reglement.html
Respecter la bonne morale, ne pas heurter la sensibilité d’autrui, majeur comme mineur / Respect good morals, do not offend the sensitivity of others, major as minor
Respecter l’ordre public, ne pas harceler / Respect public order, do not harass
Ne pas divulguer d’informations confidentielles / Do not disclose confidential information
Ne pas envoyer d'œuvres sans en avoir la propriété intellectuelle ou l'autorisation / Do not send works without having intellectual property or authorization

Ne pas discriminer ou inciter à la discrimination d’une personne ou d’un groupe de personnes en raison de sa religion, de son ethnie, de sa race, de son orientation sexuelle ou de son handicap / (english below)
… / Do not discriminate or incite discrimination against a person or a group of people because of their religion, ethnicity, race, sexual orientation or disability

Ne pas inciter à la haine, à la violence, au suicide, au meurtre, à l’assassinat, au racisme, à la xénophobie, à l’homophobie, à l’apologie des crimes de guerre ou contre l’humanité, à commettre un crime, à commettre un délit, à réaliser un acte de terrorisme / …

… / Do not incite to hatred, violence, suicide, murder, assassination, racism, xenophobia, homophobia, the apology of war crimes or crimes against humanity, to commit a crime, to commit an offence, to carry out an act of terrorism
Ne pas inciter des tiers à se procurer illégalement des données, des logiciels ou des œuvres de l’esprit ou toute autre chose portant atteinte aux droits ou aux bien des tiers / …
… / Do not incite third parties to illegally obtain data, software or intellectual works or any other thing infringing the rights or property of third parties
Ne pas être dénigrant, diffamant / Not to be denigrating, defamatory
Ne pas porter atteinte à l’image, à la réputation, d’une personne physique, d’une marque ou d’une entreprise / Do not damage the image, reputation, of a natural person, a brand or a company
Ne pas conseiller une pratique douteuse, frauduleuse, illicite / Do not advise a questionable, fraudulent, illicit practice
Ne pas envoyer de photos ou d’images pornographiques ou pédopornographiques / Do not send pornographic or child pornography photos or images
Ne pas compromettre la vie privée, l’image ou les données d’un tiers / Do not compromise the privacy, image or data of a third party
Ne pas conseiller une pratique polluante ou néfaste pour l’environnement ou la santé / Do not recommend a polluting or harmful practice for the environment or health
Respecter les règles d’éthique et de déontologie défendues par Nerv Project ASBL / Respect the rules of ethics and conduct defended by Nerv Project ASBL
Ne pas obstruer les actions de l’organe d’audit / Do not obstruct the actions of the audit body
Authorized languages are : French, English, Dutch, German. / Les langues autorisées sont : Français, Anglais, Néerlandais, Allemand.

Les inscriptions sont réservées aux membres de Nerv Project ASBL et aux personnes préalablement autorisées par l'association. / Registration reserved to Nerv Project ASBL staff and authorized people by the non-profit organization.

todon.eu.text: We do not accept racism (in all its forms, incl. hate against Muslims, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism - see our Terms of Service for our complete definition).
We do not accept hate against lesbians, gays, bisexuals, pansexuals,  transgenders, non-binary people, intersexual people, queer people in general, etc.
Sexism, misogyny and hate against black women (misogynoir).
We do not accept ableism (incl. COVID-19 denial/downplaying and anti-vax) and body-shaming.
We do not accept harassment and trolling.
We also do not accept other forms of hate speech.
We do not accept (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).
We do not accept glorification of violence, calls for murder, death threats, terrorism and militarism.

We do not accept (neo)colonialism (incl. Zionism), imperialism in all forms and nationalism (above all nationalism of nation states,  incl. flags/symbols of those on Todon.*, see our Terms of Service).
We do not accept fascism, right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism.
We do not accept evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only], and extreme sects and cults.
We do not accept Marxist-Leninists (Stalinists, Maoists, etc) or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies).
We do not accept capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (aka ancaps) and neoliberals.
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, downplaying the climate crisis, greenwashing and deceptive climate solutions (like nuclear energy).
We do not accept (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, fake news and other forms of disinformation.
Another rule in our terms of service at wiki.todon.eu/todon/terms_en. Explain in the final step (reports only).

tokonatsu.social.text: Be nice and respectful to everyone. Remember, this server is by extension part of Tokonatsu, so remember how you like to be treated and treat those in the same way!
Don't post anything illegal, it will likely get you into trouble as well.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism or other hateful conduct. Please report anything as soon as you can.
Use Content Warnings for anything that would be bad for young people to see. We are an all-ages event, so we need to make sure we are a safe space too.

tonybark.com.text: Content Warning and Labeling: Any content that is adult-oriented, graphic, or sensitive in nature must be obscured behind a content warning and must be clearly labeled as such. This is to ensure that users are adequately informed and can consent prior to their exposure to such content.

Prohibition of Misleading or Deceptive Content: The posting of content that is misleading, deceptive, or false is strictly prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to, content that is intended to deceive, mislead, or defraud others.
Prohibition of Harassment: Spamming, stalking, harassment, or antagonistic behavior is prohibited. This includes unsolicited communications and behavior intended to annoy or intimidate others.

Workplace Appropriateness of Avatars and Headers: All avatars and headers must be appropriate for a work environment. This includes, but is not limited to, images, symbols, and text that are not offensive, explicit, or inappropriate.
Bot Delisting: Except for certain exceptions like news outlets, all bots must be delisted from the public timeline. This ensures a more human-centric interaction environment on our platform.

Compliance with Laws and Regulations: All content must comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the laws of France. This includes, but is not limited to, content that does not infringe upon the rights of others, violate privacy laws, or engage in illegal activities.

Federation Compliance: The aforementioned rules apply both locally and to any social networks federating with our network. Any federated social networks found to be in violation of these rules may face defederation. This ensures a consistent and respectful environment across all platforms.

toot.beep.computer.text: Les contenus illégaux en France sont interdits.

La nudité et les posts à caractère pornographique doivent systématiquement être marqués comme tels dans le champ Content Warning (« avertissement de contenu ») et ne doivent pas être postés en public (vous pouvez cependant les poster en non-listé).
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Les propos homophobes, transphobes, racistes et tous autres propos à caractère haineux sont interdits et leur auteur·e feront l'objet d'une suspension.
Utilisez les content warnings et les descriptions d'image. Un modérateur peut être amené à vous demander de modifier votre post pour rajouter de telles informations si nécessaire.
En règle générale, soyez bienveillant·e et abstenez-vous de tout jugement ou commentaire négatif ou intrusif.

toot.beer.text: No hate speech or discrimination of any kind will be tolerated.
Do not post content that is illegal or promotes illegal activities.
Do not post content that is pornographic or sexually explicit.
Do not post content that is violent or graphic.
Do not post personal information of others without their consent.
Do not engage in harassment or bullying of any kind.
Do not impersonate other users or falsely represent yourself.
Do not spam or post irrelevant content.
Do not post copyrighted or trademarked material without permission.
Respect the community guidelines and terms of service of toot.beer and the Mastodon platform.

toot.bike.text: Be kind and respect each other.
Contact no one that explicitly stated they do not want to be contacted. Don't stalk, don't doxx.
We do not tolerate Nazi propaganda. We've read Karl Popper.
No porn. Occasional nudity (breastfeeding or naked butts at cold lakes for example) is OK though.
No spam. If you are unsure whether the real life impressions from your bike shop are OK or are considered spam, contact the admin team.
This instance has no room for racist, sexist, antisemitic, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, saneist content.
Obey the law. When you post content here, always mind: German law applies, EU law applies and the law from the country you are posting.
Please use CN, CW and NSFW where it applies (injuries, death, violence, things that might trigger people), but do not overuse it.
Do not stay on topic. Have a good time!

toot.blue.text: ●テーマは設けていません。自由に投稿してください。
●エログロやSPAM、過度の連投や，自動大量フォロー、個人情報の書き込みの他、法に抵触する可能性のある投稿があった場合には、管理人の判断で予告なく消去する場合、アカウントの停止を行う場合があります。また、成人向画像については、たとえ画像にNSFWの処置があっても、管理人の判断で予告なく消去する場合、アカウントの停止を行う場合があります。
●人種差別、外国人差別、民族差別、性差別、LGBTQ+差別などの差別発言やヘイト発言、またそうした差別につながる可能性のある発言も厳禁です。
●小児性愛など性的な同意をすることができない対象に対する性的欲求の発露・表現（画像・テキストの掲示）を行うことを禁止します。社会的な話題として小児性愛について扱うときには内面で幼児・小児を対象とした性愛・性的嗜好を持つ「ペドフィリア」と、違法行為を実行する児童性虐待者「チャイルド・マレスター」を混同せず、区別して論じてください。
●その他　規約に明確に規定されていなくても、管理者の判断で不適切と判断した場合、投稿に関する削除・停止・修正要請を行う場合や、アカウントの制限・停止・削除を行う場合があります。

toot.berlin.text: Participate in an authentic and active way. In doing so, you contribute to the health and longevity of this community.

Be mindful of your surroundings and of your fellow participants. Alert community leaders if you notice a dangerous situation, someone in distress, or violations of this Code of Conduct, even if they seem inconsequential.

toot.foundation.text: No hate speech or discrimination of any kind.
No oppressive language or actions, including micro-agressions.
NSFW posts must have a content warning and be marked as sensitive.
Content discussing or showing subjects that are likely to be traumatic to others must be behing a content warning.
Accounts created with the only purpose of posting porn are only allowed if it's your own content.
No spamming or filling your posts with unrelated hashtags  to artificially gain visibility (using lots of hashtags in your intro is fine).
No DMs asking for money (posts asking for community assistance are allowed).

toot.gaiac.io.text: Conformément aux lois de Nouvelle-Calédonie et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux. Cela concerne aussi toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés).

toot.gemeinschaffen.com.text: gemeinschaffen.com ist ganz besonders offen für Mitglieder von bzw. Interessierte an Ressourcengemeinschaften.

Wir bevorzugen es, wenn du unter deinem Klarnamen postest. Ressourcengemeinschaften, die auch auf unserem Marktplatz zuhause (kostenlose Registrierung möglich!) sind, dürfen bei uns gerne auch unter dessen Namen zu tröten.
Bots müssen von den Admins erlaubt werden. Wir tauschen uns aber lieber mit Menschen aus.
Getrötet wird bei uns ausschließlich im respektvollen Ton und förderlich für ein gutes Miteinander. Herablassendes über Menschen wird grundsätzlich ohne Vorwarnung gelöscht.
Bei uns haften Trötende nach geltendem österreichischem Recht für erstellte oder geteilte Inhalte.

Die lokale Timeline ist den Trötenden von gemeinschaffen.com vorbehalten. 
z.B. Bots oder wie automatisierte Re-tweets von Twitter müssen auf "ungelistet" gesetzt werden!

toot.iamninja.ru.text: Относитесь к другим пользователям с уважением. Харрасмент, разжигание ненависти (hate speech), трансфобия, гомофобия, расизм, сексизм, фашизм и прочие проявления шовинизма — запрещены

toot.lugbz.social.text: Respect others. Your opinion matters, but please express it respectfully without insulting anyone.
Discrimination is unacceptable. We prohibit racist, sexist, misogynistic, homophobic, antisemitic, and other inhumane posts.
Follow the laws, even on the internet. Avoid any illegal activities.
Protect your privacy. Think carefully about what information you share online if you don't want it to become public.
If you wish to share NSFW content, consider using a dedicated account on another platform.
Harassment is not acceptable. Respect others' wishes not to be contacted and avoid harassing behaviors like brigading or dogpiling.
Hate propaganda, Nazi symbolism, and the promotion of National Socialism are strictly prohibited.
Content that is illegal in Europe will be removed and may result in the suspension of your account.
Be kind and respectful. Irony and sarcasm can be difficult to discern in text, potentially leading to misunderstandings.
Automated posts should be marked as "Unlisted" to avoid overwhelming the local timeline. Non-interactive cross-posting accounts may be removed.
Conspiracy theories that support or promote the above-mentioned behaviors are not allowed.
Respect intellectual property. Do not share copyrighted materials without permission or proper attribution.
Avoid spam. Repeatedly posting the same message or sending unsolicited messages can be considered disruptive.
Stay on topic. In some communities, it's important that discussions align with the main theme or the interests of the group.
Mind netiquette. Politeness and good manners are also crucial online.
Respect platform rules. In addition to community-specific guidelines, adhere to the general usage policies and rules of the platform in use.
Treat others as you would like to be treated – with respect and kindness.

toot.paris.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une interaction avec une personne après que ladite personne ai réclamé la cessation de cette interaction, ceci peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdite toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux. Cela concerne aussi toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés).

tooter.kr.text:
의도와 목적
tooter.kr은 모든 참가자를 포용합니다

tooter.kr 행동 강령(이하 행동 강령)은 누구도 배제되지 않는 마스토돈 커뮤니티를 위해 구성원들이 지켜야 하는 최소한의 약속입니다.

tooter.kr은:

    누구나 편안하게 참여할 수 있는 마스토돈 서버를 지향합니다.
    서로 다름을 인정하고 존중하는 분위기를 지향합니다.
    성별, 성적 지향, 성 정체성, 국적, 인종, 지역, 종교, 나이, 사회적 신분, 학력, 지식 수준, 외모, 장애, 질병, 음식 선호 등과 관계 없이 모든 참가자가 동등한 커뮤니티를 지향합니다.
    서로 환영하는 분위기를 독려합니다.

모든 참가자를 포용하는 게 왜 중요한가요?

tooter.kr은 다양성을 존중하는 태도가 사회와 커뮤니티를 더 풍요롭게 만드는 원천이라고 믿습니다. 어려운 문제에 대한 해결책을 찾고, 커뮤니티가 계속 성장하여 세상에 긍정적인 변화를 불러오기 위해서는 다양한 경험과 관점이 필요합니다. 그리고 다양한 경험과 관점은 다양한 사람들을 모두 존중하고 포용하는 데에서부터 비롯됩니다.
tooter.kr은 차별과 괴롭힘을 용인하지 않습니다

행동 강령에 따라 tooter.kr 운영팀은:

    다른 참가자의 안전이 침해되거나 존중받지 못하는 상황이 발생했을 때 이를 중재 또는 제재할 수 있습니다.
    필요한 경우 행동 강령을 위반한 참가자를 서버에서 추방할 수 있습니다.
    필요 또는 요청에 따라 사법/의료 기관에 신고할 수 있습니다.

행동 강령은 서버 활동과 관련된 모든 상황에서 적용됩니다

행동 강령은 tooter.kr에서 이뤄지는 의사소통 그리고 그 과정에 참여하는 모든 참가자에게 적용됩니다.

    참가자(이용자, 운영진 등을 포함한 모든 사람)에게 적용됩니다.

주의 깊게 읽어주세요.

해서는 안 되는 일들의 전체 목록이 모두 여기에 담겨있지는 않습니다. 그보다는 이 행동 강령에 담긴 내용의 의도가 무엇인지 깊이 파악하고 서로에게 좀 더 잘 대할 수 있도록 해주는 가이드로 삼는 것이 중요합니다. 이 행동 강령을 문자 그대로 따르기보다 그 안에 담긴 의도를 파악하시고 행동해주실 것을 부탁드립니다.

커뮤니티: 환영하는 분위기를 만들어주세요.

모든 참가자는 그들의 배경과 상관없이 환영받고 있다고 느껴야 합니다. 환영받지 못하거나 소외된다고 느끼는 사람은 커뮤니티 참여를 주저하게 됩니다. 환영하는 분위기를 조성해 커뮤니티가 성장할 수 있도록 도와주세요.

처음 온 분들에게 친절하고 따뜻하게 대해주세요.
    용기를 내주세요.
        듣거나 지켜보는 게 더 편안하다면 그대로도 괜찮습니다. 만약 대화에 참여하고 싶을 때 망설임이 생긴다면 옆에서 활발하게 대화하고 있는 사람들도 오늘 처음 만났을 수 있다는 걸 생각해주세요.

    반응해주세요.
        당신에게 한 마디를 건네기 위해 상대방은 용기를 냈을지도 모릅니다.
            질문이나 도움을 구하는 요청에 친절하게 답해주세요.
            답변에는 감사를 표현해주세요.

안전한 tooter.kr을 만들어주세요

언제나 스스로의 말과 행동에 책임감을 가져주세요. tooter.kr은 다양한 사람들이 함께하는 공간입니다. 모든 사람들이 안전하고 믿을 수 있는 커뮤니티라고 느낄 수 있도록, 다른 사람을 위협하거나 위험하게 만드는 언행을 해서는 안 됩니다.

대화에 욕설/비속어/은어를 포함하지 마세요.
        가까운 지인과 대화이더라도 주변 사람에게 불편함을 주거나 위협이 될 수 있습니다.
    상대방이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 언어적 표현을 비롯한 일체의 성적 대상화를 하지 말아주세요.

법에 저촉되는 모든 폭력성을 띤 행위를 하지 말아주세요.
    위의 모든 행위를 부추기거나 장려하는 행위를 하지 말아주세요.

서로 다름을 존중해주세요

성별, 성적 지향, 성 정체성, 국적, 인종, 지역, 종교, 나이, 사회적 신분, 학력, 지식 수준, 외모, 장애, 질병, 음식 선호 등에 상관없이 함께 즐길 수 있는 서버를 만들어주세요.

tooter.kr 운영진을 사칭하거나 허위 정보를 유포하지 말아 주세요.

    tooter.kr 공간을 포함하여 스태프로 오인될 수 있는 행위(스태프 프로필과 유사한 이미지 또는 닉네임 등)를 의도적으로 하지 말아 주세요.
        서버 운영에 지장이 간다 판단될 시, 프로필 수정 요청 등의 조치를 취할 수 있습니다.

대화는 같이 하는 것입니다

    나의 의견 만큼 다른 사람의 의견도 중요함을 항상 기억해주세요.
    상대와 갈등이 생기더라도 정중한 태도를 유지해주세요.

건설적인 토론을 해주세요

우리는 서로 다른 배경과 지식을 가지고 있습니다. 의견의 불일치는 자연스러운 일입니다.

비판과 비난은 다릅니다. 건설적인 비판은 커뮤니티와 구성원의 발전에 도움이 됩니다. 하지만 남을 깎아내리고 상처 주기 위한 목적의 비난은 금지됩니다. 상대방과 생각이 다르다면 정중하고 올바른 방법으로 의견을 이야기해주세요. 올바른 비판에는 관대하게 수용하는 자세를 가져주세요.
개인의 생각과 정치적 성향은 존중되어야 합니다. 하지만 다른 참가자의 소통을 방해하거나 문맥과 상관없는 일방적 선전이나 선동은 금지됩니다.(tooter.kr 채널에서 반복적이고 지속적으로 선전하여 다른 사람의 의견을 보기 어렵게 하는 행위)

사적인 정보를 지켜주세요

    당사자의 허락 없이 상대를 특정할 수 있는 정보를 담지 말아주세요.
    대화 상대의 동의 없이 대화 메시지 또는 프로필을 포함한 개인 정보를 캡쳐하거나 유포하지 말아주세요.
    상대방이 질문에 대답하기를 원하지 않는다면, 재차 묻지 말아 주세요. 다른 사람의 의사를 존중해주세요.
    나에겐 알려져도 문제가 없는 정보라도 다른 사람에게는 그렇지 않을 수 있음을 이해해주세요.
tooter.kr은 허가를 받지 않은 단체의 영리 행위를 금지합니다. 영리 행위는 물건을 팔아서 이득을 취하는 행위, 당장 이득을 취하지는 않지만 장기적으로 개인 혹은 단체가 금전적인 이득을 취할 수 있는 행위를 의미합니다.

신고하기:

당신에게 어떤 문제가 발생했거나 다른 사람이 문제에 처한 것을 보셨거나, 불편 사항이 있으시다면 플랫폼 내 신고버튼이나 tooter.kr 운영진에게 도움을 요청해주세요. 생명의 위급한 상황이라면 경찰, 소방서 등 관할 기관에 신고해주세요.

    대표 연락처 admin@tooter.kr

행동 강령 위반이 의심되지만 확신이 들지 않는 경우에도 운영진에 알려주시면 운영진에서 정보를 더 수집하고 판단하여 조치를 취할 것입니다.

여러분의 용기가 더욱 안전한 커뮤니티를 만드는 데 도움이 됩니다.

행동 강령에는 이런 한계가 있어요

안전하고 쾌적한 커뮤니티를 위한 다양한 노력에도 불구하고, 행동 강령이 모든 위협으로부터 커뮤니티 참가자들을 100% 완전하게 보호할 수는 없습니다.

    SNS상의 상대방 생명이 위급한 상황이라면 경찰, 소방서 등 관할 기관에 신고해주세요.
    사실 확인이 어려운 경우 심증만으로 피신고자나 단체에 조치를 취하기는 어렵습니다.

운영진를 존중해주세요

tooter.kr 운영진 구성원은 모두 여러분과 같은 공개 마스토돈 커뮤니티의 일원이며, tooter.kr을 위해 대가 없이 자발적으로 시간과 노력을 제공하고 있습니다.

tooter.kr 운영팀은 참가자분들을 존중하며 도움을 드리기 위해 노력하고 있습니다. 여러분도 tooter.kr 운영진를 존중해주시길 부탁드립니다.

본 tooter.kr 행동 강령은 의도와 목적, 지향하는 가치를 더 잘 전달하기 위해 내용이 변경될 수 있습니다. 여러분의 기여를 통해 tooter.kr 행동 강령은 지속적으로 발전할 수 있습니다.

이런 걸 참고했어요

tooter.kr 행동 강령의 내용들은 다음과 같이 앞서서 고민한 사람들의 생각을 참고하였습니다.

참고한 문서: PyCon KR 2022 행동 강령

tooter.hellcat.net.text: Be nice and respect each other.

tooter.sftn.eu.text: You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people. The glorification of violence is also prohibited.

You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism. 
We define as violent extremism the act of targeting civilians with violence and/or the promotion of violence as a means to further a cause.

We have zero tolerance towards any material that features or promotes child sexual exploitation.
This may include media, text, illustrated, or computer-generated images. You may also not contribute to victimization of children through the promotion or glorification of child sexual exploitation.

You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so.
We prohibit behavior that harasses or intimidates, or is otherwise intended to shame or degrade others.

You may not promote violence against or directly attack or threaten other people on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.

You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.
However, sharing personal experiences, coping mechanisms, resources, research and education for suicide prevention will be allowed.

Media that depicts graphic violence or consensually produced adult content may be shared within your posts, provided that you mark this media with an adequate [CW] Content Warning. However, depictions of sexual violence, gratuitous gore, and hateful imagery will always be forbidden.

You may not use this service for any unlawful purpose or to promote illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.

You may not publish or post other people's private information without their express authorization and permission, nor threaten to do so. The same rule applies for images and videos, but with exceptions for those that are intended to further public discourse on issues or events of public interest.

You may not post or share explicit images or videos that were taken, appear to have been taken or that were shared without the consent of the people involved. To reitarate, intimate photos or videos of someone that were produced or distributed without their consent are forbidden.

You may not attempt to make content appear more popular or active than it is, coordinate activities to artificially influence conversations, post commercially-motivated spam, artificially amplify or suppress information, or, in general, manipulate or disrupt people's experience.

You may not post or share content that may supress participation in, or disrupt civic processes, including through the distribution of false or misleading information about the procedures or circumstances around participation in a civic process.

You may not use false profile information to represent yourself as a person or entity that is not associated with you to mislead, confuse, or deceive others, nor use a fake identity in a manner that disrupts the experience of other users.

You may not share synthetic, manipulated, or out-of-context media that is significantly and deceptively altered, manipulated, fabricated, shared in a deceptive manner or with false context if it is likely to result in widespread confusion or harm public safety. Non-confusing satire is allowed.

You may not use another’s trademark in a way that may mislead or confuse people about your affiliation with it. You may however use a trademark in a way that is outside the scope of the trademark registration or in a nominative or other fair use manner.

toots.deds.nl.text: De server staat in Nederland en dus is de Nederlandse wetgeving van toepassing.
Deze dienstverlening dient de doelen van de vereniging Open Domein, zoals geformuleerd in de statuten.
Als gebruiker heeft u een @DeDS.nl-adres, daarmee krijgt u een account en communiceert u met de server en de beheerder.
Als gebruiker schendt u de privacy van anderen niet.
Als gebruiker begint u geen ad hominems en reageert u niet op ad hominems (persoonlijke aanvallen).
Als gebruiker bedrijft u geen commercie, zoals iets verkopen of daartoe oproepen.
Deze dienst wordt aangeboden door Portagio, sponsor van de vereniging Open Domein. Open Domein heeft projecten zoals DeDS en Petities.nl.

toots.cl.text: Toots.cl no acepta ningún tipo de comportamiento que atente contra la dignidad de las personas, ni tampoco la discriminación en ninguna de sus formas.

No se permiten cuentas destinadas a SPAM, Phishing, promoción de Cryptos no oficiales / verificadas o cualquier otra promoción de acciones que puedan ocasionar perjuicios económicos a los miembros de esta instancia.
Las FakeNews (Noticias falsas) están prohibidas. Publicar este tipo de información de manera intencionada, repetitiva y sin retractarse, podría terminar en la suspensión de la cuenta del usuario.

La pornografía infantil, incitación a la violencia, comercio o promoción de sustancias ilegales (drogas),  la compra-venta de armas, así como cualquier otro tipo de promoción de comercio ilegal, está estrictamente prohibido y resultará en la suspensión de la cuenta del usuario.
Cada usuario es responsable de sus comentarios y publicaciones, y no representan de ningún modo a Toots.cl o a algún otro de sus miembros o administradores/moderadores.

Las normas de este servidor podrán ir aumentando en cantidad y también sufriendo modificaciones a la sola voluntad de Toots.cl y sus administradores, cada vez que lo consideren necesario y siendo publicadas en esta sección.
Si alguna cláusula resulta ambigua o abusiva, no dudes en contactarnos a través de la cuenta de administración @mandrake .

toots.cordelya.net.text: This is a single-user instance. These rules are posted simply to aid the admins of other federated instances in choosing whether or not to block this instance.

No hate. 

Users may not post content with the following attributes: hate, racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia, fascism, nationalist socialism, or content illegal in the United States.
Minimal Advertising. Advertising is kept to a minimum and is generally restricted to self-promotion and occasional promotion of activities sponsored by US 501(3)(c) non-profit organizations.
Nudity or gore in images must be tagged with a CW to allow other users across the Fediverse to choose whether to view them.
Users must comply with the TOS posted at https://masto.host/tos/. This instance is hosted by masto.host.

toots.tangoit.net.text: No privacy violations against other people; doxing, revealing or sexual images of someone else, information about someone's health, or crimes done against them.

toots.nu.text: No "hate speech", speech that expresses a form of prejudice or threatens people of protected characteristics (such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, religion, sex or sexuality).
No Calls to violence. Any individual promoting violence towards any person or group.
No harassment. If a user explicitly asks you to disengage, you should.
Nudity involving the genitals, sexual acts, or pornography is not allowed.
No content illegal in Sweden. The server is here, we will abide by Swedish law.
All bots must respect the #nobot tag and must post unlisted.
Posts intended for commercial advertisement purposes must be posted with the #ad tag or unlisted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts. Especially if you’re funny.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this server, the users of the service or their data

User accounts whose only activity consisted of registration, but did not post anything or follow anybody or interact with the fediverse in any other way might be deleted after a short period of time. This is in order to prevent bot activity.

top-netz.de.text: Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird als privates Hobby ohne Garantie für Verfügbarkeit betrieben. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf jederzeitigen funktionierenden Zugang zum Konto. Downtimes (Updates, Wartung, Migration etc) werden - soweit möglich - vorher über @maadmin ankündigen

Es ist grundsätzlich jeder Mensch willkommen, egal welcher politischen, religiösen oder sexuellen Ausrichtung und geschlechtlicher Identität. Bei beleidigendem, diskriminierendem oder schlicht nervtötendem Verhalten werden die Admins (auch ohne Ankündigung) Accounts sanktionieren oder deaktivieren.

Wer meint, Transfrauen seien keine Frauen, wer denkt, man könne als Mann heute ja gar keine Komplimente mehr machen oder wer glaubt, es gäbe "Rassismus gegen Weiße", ist auf dieser Instanz falsch. Diese Instanz ist gedacht als Safe Space. Von diesem Ideal lassen sich die Admins leiten.

Es wird erwartet, dass alle Nutzenden in der Lage sind, sich selbst zur Wehr zu setzen und Querelen unter einander zu klären. Die Meinungsfreiheit erlaubt zwar auch hitzigen Debatten, die Admins lassen sich aber nicht von "false balance" leiten. Werden Grenzen überschritten, gelten Ziffern 2. und 3.

Wir passen die Nutzungsbedingungen gegebenenfalls an, wenn es dafür gute Gründe gibt. Wir geben aber Bescheid, bevor Änderungen wirksam werden (mindestens 14 Tage), falls wer als Reaktion mit dem Konto umziehen möchte.
