tracyverse.social.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

tracyverse.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism
tracyverse.social.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

tracyverse.social.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
tracyverse.social.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

tracyverse.social.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
tracyverse.social.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

tracyverse.social.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
tracyverse.social.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

tracyverse.social.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and substantive use of generative AI must be disclosed
tracyverse.social.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

transportation.social.text: Please don't post anything that's illegal in the US.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination. Doing this will get you banned immediately and without recourse.

No NSFW content is allowed. Your profile (avatar, header, display name, etc.) must be SFW. Off-topic and random discussion is allowed, but please keep discourse professional and courteous at all times.
Don't abuse the instance. Transportation.social is a "pro bono" service hosted and maintained by a very small consulting firm. Don't use it to abuse federated instances, don't try to break things.

Be considerate. Keep in mind that any public post you make will appear in our public timeline and the public timelines of other instances federated with transportation.social. Use content warnings where appropriate.

Organizational/corporate accounts are allowed, and individuals are free to share news about studies, projects, or new products you feel might be of interest to the transportation community, but spam will not be tolerated.

tribe.net.text:
Be kind. 
By that, I mean don't upload a ton of stuff here because disk space is limited and costs $$. If you want to use Mastodon as an archive of your big photos and videos, then you should run your own server. It's easy and I can walk you through it.
If you want to show off your products or services, you may post an ad once per month. If you are reported for posting more than that, you will get a warning, and then suspension.
If you send unsolicited direct messages to users, and you are reported by anyone, you will get a warning and set to limited visibility. The second report will result in your suspension.
Accounts that display ads in their profile photo and description will be set to limited visibility, meaning only your followers will see your posts.

Also, just be nice in general. I'm doing my best but I don't know everything about Mastodon. The community is a better resource for answering questions, especially if things don't seem to work for you the way you'd like. Remember, this is a free service.

trumbeta.me.text:
This is a space for the RUSYN people and their language.

Imagine it as an online cafe. The purpose of this space is to promote usage of and discussion with the Rusyn language.
Тото є місто про Русинів і їх язык. Його ціль – спомагати хоснованю русинського языка і діскусій на нім. Можете си за нього думати як за каварню в інтернеті.
Пишіть лем по русинськы. Кідь МУСАЙ дашто написати другым языком, покладьте варованя на текст (CW). За потребы адміністративны новины і оглашкы годны выходити другым языком.

Честуйте ся: мы не толеруєме тровлю, язык ненависти, нетерпимость до другых і тролованя. Вважайте, жебы ся ваш текст не розумів як нечестованя або тролінґ, кідь хотіли сьте вповісти штось друге. Ту ся причислює і бечелованя етнічной, ґендерной, сексуалной або іншой ідентичности другых.
У міру можности ся варуйте спорных тем і свад. Сокотіть ся реліґійных і політичных од природы тем. Тото не є місто, жебы тручати або силовати даяку ідеолоґію або понижати думаня другых.
При розхоженю думок справуйте ся почливо і з отвореным сердцьом. Кідь мусай, ступайте до діскусії не як до дебаты або свады, ай можности повчити ся.

Будьте порядны: не діліть ся ничим незаконным, скарідным або негідным. Тото ся докывать контента сексуалного, насилного або нелеґалного филю. Кідь ваш пост не мож позерати на людях, не треба ся ним ту ділити.

Не діліть ся рекламов, промоціями, спамом, анкетами ітд. без дозволу модераторів. Кідь ваш продукт або контент ся не односить до русинського уміня, музикы, моды або културы, ту не слобідно глядати собі клієнтів або авдіторію.

6. Do not post any sexual content publicly. Even privately, make sure the recipiant is ok with it and mark it with content warnings.

tum.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.

We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
We (@adrian, @dorian and @tom) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

turtleisland.social.text: It is critical for new accounts to read the entire 'About' page (https://turtleisland.social/about) including the Rules sub-section BEFORE applying for an account at TurtleIsland.social.

We can't stress this enough - Absolutely no racism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, pro-genocide, pro-ethnic cleansing, pro-terrorism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. 95%+ of our issues fall in this category; we take this seriously.

If you are Native/Indigenous, when the 'Create Account' screen asks 'Why do you want to join?' please list your Native/Indigenous Nation/Tribe. That is all we need. Anything else or less specific may not get approved.

If you are non-Native/Indigenous, when the 'Create Account' screen asks 'Why do you want to join?', yes it's awkward but please list reasons or other Fediverse account(s) to help the moderators approve your account. That is all we need. Anything else or less specific may not get approved.
Culture is important here. To avoid confusion, we ask that the first line of your bio be either #YourNativeNation or #Ally.
Be sure to check your spam folder for confirming emails. Thanks for giving TurtleIsland.social a spin!

tweesecake.social.text:
Be Decent

Do not harass, insult, discriminate against, or otherwise intentionally harm other users of any kind, local or federated. Do not deliberately spread misinformation, including pseudoscience and conspiracy theories.

Be Sentient
Avoid creating advertising or bot accounts on this instance without permission. There may be exceptions, but it is best to consult with either of the administrators before going ahead.

Cross posting (using software to post the same content on multiple social media services) is only allowed if you regularly check your account here and interact with notifications. IMPORTANT: Please do not cross post twitter retweets or quoted tweets!

Be Lawful

Do not post or link to content that could get us hit with a violation of copyright. Only post personally identifiable information if you have explicit permission to do so.

Sexual Content

Please post any sexual content as Unlisted or stricter, and make sure to add an appropriate content warning. If you regularly find yourself wanting to post content of sexual nature, this may not be the best instance for you.

Be Mindful

Politics, Religion, and other controversial topics should be posted behind a content warning. Be mindful of people you interact with, as they may have had experiences drastically different from yours, including severe psychological or physical trauma.

Describe your content

Please try to describe your media posts to the best of your ability to accommodate disabilities such as blindness and deafness. If you cannot do so, there is nothing wrong with asking for help. Currently, tagging @ImageCaptionsPls@a.gup.pe is the best way to do so.

The password

When signing up, please include the following password in the why you'd like to join text. CakeOven. This ensures to us that you have indeed read and will agree to abide by the rules set forth in this instance!

twit.social.text: We are inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
Please keep our space safe for all and family friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

I actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in my sole judgement any account that violates the rules. I also, from time to time, de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.

Full rules at https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/about/governance/policies/social-content-policies/ Mozilla has done an excellent job of describing how a well run social network should be governed. I encourage you to read it.
By joining TWiT.social you agree to adhere to these rules. Thank you! --Leo

twoot.space.text: No racism, transmisia, sexism, ableism, ageism or homophobia.
Nudity is fine, but put it behind a CW please.
No apologia for bigotry or fascism, including incessant bad-faith questions and persistent patterns of micro-aggressive "helpful suggestions".

twoot.site.text: Hate speech and discrimination, such as, but not limited to, racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia and abelism and content illegal in Europe is not allowed in any form.

Content warnings (CWs) are often either required or highly encouraged to keep our server safe and friendly for as many people as possible. CW-ing nudity, lewdness, politics, gore and spam-like posts are all mandatory. Failure to comply will result in account limiting.
Bios (account biographies) should be kept "safe for work". Highly distracting, lewd or otherwise obscene avatar or header images are not allowed.

Malicious or misleading information (such as, but not limited to, anti-science, fake news and hate brigading) are bannable offences. This also includes the encouragement and normalising of said information. Such content can, for example, include anti-vaccine and alternative medicine.
Extreme political content, such as Nazism, authoritarianism, "tankieism", and extreme nationalism is a bannable offence. An exception to this are news stories and meta around these topics.

Incitement of violence, regardless of the situation, is generally not allowed and appropriate content warnings is required as a minimum! We also realise that there is a difference between punching up vs. down, and that violence is sometimes unavoidable, such as protests.

Advertising is discouraged and is allowed at the discretion of moderators. Commissions related to the arts, charitable causes (that are demonstrably not for-profit) and personal donation requests are exempt. A general rule is that if you think that it would be annoying, put it behind a CW.
We do not allow any bots or automated services including crossposters from other social media sites. You can have a look at sites like "botsin.space" for that kind of stuff.
Doxing and non-consensual breaches of privacy is not allowed and breaking this rule will most likely result in a ban.

Posting uncaptioned media with public visibility is not allowed and will get your account limited, usually if repeated behaviour is observed. Twootsite is supposed to be an inclusive and accessible place. Only local posts are affected by this rule, not remote posts or boosts.

types.pl.text: Racism, homophobia, antisemitism, transphobia, classism against the working class, ableism, exclusionary behavior, misogyny, genocide denial, harassment, Islamophobia, and other similar hate is not permitted. I will personally blast you into the sun.
Use content warnings for various topics, such as sexual content, mental health, food, and other touchy topics at your own discretion. If a content warning is required, the admins will let you know.
Don't advertise or spam. Asking for money is alright, but this is not a space to solely sell a product without somehow being tied to a user.
As a general rule of thumb, images should be captioned. If you are for whatever reason unable to caption an image, please add the content warning "uncaptioned image" or something akin.

Illegal content is not allowed. Despite the knowledge that some laws are unjust, types.pl does not endorse illegal action. This specifically lies under the jurisdiction of the United States, as that is where the servers are located.
If you are using a Twitter crossposter, you should be posting content on Mastodon as well. If the large majority of your posts are Twitter crossposts, you will be banned.

No cops, no feds. Members of law enforcement, federal security and intelligence, the military, etc. are not welcome. This is particularly relevant for such organizations in the United States, where the servers are located.
Administrators reserve the right to defederate with instances or boot users off the instance at their will for any reason.

typo3.social.text: Treat all community members in this server with respect.
Do not start, continue, or encourage personal attacks, flame wars, and trolling.
We do not tolerate members who intentionally share misleading or false information.
Do not use or share sexual imagery or language.
We do not tolerate harassment, personal attacks, or demeaning behavior.

typo.social.text: Please read and understand our terms of service: this includes a code of conduct.
This can be a home for type designers, typographers, letterers, fontworkers, calligraphers, tool builders, foundries, historians, scholars, students and enthusiasts.

Copyrights have deep and complex issues that do not all fit in this box. However, in general, please make sure you have permission to post the media you want include in your message. When practically possible, within reason, due diligence etc. Make sure all materials are properly credited.
Be kind. These are times of uncertainty and this instance is growing at unprecedented rates. So, please, be kind, and welcoming. Help others, when they ask questions.
Typo.social claims no copyright over media and text posted here.

Advertising: Typo.social is a discussion space, but we recognise that social media also functions as a commercial medium. We want our users to be able to advertise their products and services. Adds must be tagged using #advertisement. To further help users, discounts should also use #discount.

Advertorials: If you write posts or articles on behalf of a foundry or a distributor and only link to your customer’s products, this is clearly an advertorial. Therefor we kindly ask you to use the hashtag #advertorial. If your toot links directly into the shop, please use #advertising.

tyrol.social.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Europa illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Wir dulden keine Verschwörungstheorien, die das oben genannte (und/oder ähnliche) Verhalten unterstützen oder dazu führen.
Behandle andere Menschen so, wie du auch behandelt werden möchtest!

uddannelse.social.text: Vi prøver at overgå hinanden med overraskende og stimulerende viden.

Vi elsker alt uddannelsesrelateret (fra vuggestue til efteruddannelse), herunder brugen af teknologi, diskussioner af pædagogisk og filosofisk teori, udviklinger indenfor policy, brugen af kvalitative og kvantitative forskningsmetoder.
Når det er sagt, så man må toote om lige det man vil - men vi håber at instansen byder på en højere koncentration af ovenstående end andre steder!

under-bank.blue.text: 当サーバーはヒーローバンクの話題に限定しません。日常の雑談や制作の進捗などにどうぞ。またフォローせず、連合タイムラインやローカルタイムラインを見るだけの登録もOKです。ただしフォロワー限定の投稿は表示されないため、基本的にはフォローしてホームタイムラインで見ることをおすすめします。
公開投稿は世界中のさまざまなサーバーへ配信されます。連合タイムライン経由でさまざまなサーバーへ配信されることを忘れないでください。

ミュートやブロックは積極的に。自分の快適なタイムラインは自分で作る。
同じ作品が好きでも、性格や嗜好があう人もいればあわない人もいます。UNDER-BANK.blueでは、ミュートやブロックの積極的な使用をおすすめします。

R15以上の性表現が含まれる画像にはNSFW(職場閲覧注意)の機能を使って画像を伏せて下さい。
R18以上のえっち文章は強制ではありませんが、cw(コンテンツワーニング)の機能を使って文章を伏せることをおすすめしています。
※文章のほうが制限がゆるいのは日本の法律に合わせています。

愚痴などネガティブ要素の多い投稿はcwを活用して下さい。
愚痴などの見る人を選びやすい要素の投稿は、cw（コンテンツワーニング）機能を使って文章を伏せて投稿して下さい。ネガティブな発言を見たくない人への配慮となります。またUNDER-BANK.blueは愚痴や悩みの投稿を制限することはありません。もやもやした気持ちを言葉にすることにより、自身の思考を整理する効果があるためです。積極的に活用して下さい。

【当サーバー独自の禁止事項】管理人の趣味嗜好の都合で以下の要素を禁止します。 これらはあくまで当インスタンス内での扱いであり、該当する二次創作の存在そのものを否定するものではありません。

・作中キャラクターの安易な変態化(但しキャラクターの真面目さ・不器用さ等、公式の性格を重んじた結果の行動であればこの限りではありません) 

。作中キャラクターの安易な守銭奴化、ヤクザ化(但しキャラクターの真面目さ・不器用さ等、公式の性格を重んじた結果の行動であればこの限りではありません) 

どこからどこまでかの基準は管理者xanacに委ねられます。
ヘイトスピーチ、思想の押し付け等他者の表現の自由を阻害する行為を禁止します。最終的な判断は管理者がジャッジを下します。

vis.social.text: NO RACISM, SEXISM, HOMOPHOBIA, TRANSPHOBIA OR XENOPHOBIA.

TOPIC: vis.social is a topical server focused particularly on SciArt, SciComm, Data, Visualization, Creative Coding and related topics. There is no reporting of “off-topic” posts, but the central idea of the server is to gather a community around these shared interests.
LANGUAGE: English is the common language of the instance. Other languages are welcome, but please be kind and post English translations so that we can all read your posts.

INCLUSION: We want everyone to feel welcome, safe, and respected. This is a free service. Please be welcoming and kind to everyone, especially when you have a difference of opinion. Then, be *extra* kind. :-)

HARASSMENT: If you experience or notice any harassment or other aggressive behaviors, report it—by clicking on the three dots next to the message or profile and selecting “Report @personname”) and help keeping this platform a safe space for everyone.

AI Images: Please do not use vis.social to share your creations from text-to-image tools such as MidJourney or Stable Diffusion. We welcome critical discussion of these tools, particularly about the legal and ethical issues surrounding these tools and the implications for artists and society

No NFTs: We know many people involved in computational art sell NFTs. However, on vis.social we’ve made the decision that we don’t want to be involved in NFTs. So we’d love to see your art, but we ask that you don’t post your NFTs here.
No bots. If you’d like to experiment with bots, creating a dedicated instance could be an option for you.

CWs: the moderation team may ask you to add CW's to off-topic posts that contain photos or text about food, alcohol, and other topics, in an attempt to be a more inclusive and welcoming instance.  On our ToDo-list: writing about why we ask this.
CW on AI topics. Please add CW for posts about AI, especially tools like ChatGPT.

Joining Vis.Social: please tell us about your interest in this instance and it's topics. Tell us a little about you, your interests. Be sure to mention Green Apple candy in your application. Yes, it's a test to see if you've read the instance rules.

vkl.world.text: Наш сервер беларускамоўны, таму дазваляюцца выключна беларускамоўныя ўліковыя запісы і допісы. Выкарыстўваць можна як кірыліцу так і лацінку. У любых іншых выпадках уліковы запіс можа быць заблакаваны мадэратармі серверу.
Дазваляецца выкарыстанне міжнароднай ангельскай мовы ў допісах. Дазваляецца выкарыстанне іншых моў у апісанні ўліковага запісў, але наяўнасть беларускай часткі апісання абавязковая.
Дазваляецца пашыраць іншамоўныя допісы, калі гэта не парушае іншыя правілы нашай суполкі. Дазваляецца адказваць на іншамоўныя допісы на мове допісў, калі гэта не парушае іншыя правілы нашай суполкі.

Забаронены пагрозы асабістай бяспецы карыстальнікаў серверу ў любым выглядзе. Пагрозы расправамі, шатнатж, правакацыі, агрэсіўныя дзеянні, публікацыя асабістых дадзеных карыстальнікаў без іх дазволу і іншае можа быць падставай для блакавання ўліковага запісу мадэратармі серверу.
Паважаем, дапамагаем ды не абражаем адно аднаго. Абразы могуць прывесці да папярэджвання ці блакавання ўліковага запісу.
Забаронена парнаграфія, прапагадай расізму, імперыялізму, нацызму, фашызму, камунізму, гамафобія і іншыя супярэчлівыя тэмы.
Забаронена як рэлігіёзная прапаганда, так і абразы рэлігіёзных поглядаў.
Абмежаванні і блакаванні іншых сервераў з сеціва Мастадон адбываецца па вырашэнні мадэратараў серверу на падставе скаргаў ад карыстальнікаў серверу.

vtuber.house.text: Low drama: Don't fill our timelines with dunks, callouts, or mockery.
Embrace diversity: No slurs or attacks on people's identities. Respect names and pronouns.
Adults only: Register only if you are 18 or older.
Considerate content: No Pepe the Frog. Mark lewd/R18 images as sensitive. Use CW for spoilers and common triggers.
Adult topics, adult characters: No sexualized depictions of minors or child-like bodies.
Respect privacy: Don't reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Grow calmly: No posts bragging about follower counts, begging for followers, or offering rewards in exchange for follows or boosts.
Ethical art: No promoting blockchains, NFTs, or cryptocurrencies. Give credit when sharing images, including clear mention if a picture is AI generated.
Ought to go without saying: Don't harass other users, attempt to disrupt service on this or other Fediverse servers, or use the server to engage in or coordinate illegal activity.

w3c.social.text: I agree to abide by the terms and spirit of the W3C Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct - https://www.w3.org/Consortium/cepc/

I agree to describe media that I post, because alt text helps everyone, *especially* but not only the visually impaired, by clarifying intended meaning, saying a bit about the poster's personality, or even providing metadata if the media does not load.
I agree to fill out my bio as soon as possible after joining this instance.
I agree to stay mainly on topic for this server which is around activities of the World Wide Web Consortium
I agree to tread lightly and dive only sparingly in sensitive content and potentially upsetting or triggering topics such as violence, graphic or adult content, politics, religion, food, etc.

If I can't uphold rule #5, I agree to hide behind a Content Wrapper (CW) sensitive content and potentially upsetting or triggering topics such as violence, graphic or adult content, politics, religion, food, eye contact, critters, or whether you use emacs or vi.
Please be kind :) Your interactions go to real people who deeply care and do their best. Please be curious, not critical.

wandering.shop.text: Code of Conduct. All members of the Wandering Shop agree to read and abide by our Code of Conduct. These rules summarize the Code of Conduct (CoC) for reporting purposes. If reporting something that violates the CoC in a way not listed in these rules, select this option.

Harassment, threats, or aggressive behaviour are not permitted. Inciting actions against others, including in retaliation, is not permitted. This includes but is not limited to encouraging self-harm or sharing personal information that could result in an individual being targeted.

Wandering Shop does not tolerate promotion of fascist, white supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism. This includes but is not limited to Holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, and anti-trans, misogynistic, antisemitic and/or racist harassment; including in usernames, avatars, and profiles.

Wandering Shop does not permit the willful or persistent promotion of misinformation, disinformation, or conspiracy theories. This includes, but is not limited to, bigoted conspiracy theories and misinformation about elections and vaccines.

On public timelines, Wandering Shop does not permit graphic sexual, violent, or otherwise disturbing images without a content/media warning. Also not permitted: gratuitous advertising, spam, and cross-posting/automated posting of content that is irrelevant or disruptive.

Wandering Shop does not permit sustained disruption of conversation, including on the local timeline, in hashtags, or in replies. Only use tags that are relevant to your posts, and do not disrupt conversation with excessive tags or replies. If you are asked to leave someone alone, leave them alone.

wehavecookies.social.text: Live and let live: do not discriminate against anyone. Racist, sexist, misogynist, homophobic, anti-Semitic and other misanthropic posts are forbidden here!
Don't be an asshole. You have an opinion? That's fine, but please don't insult anyone with your comments.
Freedom of speech does not mean freedom from criticism. Just because you are allowed to express your opinion doesn't mean you can't get any opposition for it.
Adhere to laws. It's simple. The Internet is not a legal vacuum.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling or any other form of contact with a user who has indicated that they do not wish to be contacted.

Don't make fun of others and don't be condescending. You too want to be treated with respect. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar expressions do not translate well into written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
We do not tolerate conspiracy theories
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may result in immediate account suspension. For example online casinos without a proper license will immediately be suspended.
NSFW content must be labeled as such using a content warning

Automated posts should be posted as "Unlisted" (i.e. they are visible but not in the local timeline). This also applies to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts. Crossposter accounts that do not actively participate may be removed by us.
You are not allowed to plainly advertise your company without providing a benefit for the viewer

welcometo.squelfland.com.text: The majority of the art posted by any accounts hosted on this server has been drawn by me, Marina Neira. If I feature artwork done by any other artist, it will always be with that artists' explicit permission and appropriate credits given.
I make the greatest possible effort to tag any and all potentially sensitive or triggering content, as well as any links to said content. I also hide such content under a Content Warning (CW).

All accounts on this server are owned by me. You will not find bots, spamming or trolling done by any accounts hosted here, neither directly nor indirectly by boosting or "liking". My accounts may sometimes lightly advertise my own personal creative projects, but not excessively.
This server does not post any NFT related content.
This server does not post, share or support AI-generated images.
This server will never host an account that harasses, trolls or bullies people.

This server will never post or link to content that is discriminatory or illegal (including sexual depictions of minors in any form) content that glorifies racism, sexism, abuse, body shaming, conspiracy theories, white nationalism, or content that is ableist, homophobic, transphobic, or xenophobic.

wellduck.me.text:
Be kind. (Rewind?)

Be nice to people, and when you can't be nice, be firm but polite. Then move on. Block/mute if you gotta. 
Past that, use best judgement and/or pester your friendly neighborhood admin.

Not Up For Debate

Insofar as politics may come up, they should be CW'd appropriate and such posts are not to be taken as invitations to start a "debate." Period.

were.party.text: No Racism, xenophobia, transphobia, homophobia, etc or advocation of such.
No content illegal in the United States of America
No spam or excessive advertising or fundraising
Please act in such a way this list doesn't have to get longer.

werebeast.net.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive and have a short content warning when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Users registering on this instance must be at least 18 years old

weserbergland.social.text: Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird als privates Hobby ohne Garantie für Verfügbarkeit betrieben. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf jederzeitigen funktionierenden Zugang zum Konto. Downtimes (Updates, Wartung, Migration etc) werden wir - soweit möglich - vorher ankündigen.

Es ist grundsätzlich jedermensch willkommen, egal welcher politischen, religiösen oder sexuellen Ausrichtung und geschlechtlicher Identität. Bei beleidigendem, diskriminierendem oder schlicht nervtötendem Verhalten werden die Admins (auch ohne Ankündigung) Accounts sanktionieren oder deaktivieren.

Wer meint, Transfrauen seien keine Frauen, wer denkt, man könne als Mann heute ja gar keine Komplimente mehr machen oder wer glaubt, es gäbe "Rassismus gegen Weiße", ist auf dieser Instanz falsch. Diese Instanz ist gedacht als Safe Space. Von diesem Ideal lassen sich die Admins leiten.

Es wird erwartet, dass alle Nutzenden in der Lage sind, sich selbst zur Wehr zu setzen und Querelen unter einander zu klären. Die Meinungsfreiheit erlaubt zwar auch hitzigen Debatten, die Admins lassen sich aber nicht von "false balance" leiten. Werden Grenzen überschritten, gelten Ziffern 2. und 3.

westen.social.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

westend61.social.text: Keine Belästigungen, Stalking, Doxing oder Dogpiling
Keine Hassrede, Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Befürwortung
Keine Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten
Keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Übermässige Werbung / Spam / Spamflut von wiederholenden Tröts sind nicht erwünscht.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden gelöscht.
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt und/oder Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sind nicht erlaubt.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.

wetdry.world.text: No bigotry/racism/homophobia/transphobia or anything of the sort.
NSFW content must be given a content warning and posted with unlisted visibility (or lower).
No malicious acts towards other people or instances.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No uploading malware or any harmful materials.
Content generated through large language/media diffusion models (more commonly referred to as "AI") must be disclosed as such.
Temporary rule: when signing up, please do not use Outlook/Hotmail/Live email addresses, as we cannot guarantee mail delivery to them.

wetshaving.social.text:
This is a test server.

I may change my mind about running it if it turns out to be a huge time sink or there are too many trolls.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in Germany (where this instance is located)
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Add descriptions for the visually impaired when posting image content.

weyr.social.text: Be kind and treat others with respect

No discriminatory hate towards others allowed. Users on this instance found to be posting/involved in such hate speech or activities (included but not limited to neo-fascism, pro-nazi, sexism, racism, trans/homo/xeno-phobic) may be immediately banned from the instance.

weyhe.social.text: Weyhe.Social ist eine deutschsprachige Instanz. Verfasse deine Posts bitte auf deutsch. Solltest du eine andere Sprache verwenden wollen, so setze die Sichtbarkeit der Posts bitte auf „nicht gelistet“ (sichtbar, aber nicht in den öffentlichen Timelines) oder nutze eine andere Instanz/Plattform

Bitte keine Diskriminierung, auch Rassismus, Sexismus, Frauenfeindlichkeit, Homophobie, Transfeindlichkeit, Ableismus, Antisemitismus und andere menschenfeindliche oder beleidigende Beiträge will hier niemand sehen
Das Internet ist kein rechtsfreier Raum. Beiträge, die gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen, werden ohne Vorwarnung gelöscht
Wenn du Wert auf Privatsphäre legst, dann überlege vor dem Posten was du von dir preisgeben willst. Das Internet vergisst nie
Direktnachrichten sind nicht verschlüsselt und können von den Admis/Mods eingesehen werden. Möchtest du vertrauliche Nachrichten senden, dann nutze dafür bitte einen entsprechenden Messenger
Accounts, die durch Werbung, Spam oder sonstige Belästigung anderer Accounts auffallen, sind nicht erwünscht.
Meinungen differieren, man kann diskutieren. Beschimpfungen, Beleidigungen oder anderweitig respektlose Beiträge gegenüber anderen Teilnehmenden sind jedoch unerwünscht.

Crosspostings oder Twitterbrücken, Links zu Bluesky, Twitter/X, Twitter Retweets, Bots, Crosspostingbeiträge und automatisierte Posts sind auf „nicht gelistet“ zu veröffentlichen. Bitte keine Screenshots dieser Dienste.
Falls du einen mehrteiligen Beitrag über 500 Zeichen schreiben möchtest, dann denke daran die Folgeposts auf „nicht gelistet“ zu setzen, um die Timelines anderer Accounts nicht zu überfluten.
Pornografische Inhalte und Aufrufe zu Gewalt werden ohne Vorwarnung gelöscht.
Unerwünschte Kontaktaufnahme jeglicher Form zu anderen Nutzern dieser oder anderer Instanzen können zu Kontosperrung führen.
Nationalsozialistische Beiträge, Nazisymbole, und Naziideologie sind unerwünscht.
Zusammengefasst: Verhalte dich respektvoll und behandle deinen Gegenüber wie du gerne behandelt werden möchtest. Dann kommen wir alle miteinander gut aus.

Und zum Schluß: Wir nehmen hier das „Hausrecht“ in Anspruch. Das heißt: Betreiber/Admins/Moderatoren haben das letzte Wort. Es gibt hier kein Anrecht auf einen Account. Wer mit den Regeln der Instanz nicht überein kommt darf sich gerne nach einer anderen Instanz umsehen.

whereismysupersuit.com.text: Be respectful. You do not need to agree with others but give them room to express themselves.
Open your mind. This is discourse and you need to listen to understand where someone is coming from.
Have fun (this is the most important rule)

No data may be collected for profit by a 3rd party without a contract .  If a company does so without consent they are agreeing to paying a fee of $1,000,000,000 US for the data collected and this will act as the contract.

whisper.tf.text: Since whisper.tf is more or less a one person instance without public registration there are no written server rules as of yet.

whitesmokebbq.social.text: Big Heart, not Big Fists: Just exercise common sense and common decency. Always take the "High Road" and never forget to Smile!
Don't fall into the Propaganda Trap: Most people are good! Instead of focusing on differences, focus on what you have in common. We may be different, but we ALL love food!
Breaking Bread: Try to connect and unity with others via our mutual love of food.

Help Your Community: We hope everyone who uses this platform will support each other and they will support their local communities. Strong communities, support strong families, that raise strong kids.

whitespashe.uk.text: No commercial accounts, advertising, or excessive promotion.
No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
Content that is NSFW should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)
No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin
No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union
No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts. Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts.

whoneedsabudget.cheap.text: ZERO TOLERANCE for homophobia, transphobia, antisemitism, racism, or anything else along these lines. You already know what's acceptable or not.

widget.uk.text: No hate speech, harassment, or generally being annoying.

wiesbaden.social.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu Weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

wig.gl.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior will be removed. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.
The Content Warning ("CW") flag should be used for anything that, again, you wouldn't feel comfortable showing to your grandmother. This includes NSFW content, gore, and other similar items.
Account registrations are monitored. Even though account signups are open, your account may be suspended if a human considers it potentially fake or bot.
Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face.
This server, and your data, is in Australia.

wiki.style.text: Cross-posting TO Twitter is allowed, but not cross-posting FROM Twitter. That is, the original posts must be here. Rationale: general community health.

wien.rocks.text:
Nichts Diskriminierendes:

Jegliche Form von Diskriminierung ist verboten. Das inkludiert, ist aber nicht beschränkt auf: Ableismus, Antisemitismus, Homofeindlichkeit, Islamophobie, Klassismus, Rassismus, Sexismus, Transfeindlichkeit, etc.

Nichts Ungesetzliches:

Poste nichts ungesetzliches (österreichisches Recht / EU Recht).

Nichts Belästigendes:

Kein Spam, Trolling, Bullying, oder ähnliche Belästigungen.
Keine Aufrufe zu Hass oder Gewalt.
Keine Pornographie.

Nichts Automatisiertes:

Keine Bots, kein Crossposting (z.B. spiegeln von Twitter posts etc.) ohne Kontext oder sonstiger Interaktion.

Nichts (absichtlich) Fälschliches:

Keine Fake-news, Falschinformationen, Wissenschaftsleugnung.
Keine Verbreitung von Gerüchten oder Propaganda.

Hinweis für Unternehmenskonten:

Unternehmenskonten, unternehmensähnliche Konten und/oder Geschäftskonten, sind nur mit Einschränkungen erlaubt. Inoffizielle Unternehmenskonten werden gesperrt.

Bezüglich Unternehmenskonten wendet euch daher bitte vorab an: support@fediverse.foundation

English translation:

For our English speaking users we have prepared the the essential documents in our wiki. Please take a look here:
https://wiki.apps.fedi.at/books/fediverse-foundation-announcements

wikimedia.social.text: Do not post content which violates the Friendly Space Policy/Universal Code of Conduct.
Accounts are currently restricted to current Wikimedia Foundation staff

wiggle.website.text: no racism, no sexism, no homophobia, no transphobia...please be nice!!!

wikis.world.text: See the "Rules" section of the About page for this server (https://wikis.world/about).

windbag.org.text: Obey Wheaton's Law: "Don't be a dick."
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
No sexually explicit or violent media.

wireless-iot.social.text: This Mastodon server is primarily about all topics related to Wireless IoT.
However, other topics can be discussed as long as they are not illegal.
Please be polite and respectful to each other.

Forbidden are pornography, commercial activities.
Anyone who insults, rushes or does not follow the rules will be banned.

wires.social.text: The Crossed Wires Community Rules of Engagement are available at http://crossedwires.net/rules

wisdomhole.com.text: I promise I am not a moron. Do you use your pet's medications to cure medical conditions?  Probably not the place for you.
I promise to be nice (unless you’re mocking a moron.)
I promise that I do not fly politic banners or flags in my front yard, and I mock those that do.
I promise that I do not fetishize billionaires who don’t know I exist.
I promise that the only conspiracy theories and myths I believe (if any) do not exceed aliens, the Loch Ness Monster, or Bigfoot in terms of craziness.
I promise that I know freedom of speech has nothing to do with social media.

wisskomm.social.text: Fühl dich auf wisskom.social wie zu Hause. Benimm Dich so, als könnten wir uns morgen persönlich auf der Straße begegnen.
Respektvoller Umgang. Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, transphobe, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Keine übertriebene Werbung. Accounts mit sehr viel oder ausschließlich Werbung werden suspendiert.

Es ist untersagt, Inhalte einzustellen, die gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen oder die Rechte Dritter beeinträchtigen. Wir sanktionieren Verstöße gegen die Grundsätze des Jugendschutzes und der guten Sitten.

Die Inhalte dürfen insbesondere nicht beleidigend, bedrohend, belästigend, anstößig verleumderisch, Gewalt verherrlichend oder zur Gewalt aufrufend, wahrheitswidrig, pornografisch oder jugendgefährdend sein.
Vermeide das Hochladen von großen, medialen Inhalten wie Videos.  Verlinke besser auf diese in deinem Tröt.

Verifizierbare Mailadresse. Melde dich an, wenn du in der Wissenschaftskommunikation oder Wissenschaft und Forschung tätig bist. Bitte immer mit einer Einrichtungsmailadresse bzw. verifizierbarer Mailadresse registrieren.

wistodon.org.text: This is an experimental instance. There are no rules yet.

witten.social.text: Meinungsfreiheit kommt immer erst nach der Würde anderer
Keine Bewerbung strafbarer Handlungen oder illegaler Angebote
Potenziell anstößige Inhalte bitte als NSFW markieren

witchlounge.ca.text: No discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
No harassment, trolling, threatening behaviour, threats of violences, and violent language directed against another person.
No stalking, intimidation, and no posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information ("doxxing")
No unwelcome sexual attention; including but not limited to any sexualised comments or jokes, and unwelcomed sexual advances.
No sexual depictions and content involving anyone under 18 years of age.  Additionally, membership will not be granted to anyone under 18 years old.
No behaviour or actions intended to damage or disrupt this Mastodon instance or its performance.
No violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.

witter.cz.text: Žádný rasismus, sexismus, homofobie, transfobie, xenofobie.
Žádné podněcování k násilí nebo propagace násilných ideologií
Žádné obtěžování, dogpiling nebo doxxing ostatních uživatelů.
Žádný obsah nelegální v České republice nebo EU
Nesdílejte nepravdivé nebo zavádějící informace, které by mohly poškodit ostatní
Sexuálně explicitní nebo násilná média musí být při zveřejňování označena jako citlivá
K ostatním se prosím chovejte slušně, vyhněte se nadávkám a pokuste se udržovat příjemné prostředí. Díky!

wizarding-world.icu.text:
決まりがあるのは好きではないので、特に定めません。
ルールを明記しなくても楽しく遊べる、教養のあるやり取りを求めています。

wkly.ws.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia. Don't be an asshole.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

wjlafrance.net.text: This is a private blog, so there are no public rules. I'll try not to say anything too objectionable.

wmd.social.text: Be affiliated with Wave Motion Digital/family

wolfhaus.me.text: Use common sense and don't ruin other people's shit.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia or xenophobia
Nothing illegal and no incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. That includes warez.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not post racist, super edgy or other content that is meant to "trigger" people. Use common sense.
No Zoophile or NSFW Feral stuff
PLEASE put any NSFW content as sensitive content or put it behind a Content Warning to avoid defederation

wolvesare.sexy.text: Tag NSFW content as such with the Content Warning feature

wonderful.social.text: We are inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
No spamming. No personal attacks. Opinions are encouraged, provocation and antagonism are not.
We actively moderate and will suspend without appeal accounts that violate our simple rules. We may also de-federate any servers whose users harass or attack our users.

woof.group.text: If it'd be fine in a bar or public leather event space, it doesn't need a content warning here. Use content warnings for things you'd take to the back bar or a private room.
We're trans-inclusive, body-positive, and anti-racist here.
You must be over 18 years of age.
You must have the legal rights to any content you post.
When you apply, tell us a bit about your connection to queer leather/kink/BDSM.

woof.tech.text: Don't break the law, respect international laws and the Dutch and Finnish law (where this instance is located).
Be respectful. Don't insult, don't harass. Behave.
Don't be transphobic, homophobic or just a dick to someone because of their identity or who they are. We will act strongly on violations.

Content Warnings are required for NSFW content, kink and fetish content, and otherwise questionable topics (drugs etc.). Locked accounts are excluded from this rule as long as they specify this in their bio.
Do not impersonate someone else. If this is for parody purposes this MUST be clearly stated in your profile description.
Do not use an avatar that would warrant a content warning, do not use NSFW or otherwise "more than mildly questionable" banners.
When posting art, make sure to tag the original artist. Please do not post art you don't own / doesn't contain your characters or work.
NSFW art and pictures of underage characters or real animals are not allowed!

woodworking.group.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

worlds.social.text: Causing a new rule to be created will likely get you banned.
Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other forms of discrimination are not acceptable on this server.
Nudity and pornographic content is not permitted, including fan art and video game content.
Repeated, targeted harassment against an individual or group is unacceptable behavior.
Spam, advertising and bot accounts are not permitted.
Content that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Include why you want to join in your application so that we can tell you're a human and approve you! Check your spam folder for any approval email.

worldkey.io.text: Posting personal information without consent ("doxxing") is strictly prohibited
Posts that are inflammatory, inciting or unnecessarily provocative are not allowed.
Posts that stalk or harass other posters in any way are strictly prohibited.
This community will be intolerant of intolerance. (see Popper's paradox)
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
We will abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant available here: https://joinmastodon.org/covenant
When signing up, please include your Twitter handle, website, or other link in the “reasons for joining” field.

worldtravel.photos.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Do not violate someone else’s intellectual property rights.

worm.horse.text: You are only permitted to post non-actionable parody. Every post on worm.horse is to be considered as such.

wp-social.net.text: Auf WP-Social.Net ist kein Platz für beleidigende, diskriminierende, rassistische, extremistische, hetzerische oder sonstwie menschenverachtende Inhalte.

WP-Social.Net dient dem Meinungsaustausch, nicht der Werbung. Wir akzeptieren, dass Teilnehmer im Rahmen ihres Meinungsaustauschs für eigene Dienstleistungen werben. Wir akzeptieren aber nicht, wenn Teilnehmer unsere Plattform überwiegend zu Werbezwecken verwendet.

Wir erwarten, dass die auf WP-Social.Net veröffentlichten Inhalte nicht gegen gesetzliche oder behördliche Bestimmungen verstoßen. Dies gilt auch für Urheber- und sonstige Schutzrechte sowie die Vorschriften zum Jugendschutz.

Der Meinungsaustausch auf WP-Social.Net kann auch zu hitzigen Debatten führen. Wir bitten aber alle, hierbei sachlich zu bleiben und auf die allgemein üblichen Grenzen zu achten. Insbesondere akzeptieren wir weder Troll-Verhalten noch Argumentationen ad personam.

wptoots.social.text: No advertising. You may advertise your own work to a reasonable extent, reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.

Restrictive on bots. Bots are not generally disallowed, but they have to specifically post WordPress content in a reasonable way. Reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.

wp-punks.social.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.

wrannek.me.text: Sei kein Arsch!!! Behandele jeden so, wie Du gerne behandelt werden würdest!
Dies ist zwar eine private Instanz, aber auch Du kannst die  Möglichkeit bekommen, Dich hier anzusiedeln.
Dies ist eine spielorientierte Mastodon-Instanz. Es wurde von einem Gamer für Gamer erstellt. Poste alles, was mit Videospielen zu tun hat. PC-Gaming, Konsolen-Gaming, VR-Gaming.
Alle anderen Themen, die Dich interessieren, sind absolut erlaubt (siehe nächste Regel), aber das Hauptthema hier sind Videospiele.

Wir haben uns in diesem Fall versammelt, um eine Flucht aus der Realität namens Videospiele zu bieten. Wir lieben Spiele, wir leben Spiele. Wir begrüßen Dich in dieser Community mit jedem Thema, das Dich interessiert (außer Spielen), außer der Politik im wirklichen Leben.

Frieden, Liebe, Einheit und Respekt. Es ist die Absicht dieser Instanz, andere Menschen willkommen zu heißen, unabhängig von ihrer Hautfarbe oder Identität. Als Gamer gehen wir mit gutem Beispiel voran.

writ.live.text: Be Kind. Trolling and hateful comments have no place on this server. We reserve the right to moderate or ban any account that is consistently spiteful. You will be held accountable for the words you use.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
Incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies is prohibited.

wrestling.social.text: Be excellent to each other. This server does not tolerate racism, sexism, anti-LGBT bigotry.

write.echoless.space.text: One should strive to act with compassion and empathy toward all creatures in accordance with reason.
The struggle for justice is an ongoing and necessary pursuit that should prevail over laws and institutions.
One’s body is inviolable, subject to one’s own will alone.

The freedoms of others should be respected, including the freedom to offend. To willfully and unjustly encroach upon the freedoms of another is to forgo one's own.

Note that this does not mean freedom from consequences for one's actions including speech both written and spoken. Words matter.
Beliefs should conform to one's best scientific understanding of the world. One should take care never to distort scientific facts to fit one's beliefs.
People are fallible. If one makes a mistake, one should do one's best to rectify it and resolve any harm that might have been caused.
Every tenet is a guiding principle designed to inspire nobility in action and thought. The spirit of compassion, wisdom, and justice should always prevail over the written or spoken word.

wspanialy.eu.text: Media zawierające treści seksualne lub przemoc muszą być oznaczone jako wrażliwe podczas publikowania.

wue.social.text: Auf dieser Instanz sind alle Nutzenden willkommen, egal welcher politischen, religiösen oder sexuellen Ausrichtung und geschlechtlicher Identität.
Geht freundlich und respektvoll miteinander um. Auch wenn ihr andere Meinung seid.

Verboten ist die Verbreitung und Unterstützung gewaltverherrlichender, pornographischer,  rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, faschistischer, antidemokratischer, rechtspopulistischer, inhumaner, fremdenfeindlicher, homophober, transphober oder extremistischer Inhalte.
Verboten ist die Verletzung von Persönlichkeitsrechten ebenso wie Doxing.

Verzichtet aus Rücksicht auf andere Nutzerinnen und Nutzer auf Bilder mit Blut oder anderen Körperflüssigkeiten oder nackten Menschen. Wenn es wirklich wichtig ist, setzt wenigstens eine aussagekräftige Content Warning (CW).
Wenn jemand beleidigend, diskriminierend oder schlicht nervtötend wird, kann dieser Account auch ohne Ankündigung sanktioniert oder deaktiviert werden.

Datenschutz fängt bei dir an. Poste nichts aus deiner tiefsten Privat- und -Intimsphäre - auch nicht als Direktnachricht - und hinterlege keine sensiblen Daten. Das ist weder eine Hochsicherheits-Software noch ein zwölffach verschlüsselter Server.
Auf wue.social bist Du für deine eigenen Inhalte verantwortlich. Missbrauch kannst du mit den Reporting-Tools dieser Instanz melden.

wulf.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting to prevent issues with federation.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No content illegal in Canada, United States, Germany, or Estonia.
Do not knowingly share false or misleading information, misinformation, or disinformation.

No spamming, repetitive / redundant, or aggressive promotion. 
For personal project / self promotion, please include text with content, and use unique content.  
For third party promotion, please limit promotion to 12 times a day with supporting facts and never only links.

www.afcolegiado.app.text: El servidor de Mastodon solo estará disponible para los Administradores de Fincas Colegiados (AFC) registrados.
El uso del servidor está sujeto a cumplir con las leyes y normas aplicables en materia de protección de datos, derecho de autor, y cualquier otra regulación relevante.
Los usuarios deberán respetar las opiniones y creencias de los demás, evitando cualquier tipo de discriminación o acoso.
El contenido compartido en el servidor debe ser apropiado y respetar los derechos de terceros. Cualquier contenido inapropiado será eliminado y el usuario será sancionado.
El uso de la plataforma para fines comerciales está estrictamente prohibido, a menos que sea previamente autorizado por los administradores del servidor.
Los usuarios deben mantener la confidencialidad de cualquier información privada o confidencial obtenida a través del uso del servidor.
Los usuarios deben cumplir con las normas y regulaciones de la profesión.
Los administradores del servidor se reservan el derecho de revocar el acceso a cualquier usuario que no cumpla con estas normas de conducta.

www.blimps.xyz.text: You must be 18 years of age or older. No exceptions will be granted for "age of consent" or similar for your region. If discovered a minor, your account will be suspended.
No bigotry is permitted. We do not tolerate hate speech of any kind, including transphobia, homophobia, Islamophobia, or any other facet of one's being.
Be respectful: Treat others with respect. Assume good faith with everything. Text has limited ability to convey intent; be kind with yours.
NSFW or kink-driven content must be behind a CW giving a short summary of the content (e.g. "NSFW Art, inflation"), while ensuring media is marked as 'sensitive'
Zero tolerance for attacks. Harassing other users, whether on this instance or another, is cause for immediate suspension of your account.
Copyrighted content may only be shared in fair use contexts. Basically, if it would earn a DMCA takedown request filed against us, don't post it directly.

Take care in sharing sensitive information. While the admins here simply don't have the time nor interest to pry in the database, law enforcement could still have access as your messages are not encrypted at rest, same as nearly all other platforms. When in doubt, use a private messaging platform.

이 서버는 한국어를 하거나 읽고 쓸 수 있는 사람들을 위한 인스턴스입니다.
외국어도 허용되지만 가능한 한국어 사용을 권장합니다.
타인을 모욕하거나 괴롭히는 등 평화롭지 못한 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 반달리즘, 트랜스포빅, 사칭 등이 여기에 포함됩니다.

다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 내용은 CW/NSFW 표시를 꼭 해야하며. 예시로는: 고어물, 과도한 성적 묘사, 잔혹한 묘사, 과도한 빛의 반짝임 등이 있습니다.
추가로 실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 어긋나는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.
사전에 승낙을 얻지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다.

성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다. 
이러한 행동은 경고 없이 제재될 수 있습니다
특정 문화를 강요하거나 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 행동은 경고 없이 제재될 수 있습니다

위의 해당하는 규칙을 위반할 경우 처벌 수위에 따라 영구 정지 혹은 제재를 당하실 수 있으며
처벌 수위는 담당 관리자에 의해 결정됩니다
무분별한 가입과 어뷰징 행위를 막기 위해 저희 서버는 가입 이유를 필수로 묻고 있습니다. 특별한 이유가 있어 가입 제한을 하는 것은 아니니 자유롭게 하고 싶은 말이나 하고 싶은 일들을 적어주시면 누구든지 가입할 수 있습니다.

wxcloud.social.text: This is not a general purpose server. This is intended for use by weather enthusiasts and meteorologists.
This said, you can talk about anything you want (but talking about the weather, climate, and the environment often makes our local timeline useful).
Absolutely no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, bigotry, or prejudice of any kind. Engaging in any of the above is contrary to the spirit of Mastodon, and grounds for immediate suspension.
Please disagree in a respectful manner, not only on wxcloud.social -- but across Mastodon.

wzrds.fun.text: Respect Others: Treat fellow users with kindness and respect. Avoid any form of harassment, discrimination, or offensive behavior.
No Hate Speech: Do not engage in or promote hate speech, racism, sexism, or any form of discrimination.
Content Guidelines: Follow guidelines regarding acceptable content. This may include restrictions on explicit material, violence, or other sensitive topics.
Privacy: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent.
No Spam: Avoid spamming or excessive self-promotion. Keep posts relevant and of interest to the community.
Legal Compliance: Users should adhere to applicable laws and regulations. Illegal activities are not allowed.
Use of Resources: Do not engage in activities that may negatively impact server performance or hinder the experience of other users.
Reporting Issues: Report any violations or issues promptly to the administrators.
Multiple Accounts: Users may be limited to one account unless otherwise specified by the server rules.
Be Mindful of Local Rules: Familiarize yourself with and adhere to any specific rules set by the instance or server administrators.

x0r.be.text: Any kind of hate speech, racism or phobia against LGBTQ+ people is grounds for immediate account suspension.
These are not welcome on this instance: corporate accounts (non-profits are fine), advertising, one-directional crossposters from Twitter.

User accounts whose only activity consisted of registration, but did not post anything or follow anybody or interact with the fediverse in any other way might be deleted after a short period of time. This is in order to prevent bot activity.
When signing up, only about one out of ten requests are accepted. You can increase your chances by writing a more detailed description and including the word "Mellon" in your request.

xarxa.cloud.text:
[CA] No està permès fer SPAM o compartir enllaços que insinuïn SPAM (sobretot per a comptes nous)

[ES] No está permitido hacer SPAM o compartir enlaces que insinúen SPAM (sobretodo para cuentas nuevas)

[CA] Els comptes que estiguin inactives durant sis mesos, seran eliminades de la DB sense previ avís. L'esborrat de comptes es fa mensualment.

[ES] Las cuentas que estén inactivas durante seis meses, serán eliminadas de la DB sin previo aviso. El borrado de cuentas se hace mensualmente.

[CA] L'ús de "Crossposters" està prohibit en el servidor. Tant si és de Mastodon a Twitter o de Twitter a Mastodon.

[ES] El uso de "Crossposters" está prohibido en el servidor. Tanto si es de Mastodon a Twitter o de Twitter a Mastodon.

[CA] No està permès els comentaris que faltin el respecte a un usuari local o remot.

[ES] No está permitido los comentarios que falten el respeto a un usuario local o remoto.

Queda TOTALMENTE prohibido hacer comentarios y/o subir contenido multimedia de carácter racista, homófobo, de transfobia, sexista, capacitista o cualquier otra forma de discriminación.

[ES] Si se detecta que se está generando algún tipo de acoso a una persona del Fediverso la cuenta será suspendida inmediatamente.

[CA] Està prohibit qualsevol forma de militarisme així com posicionar-se clarament en un conflicte bèl·lic.

[ES] Está prohibido cualquier forma de militarismo así como posicionarse claramente en un conflicto bélico.

[CA] Està prohibit tot tipus de contingut religiós que sigui intolerant.

[ES] Para cualquier otra duda, revisar las normas explicadas de forma detallada en: https://xarxa.cloud/about/more

xcloud.zone.text: Keine rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigten, feindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache.
Kein Belästigung einzelner Personen durch ungewünschte Kontaktaufnahme, Stalking oder Doxing.
Kein Verbreiten von urheberrechtlich geschütztem Material.
Kein Verbreiten von Materia, welches gegen das Persönlichkeitsrecht verstößt.
Nicht jugendfreie Beiträge müssen als solche gekennzeichnet werden.
Profilbilder und Banner, die nicht jugendfrei sind, werden nicht toleriert.
Werbung muss als solche gekennzeichnet sein. Übermäßige oder automatisierte Werbung wird nicht toleriert.
Bot-Accounts müssen als solche gekennzeichnet sein, dürfen nicht auf der lokalen Timeline posten und dürfen nur mit Nutzer:innen interagieren, wenn sie dazu eingeladen worden sind.

xelebre.com.text: No harassment; including but not limited to persistent insult, pressure, or intimidation, block evasion, slander, callout posts, or whisper campaigns.

No bigotry; personally attacking individuals based on categories including but not limited to: age, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, sexual history, race, ethnicity, national origin, former or current religious creed, disability, medical conditions, kinks, fetishes or paraphilias.

No abuse material; this includes but is not limited to CSAM/CSEM or other child abuse material, ASAM or other animal abuse material, revenge porn, and videos or photos of deaths from war or otherwise (snuff films).
No spam, including of text, images, and videos
No live porn; do not post live-action pornography as original posts on Xelebre Space.
No censorship; all material that is allowed under United States law and is not explicitly prohibited by one of the other rules is permitted on Xelebre Space.
No promotion of pro-abuse ideology; including but not limited to pro-parental abuse rhetoric, pro-contactism, rape apologia, genocide or ethnic violence denial/apologia, police apologia, etc.
By signing up to Xelebre Space you affirm that it is legal for you to view the content therein in your region.

xerrem.xyz.text: No estan permesos els discursos d'odi ni les actituds feixistes, racistes, xenòfobes, LGTBI-fòbiques, masclistes, capacitistes, grassòfobes, aporofòbiques ni de qualsevol altra classe de discriminació, assetjament, abús o falta de respecte a persones o col·lectius.
No està permesa la divulgació o promoció de notícies falses, teories pseudocientífiques, fets paranormals, conspiracions infundades ni fraus.
Es permet fer publicacions informatives, de denúncia o històriques de tots els temes tractats en els punts anteriors, però han d'anar obligatòriament marcades amb una advertència de contingut (CW).
No està permesa la publicitat dirigida, massiva, reiterada o encoberta (spam) ni de caràcter persuasiu.

És obligatori l'ús de les advertències de contingut (CW) en publicacions de caràcter molt sensible: nuesa explícita, sexe, violència, sang, drogues dures, sorolls sobtats, imatges de terror, imatges estroboscòpiques (epilèptiques), etc.
És recomanable l'ús de les advertències de contingut (CW) en publicacions de caràcter sensible: seminuesa, drogues blanes, menjar (especialment d'origen animal), contacte visual, etc.

Les eines de publicació creuada automatitzada (Twitter ⇆ Mastodon) es poden fer servir de manera complementària a l'ús habitual dels comptes. Aquestes publicacions han d'anar marcades com a “No llistat”.
No estan permesos els comptes fantasma que només estan actius a través d'eines de publicació creuada.
No es permet l'accés a Xerrem! a menors de 16 anys.

Les entitats sense ànim de lucre poden crear-se un compte lliurement a Xerrem!. Les entitats amb ànim de lucre han de demanar permís a info@xerrem.xyz i contribuir econòmicament amb les despeses del servidor.
La llengua d'ús habitual de Xerrem! és el català. Es permet publicar tuts, enllaços i etiquetes en altres idiomes, però la seua aparició en Explora es pot veure limitada en favor d'altres en català.

xforum.dev.text: Be cautious about the personal information you share. Assume that any information could become public in an unlikely incident event. This is an unofficial, self-managed platform.
No harassment or discriminatory speech will be tolerated. Harmless jokes, banter and fun are most welcome! Please post alt text for images

Understand that this unofficial platform is maintained by volunteer admins from our workforce, not IT professionals. The security measures may not be robust as those of officially sanctioned corporate tools.
Use Content Warnings where appropriate. No NSFW content. Moderators reserve the right to remove content or access for any behavior deemed inappropriate.
Accounts on this server are for staff of the University of Exeter only. Please use your work email to sign up. Registration sign-ups are screened.
Adherence to Terms: All members are expected to follow these guidelines and the general terms of service of Mastodon.
You are free to question or request changes in these rules, but such discussion needs to be settled before you break them.

yeen.social.text: This is a first version of the rules. Being apart of this instance means that you agree to and follow them during your interactions on it and through it, the wider Mastodon federation.

yeen.social is an instance designed to be a safe space for furries. As such, people should be respectful of one another. Please be argumentative in your debates. Fuck nazis & all sorts of bigotry. Discrimination of any kind does not have a place in this server :)

If you have encountered a problem with this instance or an interaction on it, don't hesitate to contact @deeryeen. I'll try my best to administer or moderate any issues that might appear.
This instance is hosted in Germany, we will use their baseline for lawful content online. There are to be no discourse about illegal activities and or illegal content.

Das Diskutieren mit Freunden und anderen Fans geht am besten mit einem freundlichen und respektvollen Umgangston. Seid nett zueinander! Jeder hat das Recht auf eine freie Meinung – im Rahmen des gesetzlich Erlaubten.
Nicht erwünscht sind unter anderem: Beleidigungen, Drohungen und Verunglimpfungen aller Art, Aufforderungen zu Gewalt, Wahl- und Parteienwerbung.

zirk.us.text: No sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions.
No gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions.
Racism, antisemitism and any form of harassment and discrimination on the basis of culture/background will not be tolerated.
Misogyny, transphobia, homophobia and any form of harassment and discrimination based on a person's sex, gender identity or sexual orientation will not be tolerated.

No promotion of disinformation, "alternative facts", conspiracy theories, etc.

znajomi.suwerenni.org.text: Bez kłamstwa, chamstwa, agresji, fałszu, przemocy, oszustw i obrażania kogokolwiek.

zombofant.net.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
No right or alt-right bullshit, Nazi content, conspiracy narratives. There is a zero-tolerance policy for Nazis. Why? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox_of_tolerance

When posting to the local timeline, provide Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like “uspol, elections”).

NSFW content / Nudity: NSFW is discouraged, but allowed unless it can be considered harassment or the sole point of depiction is the fact that it falls into this category. NSFW tags are required. Porn is never allowed. NSFW content depicting minors is never allowed.
When posting to the local timeline, provide image descriptions.

Promoting harmful items: It is not allowed to promote potentially harmful items such as weapons, drugs, narcotics, items that can be considered harassment, combustion cars, gambling or high-risk investments, including cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
No SLA: At this time, we are not in a position to commit to any SLA. It's a hobby. I cannot make a uptime guarantee.

Safety Recommendation: Use a private relay email and a uniquely generated password. I may not always be able to apply the security patches as soon as they're released. Treat any data you submit to this server as potentially public data.
Consequences: Failure to comply with this code of conduct may result in immediate suspension at the discretion of the moderator.
Unannounced Changes: This code of conduct can be updated at any time without prior notice.

zocial.ee.text: Слежка за пользователями и сбор данных - запрещены.
Шутки любого рода разрешены, но переход на личности нежелателен.
Распространение наркотических средств запрещено. Если будет запрос по данному делу, то данные будут переданы куда следует. Это же и касается обнажёнки до 18 лет.

Если вас что-то не устраивает, вы можете обсудить это с администрацией. Если вашу просьбу отклонили - нажмите alt+f4. К сожалению эта не та социальная сеть, где будут прогибать ваши интересы. Тут свободные и разные интересы.
Можно ли обсуждать военные действия на Украине, и поддерживать ту или иную сторону? Да можно, это свободная социальная сеть.
Всё что касается фото/текста деликатного характера, как правило это обнажёнка, должны быть скрыты тегом CW. В случае картинки, она будет размыта, пока пользователь не кликнет по ней.
Запрещено маскироваться под администрацию (ник, имя и прочие действия, связанные за выдачу себя в качестве администрации).
